headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abavubuka abawangaalira e Bungereza okutandikawo emirimu e Uganda
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abavubuka ababeera e Bungereza okutandikawo emirimu egy’enjawulo mu ggwanga lyabwe omuli okuzimba amakolero bayambeko ku bavubuka bannabwe abaasigala e Uganda. Okusaba kuno katikkiro abyogeredde Bungereza bwabadde asisinkanye abavubuka ababeera e London mu Bungereza ku ssomero lya School of Orient and African Studies. Owek. Mayiga agamba eno y’engeri yokka gyebagenda okutaasa bavubuka banabwe abataayayiza ku nguudo z’ekibuga olw’ebbula ly’emirimu. Ono era abasabye okukozesa obukugu bwe bafunye ku ssetendekero ono bekulaakulanya basobole okuleka omukululo. Katikkiro abakuutidde okusigala nga bawuliziganya n’abenganda zaabwe mu Uganda, kibayambe okuyunga oluganda kuba gye basibuka. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu Owek. Joseph Kawuki, Owek. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, Omulangira Dawudi Ggolooba; Ssaabalangira Godfrey Musanje Kikulwe, Abataka okubadde Nakigoye, Walusimbi,Ggunju, Kyaddondo, ne Kasujja wamu ne Bassenkulu b’ebitongole by’obwakabaka okubadde Omuk. Simon Kaboggoza – BLB; Omuk. Michael Kawooya Mwebe n’abalala.

headline: Bakutte 7 ku by’okusaba abantu ssente babayingize Emyooga
text: Kampala Poliisi e Nakaseke ekutte abantu musanvu abavunaanyizibwa ku by’enkulaakulana mu kitundu kino ku bigambibwa nti, basabye abantu enguzi okubawandiisa mu nteekateeka y’Emyooga eruubirirwa okuggya abantu mu bwavu. Abamu ku bakungu ba gavumenti nga batongoza Emyooga Omwogezi wa poliisi mu bitundu bya Savannah, Isa Ssemwogerere, ategeezezza nti abakwate kuliko ow’eggombolola y’e Ngoma ttawuni Kkanso, Wakyato, Kinoni, Kinyogoga, Nakaseke, Kito ne Kikamulo era nga bano okukwatibwa poliisi yasoose kutemezebwako omu ku bantu ababadde basabiddwa ssente. “Abakwate basabye emitwalo 5 ku buli muntu okusobola okubawandiisa mu nteekateeka y’Emyooga. Twakutteko musanvu era nga tulina omulala gwe tukyanoonya,” Ssemwogerere bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Ssemwogerere bano babagguddeko emisango gw’okulya enguzi era nga bagenda kwongerwako emisango gy’okukozesa obubi woofiisi zaabwe. Enteekateeka y’Emyooga egenderera okuyamba abantu naddala banneekolera gyange nga mu bano mulimu; abavuzi ba boodabooda, ddereeva ba takisi, aba wooteeri, abookya ebyuma, abatunda mu butale, abavubuka, abakyala, abantu abaliko obulemu, bannazirwanako, abasomesa awamu n’abavubi. Mu kaweefube ono buli SACCO egenda kufuna obukadde 30 ng’ezentandikwa, wabula abasomesa n’ebibiina bya bakulembeze abalala bajja kufuna wakati w’obukadde 50 ne 60. Kinajjukirwa nti Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyenfuna, Haruna Kyeyune Kasolo, yalabula ng’okwewandiisa mu nteekateeka eno bwe kuli okwobwereere era n’alabula abavunaanyizibwa ku by’enkulaakulana mu byalo obutajja ku bantu ssente. Kasolo era yalabula n’abafunye ssente zino okukimanya nti zirina okusasulwa era nga singa zinaabalemerera bajja kusibwa. Ono yagattako nga bwe baleese Emyooga oluvannyuma lw’okulaba ng’enteekateeka ezaasooka zonna bwe zaalemwa okubbulula abantu mu bwavu.

headline: Aba CBS Fans Club bafungizza ku Mmwanyi Terimba
text: Abawuliriza ba leediyo ya CBS abeegattira mu kibiina kya CBS Fans Club mu ttabi lya St. Balikuddembe mu Buddu bafungizza okwekulaakulanya nga balima emmwanyi mu nkola y’Emmwanyi Terimba. Sophia Nabatanzi ne Juma Katende nga balaga bwebafunye mu kirime ky’ Emmwanyi Bano okuli; Sophia Nabatanzi ne Juma Katende, be baawadde obujulizi ku lwa bannaabwe ne bategeeza nti wadde waliwo ebibasoomooza naye obulamu bwabwe bukyuse nnyo olw’ekirime ky’emmwanyi nga kati baweza yiika 25. Bano balimira ku kyalo Kabaale-Kibisi mu ggombola ya Lwabenge mu disitulikiti y’e Kalungu ng’okulima emmwanyi bakumazeemu emyaka 8. Era nga bagamba nti ekibatusizza ku kino bwe bwegassi ne basaba abantu ba Kabaka okunyweza obumu. Olwaleero bano bakyazizza ssentebe wa CBS fans Club ettabi ly’e Kyaddondo Ssendyowa George William n’alambula ebimu ku bye bakola era n’awera naye okwekolamu omulimu n’abantu b’akulembera. Bw’abadde alambula Ssendyowa abasabye okwagazisa bannaabwe abalala basobole okulima emmwanyi. Okusinziira ku Katende, basobodde okuteekawo ekyuma ky’emmwanyi okubayamba okwongera ku mutindo kuba baakizuula nti abaguzi babadondola wamu n’okugula nga babajerega. Katende asabye wabeewo ekikolebwa ku kawuka akakaza emmwanyi era n’asaba Obwakabaka okubayamba babafunire eddagala basobole obutafiirwa. Bano basabye bammemba bannaabwe abakyakolera mu kibuga yokka beeyunire n’okulima kuba okulima tekusala.

headline: Mwewale obukuluppya bwemuba bakuwaangula-Katikkiro
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga agambye nti kampuni yonna okuwangaala n’okuwangula, bannayiniyo bateekeddwa okuba abamalirivu wamu n’okuba n’obukugu mukyebakola.   Okwogera bino, Ow’omumbuga abadde ku wooteeri ya Serena mu Kampala nga kkampuniye ne munne Francis Buwule, ey’amateeka eya Mayiga & Buwule Advocates, eweza emyaka 25 ng’eweereza Bannayuganda.  “Lubadde olugendo olubaddemu eby’okuyiga bingi. Tetwalina nsimbi zitandika wabula obumalirivu n’ekirowoozo kyetwalina era twawagirwa abantu bangi,” Mayiga bweyategeezezza.   “Ekyokuyiga kyetufunye mu lugendo luno kiri nti buli kintu kyonna ky’oyagala okukola weetaaga abantu abalowooza nti kirungi nebakuwagira. Twali balenzi bato, okutandika kampuni nga gyetugenda okuyimirirako kyali kyetaaaga obumalirivu.”   Katikkiro yanyongeddeko nti esonga endala eyabasobozesezza okuwangaala ne munne wamu n’abawagizi baabwe, kwekuba nga bafubye okukola emirimu gyabwe nga tewali bukuluppya yadde okukukuta.   “Emirimu gyetukola tulina okuba nga tugirinamu obukugu betukolera babe bamativu ate babuulire n’abalala. Twebaza nnyo abo abatwesize era kati waliwo omujiji omuto ogwa bannamateeka ndowooza baggya kusobola okutwala omulimu guno mumaaso.”

headline: Kampuni Ya Bannamateeka Ba Buganda Ekkiriziddwa Okutandika Emirimu
text: Bya Musasis waffe  Oweek. Christopher Bwanika  Akakiiko akakola ku nsonga z’abannamateeka kayite Law Council, kakakasizza kampuni ya Buganda eya Bannamateeka emanyiddwa nga Buganda Royal Law Chambers okutandika okukakkalabya emirimu. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa eyawandikiddwa Margret Apiny, ssaabawandiisi wa Law Council, Obwakabaka bwatuukirizza ebisaanyizo byonna ebyetaagisa okutandika kampuni ya bannamateeka. “Nga nkozesa obuyiinza obumpeebwa Law Council mu kawaayiro nnamba 6(1) akabannamateeka, era oluvannyuma lw’okumatira nti Buganda Royal Law Chambers, ekitongole kya bannamateeka, ekisangibwa e Bulange… kisaanidde okukola amateeka, tukiwadde satifekeeti eno…era yakukola okujjako nga ebaggyiddwako,” ebbaluwa ya Apiny bwesoma. Nga ayogerako ne Gambuuze, Ssaabawolerereza wa Buganda OweeK. Christopher Bwanika ategeezezza nti oluvanyuma lw’okufuna olukusa luno, kampani ya bannamateeka ya kutandika ng’omwaka guno tegunnaggwako. “Tuli beetegefu okuweereza abantu ba Ssaabasajja abalina emisango mu makkooti ag’enjewulo. Ekyenjawulo kuffe nti tugenda kuba balambulukufu mu mirimu gyaffe era tusuubira nti abantu tujja kubaweereza bulungi,” Bwanika bweyagambye. Woofiisi ya bannamateeka eno esangibwa ku mwaliro ogw’okubiri mu Bulange Mmengo.

headline: Ab’e Masaka beemulugunyizza ku nsimbi eziweebwa okwekulaakulanya
text: Masaka – Buddu Abakyala abeegattira mu disitulikiti 9 mu bendobendo ly’e Masaka atambulira wansi wa  Uganda Womens’ council  beemulugunyizza ku nsimbi ezibaweebwa okwekulaakunya n’engeri gye zibatuukako bye bagamba nti bibulamu. Okwogera bino bano babadde ku  Tropic Inn Hotel mu Masaka bwe basisinkanye okutema empenda ku ngeri gye basobola okugenda mu maaso.  Bano bategeezezza nti  ensimbi ezibaweebwa gavumenti okwekulaakulanya eza UWEP (Uganda Women entrepreneur programme) enfuna yaazo si nnambulukufu, nga bassentebe b’eggombolola mu bitundu ebimu okuyinza bwazo babubaggyako nebabuwa bakyala baabwe. “Wadde gavumenti erwanye nnyo okulaba nga twekulaakulanya naye abamu kuba Ssentebe ku magombolola obukiiko bwabwe tebakwatagana nabo nga bwe gutuuka ku bya ssente batusula bbali, mu byandibadde ebifo byaffe ne bateekawo bakyala baabwe.” Abakyala bwe bategeezezza .  Abakyala beemulugunya nti ng’oggyeeko bakkansala abakiikirira abakyala n’abakulembeze b’obukiiko bw’abakyala bwe balina naye waliwo obwetaavu bakkirizibwe mu ntuula za gavumenti z’ebitundu okusobola okugoberera ebigenda mu maaso.  Abakyala bawakanyizza eky’okuggya  ssente zino mu minisitule y’ekikula ky’abantu ziddizibwe mu minisitule ya gavumenti ez’ebitundu kuba kigenda kukosa obuweereza. Akulembera abakyala mu kibuga Masaka,  Florence Owamaria, annyonnyodde nti obulyake obufumbekedde mu bagaba ensimbi zino tebwogerekeka kuba buli kibiina ekifuna ku nsimbi zino abakulu bazisolooza. Ate akulira akakiiko k’abakyala mu ggwanga, Faridah Kibowa asinzidde wano n’ategeeza nga bwe bagenda okutongooza enteekateeka gye batumye Mayumba kkumi n’ataano (15),nga mu eno buli kyalo baakulondayo amaka 15 ge bagenda okuteekako essira okulaba nga g’ebbulula mu by’enfuna n’ebyobulamu.

headline: Abakooki bawanjaze bakwatirweko ku by’enfuna n’ensula
text: Rakai –Kkooki Abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira mu ssaza ly’e Kkooki mu disitulikiti y’e Rakai, bawanjagidde Obwakabaka ssaako n’Abazirakisa, okubakwasizaako okubaggya mu mbeera gye bayitamu, basobole okukyusa obulamu bwabwe. Omukyala bba gweyasula mu nnyumba ekutte mu mbinabina nga annonnyola byayitamu. Bano okuli; abakadde, bannamwandu, bamulekwa n’abalala, bagamba nti basanze okusoomoozebwa mu by’enjigiriza, mu by’enfuna, mu by’endya, ssaako n’ebyensula era wano we basabidde Obwakabaka okubwakwasizaako. Abakooki bino babiroopedde abakulu okuva mu gavumenti ya Kabaka ne bannamukago b’ekitongole kya Habitat for Humanity, ababadde bakyaddeko mu ssaza lino nga bamazeeyo ennaku 2 mu kaweefube w’okulaba engeri gye basobola okuteekawo amaka ag’enjawulo wansi w’enteekateeka eyatuumibwa amaka amalungi ,akaalo amatendo. Bano bagenyiwaddeko mu maka ag’enjawulo okuli aga mukyala Harriet Akayo ku kyalo Byakabanda mu ggombolola ya Ssaabawaali- Byakabanda, Nakisekka Gertrude ku kyalo Kigayazza mu ggombolola ya Ssaabagabo Buyamba, Nakanwagi Jane ku kyalo Kabala mu ggombolola y’e Kifamba, Nakafeero Hasifah ku kyalo Kagamba, Namayanja Janet ku kyalo Kigayazza, Namazzi Ferisitansi n’abalala. Wabula abantu bano battottodde ebizibu bye bayitamu oluvannyuma lw’okufiirwako abantu baabwe abaali babayambe kyokka nga n’abalala abaami baabwe baabaddukako ne babalekera obuvunaanyizibwa nga tebamanyi mayitire baabwe. Wano we basinzidde ne basaba Abazirakisa okubakwatirako. Ye omuweereza mu Minisitule y’ebyettaka, obulimi, Bulungibwansi n’obutonde bw’ensi, Mujjuzi Azizi nga yatumiddwa Oweekitiibwa Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo okutambula n’aba Habitat for Humanity, ategeezezza nti baagadde okumanya embeera abantu bano mwe bali era balabe oba basobola okuganyulwa mu nteekateeka eno. Ono era ategeezezza nti abantu b’e Kooki okusinziira ku kye balabye beetaaga okuyambibwa era n’asaba Abazirakisa okuyamba ku bantu bano. Ate ye Brenda Luyiga okuva mu kitongole kya Habitat for Humanity agamba nti balina omukago ne Ssaabasajja okutalaga amasaza gonna n’ekigendererwa ky’okunoonya abantu abateesobola, engeri gye bayinza okuvvuunuka obuzibu buno. Ye omukwanaganya w’emirimu gya Ssaabasajja Kabaka e Kkooki, Owek. Nakalanzi Gertrude Ssebuggwawo, annyonnyodde nti obwetaavu mu bantu be bwali bungi n’asalawo okuwandiikira bakama be e Mmengo okumuyambako okutumbula ebyenfuna, ebyenjigiriza n’ebirala. Abatuuze n’abakulembeze mu kitundu kino, bo balaze obwennyamivu ku mbeera bannaabwe gye bayitamu nga bagamba nti eyungula amaziga.

headline: KITALO! Omutandisi wa kkampuni za Ssembuule afudde
text: Munnabyanfuna era omutandisi wa kkampuni ya Ssembuule eyeegulira erinnya mu kukola ttivvi, leediyo awamu n’ebintu ebirala, Christopher Ssembuuya yafudde olunaku lw’eggulo ku Lwokubiri. Ssembuuya afiiridde ku myaka 85 era ajjukirwa nnyo olw’okuwa bannayuganda emirimu era w’afiiridde nga wakayita ebbanga lya myaka mitono ng’alaajanidde gavumenti ebbanga okumuyambako azze kkampuni ze engulu oluvannyuma lw’okutawaanyizibwa n’ensimbi, ekitaasoboka. Ezimu ku kkampuni Ssembuuya z’abadde nazo kwe kuli; Ssembuule International ne Ssembuule Steel Mills ebadde ekola amabaati n’ebizimbisibwa esangibwa e Nalukolongo. Olumbe lwakumiddwa mu maka g’omugenzi agasangibwa e Kololo mu Kyaddondo era okusinziira ku beng’anda, wategekeddwawo okusaba ku Lutikko e Namirembe ku Lwokuna. Okusaba nga kuwedde, omulambo gujja kutwalibwa ku kyalo Kikwaya e Nkokonjeru mu ssaza Kyaggwe omugenzi gy’agenda okuziikibwa ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno.

headline: Abakulembeze abaggya babanguddwa ku mbalirira
text: Bukomansimbi – Buddu Abakulembeze  abalonde e Bukomasnimbi  babanguddwa  ku ngeri gye bayinza  okuteekerateekera  abantu ab’enjawulo okusobola okuganyulwa mu mbalirira ya disitulikiti mu ngeri ey’ekyenkanyi. Omusomo gw’okubangula abakulembeze guyindidde ku kitebe kya disitulikiti  y’e Bukomansimbi  nga gukulembeddwamu  Lukungu Bashiri okuva mu kitongole  ekirafuubanira obwenkanya ekya Equal  opportunities  Commission,  okuyamba n’okuzibula  abakulembeze  maaso  okumanya omulimu ogwabatumwa abalonzi. Omukugu Lukungu Bashiri  ategeezeezza nti kya bwenkanya abantu mu biti  eby’enjawulo  omuli; abaami, abakyala, abavubuka ,abaliko obulemu n’abalala  okuganyulwa  mu buli kintu ekikolebwa  mu mbalirira ya disitulikiti eno. Lukungu alabudde  abakulembeze obutetantala kusibira balonzi ekikookolo nga beekwasa nti akalulu kawedde bano abasabye okuweereza abalonzi kyenkanyi kuba kati kaseera kakuweereza bantu. Bo bakkansala abeetabye mu musomo  guno beebazizza  abaategese omusomo guno  kubanga  baabayambye okubazibula amaaso  nga bingi bye baayize  bye baabadde tebamanyi omuli  obutaagaliza. Mu ngeri yeemu  Ssentebe wa disitulikiti eno omulonde,   Nyenje  Fred Kayiira, yategeezezza nti abakulembeze bayina okukola emirimu gyabwe obulungi. Yasabye bakkansala okwewala entalo mu kkanso naye bafeeyo ku kimu kya kuweereza bantu naddala bwe kituuka ku kuyisa embalirira. Mu kwogera kwe amyuka omubaka wa Pulezidenti  e Bukomansimbi,  Asaba David Nkojjo,  yategeezezza  nti baakuyambako  abakulembeze bano  naddala ng’essira baliteeka mu kuweereza abantu n’okunyweza obumu.

headline: Beene awadde aba BUCADEF emmotoka okutumbula ebyobulimi
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II awaddeyo kapyata w’emmotoka Toyota Hillux eri ekitongole kye ekya BUCADEF, okubayambako okutumbula ebyobulimi n’obulunzi mu bantu be okusobola okweggya mu bwavu. Omukolo gw’okukwasibwa emmotoka eno gubadde mu Bulange- Mmengo leero ku Lwokubiri nga gukoleddwa omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek. Hajji Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo. Owek. Kaawaase bano abalabudde okwewala okukozesa emmotoka eno mu mirimu egitaligya Bwakabaka kuba giyinza okwonoona ekitiibwa kyayo. “Nkukwasa ekidduka kino eri ekitongole kyaffe ekya BUCADEF kuba kisaale nnyo okutambuza ensonga ezituukira ddala ku muntu owaabulijjo owa Ssaabasajja Kabaka.” Owek. Kaawaase bw’ategeezezza. Eyakiikiridde Ssenkulu wa BUCADEF, Muwanga Samuelategeezezza nti emmotoka eno egenda kubayambako okutuuka ku muntu asembayo okubeera ewala mu kyalo okusobola okumuyamba okwekulaakulanya. Oluvannyuma aba BUCADEF bakwasiddwa emmotoka eno mu butongole ate ebadde ekaddiye n’etwalibwa okuterekebwa.

headline: Kabaka awadde Bannabusujju ensigo beekulaakulanye
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda, Ronald Mwenda Mutebi II adduukiridde abalimi ba kasooli mu ssaza Busujjun’ensigo za kasooli ez’omulembe basobole okuzisiga mu nkuba eno etonnya, bafune emmere era beekulaakulanye. Ensigo zino zibakwasiddwa Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi mu Bwakabaka, Owek. Hajji Amisi Kakomo n’asaba abazifunye okuzisiga basobole okufunamu amakungula amalungi. Okusinziira ku Owek. Kakomo, zino zigenda kusooka okuweebwa ab’eggombolola ya Ssaabagabo ne Ssaabaddu Malangala. Kasujju Mark Jjingo Kaberenge II asinzidde wano n’aloopera Owek. Kakomo nti abalimi bagezezzaako okulima naye ebbeeyi y’ebirime ekyali wansi, ekintu ekibamalamu amaanyi n’abamu okufiirizibwa. Mu kiseera kye kimu wabaddewo n’okukyusa obuweerezang’abadde Ssaabaddu-Malangala, Erineewo Kalibbala Ssempiira obuweereza abukwasizza abadde omumyuka we Edward Ddungu Nyonyintono. Ono asabye amuddidde mu bigere okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obumuweereddwa era ne Nyonyintono n’awera okubeera omuwulize eri Nnamulondo.

headline: Gavumenti eddiza bamakanika ekitundu ku katale ka Kisekka, bazina gunteese
text: Gavumenti eddiza ekitundu kya katale kowa Kisekka ekibaddeko ekibaati okumala emyaka 8 eri abasuubuzi naddala bamakanika basobole okukikoleramu era bakikulaakulanye. Ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kibuga ki Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA) kyekikoze kino wakati mu bukuumi obwamaanyi okuva mu magye ne poliisi. Akulira ekitongole ki KCCA, Dorothy Kisaka asinzidde mu kifo kino nategeeza nti kyebakola kwekuteeka mu nkola ekiragiro kya Pulezidenti Museveni kyeyawa nabasaba okwezza obuyinza bw’obutale era babuwe bamufunampola babuddukanye.  Kinajjukirwa nti ekifo kino kimaze ebbanga nga kikaayanirwa wakati w’abagagga abavaayo okukikulaakulanya awamu n’abasuubuzi. Akulembeddemu ekikwekweto kino, Maj Gen Emmanuel Kuteesa ategeezezza nti sibaakussa mukono okutuusa nga bamufunampola batandise okuganyulwa mu butale obwateekebwawo gavumenti. Ye amyuka omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Yasin Ndidde Njasabiggu agamba bamakanika okubafunira webakolera kigenda kuyamba nnyo ku kukendeeza obumenyi bwamateeka obubadde bufuuse ekyonga ewa kisekka. Bo bamakanika n’abasuubizi baaniriza enteekateeka eno era nebasiima Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okubafaako era bano mukujaganya basaze ente nga akabonero ak’obuwanguzi bwebafunye oluvannyuma lw’ emyaka 8.  Engoma n’embuutu nabyo bisindogomye nga bamakanika bagamba babadde mumbeera mbi etabasobozesa kunoonya nsimbi. Enkayana zino ezimaze ebbanga zibadde wakati wa gavumenti ne Rtd Brig Mugyenyi eyali nnanyini ttaka nerimutwalibwako mu lukujjukujju wadde gavumenti egamba nti ono gavumenti yali yamusasula. Akatale kewa Kisekka keegasse ku Wandegeya okununulwa gavumenti nekadda mu mikono gya bamufunampola era KCCA erina enteekateeka ezitalaaga obutale bwayo bwonna nga ekola kyekimu.

headline: Abaakwatibwa nga babba obuwumbi mu URA basibiddwa emyaka 20
text: Kkooti ensukkulumu mu Kampala ekkaatirizza ekibonerezo ky’emyaka 20, kkooti erwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi kye yawa abasajja abaakwatibwa nga bagezaako okuyita ku mutimbagano babbe ssente eziwera obuwumbi 2.4 okuva mu kitongole ekisolooza omusolo ekya Uganda Revenue Authority (URA). Abasajja bano; Nsubuga Guster ne Byamukama Robinhood baakwatibwa mu mwaka gwa 2012 oluvannyuma lw’okunoonyereza okwalaga nti baagezaako okuyingira mu byuma by’ekitongole kino ebya ‘Automated System for Customs Data (ASYCUDA).’ Bano baaluka olukwe okulaba nti emmotoka 150 zifuna ennamba awatali kusasula musolo mu bbanka kyokka nga waliwo lisiiti ezaaweebwayo mu URA okuyingiza emmotoka zino, zonna zaali njigirire. Mu 2013, baasimbibwa mu kkooti ewozesa obukenuzi era ne bavunaanibwa emisango okuli; okuyingira mu kompyuta za URA, obufere n’okubbira ku mutimbagano awamu n’okuyingira mu byuma by’ekitongole ne basomola ebyama byakyo awatali lukusa. Bano baasingisibwa emisango okuli; okukola, okutunda, okugula awamu n’okusangibwa ne pulogulaamu za kompyuta ezisobola okuyingira mu kompyuta z’ekitongole n’okubbayo ebyama, ekintu ekikontana n’akawaayiro 12(3)ne 20 ak’etteeka lyaComputer Misuse Act, 2011. Kkooti ewozesa obukenuzi bano, buli omu yamusiba emyaka 20 awamu n’okutanzibwa ddoola 4500 buli omu. Wabula bano baddukira mu kkooti ejulirwamu era ne baddamu okuwozesebwa naye ekitongole kya URA tekyamatira ku ebyo ebyasalibwawo era ne kisalawo okujulira mu kkooti ensukkulumu. Ku Mmande, Kkooti ensukkulumu yawagidde ekya bano okusibibwa emyaka 20 buli omu oluvannyuma lw’okukkaanya ne URA nti buli kimu kyagobererwa nga bano baweebwa ekibonerezo. “Ennoongosereza ezaakolebwa(Anti-Corruption Court) tezirina bwezakyusa nnaku z’omwezi wadde ebikulu ebyali mu musango guno, tekikola makulu okusazaamu omusango guno olw’ennoongosereza.” Kkooti ya Ssemateeka bwe yategeezezza. Kkooti ensukkulumu yaggumizza ekibonero ky’emyaka 20 eri abasajja bano oluvannyuma lw’okusibwa emyaka 12 ne 8 ku misango gyonna era ng’ekibonerezo balina kukikola lumu. Wabula bano kkooti ebaggyiddeko emyaka gye bamaze ku alimanda nga kati buli omu agenda kusibwa emyaka 10.

headline: Ab’e Ssembabule basiimye enkola ya  CBS PEWOSA
text: Ssembabule Abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira e Ssembabule mu Mawogola wansi w’enteekateeka ya CBS PEWOSA, basiimye Nnyinimu olw’ekirowoozo kino ekibayambye okwekulaakulanya. Bano abeegattira mu kibiina kya Magezi Bugagga – CBS PEWOSA MITIMA mu ggombolola ya Mutuba I, Lugusuulu bategeezezza nti enkola eno ebayambye okubaako kye bafiisa era ne batereka okumala omwaka mulamba. Okusinziira ku ssentebe kino, Kagolo Fesito Ndawula, omwaka guno bakoze bulungi wadde nga wabaddewo okusoomooza kw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. “Twebaza nnyo Ssaabassajja Kabaka olw’obuyiiya n’amagezi okussaawo CBS PEWOSA kuba etukoze obulungi kuba kati we njogerera abantu abatereka ssente zaabwe okumala omwaka, ssente zaabwe zaatuuse dda ku akawunta zaabwe.” bwe Kagole bwe yannyonnyodde.  Ono agamba nti enkola eno ebayigiriza okutereka kuba baatandikira ku 2000  ne badda ku emitwalo 2 wabula kati boogerera mu bukadde naye olwaleero bonna bammemba 30 batereka obukadde obusoba mu 20.  Ye omwami wa Kabaka atwala eggombolola eno,   Nantume Hamidah, yakunze abantu naddala abakyala mu kitundu kino okweyunira CBS -PEWOSA kibayambe okwekulaakulanya n’okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe kuba kati babugabana n’abaami. Omu ku bammemba , Kanaluswata Joseph, yannyonnyodde nti enkola eno ebasizeemu obumu ne kibayamba okugenda mu maaso. Ate ye Tumusiime Angellah agamba nti kyali kizibu okutereka ssente awaka n’atazikozesa naye kati ebintu byakyukamu kuba mu CBS- PEWOSA atereka talina kyatya.

headline: Aba KACITA  beegayiridde gavumenti ereme kuzza Kampala ku muggalo olwa Ebola
text: Abasuubuzi mu Kampala abeegattira mu kibiina ki , Kampala City Traders Association (KACITA ), basabye gavumenti obutalowooza ku kya kuzza ggwanga ku muggalo ng’emu ku nkola y’okutangira ekirwadde kya Ebola okusaasaana. Ssaabawandiisi wa KACITA, Thaddeus Musoke agamba nti abasuubuzi beetegefu okukolagana ne gavumenti okulaba nti baziyiza ekirwadde kino singa ebeera tegaddewo. “Omuggalo gwa COVID-19 gwatukosa nnyo era tukyakaluubirirwa embeera, tulina looni za bbanka, batubanja ez’obupangisa ate abamu bizineensi zabwe zaggalawo, buli lwobikkula empapula z’amawulire olaba ebintu byabantu nga bitundibwa ku nnyondo,” Musoke bwe yategeezezza bannamawulire mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Musoke, bataddewo abantu okutambula nga basomesa abasuubuzi ku ngeri akawuka kano gyekasobola okwewalibwa era kino bakukikola nga bakolagana ne Poliisi, KCCA awamu ne Minisitule y’e byobulamu era abo abajeemera ebiragiro ebigenda okubaweebwa ebifo byabwe bijja kuggalwa. Bino webijjidde nga abakulu mu gavumenti naddala mu Minisitule y’ebyobulamu bagenda mu maaso n’okukubiriza abantu okwewala ekirwadde kino kuba singa kyongera okusaasaana eggwanga lisobola okuzzibwa ku muggalo. Musoke era akoowodde bannanyini bizimbe okukakasa nti bataddewo ebifo abantu webanaabira engalo ku buli mulyango oguyingira mu kizimbe era bateekewo n’obuuma obupima ebbugumu awamu ne bannannyini maduuka okulaba nti tegabaamu mujjuzo. Ono agamba bagenda kutongoza enkola ya Bulungibwansi naye ku luno kyebagenda okwesibako kwekusomesa abantu ku kirwadde kya Ebola era nga bakutandikira mu katale ka Owino. Kinajjukirwa nti Minisita w’ebyamawulie mu gavumenti eyawakati , Dr Chris Baryomunsi, yategeeezza ku Lwokusatu nga bwebanaba kulowooza ku kyakuteekawo Kampala n’emirilaano ku muggalo mu kaseera kano nga kyebeemaliriddeko kwekunoonya abantu bonna abatabaganako n’abazuuliddwamu ekirwadde kino.

headline: Obwakabaka busse omukago ne Centenary Bbanka okufunira abantu ennyumba ku ssente entono
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyitira mu kitongole kya Buganda Land Land Board, busse omukago ne Centenary Bbanka awamu ne Henan Guoji Group, okuzimbira abantu ba Kabaka ennyumba ku bbeeyi eya wansi. Gouji, Centenary Bbanka ne BLB nga batta omukago Bw’abadde atongoza omukago guno mu Bulange -Mmengo ku Lwokusatu, Kamalabyonna Mayiga agambye nti ekimu ku bintu ebitawaanya ennyo abavubuka, kwe kuzimba kuba kwa bbeeyi. “Okuzimba enju kintu kirungi naye kimalako nnyo abavubuka ssente. Ekisookera ddala omuvubuka asooka n’anoonya ssente okugula ettaka, ettaka eriri mu bifo ebirungi lya bbeeyi ate nga n’ebizimbisibwa nabyo bya buseere.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Kamalabyonna Mayiga agamba nti wakati ng’abavubuka bakuutirwa okumala emisomo, okufuna omulimu n’okuwasa ekiddako libeera bbanja lya kuzimba nnyumba wakati mu byetaago ebingi by’abeera nabyo. “fFe ng’Obwakabaka, tulowooza nti omuntu bw’aba yeekutte bbanka nga Centenary, asobola okuwewulwako ku buzibu buno.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro mu mukago guno, bbanka ewa Gouji ssente z’ennyumba omuntu gy’aba asiimye ate Buganda Land Board n’ewa aba bbanka ekyapa, olwo omuntu n’ayingira ennyumba. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti bbanka ky’ekola kwe kuwa omuntu ebbanga eggwanvu okusobola okuzzaayo ssente z’ebeera ewadde kkampuni ya Gouji olwo obulamu ne butambula nga tali ku muliro. Omu. Simon Kaboggoza, ategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka ayagala abantu be basule bulungi era bawangaalire mu bulamu obweyagaza. Ku lwa Buganda Land Board, Omuk. Kaboggoza y’ataddeko omukono ku lwa Buganda Land Board, Beatrice Lugalambi ku lwa Centenary, ate Shen Windy ku lwa Henan Guoji group. Mu nteekateeka eno, ennyumba zino zitandikira ku bukadde 58 ku nnyumba ey’ekisinge ekimu okutuuka ku nju y’Obukadde 130 era zonna ziri mu kifo ekiteekeddwateekeddwa obulungi.

headline: Minisita Baryomunsi agamba gav’t yandiwera okukuba ekyeeyo mu mawanga ga Buwarabu
text: Minisita w’ Amawulire era omwogezi wa gavumenti, Chris Baryomunsi agamba nti gavumenti etandise okulowooza ku ky’okuwera bannayuganda okutwalibwa mu mawanga g’Abawarabu kuba bano basusse okutulugunyizibwa. Bino minisita Baryomunsi yabitegeezezza bannamawulire bw’abadde abategeeza kwebyo ebyavudde mu lukiiko lwa baminisita olwatudde wiiki eno. Baryomunsi agamba nti olukiiko luno lwabadde lukubirizibwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni era yalagidde Minisita w’ekikula ky’abantu n’abakozi, Betty Amongi okuvaayo ne alipoota enambulukufu ku bannayuganda abatwalibwa mu mawanga gano okukuba ekyeeyo. Okusinziira ku Baryomunsi, kkabineeti okutuuza okulowooza ku kino kiddiridde bannayuganda abawerako okuvaayo nebeemulugunya ku mbeera gyebakoleramu mu bitundu bino nga abamu batuuse nokufiirwa obulamu. Bweyasisinkanye abali mu mulimu gw’okutwala bannayuganda ebweru, Among yabategeezezza nti gavumenti eyinza okuwera omulimu guno singa abagukola tebavaayo na nteekateeka ekakasa nti okubonyabonyezebwa kwa bannayuganda abali ku kyeeyo kuyinza okubaako ekkomo. “ Kkabineeti esinze kutunuulira kya kutulugunya bantu, omwaka guno gwokka emisango 300 gyegiloopeddwa bannayuganda nga ebikolwa by’okubakabasanya bikwata kyakubiri ku bizibu byebasinga okusanga,” Amongi bw’annyonnyodde. Amongi agamba nti kabineeti yalaze okutya ku biwulirwa nti bannayuganda abamu baggyibwamu ebitundu byabwe eby’omubiri nga ensigo nebitundibwa abamu nebakafiiramu. Minisita Amongi yannyonnyodde nti Kkabineeti yetemyemu ku nsonga eno nga baminisita abasinga obungi baagala ensonga y’okutwala bannayuganda ku byeyo ekome ate nga abalala bagala esooke ewummuzibwemu okumala akaseera nga gavumenti bweteekawo enteekateeka enaziyiza okutulugunya bannayuganda abatwaliddwayo. Alipoota eyakoleddwa ekitongole ekitaba kampuni ezitwala abantu ebweru ki ‘Uganda Association of External Recruitment Agencies (UAERA)’ yalaze nti bannayuganda emitwalo 35 bebakolera mu mawanga ga Buwarabu nga abamu bakola waka ate abalala bakola mirimu mirala. Wabula ekitongole ki UAERA, kirabudde nti singa gavumenti enawera okutwala bannayuganda ku kyeeyo mu bawarabu kigenda kuleetawo okubakukusa kuba mu ggwanga temuli mirimu.

headline: Muwagire amakampuni ga Bannayuganda-Katikkiro
text: Katikkiro agguddewo Ettabi eppya erya Sekanyolya systems. Lisangibwa ku kizimbe kya “Kingdom Kampala” okumpi ne Uganda Broadcasting Corporation (UBC). Bano batunda byuma ebikozesebwa mu kukuuma, omuli; camera, ne ssengenge.   Ssenkulu wa kampuni eno, Elijah Zizinga yagambye nti ettabi lino litandikiddwawo okwanguyiza abantu abava mu bitundu ebiriranye Kampala okufuna obuweereza obwamangu. Katikkiro yasabye bannayuganda okuwagira ebintu ebikoleddwa mu Uganda okusobola okukulaakulanya eggwanga. Yagasseeko nti n’amakampuni gano gateekeddwa okukola obulungi okusikiriza abantu babawagire.  “Kikulu nnyo amakampuni agaagala okuwangaala okusukka ku myaka etaano okutegeera bakasitoma baago era n’ebakola nga bwebaagala. Okusomoozebwa okusinga obukulu gw’emutindo gw’obuweereza bwaffe,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Yasiimye nnyo Ssekanyolya n’omutandisi waayo Zzinga olw’obuweerezabwabwe obulungi. N’agamba abantu abaagala okuwangula balina okwagala byebakola.

headline: Abasuubula ennuuni bawakanyizza eky’okuwa abagwiira bokka olukusa okugitunda
text: Bannayuganda abasuubula ennuuni batabukidde gavumenti olw’okutiitiibya abagwiira nenyigiriza bannansi ate nga bebasinga okubeera n’omugabo ku ggwanga lino ekintu ekyongedde okubakuumira mu bwavu n’okuzza emabega enkulaakulana. Bano abeegattira mu kibiina ki ‘Uganda Fish Maw Traders Association’ bategeezezza nti enkola eriwo ey’okuwa abagwiira olukusa okugula n’okutunda ennuuni okuzitwala ebunaayira erina okukoma mu bwangu oba ssi kyo bagenda kwekalakaasa. Amyuka Ssentebe w’abasuubuzi bano Jackson Yiga Musisi ne Ssaabawandiisi Richard Matovu bagamba nti waliwo abakungu mu gavumenti abakikola mu bugenderevu okulemesa bannansi obusuubuzi bw’ennuuni ku myalo egy’enjawulo. Balumiriza nti ttenda zonna ziweebwa bagwiira olwo bannansi nebateekebwako obukwakkulizo obungi ennyo okusobola okubalemesa omulimu guno kyebagamba nti bagenda ku kilwanyisa kuba tekirina gyekitwala ggwanga era bakwekalakaasa mu bbanga lya wiiki bbiri singa ensonga eno tekolwako mu bwangu. Oluvannyuma lw’ebigambo okuyiting’ana ku nsonga eno, Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku buvubi mu ggwanga Hellen Adoa, yavaayo nategeeza nti tewali mugwiira yenna yaweereddwa layisinsi kusuubula nnuuni wabula natangaaza nti ekiseera kyebalimu kya kwekeneenya kkampuni zonna eziri mu mulimu guno nga mwezo zebatunuulidde mwemuli neza bannayuganda ezaateekamu okusaba. Minisita Adoa agamba nti ennuuni kyekimu ku byongedde okuleetawo ebikolwa ebityoboola kw’ennyanja olw’abantu abaagala ssente ez’amangu. Ennuuni ya ttunzi nnyo ku katale k’ensi yonna nga kiro yaayo egula wakati wa ddoola za America $450 ne $1000 (shs1.5 m – 3.6m) olw’ebintu ebingi ebigikolebwamu wabula munda mu ggwanga kiro egula wakati w’emitwalo 16 na 35. Bino webijjidde nga waliwo Abayindi nebasaba gavumenti ewere bannansi okulya empuuta zisigale kutundibwa wabweru w’eggwanga awamu n’okuziggyamu ennuuni ekintu bannansi gyebawakanya ennyo.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akunze abantu okunywa Kkaawa
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiya, akunze abantu bulijjo okunywa kkaawa beesonyiwe ebimwogerwako kuba tebiriiiko mutwe namagulu. Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde ku mbuga y’ essaza Buddu ku Mmande bw’abadde aggulawo omwoleso gwa CBS PEWOSA, ogumaze ennaku ttaano nga guyindira mu kifo ekyo. “Njagala okutegeeza abantu nti balekere awo okutya okunywa kkaawa. Wajjawo ebyogerwa nti kkaawa akubisa entunuusi, nti alina obuzibu bwaleeta ku bakyala, ebyo byonna byaleetebwa abavuganya nga baagala abantu baleme kunywa kkaawa, okulwala entunuusi kireetebwa omuntu alina emisuwa emifunda nga amazzi amangi nga gayita mu mufulege omutono era bwegutaba mu kipimo kituufu guyinza okwabika,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Ono era asaabuluddde ebigambibwa nti kkaawa alemesa abantu okwebaka nagamba nti singa omuntu anywa ekintu kyonna nga agenda okwebaka ayinza okulemwa okwebaka kuba okwebaka omuntu alina okubeera omukakkamu mu bwongo n’omutima.  Okusinziira ku Mayiga, singa abantu banajjumbira okunywa kkaawa kijja kuyamba nnyo okwongera okumufunamu nga batondawo akatale akasooka nga bwe guli ku matooke. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti enteekateeka eno eggidde mu kiseera ekituufu ng’Obwakabaka buli mu kaweefube ow’okutumbula n’okuzzaawo ekirime ky’emmwanyi, owa Mmwanyi Terimba, n’asiima n’ebitundu bya Uganda ebirala abantu gye bawulidde kaweefube ono ne balima emmwanyi. Katikkiro era yeebazizza aba Masaka Cooperative Union olw’ebbanga eppanvu lye bamaze mu mulimu ogw’emmwanyi, nga ne mu kiseera kino, bakyagulimu nnyo.  Akiikiridde baminisita b’ebyobulimi mu ggwanga era minisita amawulire, Owek. Noah Kiyimba asabye gavumenti okukendeeza oba okujjawo omusolo ku bintu ebikozesebwa mu bulimi nobulunzi kyanguye enkulaakulana. Ate Ssenkulu wa CBS, Omuk. Michael Kawooya alambuludde ku nteekateeka gyebalina nga baagala omwoleso guno okubunyisibwanga mu masaza ga Buganda gonna okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Nnaalinya Sarah Kagere ne Bbaale Mugera, Ppookino Jude Muleke, abaami b’amasaza abalala, abantu ba bulijjo n’ abaana bamasomero .

headline: Abavubuka basabiddwa okwettanira obulimi bakulaakulane
text: Abavubuka bakubiriziddwa okwettanira eby’obulimi era bafube okubeera abayiiya kibayambe okwegobako obwavu. Amagezi gano gabaweereddwa omukugu mu bya bizineensi Dr. Peter Kimbowa mu musomo ogwategekeddwaminisitule y’abavubuka mu Buganda nga eyita mu kitongole ky’abavubuka mu Bwakabaka ki Buganda youth Council . “Kyetusookera ddala okusosowaza kwe kulima, Oba olina ettaka oba tolina. Tulina okubaawo n’ebibiina by’obweggasi nga biri ku magombolola. Emmere kye kintu ekigenda okubeera ekintu ekikulu ennyo mu nsi eno n’okusinga amafuta.” Bwatyo Dr. Kimbowa bw’ababangudde. Dr. Kimbowa annyonnyodde nti akaseera katuuse abavubuka bakomye okunyooma eby’obulimi wabula bakozese amagezi gebafunye okulinnyisa omutindo gw’ebyobulimi olwo basobole okubyagazisa abalala era kikendeeze neku bbula ly’emirimu eriri mu ggwanga. Minisita w’Abavubuka emizannyo nokwewumuza mu Bwakabaka Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu afalaasidde abavubuka okweyambisa enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka nga eno eziteekawo okukyusa obulamu bwabwe naddala mukiseera kino nga eggwanga likyali mu kusoomozebwa kwa sennyiga corona agotannyiza kumpi buli kimu. “Buganda egenda ku ntikko eteekeddwa okuba n’obusobozi obukola abalala byebatasobola kukola esobole okufuna abalala byebatalina esinziire okwo eyambe ebitundu bya Buganda ne Yuganda oba olyawo n’ensi yonna.” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye Ate ye Ssentebe w’Abavubuka ba Buganda Baker Ssejengo agamba nti okuyita mu misomo nga guno bayina essuubi nti ekiruubirirwa kyokusitula embeera y’ abavubuka kyakutuukirira ate nokulaba nga batuukiriza obuvunannyizibwa bwabwe ku lugendo olkwokuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Olukungaana luno lutambulidde kuy mulamwa oguvuga nti Omuvubuka n’Ebyenfuna wakati mu kusoomozebwa . Obwakabaka bwakugenda mu maaso nenteekateeka nga eno okulaba nga abavubuka mu Buganda nr Uganda okutwaliza awamu bakuguka mu bintu ebyenjawulo okufuuka abomugasso eri egwanga

headline: Obwakabaka butandise okwetegekera olunaku lw’obwegassi
text: Obwakabaka butegese olunaku lw’okukuliza obulimi n’obwegassi wakati mu kaweefube w’okunnyikiza omutima gw’okukolera awamu n’obumu mu bantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka kiyambeko okulwanyisa obwavu mu bitundu bya Buganda ebyenjawulo. Kino kirangiriddemu lukiiko olutegeka emikolo gino nga lukubiriziddwa Minisita w’Ettaka, Obulimi n’Obwegassi, Owek Hajjat Mariam Nkalubo Mayanja era lwetabiddwamu Omwami w’essaza Busujju, Kasujju Mark Jjingo Kaberenge II nga lutudde Maanyi mu Busujju ku Mmande. “Obwakabaka bwa Buganda ng’ennaku z’omwezi 30 omwezi guno bugenda kukuza olunaku lw’obulimi n’obwegassi nga ku mulundi guno basazeewo olunaku luno lukuzibwe mu ssaza ly’e Busujju wansi w’omulamwa, ” Obulimi n’obwegassi bwe bugagga. Tubadde n’olukiiko okuttaanya embeera yonna.” Minisita Nkalubo bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Owek. Mayanja, ku lunaku olwo Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga y’asuubirwa okubeera omugenyi omukulu era ng’ajja kusooka kulambula abalimi b’emmwanyi wansi w’enteekateeka y’Emmwanyi Terimba muggombolola y’e Maanyi n’e Kakindu era alambule n’emmerezo y ’emmwanyi eyateekebwa ku ssaza. Katikkiro Mayiga era ajja kulambula abalimi era aggalewo omwoleso gw’abalimi n’obwegassi era akoowodde abantu ab’enjawulo okujja basobole okubangulwa ku bwegassi ng’ebibiina ebigenda okwolesa mwe muli Wamala Growers ne CBS PEWOSA. YeOmwami w’essaza Busujju, Kasujju Mark Jjingo Kaberenge II yeebazizza Beene olw’okuwaayo olunaku lunon’asaba bannabusujju okujja basobole okwongera okufuna obukugu basobole okulinnyisa omutindo gw’ebyo bye bakola. Ate ye amyuka Ssentebe w’ekibiina ky’obwegassi ekya WamalaCooperative Union, Kuteesa Christopher Nsubuga agambye nti kiseera kya kusoomoozebwa kuba bannayuganda eby’obwegassi baali babisudde wala naye ekiseera kikyaliwo okwetereeza. Nsubuga asabye abantu okukimanya nti buli lwe bakola omulimu nga basusse mu muntu omu bwe bubeera obwegassi n’alaga bannayuganda obwetaavu bw’okunyweza obumu okusobola okufunamu era babeera n’ekyokusalawo ku bbeeyi n’okulima mu bungi.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asisinkanye abakungu ba IMF
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga asisinkanye omubaka w’ekitongole ky’ensi yonna ekiwola ensimbi ekimanyiddwa nga International Monetary Fund (IMF) mu Uganda, Izabela Karpowicz ne babaako ensonga ze bateesaako. Abakulu bano basisinkanidde ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange e Mmengo leero ku Lwokubiri era wano Katikkiro Mayiga amulaze nsonga enkulu Buganda z’esimbyeko essira era omugenyi ono Katikkiro amwanjuliddwa Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro, Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa. “Kirungi okubeera nti omubaka wa IMF otukyaliddeko okuzuula engeri gye tulwanaokukwasizaako gavumenti okutumbula embeera z’abantu baffe kuba abantu baffe abasinga bali mu byalo ate nga bavubuka era nga beetaaga okuyambibwako.” Owek. Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Okusinzira ku Owek. Mayiga mu zino mulimu okutuusa ku bantu amazzi amayonjo, okumalawo endwadde, okukola ku byenjigiriza n’ensonga endala. Era ensisinkano eno egendereddwamu okugaziya nkolagana wakati wa Buganda n’ebitongole by’ensi yonna n’okwongera ku mikago Buganda gy’erina. Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga asinzidde mu nsisinkano eno ebadde mu kisenge kya Kabineeti wano ku mbuga enkulu Bulange e Mengo, abuulidde Karpowicz nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asoosowaza nnyo ensonga ezikwata ku bulamu bw’abantu be mu byenjigiriza, ebyobulamu, n’ebintu ebirala kubanga Kabaka ayala bantu. Mukuumaddamula era agamba nti mu zino zonna Omutanda aba ayagala bantu be basobole okwebeezaaawo era nga zonna ziruubirirwa kuleetawo nkulaakulana nga mu zino mulimu Emmwanyi Terimba, okuweerera abaana nga bayita mu Kabaka Education Fund awamu n’okutumbula eby’obulamu nga balwanyisa endwadde enkambwe . Omubaka wa IMF mu ggwanga, Izabela Karpowiczategeezezza nti ayize bingi ku Bwakabaka bwa Buganda naddala ku ngeri gye bufunvubiddemu okulaakulanya abantu ba Kabaka awamu ne Uganda. Ono asuubizza okwongera okukolagana ne Buganda awamu ne Uganda kuba balabye ng’ezimu ku nteekateeka z’Obwakabaka zikwatagana n’ebiruubirirwa byabwe eby’okusitula bannansi.

headline: Katikkiro  Mayiga akuutidde  bannanyini kampuni okunyweza omutindo
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu abalina kampuni n’emirimu egy’enjawulo bulijjo okunyweza omutindo kibayambe okugenda mu maaso olwo bakulaakulana ne Buganda edde ku ntikko. Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde mukulambula Gombolola ya Makindye Mutuba III ku Lwokusatu, nga asookedde ku kifo ekisanyukirwamu ekya Climax entertainment centre era kino akigguddewo mu butongole. “Buganda okugenda ku ntikko tulina okulongoosa emirimu, ogubadde ku ddaala lino gutuuke ku ddaala lino. Buli lw’oyagala okwezimba, olina kulongoosa ekyo ky’okola nokirinyisa omutindo. Obunafu bwetulina abantu bangi batya okukola eby’omutindo kuba bimalawo ssente nyingi naye ssente eweesebwa ssente,” Kamalabyonna Mayiga bw’ategeezezza.  Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti bwobaako byotandise nebwoleeta bannaddiini bebakiwonga eri Katonda naye nolemwa okuteekamu ssente tolina ky’osobola kukifunamu. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Buganda okudda ku ntikko zisimbye emirandira mu bantu baayo okutambula nga bagenda mu maaso era nabakuutira bulijjo obutadda mabega. Ono asabye bulijjo abantu okukuuma eddaala kwebalinyira era bakomye okulisamba wabula bulijjo bajjukire gyebavudde okusobola okwekeneenya gyebalaga. Akuutidde abakozi ku mitendera gyonna okutwala ebifo mwebakolera okusinga nnyini kyo kuba singa wabaawo ekizibu ku bifo bino bebasinga okukosebwa era nga kibeera kyangu emirimu okugifiirwa.  Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu mu Bwakabaka, Owek. Joseph Kawuki asabye abamu ku bakozi bebasanze mu bifo ebirambuddwa okubeera abakozi era emirimu bagikolere mu buyiiya n’obumalirivu. Owek. Kawuki asabye abantu bulijjo okunyweza obukakkamu n’obuntubulamu era bongere omutindo mwebyo byebakola kibayambe okulaakulana. Ye Nnanyini kifo kino era nannyini wa Pakalast, Coffee Plus ne Mirano, Raphael Lule yeebazizza Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okubakubiriza bulijjo okukola awamu n’okulaakulanya Obuganda. Oluvannyuma Katikkiro Mayiga yeyongeddeyo okulambula ebifo ebirala mu ggombolola eno.

headline: Tetujja kukendeeza ku misolo , kyabulabe –  Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni awakanyiza eby’okukendeeza ku misolo mu ngeri y’okuyamba bannayuganda ku bbeeyi y’ebintu epaluuse ku bintu eby’enjawulo. Kinajjukirwa nti mu myezi esatu egiyise ebbeeyi y’ebintu ezze yeyongera nereka abantu abawerako nga tebalina busobozi ku byetuusaako era nebasaba gavumenti ebayambe olwo amafuta bwegeyongedde bwegarinye embeera netabukira ddala. Bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga ku mbeera eno, Pulezidenti Museveni yagambye nti tebasobola kusala ku misolo kuba kyabulabe nnyo eri eggwanga. “Okuggyawo emisolo oba ogugikendeeza ku bintu ebiggyibwa ebweru ebeera nsobi era kyabulabe. Nali ndowooza tukendeeze ku misolo gy’ebintu byetukolera wano nga sukaali, Seminti kuba abantu bwebongera okubigula kibeera kirungi okutuusa lwenatuula ne kabineeti netulaba emisolo gyetuba tugenda okufiirwa,” Museveni bwe yagambye. Museveni yalaze nti singa baggya emisolo ku seminti bafiirwa emisolo obuwumbi 200, Sukaali obvuwumbi 193 ate obuwumbi 120 ku mitayimbwa, ono agamba nti kino kibeera kya bulabe nnyo wadde embeera y’ebyanfuna mbi nnyo kuba gavumenti tejja kusobola kukola nguudo, masanyalze awamu n’ebirala. “ Okufiirwa omusolo kijja kukosa embalirira yaffe nebyo byetutegese okukola. Okusomoozebwa kuno kwa kaseera buseera,” Museveni bwe yalambuludde. Museveni agamba nti eby’okusooka okuyimiriza mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo nga bakendeeza emisolo okusobola okukendeeza ku bbeeyi y’ebintu sikya magezi. Okusinziira ku Pulezidenti Museveni wadde ssente ya Uganda egudde, ebbeeyi naye bwotunuulira ekiri mu mawanga amalala nga UK. Spain, US n’ensi z’ Afirika, Rwanda ne Kenya, Uganda ekyakola bulungi. Ono agamba nti ekizibu ky’ ebbeeyi y’ebintu tekyenkana kizibu kya COVID-19 nategeeza nti singa kibeera kikwatiddwa bulungi eggwanga lisobola okukivunuka. Museveni yannyonnyodde nti amagezi akadde kano kali mu kusooka kwesonyiwa bintu ebitetaagisa era batunuulire nnyo ebyo ebikolebwa wano nga bweboogerezeganya n’amawanga g’ebweru okulaba bwebasobola okuyambako ku mbeera eriwo.

headline: Ab’Embogo bakoze kaawa w’emmwanyi
text: Bazzukulu ba Kayiira e Mugulu bakoze kaawa w’emmwanyi nga kino bakikoze okwongera omutindo ku mmwanyi nga ono bamutuumye ‘Mbogo Coffee.’ Kaawa wa Mbogo atongozeddwa omumyuka wa Katikkiro owookubiri era Minisita w’ebyensimbi,Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa kuPanthal Suits e Goma Seeta -Mukono mu Kyaggwe. Minisita Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwettanidde nnyo okuyitimusa okulima emmwanyi nga kati ky’ekiseera okulaba nga bannansi bettanira okunywa kaawa okusobola okutumbula akatale ak’awaka. “Emmwanyi erina essente, toyinza kubeera awo olin’agamba nti zimpole ate osobola okutunda ekimuli wadde kino tetukikkiriza kuba twagala munoge myufu era osobola okuzitunda n’ekikopo. Tetwetaaga kuggya bazungu bweru okutuyigiriza okugirima wadde ebigimusa ebingi ennyo kuba tulina nnakavundira waffe.” Owek. Waggwa bw’agasseeko. Owek.Nsibirwaannyonnyodde nti emmwanyi kirime kyattunzi era ekivaamu ebintu ebyenjawulo ate nga kaawa kyakunywa kya mugaso nnyo eri abantu nga kisaanye okussibwamu amaanyiera bannansi basaanye okutegeezebwa emigaso egiri mu kaawa n’emmwanyi. Omuzzukulu wa Kayiira eraakulembeddemu enteekateeka eno, Edward Lutakome Ssentamu agamba nti baagala okutumbula omutindo gw’emmwanyi erimibwa mu Buganda kuba esobola bulungi okuvuganya ku katale k’ensi yonna. Akulira okulondoolaomutindo gw’emmwanyi mu kitongole kya ‘Uganda Coffee Development Authority,’ Doreen Rose Reihabwe ategeezezza nti Uganda ly’eggwanga erisinga okulima emmwanyi ku lukalu lwa Africa, kyokka ng’ezisinga zitundibwa wabwerunga waliwo obwetaavu okuzongerako omutindo. Reihabwe alaze nga bwe bakwataganye n’ekitongole kyaNARO okukuza ekika ky’emmwanyi ya Robusta ekirimibwa e Brazil kuba bazudde nti kisobolaokukola ku ttaka lya wano.

headline: Katikkiro akyalidde MTK Uganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga akyaddeko mu maka ga kampuni ya MTK Uganda Limited okubayozaayoza okuweza emyaka 52 nga baweereza bannayuganda. Katikkiro , Mw. Xavier Kitaka omutandisi wa MTK Uganda Ltd. Kaggo, Minisita w’Amawulire mu Bwakabaka wamu n’abakozi abalala aba MTK Uganda.  Katikkiro yeebazizza nnyo omutandisi wa kampuni eno Xavier Kitaka olw’okuweereza obwakabaka wamu n’okwagala Kabaka we. Mu ngeri yeemu yamwebazizza okwagala eddiini ye n’okuweereza Katonda.  Katikkiro nga ali n’abakozi ba MTK Uganda Limited. Katikkiro era wano akubirizza abakozi okwagala emirimu gyabwe, bagyemalireko kubanga business bweggwawo bebasinga okukosebwa. Era wano Katikkiro yalambudde ebifo abakozi gye bakolera (offices) emirimu awamu ne sitoowa gye batereka eddagala erikolebwa.  MTK bakola eddagala ly’abantu n’ebisolo era nga baludde mu nsiike eno ey’okukola eddagala.

headline: Basabiddwa okwettanira omukutu gwa K2 -Eggumidde
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu mu Buganda ne Uganda okwettanira omukutu gwa K2- Eggumidde okusobola okuganyulwa mu mpeereza ey’omulembe era bakulaakulane. Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokuna, bw’abadde atongozza enteekateeka y’okubunyisa enjiri ya Airtel -K2 Egumidde mu masaza ga Buganda ag’enjawulo nga ali wamu ne bannamukago okuva mu kampuni ya Airtel. “Emikago gikula bwe wabaawo obwesigwa wakati we njuyi zombi era nkakasa aba Airtel nti Obwakabaka bujja kukola ekisoboka okukuuma omukago ogukoleddwa. Bw’oba oyagala okubaako by’okola tambula naabalina ensa, nga K2 bwe yakola ku Airtel ” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti okuva lwe batta omukago ne Airtel mu 2018, K2 yajjula, era kati K2 eggumidde era n’obuweereza bwayo buggumidde nasaba abaami ab’Amasaza okukola obwa kitunzi bwa K2 mu Masaza gaabwe era bajagazise abantu. Akuutidde abaweereza bonna mu Bwakabaka okwettanira Obuweereza bwa K2. Agambye nti tewakyali nsonga yonna lwaki Minisita wa Kabaka; Ssenkulu, oba omuweereza wa Kabaka yenna alemererwa okukozesa K2 ng’ate eggumidde. Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Owookubiri era Minisita w’Ebyensimbi n’Okuteekerateekera Obwakabaka, Oweek Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, annyonnyodde nti nga bayita mu nkola ya K2 eggumidde, baagala abantu ba Kabaka bakole bizineensi s nga bakozesa K2 eggumidde. Owek. Waggwa agamba nti mu byenkizo K2 byerina kati by’ebyempuliziganya, amayengo n’okutambuza n’okutereka ensimbi awamu n’okuzisiga era abantu ba Nnyinimu basobole okufunirako amagezi ag’enjawulo nga bakozesa omutimbagano ku bbeeyi esinga okubeera wansi. Ssenkulu wa Airtel mu Uganda, Manoji Murali, agambye nti eky’enkizo ekiri ku Buganda kye ky’okuba nga abantu ba Kabaka bali mu buli kitundu kya Uganda, era oli asobola okusinziira gy’ali naawagira emirimu gya Kabaka nga anyiga *173# ne bw’aba talina line ya 0708 oba 0709. Ssenkulu wa K2 Telecom, Omuk. Arthur Mawanda, alaze nti mu kiseera kino K2, ewezezza ba kasitoma abasukka akakadde kamu (1m) nga bano bagenda kuganyulwa butereevu mu nkola empya ezijjidde mu kikapu kya K2 eggumidde omuli ‘internet’ edduka sipiidi, okusindika ssente n’ebirala. Mu nteekateeka eno, Katikkiro Mayiga akwasizza Abaami b’Amasaza essimu ekika kya sseereza eziweereddwayo aba Airtel bagende bakubirize abantu ba Kabaka beeyunge ku mukutu gwa K2 eggumidde.

headline: Omubaka Adeke ne Nyanjura basindikiddwa ku alimanda e Luzira
text: Kampala Kkooti ya Law Development Centre (LDC) esindise bannakibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) okuli omubaka omukyala owa Soroti Adeke Anna Ebaju n’omumyuka wa Loodimmeeya, Doreen Nyanjura ku alimanda. Bano basibiddwa wamu ne Nanyonjo Susan, Amony Alice, Wokuri Madanda ne Mariam Kizito oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa ku nkulungo e Mulago nga beekalakaasa ku miwendo gy’ebintu egyekanamye awamu n’okuwakanya obukadde 30 ezasabiddwa Dr. Kizza Besigye okweyimirirwa. Okusooka bano baggaliddwa ku poliisi y’e Wandegeya gyebabadde bakuumirwa oluvannyuma nebasimbibwa mu maaso g’Omulamuzi Augustine Alule gyebavunaanibwa omusango gw’okukuba olukung’aana olumenya amateeka. Bano bonna emisango bagyegaanye nga bayita mu bannamateeka babwe abakulembeddwamu Erias Lukwago, Ivan Bwowe ne Samuel Muyizzi era nebasaba okweyimirirwa. Balooya bano bategeezezza kkooti nga abavunaanwa bwebalina ebifo ebyamaanyi mu ggwanga ate nga tebasingisibwangako musango gwonna oba okweyimirirwa ku kakalu ka kkooti nebamenya amateeka gaako. Omulamuzi bano agaanye okubeeyimirirwa nabasindika e Luzira okutuuka lwebanaddamu okuwulira okusaba kwabwe okw’ okweyimirirwa nga 7, July, 2022.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga ayongedde okutalaaga Mutuba II  Makindye, abakuutide okukola ennyo
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga olunaku olwookubiri ng’alambula emirimu egikolebwa mu ggombolola ya Mutuba III Makindye. Enteekateeka eno yatandikibwa n’ekigendererwa eky’okusiima n’okwebaza abaami ba Kabaka mu ggombolola eba ewangudde mu mpaka z’enkola y’emirimu gy’Obwakabaka. Leero asookodde ku Sir Jose Hotel e Gaba, eya Mw. Joseph Ssettuba, ate oluvannyuma ne yeeyongerayo ku Islamic Centre for Education and Research e Buziga. Ab’eno abakuutidde okwefubako babeeko emirimu gye bakola, bafune ensimbi, batuukirize ebyetaago byabwe, Buganda edde ku ntikko. Asabye abasuubuzi abagundidde okuyigiriza abaana baabwe enkola y’emirimu nga batandikira ku bifo ebisookerwako mu kkampuni, okusinga okubaleeta nga ba manaja nga tebamanyi nkola ku mitendera egisooka. Yeebazizza nnyo Mw. Joseph Ssettuba, olw’enkolagana ennungi n’abantu, era n’asaba abantu okwewummuzangako ng’emirimu giwedde basaka amaanyi n’amagezi amaggya. Katikkiro era akwasizza abaliko obulemu obugaali okubayambako mu kutambula kwabwe. Bino bibadde ku Islamic Center for Education and Research, e Buziga. Katikkiro akyalambula eggombolola ya Mutuba III Makindye. Katikkiro awerekeddwako Oweek. Joseph Kawuki n’abaweereza n’Obwakabaka abalala.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akunze abantu balime emmwaanyi baleme kwekwasa bisomooza
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akunze bannayuganda yonna gyebali bulijjo okulima emmwaanyi beewale okwekwasa kuba buli mulimu gulina ebigusomooza. Okwogera bino Katikkiro Mayiga abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire nga ayolekera ebizinga bye Ssese ku nteekateeka y’Emmwaanyi Terimba ku Mmande okulambula abalimi ba Beene. “Mbakubiriza balime wadde waliwo abagamba nti tebalina ttaka ekyo kituufu naye era bwogamba omuntu nti suubula waliwo akugamba nti sirina ntandikwa. N’omuyigirize ajja kugamba nti emirimu tegirabika, ekyo kireme kuba nti kye kyekwaso kyetukulembeza,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga wadde abantu beeno baagala nnyo okulima ebinazi naye akaseera katuuse balowooze ku kulima emmwaanyi.  Katikkiro waakulambula abalimi mu Ggombolola ssatu okuli Mugoye, Bujjumba, Mutuba II Kalangala era nga wadde ataalaze Amasaza ga Buganda ag’enjawulo abadde tatuukangako Ssese. Mu kulambula kuno, Owek. Mayiga awerekeddwako baminisita okuli avunaanyizibwa obutereevu ku byobulimi Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo Nassejje, Owek. Noah Kiyimba, minisita wamawulire era omwogezi wa Buganda ne Minisita w’ Abavubuka, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe. Bino webijjidde nga ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku Mmwaanyi mu ggwanga Ki Uganda Coffee Development Authority kyakamala okusiima Obwakabaka, Katikkiro Mayiga awamu ne BUCADEF olw’okutumbula ekirime ky’ Emmwaanyi. Ku ssaawa kkumi Mukuumaddamula abadde atuuse ku mwalo gwe Bukakata era ayaniriziddwa John Baptist Lubega akulira entabuza yemirimu ku kidyeri kya MV ssese era kirutwalidde eddakiika asatu okutuuka ku mwalo gwa Luku-Bugoma. Ku mwalo gwe Bugoma Katikkiro ayaniriziddwa Minisita omubeezi owebyobulimi avunanyizibwa obutereevu ku Mmwaanyi, Omwami w’essaza lino, Kweeba Augustine Kasirye, omubaka Hellen Nakimuli awamu n’abalala. Mukuumaddamula atandikira wa Paul Ssemanda e Buyindi mu ggombolola ya Ssaabaddu Mugoye n’ oluvannyuma aggulewo ekyuuma ky’Emmwaanyi ku kyalo Bweeya. Bwanamala Owek. Mayiga wakugendako mu ggombolola Mumyuka Bujumba okulambula omulimi Kizza Dan Kyeeswa, ate mungeri yeemu agendeko mu gombolola Mutuba II ewa Eugene Kitaatire e Mweena noluvannyuma ayogereko eri abantu ba Kabaka mukitundu kino.

headline: Muwanga Kivumbi : Bamafiya bagezaako okuzza endagaano y’emmwaanyi nga bakyuusa Palamenti byeyasalawo
text: Minisita w’ebyensimbi ku ludda oluvuganya, Muwanga Kivumbi ategeezezza nti agudde mu lukwe lwa bamafiya olw’okugezaako okukyuusa ebyasalibwawo akakiiko ka Palamenti ku ndagaano y’emmwaanyi gavumenti gye yakola ne kampuni ya Vinci nga egiwa obuvunaanyizibwa ku mmwaanyi mu ggwanga. Nga beesigama ku byasalibwawo akakiiko k’ebyobusuubuzi mu Palamenti akakulirwa omubaka Mwine Mpaka, Palamenti eyawamu yagoba endagaano eno gavumenti yawakati gyeyakola ne kampuni ya Uganda Vinci Coffee Company Limited (UVCC) ku ntandika y’omwaka guno. Palamenti yategeeza nti endagaano eno yali mbi eri bannansi naddala abali mu mulimu gw’okulima n’okutunda emmwaanyi. Bano bakolokota ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, Kiryowa Kiwanuka olw’okukkiriza gavumenti okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano eno era bwatyo naye nakkiriza okukola enongoosereza mu ndagaano eno n’oluvannyuma bagikomyewo mu Palamenti. Ku Lwokuna, omubaka Muwanga Kivumbi ategeezezza bannamawulire nga bwagudde mu lukwe lw’ abamafiya batayatukiriza mannya okukyuusa ebyasalibwawo Palamenti bateekemu ebyabwe. “Twesanze nga ebibeera bisaliddwawo Palamenti bikyuusibwa nga tebinasindikibwa mu Minisitule y’ebyensimbi. Kati baagala kukyuusa byasalibwawo Palamenti ku ndagaano y’emmwaanyi,” Kivumbi bwe yagambye. Kivumbi agamba nti bano bakikolako bwebakyuusa ekiragiro kya Palamenti mweyasabira gavumenti egule emigabo gya buwumbi 108 mu kampuni ya Atiak Sugar kyokka bakyuusa nebalaga nti ssente zino zaali zakugula byuma ebigenda okukozesebwa ekkolero lya kampuni. Ono ategeezezza nti pulaani eno ebaddewo nga bamafiya bakyuusa ebisaliddwawo Palamenti nalaga nti akaseera katuuse basanguzibwe. Kati Kivumbi awandiikidde Kalaani wa Palamenti nga amusaba amuwe ebiragiro Palamenti byeyawa nga May 18, ku ndagaano eno ku ndagaano y’emmwaanyi eno byebavaako okugisazaamu. Ono agamba nti ebyasalibwawo Palamenti ku ndagaano ya Vinci birina okusibwako eriiso ejjogi kuba eggwanga lyonna lyali libataddeko amaaso era lyasanyuka ng’endagaano eno esaziddwamu kuba yali emenya amateeka era nga terina kalungi kegenda kuwa bannansi. “Mpandikidde Kalaani nga musaba ampe ebiragiro ebyasalibwawo byategese okuwa gavumenti. Eyali alumiddwa ku musota, twali tulabyeko ebisaliddwawo nga bikyuusibwa ate kati tuwulira nti era batandise, twagala Kalaani wa Palamenti akigoberere nga atunuulira Hansard okumanya ekituufu, kino kirina okukoma,” Muwanga Kivumbi bw’agambye. Wabula ono bwabuziddwa abali emabega w’olukwe luno, Muwanga agaanye okuboogera nategeeza nti obukulembeze mu Palamenti bwebulina okunenyezebwa ku nsonga eno.

headline: Abavubuka mutandikewo ebibiina ebisizi by’ensimbi – Owek. Ssekabembe
text: Minisita w’abavubuka, okwewummuza n’ebyemizannyo mu Buganda, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, asabye abavubuka ba Beene mu ssaza ly’e Ssese okujjumbira ebibiina ebisizi by’ensimbi basobole okwekulaakulanya. Owek. Ssekabembe nga asomesa abavubuka e Ssese “Ssentebe njagala munzibire ebibiina by’abavubuka ebisiga ensimbi ebigenda okusonda ssente ez’enjawulo ebitakka wansi wa 30 nga biteeseteese bulungi ssente zaabwe ne kye byagala okukola,” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Okwogera bino Ssekabembe abadde Ssese ku Dream Land Guest House, ng’akomekkereza ekitundu ekisooka eky’okutalaaga amasaza gonna aga Buganda ng’abasomesa ku nnambika yaabwe wamu n’okubalaga engeri gye basobola okulondamu abakulembeze abatuufu. Owek. Ssekabembe abakubirizza okunywerera ku kiragiro kya Ssaabasajja eky’okukola, okufissa, okutereka wamu n’okusiga kibayambe okwekulaakulanya. Ono yagambye nti enkola eno ey’okulambika abavubuka y’esobola okuteekawo olujegere lw’abakulembeze oluyunga ekyalo ku ssaza ate nalyo ne lyegatta ku Bwakabaka. Abasabye okulonda abakulembeze abatuufu era bakimanye nti omulimu gw’okuzimba Buganda gwabwe ng’abavubuka era bakole ebibiina by’abavubuka bya bantu 10 ku buli kizinga kibayambe okutambulira awamu. Wano Kweba atwala Ssese Augustino Kasirye alaze obwennyamivu olw’abantu abafudde abavubuka ku Nnyanja abapakasi baabwe nebalemwa okwekulaakulanya. Kweba Kasirye asabye Obwakabaka okumuyambako babangule abavubuka mu mirimu emirala kubanga abasinga mu kitundu kino beesibye ku kimu kya buvubi ate ng’ennaku zino eby’ennyanja bitono. Omulungamya w’ebibiina by’obukulembeze mu Buganda, Joseph Balikuddmbe wamu n’Omuk. Hassan Kiyemba, basabye abavubuka okukwatirako bannaabwe basobole okwezimba. Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu Ssaza lye Ssese Mwanje Daniel, asabye Minisita Ssekabembe bayambibweko ku nsonga y’akawuka ka siriimu akasusse mu kitundu kino. Abavubuka era basabye Minisita Ssekabembe okubayamba ku bantu abavaayo okubatiisatiisa buli lwebavaayo okubaako woofiisi gye baagala okwesimbako. Kaweefube ono, Owek. Ssekabembe ne ttiimu ye baamutandikira mu Kyaggwe ne bamutwala e Buddu, wuuyo Kkooki, Kabula nga leero abadde Ssese .

headline: Uganda Airlines eyimirizza entambula zaayo lwa Coronavirus
text: Ennyonyi ya Uganda Airlines   Kampuni y’ennyonyi eya Uganda Airlines erangiridde olwaleero nti eyimirizza engendo zaayo mu bibuga Mogadishu ekya Somalia, Kirimanjaro ne Zanzibar ebya Tanzania, Bujumbura ekya Burundi wamu ne Mombasa ekiri mu Kenya olw’ekirwadde kya senyiga wa Coronavirus amanyiddwa nga COVID19.  “Oluvanyuma lw’okubalukawo kw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 wamu n’obukwakkulizo obuteereddwawo amawanga ag’enjawulo okutangira okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kino, twagala okutegeeza nti tugenda kukyusaamu mu ngendo zaffe,” bwekityo ekiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwa aba Uganda Airlines bwekyategeezezza.  Engendo zino zigenda kusazibwamu wakati wa March 20 ne 23.  Ekirwadde kino kya balukawo mu kibuga kya Wuhan ekiri mu China ku nkomerero y’omwaka oguwedde era nga wetwogerera bino kyakatugumbula abantu abasukka mu 7500 mu nsi yonna.  Wano ku lukalu lwa Africa, abantu 300 bebaakazuulibwa n’ekirwadde kino mu mawanga 25.  Balirwana ba Uganda omuli Kenya, Tanzania, South Sudan, DR Congo ne Rwanda gonna ekirwadde kino kyagobyeyo dda.  Olwaleero omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni agenda kwogerako eri eggwanga ku nteekateeka gavumenti ye gy’erina okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino nnamuzisa.   Gyebuvuddeko, minisitule ekola ku by’obulamu yawera abantu abava mu mawanga omuli Italy, San Marino, Iran, South Korea, France, China, Germany, Spain, Belgium, USA, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Sweden, Norway, Austria ne Malaysia okujja mu Uganda olw’okutya okujja n’ekirwadde.

headline: Temuggwaamu ssuubi lwa kolona- Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abantu obutaggwaamu ssuubi olw’embeera ereeteddwa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga kolona, ekiwanise amatanga. “Temuggwaamu ssuubi kubanga omuntu bw’aba n’essuubi kimuwa obuvumu okulwanyisa abulwadde. Alina essuubi yeerwanako era afuba okukola ebyo ebimugasa. Kyokka omuntu bwaggwaamu essuubi ayinza okulwala n’okufa n’afa.” Katikkiro bw’agambye. Okwogera bino, abadde asisinkanye bannamawulire wali ku Mbuga y’Obwakabaka enkulu e Bulange, Mmengo. Omuntu atalina ssuubi Katikkiro amugeraageranyizza ku kyoto ekitaliimu wadde akaliro akatono. Mukuumaddamula asabye bannayuganda okwongera okugoberera amateeka agaateekebwawo okwewala okusaasaanya obulwadde bwa kolona omuli okunaaba mu ngalo, okukozeza eddagala eritta obuwuka erimanyiddwa nga ‘sanitizer’, okwambala obukookolo n’okwewa amabanga. Akuutidde abantu okwewala emikolo gyonna kabubeere obubaga obutegekebwa awaka. Okusinziira Ku Katikkiro, obutagoberera biragiro ye kanaaluzaala mu kisaasaanya kolona. Katikkiro ategeezezza nti wadde mu kaseera kano kyenkana buli muntu alwazizza oba afiiriddwa omwagalwa olw’akawuka okweyubula ne keeyongera amaanyi. Kyokka abawonye nawokeera w’ekirwadde kino nabo bangi, wabula omuwendo gwabwe gubikkibwa abafudde. Owoomumbuga asinzidde wano n’asaba abantu obuteesiga mboozi yonna ku kolona okuggyako ng’eva mu mikutu esatu gyokka omuli ekitongole ekitwala eby’obulamu mu nsi yonna, ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu gavumenti yaawakati wamu n’abakulembeze baabwe.

headline: Buganda eyagala amateeka g’abaliko obulemu gateekebwe mu nkola
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda busabye abakwasisa amateeka g’abantu abaliko obulemu okufuba okulaba nti gateekebwa mu nkola wasobole okubeerawo obwenkanya ku bantu ab’ekikula kino. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa minisita avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z’Amawulire era Omwogezi w’Obwakabaka, Owek. Noah Kiyimba bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire e Bulange Mmengo. Minisita Kiyimba ategeezezza nti olunaku lw’omwaka guno, Beene yasiima lukuzibwe nga Decemba 14 wansi w’omulamwa ogugamba nti “Okutumbula Embeera z’Abaliko Obulemu mu Buganda”. Owek. Kiyimba alaze obukulu bw’okusomesa abaana abaliko obulemu nakakasa nti basobola bulungi okubeera ab’omugaso era nebakola ebintu eby’omuwendo ebigasa ensi yabwe bwatyo nalabula abazadde abalemeddemu omuze gw’okukweka abaana mu nju olw’okuba baliko obulemu. Ono annyonnyodde nti abaana bano basobola bulungi okusoma era nasaba abazadde abatalina busobozi okweyuna bbasale z’Obwakabaka basobole okuwa abaana bano ebiseera by’omu maaso ebitangaavu. Minisita Kiyimba asabye ebitongole ne kampuni ezigaba emirimu okulowooza ku ky’okuwa abaliko obulemu omukisa kuba bano balina ebitone ebyenjawulo nga abamu basobola bulungi okuvuganya n’abantu abataliiko bulemu ate nebabasinga. Owek. Kiyimba era asabye abantu abaliko obulemu okusibwa ku mwanjo bwekituuka mu nsonga zebyobulamu , ebyenjigiriza ne bintu ebirala kubanga nabo balina eddembe okubifuna. Omukiise wabaliko Obulemu mu lukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Dr. Vincent Ssenabulya yeebaziza Obwakabaka olwokubassa ku mwanjo wabula nafalaasira abaliko obulemu okukozesa omukisa guno okukyuusa embeera yabwe. Dr. Ssenabulya agamba nti newankubadde abaliko obulemu balina ebizibu eby’enjawulo ebyekuusa ku nkula yabwe, tebasaanidde kwekubagiza kuba baamukisa nnyo okuba abalamu, ate nga balina n’ebintu bingi bye bayinza okukola ne bibayamba okubeerawo.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka alagidde abantu bakomye okuboola abalina Mukenenya
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II alagidde abantu be okukendeeza okuboola n’okusosola abantu abalina akawuka akaleeta Mukenenya. Ekiragiro kino Omutanda akiyisizza mu kiwandiiko bw’abadde awa obubaka bwe obw’okujjukira ku kirwadde kino awamu n’okwefumiintiriza ku ngeri y’okukirwanyisa olubeerawo buli 1 Decemba owa buli mwaka. “Newankubadde waliwo ebituukiddwako mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya tuteekeddwa okwongeramu amaanyi okukendeeza okuboolwa n’okusosolebwa kw’ abantu abalina akawuka akaleetebwa Mukenenya,” Ssaabasajja Kabaka bw’alagidde. Omuteregga era alagidde abaami okwongera okwekebejja n’okufuna obujjanjabi bw’ekirwadde kino kiyambe obutakitambuza. Omutanda agamba nti nga ensi yonna yeefumiintiriza ku kirwadde kino obudde buno abantu be balina okubukozesa okwekeneenya kaweefube w’okulwanyisa Mukenenya waatuuse. Ssaabasajja Kabaka ategeezezza nti wadde emyaka egiyise gibaddemu okusomoozebwa kwa COVID-19 n’okubundabunda kw’abantu mu Uganda ate nga kati waliwo ekirwadde ky’Ebola so nga ebikozesebwa n’emmere nabyo byekanamye naye bino byonna tebirina kunafuya kaweefube wakulwanyisa Mukenenya. Kabaka asiimye enteekateeka ez’enjawulo ezisobodde okukendeeza Mukenenya mu Buganda bwogerageranya n’emyaka ettaano egiyise, ekiwa essuubi ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde kino, nga n’omuwendo gw’abali ku ddagala gulinnye okuva ku bitundu 64% negudda ku 92%. Nnyinimu akiggumiza nti Obwakabaka busoosowaza eby’obulamu mu bantu be nga bayita mu nteekateeka za Buganda ez’enjawulo omuli; ensiisira z’ebyobulamu naddala mu bifo ebirimu ebizinga Mukenenya gyasinga okwegiriisa. Era eno y’ensonga lwaki emyaka esatu egiyise egy’ Amazaalibwa enteekateeka eno ebadde ku kulwanyisa Mukenenya. Ccuucu asabye abantu mukiseera kino okugoberera ebiragiro ebyayisibwa eby’obulamu, beekebeze era bategeere webayimiridde ku kawuka akaleeta Mukenenya. Nnyinimu asabye abali ku ddagala obutagayaala basobole okunafuya akawuka kano era nasaba abavubuka bonna okwekuuma, basome nnyo kuba Buganda ey’enkya eyimiridde kubo. Mu ngeri ey’enjawulo Omutanda, asiimye aba UNAIDS n’ebitongole by’ ensi yonna ne bannamikago olw’okutumbula eby’obulamu naddala mukulwanyisa Mukenenya asobole okumalibwawo mu 2030 mu Buganda ne Uganda awamu n’ensi yonna.

headline: Beene asiimye okulemberamu olutalo ku Siriimu okutuuka 2023
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okukulemberamu olutalo lw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Siriimu mu Uganda okutuuka mu 2023, obuvunaanyizibwa bw’abadde nabwo okuva mu mwaka gwa 2007.  Kino kibikkuddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, bw’abadde alagirira olunaku lw’okuddukirako emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka e Bulange Mmengo ku Lwokuna leero. Ategeezezza nti ekigendererwa ky’emisinde gino kyakulaba nga bongera okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino naddala mu kiseera kino ekya Ssennyiga Corona. “Nina essanyu okubategeeza nti aba UNAIDS basabye Ssaabasajja, atwale obuvunaanyizibwa bw’okutukulemberamu okulwanyisa Mukenenya okutuukira ddala mu 2023 era obuvunaanyizibwa buno, Ssaabasajja Kabaka yakkirizza okubutwala.” Mayiga bw’agambye. Obuvunaanyizibwa buno Beene bwamuweebwa ettabi ly’ekitongole ky’ensi yonna ekikola ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Siriimu mu nsi yonna. Ono agasseeko nti Beene ayagala abasajja be baba bakulemberamu olutalo lw’okulwanyisa Siriimu nga beekebeza n’okwekuuma ate abasangiddwa nga balina ekirwadde kino, batandike eddagala kibayambe okubajjanjaba. “Ssaabasajja ayagala buli muvubuka, buli musajja akitwale nti buvunaanyizibwa bwe okumalawo Siriimu, tutuuke mu 2030 nga tumunyumyako bunyumya ng’ekirwadde ekyaliwo.” Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Asabye abavubuka n’abaami okwewala embeera eziyinza okuleeta Siriimu nga balowooza ku bannyaabwe ne bannyinaabwe wamu ne bawala baabwe, kibayambe okutaasa be bali nabo. Mayiga agambye nti abantu balina okukimanya nti Siriimu ne mu mbeera ya COVID-19 akwatiramu era nga ekigendererwa kyakulaba nti ensi ewona Ssennyiga Corona naye ate ereme kukwatibwa Siriimu. Omukungu wa UNAIDS, Sarah Nakku, yeebazizza Ssaabasajja olw’okukulembera olutalo lw’okulwanyisa Mukenenya mu Uganda, Buganda, mu buvanjuba n’amaserengeta ga Ssemazinga Africa. Nakku agambye nti wadde wabaddewo eddagala eriweweeza ku kirwadde kino okumala emyaka 30, naye buyinza okukya enkya ng’eddagala lino terikyalinawo. Noolwekyo nga buvunaanibwa bw’abantu bonna naddala abaami okukuuma abaagalwa baabwe. “Mu Buganda omwami y’akulembera amaka era tusaba mutukulembere mu lutabaalo luno olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya.” Nakku bw’agambye. Ono annyonnyodde nti abantu bwe baneetaba mu misinde gino, tebagenda kulwanyisa Siriimu yekka naye n’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 nga bakuuma emibiri gyabwe nga miramu.

headline: Owek. Nankindu asabye abantu okukuuma obuyonjo kibataase ku ndwadde
text: Minisita w’enkulaakulana y’abantu, Owek Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavumaasabye abantu ba Kabaka okunyweza ekigambo ky’obuyonjo basobole okwewala okusaaasaanyiza ssente mu malwaliro era basigale nga balamu. Owek. Nankindu okusaba kuno akukoze alambulaemirimu egikolebwa abakyala mu ssaza Ssingo wamu n’amaka amagunjufumu nteekateeka y’Akaalo Amatendo egendereddwamu okufuna amaka agateekeddwatekeddwa obulungi, amagunjufu era amayonjo. “Obuyonjo tekitegeeza kubeera na nnyumba oba amaka amatiribona. Naye ndabye obuyonjo era njagala okwebaza abaakaalo amatendo nti tugendere awo n’omutindo. Lwaki nzikaatiriza obuyonjo kuba ne bw’atandika okunaabamu ngalo nga COVID-19 azze, endwadde zaakendeera.” Minisita Nankindu bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Minisita Nankindu, endwadde ezituluma ebitundu 75 ku buli 100 ziva ku bucaafu nga singa banaatumbula obuyonjo obulamu bwabwe bujja kukyukamu. Owek. Nankindu asabye abantu okuwang’ana amagezi kibasobozese okugenda ku ddaala eddala nga Beene bw’atukubiriza era kino bakikole awatali kwesosola mu byabufuzi, mawanga n’eddiini. Ono annyonnyodde nti enteekateeka zino ze ziyamba Obwakabaka okukwatagana n’abantu mu masaza ag’enjawulo okusobola okwekenneenya embeera bw’eri nga bamanya ekituufu era ky’ekimu ku bigenda okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Owek. Nankindu akubirizza abantu okwegemesa ekirwadde kyaSsennyiga Corona era bafube okujjumbira enteekateeka za Buganda ng’okugaba omusaayi, emisinde, n’ebirala okusobola okutwala Obwakabaka mu maaso. Omwami w’essaza Ssingo, David Nantaggya, ategeezezza nti waliwo ebintu ebirabiddwako olwaleero ebiraga nti amaka mu kitundu kino galimu obugunjufu era abeetegefu okutwala Buganda ku ntikko. Mu balambuddwa mu nteekateeka enokuliko, Mukyala Aidah Nabulime, Omwami n’omukyala Luweesi Peter ab’oku kyalo Katooke, Mukyala Lilian Namisango Ssewanyana, Mukyala Bukirwa Sarah, Mukyala Teddy Nabuyondo, n’abalala.

headline: DFCU esse omukago n’Obwakabaka ku kulwanyisa siriimu
text: Bbanka ya DFCU, esse omukago n’obwakabaka bwa Buganda ku kulwanyisa siriimu. Nga asisinkanye Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga ku Bulange, Mathias Katamba, agambye nti bbanka egenda kussa obukadde 500 mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa siriimu mu Uganda nga bayitira mukuwagira emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka. “DFCU ekolera kuteekawo nkulaakulana mu ggwanga n’okukyusa obulamu bw’abantu. Omukago guno gulina okukolebwa kubanga Obwakabaka Bwa Buganda ne DFCU birina ebiruubirirwa byebimu,” Katamba bwagambye. Yayongeddeko nti bbo nga bbanka baagala okwegatta ku kaweefube w’okulwanyisa siriimu kubanga yeyongedde naddala mu bavubuka. “Twagala okukolaganira awamu okusobola okulwanyisa siriimu muggwanga. Tukimanyi nti abasajja tebaagala kwekebeza era tulina okubakubiriza okwekebeza kubanga kino kiggya kukendeeza siriimu mu bakyala,” Katamba, ng’ono ye ssnetebe wa boodi ya CBS bwategeezezza. Yayongeddeko nti nga bbanka nabo bakubiriza abakozi baabwe okwekebeza era babawa n’obujjanjabi obw’obwerere.   “Abantu bonna balina okumanya nti okuba n’obulwadde simusango wabula balina okuwagirwa okulaba nga abulamu bwabwe butambula bulungi,” Ku lulwe Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga yebazizza nnyo DFCU okwegatta ku kaweefube w’okulwanyisa siriimu. “Abantu abatali balamu tebasobola kweyagalira munsi yaabwe; mukenenya fenna wamu tulina okumulwanyisa,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseko nti nga Obwakabaka wamu ne bbanka bagenda kufunamu mu mukago   “Omukago gukufuula wamanyi okusinga bw’obadde; oyigira kubannamukago by’otamanyi oba byoba tosobola. Omukago fenna gutuleetera obuwanguzi, essanyu n’eddembe,” Mayiga bwagambye. Ye omukungu Ronald Kawaddwa akulira Majestic Brands ategeezeza nti beeteefuteefu okukolagana ne DFCU. “Tukimanyi nti tetugenda kulemaganwa, emikago gino bwetuba tugiyingiddemu tufuba okutuukiriza ng’Obwakabaka era tweyama nti tujja bakwata bulungi. Twagala okukwaniriza era tukukakasa nti ffe lutindo eri akatale,” Kawaddwa bwategeezezza.

headline: Akulira ekibiina ky’abasawo agaanye eby’okudda ebbali bamunoonyerezeeko ku by’okusaba Museveni addemu yeesimbewo mu 2026
text: Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ekitaba abasawo ki ‘Uganda Medical Association (UMA), Dr Samuel Oledo agaanye okuddako ebbali nga bweyabadde asabiddwa bannakibiina basobole okumunoonyerezaako. Kino kiddiridde ebyaliwo mu lukung’aana lwa Youth Patriotism Symposium e Kololo ku Lwomukaaga, Oledo gyeyasinziira nga ali n’abamu ku basawo okufukamira nebasaba Museveni akomewo mu 2026. Ekikolwa kino abasawo bavaayo nebakivumirira nga bagamba nti enneeyisa eno teyali ya kintukilamu era ng’ono yakikola ku lulwe ng’ alina byeyeenoonyeza ng’omuntu. Ku Lwokubiri Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino, Dr. Herbert Luswata yategeeza bannamawulire nti Oledo yali azzeeko ebbali basobole okunoonyereza ku bikolwa bye n’ebigendererwa byalina mu kino. Wabula bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lwokusatu, Oledo agambye nti wadde akkiriza okumunoonyerezaako kugende mu maaso naye tagenda kuddako bbali nga banne bwebasaba.  “Nkyali Pulezidenti wa UMA era sigenda kuddako bbali. Nzikkiriza okunnoonyereza kugende mu maaso era y’ensonga lwaki mbadde nsirise era sirina kyenayingiddemu,” Oledo bw’ annyonnyodde. Oledo agasseeko nti banne balina kyekubira kuba omwaka oguwedde yakola ekikolwa kyekimu nafukamira okusaba omuntu y’omu Pulezidenti Museveni abongeze omusaala kyokka tebavaayo kumunoonyerezaako. Ono agamba nti ekikolwa kino yakikoze kusiima Pulezidenti Museveni kyeyakola okwongeza omusaala gw’abasawo era eno y’ensonga lwaki yamusabye akomewo yeesimbewo ayongere okutereeza embeera z’abasawo.

headline: Minisitule y’ebyobulamu: Ebbula ly’eddagala erigema COVID-19 tekijja kulemesa kuggulawo ggwanga
text: Minisita w’ebyobulamu, Dr. Jane Ruth Aceng, ategeezezza nti wadde bafunye okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna eddagala naye kino tekijja kulemesa ggwanga kuva ku muggalo. Dr. Aceng yagambye nti tebagenda baggulawo kimu ku kimu wadde nga bakyalemeddwa okufuna eddagala erigema omuwendo ogwegasa. Bino Aceng yabyogeredde mu kakiiko ka Palamenti akaateekebwawo okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya COVID-19 eggulo ku Lwokusatu. “Mujjukira mu muggalo ogwasooka, twaggulawo ebintu kimu ku kimu nga tetunnagema bantu era bwetutyo bwe tujja okuggulawo n’omulundi guno.” Dr. Aceng bwe yannyonnyodde. Minisitule y’ebyobulamu okusooka yali esuubira nti ejja kuba emaze okugema abantu ebitundu 50 ku buli 100 okusobola okuggyawo omuggalo. Okusinziira ku Dr. Aceng waliwo ebbula ly’eddagala erigema Corona ku katale k’ensi yonna era eggwanga terisobola kusigala ku muggalo nga ate n’eddagala erigema abantu terirabikako. “Tetusobola kulinda kugema bantu bukadde 22 nga tetumanyi watuufu we tugenda kuggya ddagala ligema bantu.” Dr. Acengbwe yagasseeko. Bino we bijjidde ng’eggwanga lirindiridde okuva ku muggalo gw’ennaku 42era amaaso gonna galinze kwogera kwa Pulezidenti Museveni ku lunaku Lwokutaano okulaba oba omuggalo guggyibwawo. Ebikyafulumiziddwa biraga nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yaakagema abantu 1,135,916 bokka ku bukadde obusoba mu 45.

headline: Abantu ba Kabaka basabiddwa okujjumbira okwegemesa COVID-19
text: Omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda, Owek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule asabye abantu ba Kabaka okujjumbira okwegesa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era bafube okulwanyisa endwadde endala omuli omusujja gw’ensiri ne Mukenenya ssaako okunyweza ekigambo buyonjo yonna gyebawangaalira. “Lumiimamawuggwe azze naye bw’asanga nga mulina obuyonjo tuba tumugobye. Obujama buleeta endwadde nnyinginaye ddala singa tweyonja ne Ssennyiga ono owaabulijjo tubeera tumugobye. Temweyibaala gyemuli, obulwadde bukyaliyo naye eyo gye butannaba kutuuka mukole abasawo bye batugamba okubwewala.” Owek. Mugumbule bw’agambye. Okusaba kuno akukoledde mu Bulange -Mmengo ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atikkula Oluwalo lwa bukadde obusobye mu 31 okuva e Buweekula, Kyaggwe ne Busujju. Ono abadde akiikiridde Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga era ng’ayambiddwako Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Joseph Kawuki. Owek. Mugumbule akunze abantu ba Kabaka okwegemesa nga balabira ku Ssaabasajja Kabaka ne Katikkiro kuba ekirwadde kino kyabulabe nnyo eri obulamu bwabwe. Ono era asiimye abaami ba Kabaka ku mitendera gyonna olw’okusitukiramu okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya awamu n’omusujja mu bitundu byabwe. Ye Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Owek. Joseph Kawuki asabye bannabuweekula okusigala nga bakkakkamu kuba ensonga y’ebigambo ebikwatiddwa n’obwegendereza obusembayo era tewali nsonga erina kubeeraliikiriza. Kino kiddiridde abaami ba Kabaka nga bakulembeddwa abaamasaza baloopedde Katikkiro ekizibu ky’ekibbattaka ekikudde ejjembe mu bitundu byabwe, ng’abantu bangi basenguddwa era tebalina we balaga. Ate bannabuweekula bannyonnyodde nga bwe waliwo abantu ababuzaabuza abalala obutawa busuulu nga bagamba nti essaawa yonna ettaka lino liddayo mu Bunyoro. Ku bakiise Embuga mubaddemu abavudde mu magombolola ag’enjawulo agakola amasaza gano omuli; Malangalanga-Kaggwe, Kakindu, Ssaabawaali- Butayunja,Mituba etaano-Nyenga, Mumyuka -Maanyi, Mutuba gumu- Kitenga, Musaale-Kiyuuni n’amalala . Amasaza gano gonna gavuddemu Ouwalo lwa bukadde 31,155,000/= wamu n’ebirabo bye batonedde Nnyinimu mu nteekateeka y’okuyimirizaawo emirimu gy’Obwakabaka.

headline: Ssenyiga Kolona: Poliisi Ezinzeeko Ekyalo E Namisindwa Oluvannyuma Lw’omuntu Omulala Okufa
text: Poliisi ng’egezaako okugoba abatuuze mu ka tawuni k’e Buwasunguyi Ab’ebyokwerinda basazeeko ekyalo ky’e Bumandli A wamu n’akabuga ka Buwasunguyi mu ggombolola y’e Namabya mu disitulikiti ye Namisindwa oluvannyuma lw’omuntu omulala okufa ku biteeberezebwa nti kirwadde kya Ssenyiga Kolona kiyite Covid-19.Omugenzi ye Martin Muyenlitsi, oweemyka 27. Muyenlitsi yafiiridde ku kalwaliro ka Buwasunguyi ku ssaawa nga 11 ku makya gyeyadusiddwa oluvannyuma lw’okulumizibwa mu kifuba wamu n’okuba nga tassa bulungi. Kino kyekireetedde Poliisi ng’eduumirwa omubaka wa gavumenti mu disitulikiti y’e Namisindwa Moses Kigai Wamoto okusalako ebyalo bino. Enguudo zonna eziyingira mukitundu zigaddwa ssaako amaduuka gonna. Abakkirizibwa okutambula babyakwerinda bokka wamu n’abakozi b’e ggombolola. Wabaddewo okusika omugwa wakati w’aba famire y’omugenzi ssaako n’abaddukanya akalwaliro kano nga bagezaako okukaayanira omulambo. Abenganda baagambye nti omugenzi abadde n’ebirwadde ebimutawaanya nga tekisoboka okuba nti yafudde Covid-19. Joseph Khisa ssentebe w’eggombolola ya Bukhaweka bwebasalaganya ne ggombolola ye Namabya, yagambye nti abenganda z’omugenzi baategeezezza nti ono abadde n’akawuka ka mukenenya era nga abadde mulwadde ennaku eziyise.Rogers Wabuteya, nannyini kalwaliro kano ng’ono era akola n’eddwaliro ly’e Bududa yagambye nti omugenzi abadde n’obubonero bwekirwadde kya Covid-19. Ono yagambye nti yeegayiridde abenganda z’omugenzi bamutwale mu ddwaliro eddene e Mbale kyokka bbo nebeerema. “Bwenabagambye beeremye nga bagamba nti tebaagala kugenda okutuusa omulwadde bweyafudde,”Wabuteya bweyagambye. Okufa kwa Muyenlitsi wekujjidde nga tewannayita na wiiki oluvannyuma lw’okufa kwa Yunis Chamitala mu ggombolola yeemu nga naye yafa Kolona. URN

headline: Minisita Nankindu asabye abazadde  okugemesa abaana abatuuse ekirwadde ki Corona
text: Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu n’embeera z’abantu mu Bwakabaka Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma asabye abazadde okukozesa omukisa gw’okugema COVID-19 okw’ekikungo okutegekeddwa mu Bulange e Mmengo okuleeta abaana abali mu luwummula nabo bagemebwe. Okusaba kuno Minisita Nankindu akukoze aggalawo olunaku olusoose olw’okugema kw’ ekikungo okw’omulundi ogw’okubiri okwategekeddwa mu Bulange e Mmengo nga kutandise leero ku Lwokusatu. “Tukubiriza abazadde okujjukiza abaana abali mu luwummula n’abalala abatanawummula bajje wano kuba bafunye omukisa okugemebwa ekirwadde kya COVID-19 mu luwummula luno.
