Tubeebaza kuba omuwendo gutuuse ku gwetwabadde tusuubira okufuna,” Minisita Nankindu bw’alambuludde.  Ono asabye abantu abawezezza emyaka 50 n’okudda waggulu nga baagemwa okufuna akayiso kuba bakeetaaga wadde nga abamu balowooza nti emibiri gyabwe gyaguma era gisobole okwerinda ekirwadde kino. Owek. Nankindu asabye abo bonna abalabye ebisoomoozo okubatuukirira okusobola okulambika enteekateeka eno, abantu ba Beene basobole okuganyulwa, neyeebaza abasawo n’ebitongole ebiwagidde enteekateeka eno. Okugema kuno kusoobye abantu bangi omubadde ne Ssaabawolereza wa Buganda, Owek. Christopher Bwanika asabye abantu okukomya okusaagira mu nsonga z’ebyobulamu naye baveeyo beegemese ekirwadde kino kuba kikyaliwo. Ye akulira eby’obulamu mu ggombolola ye Lubaga, Dr. Dennis Buluma akunze banna Uganda okwettanira okugembwa kuno naddala mu budde buno nga abangi balowooza nti ekirwadde kyaweddemu amaanyi. Okugema kuno kugenda kumala ennaku 4 era kusuubirwa okukomekerezebwa nga 23 omwezi guno. Enteekateeka eno ewagiddwa Majestic Brands, Red Cross, amalwaliro agenjawulo, UNAIDS, CBS FM ne BBS Terefayina, KCCA n’abalala.

headline: Tukyuse mu nneeyisa okuwangula Mukenenya –Minisita Kiyimba
text: Minisita w’amawulire Kabineeti, Olukiiko, era Omwogezi w’Obwakabaka, Owek Noah Kiyimba, asabye abantu okukyusa mu nneeyisa yaabwe era bafeeyo ku bulamu bwabwe olutalo ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya bweluba lunaawangulwa. Minisita Kiyimba, Kaggo n’abamu ku beetabye mu musomo “Okuggyako nga tukyusizza mu nneeyisa yaffe obulwadde buno buyinza okutubeerera obuzibu okwegobako kubanga bwo bugenda na nneeyisa.” Owek. Kiyimba bwe yasabye. Okusaba kuno Minisita Kiyimba akukoledde ku Kasangati High School mu Kyaddondo bw’abadde aggalawo omusomo ku Mukenenya, obutabanguko mu maka wamu n’okutangira abaana abawala okufuna embuto, ogwategekeddwa Minisitule y’ekikula ky’abantu mu Buganda. Abakulembeze abeetabye mu musomo guno abasabye okutwala ebibasomeseddwa ng’ensonga nkulu era bafube okubiyigiriza abalala era bafeeyo ku bantu be bakulembera, kiyambe okukendeeza ekirwadde kino. Owek. Kiyimba yasabye bannayuganda okumanya ebyo ebikwata ku Mukenenya era beefumiitirize basobole okubulwanyisa era n asabya abakulembeze mu kitundu kino okubeera abasaale ku nsonga eno era bajjukize abantu enjiri esobole okunnyikira. Minisita Kiyimba asinzidde wano n’addamu okusiima Omutanda olw’okusiima okubeera emmunyeenye mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya era ng’essira liteereddwa ku baami era n’abakubiriza okunyweza omumuli. Ono yabakubirizza okwewala obutabanguko mu maka kuba embeera eno erina akakwate n’okusaasaana kwa Mukenenya okweyongera. Yasabye wabeewo empuliziganya mu maka, kibasobozese okwekuuma. Ono era yeebazizza Minisitule ya Buganda ey’ekikula ky’abantu, UNAIDS, TASO n’abalala, olw’okusomesa abantu b’Omutanda mu ssaza lino.

headline: Abasawo e Kyotera balabuddwa ku kuguza Abatanzania eddagala lya Corona
text: Ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Kyotera, Patrick Kintu Kisekulo, alabudde abasawo baayo obutetantala kukukusa ddagala erigema Covid 19 nga balitwala mu ggwanga lya Tanzania kuba anaakikola omulimu gwakumufa. Hajji Ddumba Moses nga agemebwa Kisekulo bino yabyogeredde ku ddwaliro ly’e Kaliisizo ku mukolo gw’okutongoza okugema Covid 19 mu disitulikiti eno eggulo ku Lwokuna. Mu ngeri y’emu asabye abakulembeze banne n’abantu ab’enjawulo okutavaayo kuteeka kazito ku basawo okubagema mufeezi esooka wabula babeere bagumiikirizza. Kisekulo asinzidde wano ne yeebaza President Museveni olw’amaanyi g’atadde mu kulwanyisa Covid 19 ssaako endwadde endala omuli Siriimu. Omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Kyotera, Hajji Ddumba Moses, naye yeegasse ku Ssentebe Kisekulo n’alayira okufaafagana n’abasawo abanaagezaako okutunda eddagala lino era ajja kuvunanwa gwa kulya mu nsi lukwe. Ono era yalaze okutya eri abantu abalowooza nti enteekateeka y’okugema Covid 19 nti si yaabuwaza n’ategeeza nti yabuwaze okuggyako abo bokka abalina ensonga y’essimba. Ye akulira eby’obulamu mu Kyotera, Dr Edward Muwanga, yasambazze ebigambo ebibadde byogerwa ku Mutimbagano nti eddagala lino ffu n’asaba abasawo okujjumbira enteekateeka eno. Dr. Muwanga yalambise ebifo mwe bagenda okugemera Covid 19 ng’agamba ntu bafunye bungi bw’eddagala erisoba munkumi (3000). Ate ye amyuka akulira abakozi mu disitulikiti eno, Yasin Mayanja, yeeyamye nti bo nga disitulikiti beetegefu okuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka eno, n’asaba abasawo okukola obulungi omulimu guno.

headline: COVID-19 :  Abantu 1000 basindikiddwa mu Kalantiini  e Kalangala
text: Abakulira akakiiko akalwanyisa ssennyiga Corona ku bizinga bye Kalangala balagidde abatuuze ku mwalo gwe Nkose abawera olukumi okugenda mu kalantiini oluvanyuma lw’okuzuulayo omuntu ow’okubiri nga akwatiddwa ekirwadde kino.  Eyazuuliddwamu ekirwadde  kino mukyala,  nga Sampolo zaali zamugyibwako mu mwezi gwa August nga 28  ku ddwaliro lya Buvuma Health Centre IV. Wabula  ono oluvanyuma yagenda ku mwalo gwe Nkose, mu Ggombolola ye Mazinga mu disitulikiti ye Kalangala era gyeyasangiddwa. Oluvanyuma lw’okumunoonya nebamusanga ku kizinga kino, abakakiiko akalwanyisa ekirwadde kino balagidde abantu bonna ku mwalo guno okwetwala mu Kalantiini nga bwebalinda okukeberwa abakugu. Akulira eby’obulamu mu Kalangala Godfrey Hadubi, yategeezezza nga bwebasazeewo okukugira abantu okufuluma n’okujja ku mwalo guno kiyambeko obutasaasaanya kirwadde kino. Ono yagasseeko nti, basazeewo ekizinga kino kyebaba bafuula kalantiini era webagenda okukuumira abantu bano bonna kubanga nga disitulikiti tebalina busobozi kuteekawo kifo kya Kalantiini eky’enjawulo kubanga ne kyebalina bakiggala olw’obuzibu bw’ensimbi.  Disitulikiti ye Kalangala  yali yateeka ekifo kya Kalantiini ku ssomero lya Bishop Dunstan Nsubuga Memorial wabula nga kati kyaggalwa olw’obuzibu bw’ensimbi. “Nga akakiiko tetulina busobozi kuggyayo bantu bano bonna kubanga n’ekifo wetwandibatutte kyaggalwa olw’obutaba na ssente, kati tusazzeewo tubasigaze ku kizinga kino kubanga kyetusobola,” Hadubi bweyanyonyodde. Hadubi yalambuludde nti mu kiseera bakwataganye n’abakulembeze ku byalo wamu n’akakiiko ka COVID-19 mu disitulikiti eno okulaba nga abantu bagondera amateeka n’ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino. Ate yye omulwadde yaggyiddwayo natwalibwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Masaka okusobola okujjanjabibwa. Kinajjukirwa nti omuntu eyasooka okusangibwa n’ekirwadde mu disitulikiti ye Kalangala yazuulwa mu mwezi gwa April era nga ono yali muvubuka eyali yakadda okuva mu Buwarabu.

headline: Owek. Mayiga ayagala abaami bataase abawala abato ku Mukenenya kiyambe omujiji ogujja
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu ba Kabaka abawangaalira mu bizinga bye Ssese batandikire ku baana abato naddala ab’obuwala bweba baagala okuwangula olutalo ku Mukenenya. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti abaana bano bwebabeera abalamu n’emigigi eginajja gijja kusobola okubeera nga miramu bwatyo neyeebaza abo bonna abagezezaako okusomesa abaana abato ebikwata ku Mukenenya n’engeri gyebasobola okumwerindamu. Obubaka buno Katikkiro Mayiga abuweeredde ku ssomero lya lya St. Simeon Bugoma Primary School e Ssese ku Mmande gyeyagenze ku mulimu gw’okwongera amaanyi mukulwanyisa ekirwadde ki Mukenenya.  “Abaana bano kikulu nnyo okubakuuma ate omulimu ogwo nga gutandikira ku ffe abasajja naddala abasomesa abasajja abasomesa mu ssomero eririmu abawala. n’abasajja abaana be basanga mu makubo n’obutale nga babagambye okugulayo engege. Musajja munnange leka mwesitaza mwana muto,” Owek. Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Akunze banna Ssese obutakkiriza bantu baseegu mu kitundu kyabwe era batangire empisa z’okukabasanya n’okutigatiga abaana abawala abato bwatyo nasaba bafuuke eky’okulabirako era bafuule Ssese ensibuko y’abasajja abalimu ensa. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga olutalo luno terugenda kukoma ku baana bawala bokka naye n’abalenzi kuba nabo obulamu bwabwe buli mu matigga.  E Kalangala Katikkiro Mayiga ayaniriziddwa Omwami wa Kabaka, Kweba Augustine Kasirye n’abakulembeze b’ekitundu kino abawerako. Owek. Mayiga e Ssese agenda kumalayo ennaku eziwerako mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa okusaasaana kw’obulwadde bwa Mukenenya mu bizinga era asuubira okutuuka mu bizinga eby’enjawulo ebikola essaza Ssese. Bino webijjidde nga Kalangala yeemu ku disitulikiti ezisingamu ekirwadde ki Mukenenya mu Buganda nga kirowoozebwa nti kino kiva ku ngeri abavubi gyebeeyisaamu awamu n’ebyobulamu ebikyali wansi ku bizinga ebikola Kalangala.

headline: Abantu Bwongedde Okujeemera Ebiragiro Bya Gavumenti Ku Coronavirus
text: Fred Enanga ayogerera Poliisi Abatwala eby’okwerinda mu ggwanga olwaleero bategeezezza nti abantu bangi muggwanga tebakyassa biragiro bya gavumenti mu nkola kukulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri olukungaana lw’amawulire ku ssengejjero ly’amawulire ga gavumenti liyite, Uganda Media Centre, Fred Enanga, ayoegerera poliisi ya Uganda, agambye nti abantu tebakyayagala kwambala bukookolo buyite mask, enkola ya tonsemberera nayo baagivaako dda nga naabamu kati bakwata bannabwe mungalo ate abandi n’eby’okunaaba mungalo babivaako dda. “Ekirwadde kya coronavirus kikyalimu mu Uganda era tusaba abantu okugenda mumaaso ngabassa ebiragiro by’omukulembeze munkola kubanga kino kiriwo ku lwa bulungi bwabwe,” Enanga bweyagambye. Yayongedde nti mu nnaku bbiri emabega, bakutte emmotoka 106 ne boda boda 82 lwakutambula ku luguudo mu bumenyi bw’amateeka. Ate ye Frank Baine, ayogerera ekitongole ky’ebyamakomera yagambye nti bwebaagenzeeko mu bitundu ebyesudde Kampala baakizudde nti ebeeyo ebiragiro byonna ku coronavirus tebibakwatako. “Bagamba Coronavirus bulwadde bwa Kampala naye tubategeeza nti buno obulwadde bukwata buli muntu,” Baine bweyagambye. Ono era yalabudde abasirikale ebeenyigira mu kusaba abantu essente abakwatiddwa mu kujeemera ebiragiro bya Museveni. Yagambye abo bebanaakwatako kajja kubajjutuka. Abantu 248 bebakakasiddwa okuba nga balina coronavirus mu Uganda oluvanyuma lwa 21 okukeberebwa eggulo nebazuulwamu obulwadde.

headline: Poliisi erabudde abamenya ebiragiro bya Corona ebipya
text: Poliisi ya Uganda erabudde abantu bonna abanaalemwa okuteeka ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona mu nkola nti, kajja kubajuutuka ku mulundi guno. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, Fred Enanga, ategeezezza nti abaduumizi ba poliisi bonna baweereddwa ebiragiro okuva ewa Ssaabaduumizi okukwasisa ebiragiro bya Corona, kiyambeko okutangira ekirwadde kino. Ku Ssande, Pulezidenti Museveni yavuddeyo n’afulumya ebiragiro ebipya omwabadde; okuggala amasomero, okuyimiriza amakkanisa wamu n’abantu okutambula okuva mu disitulikiti emu okugenda mu ndala, okumala ennaku 42. Enanga annyonnyodde nti abakulira poliisi mu bitundu ebyenjawulo basabiddwa okumanya ebikolebwa mu bitundu bino era bagoberera n’okukwasisa ebiragiro bino mu muggalo guno ogw’ennaku 42. “Tugenda kukola ku bannayuganda abalagajjavu abagaanye okuteeka ebiragiro bino mu nkola, nga bwe tulinda aba minisitule y’ebyensimbi okulaga ensimbi zino bwe zigenda okusasulwamu. Tugenda kusigala ku nkola enkadde eya Express Penalty System n’okutanzibwa mu kkooti nga bwe tubadde tukola.” Enanga bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Enanga ku mulundi guno bagenda kubeera bakambwe n’asaba abantu okunyweza ebiragiro bino okwewala ebiyinza okubatuukako. Era ku Ssande, Pulezidenti Museveni ng’akolera ku magezi agamuweebwa aba minisitule y’ebyobulamu yalangirira kafyu ku ssaawa 12 eri abavuzi ba boodabooda ne ssaawa 3 ez’ekiro eri ab’emmotoka. Kinajjukirwa nti ku wiikendi ewedde abantu abawera 1100 bakwatibwa poliisi oluvannyuma lw’okusangibwa mu mabaala nga banywa ekikontana n’ekiragiro kya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ekyaggala amabaala. Amyuka omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Owoyesigyire, yategeezezza nti ebikwekweto bye bali mu kukola ekiro kyakulaba ng’amabaala tegakola.

headline: Kabaka asabye abakulembeze okweggatta ku lutalo lw’okulwanyisa Nalubiri
text: Oweek. Dr Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma ng’ayogerera mulukungaana e Lagos Nigeria  Ssaabasajja Kabaka asabye abakulembeze ku lukalu lwa Africa okusitukiramu beeyunge ku kaweefube w’okulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Nalubiri (Sickle cell). Bino bibadde mu bubaka bwatisse Minisita w’enkulaakulana y’abantu era avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu, Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma mu lukungaana lw’okutema empenda z’okulwanyisa Nalubiri ku Landmark Convention center, Lagos Nigeria. Beene agambye nti obulwadde bwa Nalubiri bukonzibya abaana naddala abali wansi w’emyaka etaano ekintu ekiremesa enkulaakulana. Wano wasinzidde najjukiza abafuzi ab’ennono mu Africa obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe eri obulamu bw’abantu bebakulembera. Nga tannaba kusoma bubaka bwa Beene, Nankindu yasoose kulaga katambi akalaga emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka. Abantu ab’enjawulo abeenyigidde mu lukungaana luno beebazizza Omutanda olwa kaweefube gwatadde mu kutumbula eby’obulamu era nebasaba abakulembeze abalala bamulabireko. Mubuufu bwebumu Owek Dr. Prosperous Nankindu yasisinkanye President wa Nigeria eyawummula Olusegun Obasanjo naamutuusaako obubaka bwa Kabaka obwenjawulo. Yebazizza nnyo Kabaka olw’emirimu gy’akolera abantu.

headline: Poliisi erabudde abaagala okwekalakaasa olw’omuggalo
text: Fred Enanga ayogerera Poliisi Ab’ebyokwerinda nga bakulembeddwamu Poliisi n’amagye ga UPDF balabudde omuntu yenna aneetantala okwekalakaasa olw’omuggalo nti kajja kumujjuutuka. Olwleero Poliisi, amagye n’aba LDU abampi nabawanvu bakadde kuyiibwa mu Kampala n’ebitundu ebiriranyeewo oluvannyuma lw’okufuna amawulire nti aba boda boda wamu na ba takisi babadde bateekateeka kwekalakaasa oluvannyuma lwa gavumenti okubagaana okutikka abasaabaze mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri Bannamawulire ku ssengejjero ly’amawulire ga gavumenti erya Uganda Media Centre, Fred Enanga eyogerera Poliisi agambye nti mu kaseera kano nga coronavirus akutte akati mu Uganda, kyabulabe okukkiriza abantu okwekalakaasa. “Naffe tumanyi embeera mwemuli nti nzibu naye okukkiriza okwekalakaasa kyabulabe nnyo kubanga obulwadde bwa coronavirus bukyaliwo mu ggwanga. Tubasaba okukozesa amakubo ag’eddembe okulaba nga mwogera ne gavumenti okulaba egeri gyemuyinza okuggulwawo,” Enanga bweyagambye. Ono era yasabaye abo bonna abakkiriziddwa okuddamu okukola okussa mu nkola ebiragiro bya gavumenti okulaba ng’obulwadde buno tebusaasaana. Ku lulwe, omwogezi wa magye, Brig. Richard Karemire, yategeezezza nti kyennyamiza nti eggwanga eribadde litandise okuwangula olutalo l’wokulwanyisa Coronavirus kati ate lisebengerera olw’ebikolwa by’abantu. Karemire yategeezezza nti obulabe eggwanga lyebwolekedde bwamaanyi okusinga bwebwali emyezi esatu emabega ng’omuggalo tegunnalangirirwa. “Mugoberere ebiragiro bya gavumenti okwambala mask, tonsemberera, wamu n’okunaaba mungalo kubanga olutalo luno tululimu fenna,” Karemire bweyagambye. Bwosomera bino, ng’abantu 646 mu Uganda bamaze okuzuulwamu ekirwadde kya coronavirus.

headline: KITALO!  Rev. Bro Anatoli Wasswa owa Banakalooli afudde
text: Munnaddiini omutabuzi w’eddagala, omusomesa omutendeke Rev. Bro Fr. Anatoli Wasswa Kiriggwajjo owa Banakaroli Brothers abalina amakanda e Kiteredde mu disitulikiti ye Kyotera afudde. Bro. Anatoli Wasswa afudde ku makya g’Olwokubiri oluvannyuma lw’okumala akaseera nga mugonvu nga atawanyizibwa ekirwadde ky’omutima era afiiridde ku myaka 97 ate nga obwa ‘Brother’ abumazeemu emyaka 75. Ebyakafunikawo biraze nti ono abadde atwaliddwa okulongoosebwa omutima ogwali gwanafuwa wabula natasobola kudda ngulu. Anatoli yabadde omutandisi w’eddwaliro lya St. Luke Ganda erijjanjabisa obutonde n’eddagala ly’ ekinnansi nga lino lirina amatabi e kiteredde, kibuye ne Gaba. Ono ye munnaddiini eyasookera ddala okukozesa eddagala ly’ Ekinnansi najjanjaba abantu era nafuuka omusawo omuganda wadde abasinga baali baliddibya nga balowooza nti bya Sitaani era kuba kusamira. Father Annattooli Waswa abadde mukugu mu kunoonyereza ku by’obuwangwa n’eddwadde, era abadde munoonyereza ate omuvumbuzi w’eddagala ly’obutonde. Anatoli Wasswa yafuuka ‘Brother’ mu 1947 ate nafuuka ffaaza mu 1977 nga eno yesonga lwaki olumu abadde ayitibwa ffaaza. Mukiseera kino omubiri gwa Fr. Anatoli Wasswa gukyali Kiteredde wabula Enteekateeka z’okumuziika zigenda kufulumizibwa akadde konna okuva kati.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga afunye akayiso ka COVID-19 akasembayo
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, afunye ddoozi esembayo ey’eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona. Mukuumaddamula akayiso kano akookubiri akafunidde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Mmande n’asaba abantu okukola kyonna okwekuuma. “Eddagala erigema teririna bulabe era mugende babageme, abazungu bwe baba baagala okututta obutwa basobola okubuteeka mu ddagala lyonna lye tumira.” Mayiga bw’alung’amizza Katikkiro agamba wakyaliwo bangi abatidde okugemebwa nga beekwasa nti abazungu baagala kumalawo baddugavu ekintu ekitali kituufu. Ono abasabye okwewala Pokopoko naye bagemebwe, kibayambe okutaasa obulamu. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti abazungu beetaaga nnyo abaddugavu basobole okubaguza ebintu bye bakola bafunemu ssente kuba akatale mu Afirika tekannabooga. Mukuumaddamula alabudde abeegumbulidde omuze gw’okwejjanjaba nga bakozesa eddagala ezzungu lye bawulidde ku mutimbagano ssaako eryekinnansi erirowoozebwa nti teriraba ku Covid-19. Alabudde nti okwejjanjaba kwa bulabe singa eddagala limala gakozesebwa Katikkiro awabudde nti ng’obunkenke n’ennyiike bisaanikidde emitima gy’abantu bangi, kikulu okwewala okubugutana n’okulaba abakugu abali okumpi. Olwaleero n’abakungu ab’enjawulo mu Bwakabaka nabo bagemeddwa nga ku bano kuliko; eyaliko omumyuka wa Katikkiro owookubiri, owek. Amb Emmanuel Ssendawula, Minisita w’ebyobulamu Owek. Prosperous Nankindu, ssaako abakozi b’Obwakabaka awamu n’abalala. Kinajjukirwa nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu ggwanga yayimiriza okugema abantu okwekikungo oluvannyuma lw’eddagala okuggwaawo era okugema kusuubirwa okuddamu singa eddagala eddala linaaba lituuse mu kiseera ekirowoozebwa nti si kye wala okuva kati.

headline: Muwulire omulanga gwa Ssabasajja ku  siriimu-Katikkiro
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga nga ayaniriza omukungu wa UNAID Natalie Rigards  Akola ku by’empuliziganya mu ttabi ly’ekitongole ky’amawanga amagatte ekikola ku kulwanyisa akawuka ka mukenenya, Natalie Rigards, akyaddeko ku Bulange okwongera okunyweza enkolagana wakati w’obwakabaka ne UNAIDS, mu kulwanyisa siriimu. Bwabadde amusisinkanye, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, yeebazizza aba UNAIDS olwokuwa Ssaabasajja obuvunaanyizibwa buno. Yagaseeko nti Beene asoosowazza nnyo ensonga z’eby’obulamu nga kino kyeyolekera mu kukola dduyiro, okugema abaana, akukubiriza abantu okubeera abayonjo wamu n’okujjanjaba abalwadde ba Nalubiri ne Fistula nga ayita mu misinde gyamazaalibwa ge egya buli mwaka. Katikkiro agambye nti abasajja balina obuvunaanyizibwa bunene nnyo mu kulwanyisa n’okumalawo mukenenya kubanga bebatuukirira abakyala nebabagamba obugambo obuvaamu ebikolwa ebisaasaanya mukenenya. Yasabye abasajja bakitwale nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okukuuma obulamu bwabaagalwa baabwe bannakazadde b’eggwanga. “Omusajja bwanaafaayo okulwanyisa mukenenya nga Kabaka atukulembeddemu, mukenenya tujja ku mumalawo”, Katikkiro bwategeezezza. Wano wasinzidde nakuutira obuganda okuwulira Ssaabasajja byabalagira omuli; okwewala mukenenya, okwekebeza, okwekuuma, omulwadde genda ofune eddagala, abo abalina siriimu okubeera abasaale okulaba nti tebakasaasaanya okusobola okukuuma ebiseera by’eggwanga eby’omumaaso. Okulwanyisa mukenenya gwe ggwabadde omulamwa gw’omupiira gw’amasaza nga Bulemeezi ettunka ne Busiro e Namboole.

headline: Okugaba omusaayi mu masaza kuzzeemu, Kyaggwe y’eddako
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buttukizza enteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi okwetooloola Buganda kiyambe okukendeeza ku bbula ly’omusaayi eriri mu ggwanga. Kino kirangiriddwa Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala bw’abadde mu musomo gw’abakulembeze b’ekitundu ky’e Kyaggwe ku enteekateeka y’amasaza okugaba omusaayi e Ggulu mu Mukono ku Lwokuna. “Ssebo Ssekiboobo ekituleese wano e Ggulu kwe kulaba nga tutuukiriza ekiragiro kya Nnanyininsi ate era n’okulaba nga tutaasa obulamu bw’abantu abeetaaga omusaayi.” Omuk. Ndagala bw’ategeezezza. Ono alaze nti enteekateeka eno egenda kubaawo nga 7/02/2022 okutuuka nga 11/02/2022. Okusinziira ku Ndagala, ekibiina kya Red Cross bwe kyasaba ekitongole kino obuyambi yategeeza Beene eyawa ekiragiro okukung’aanya omusaayi mu masaza ge gonna era n’alagira nti mu myaka 2 ekizibu ky’abantu okufa olw’ebbula ly’omusaayi kibeere nga kiweddewo. Ndagala agambanti tannalagira kukung’aanya musaayi mu masaza, Obwakabaka bubadde buwa ekitongole kya Red Cross emirundi ebiri buli mwaka mu mwezi gwa February ne Octobernga bakozesa ekiseera abaana we babeeredde mu masomero wabula yadde gubadde bwegutyo ekizibu ky’ebbula ly’omusaayi kibadde kikyalemeddewo. Kino kyawaliriza Nnyinimu okubalagira bagende mu masaza,Ndagala era annyonnyodde nti Beene agenda kusiima essaza erinaaba lisinze okugaba omusaayi okutaasa obulamu bw’abantu be nga kino kyakubaawo mu mwezi ogwomunaana omwaka guno. Ndagala asiimye Buddu olw’okuteekawo okuvuganya okwamaanyiwakati mu kusoomoozebwa okwamanyi okwaliwo olw’ensonga nti enteekateeka eno yali etandika butandisi naye ne bakung’aanya yuniti z’omusaayi eziwera 8,169 olwo Busiro n’eweza yuniti 9,345. Kyaddondo yasobola okukung’aanya 18,346 ate Ssingo n’evaayo ne Yuniti 13,200 n’ebeera nti akadde kano yeeri mu kifo ekyokubiri. Omukwanaganya w’ebyokugaba omusaayi mu Red Cross, Sarah Mutegombwa ategeezezza nti omusaayi okugukanyizibwa mu Uganda tegumala bw’ogerageranya n’abantu abagwetaaga n’asaba abantu bonna okujjumbira enteekateeka eno kitaase obulamu.

headline: Gavumenti: Teri muggalo mu Ssekukkulu naye munyweze ebiragiro
text: Kampala Gavumenti ya Uganda erangiridde nga bw’etagenda kuteekawo muggalo ng’abamu ku bantu bwe babadde basabye okusobola okutangira okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona naddala mu kaseera kano ng’abantu beeyuna okugenda mu byalo okulya ennaku enkulu. Minisita Nabakooba Minisita w’ebyamawulire era omwogezi wa Kabbineeti, Judith Nabakooba, yategeezezza bannamawulire eggulo ku Ssande nti gavumenti tegenda kuteekawo muggalo nga kano ke kaseera bannayuganda bafeeyo ku bulamu bwabwe. “Tewagenda kubaawo muggalo mu kiseera kino eky’eggandaalo lya Ssekukkulu naye kafyu n’ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona byo bisigaddewo era musabiddwa okubeera abeegendereza ennyo.” Minisita Nabakooba bwe yagambye. Nabakooba yannyonnyodde nti ebivvulu n’endongo tebigenda kukola era n’asaba abantu okumanya nti ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kikyaliyo ne mu kiseera kino ekya Ssekukkulu. “Eri abo abagenda okugenda mu byalo, mugoberere ebiragiro, mwambale obukookolo n’okwewa amabanga, abakulembeze mu butale obwenjawulo balina okulaba ng’ebifo abayingira we banaabira engalo biddizibwawo.” Minisita Nabakooba bwe yakiggumizza. Uganda mu kiseera kino etendewaliddwa olw’omuwendo gw’abalina Ssennyiga Corona okweyongera, Ssande we yatuukidde ng’abalina ekirwadde bali 31,187 ate 231 bakkiridde dda ewa Ssenkaaba.

headline: Katikkiro akubirizza abavubuka okukulemberamu olutalo ku Mukenenya
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, akubirizza abavubuka naddala abasajja okukulemberamu olutalo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya mu kiseera kino ng’Obwakabaka bwetegeka okukuza amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’emyaka 66. Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoze leero ng’aggalawo omusomo gw’abaami n’abaweereza ba Kabaka ku kulwanyisa okusaasaana kwa Mukenenya, ogutegekeddwa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu eya Gavumenti eyaawakati ne Buganda ku Imperial Resort Beach Hotel e Ntebe. “Mbabuulidde kaati; abasajja mulina okukuuma abaana abawala. Bw’oba ogenda n’omwana omuwala, lowooza ku mwannyoko. Oyagala bamuwe ssente ensajja? Oyagala mwannyoko aleme kubuuza musajja oba baamukebera?” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abuuzizza. Katikkiro Mayiga ajjukizza abeetabye mu musomo guno ku buvunaanyizibwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bwe yasiima okukulembera olutalo lw’okulwanyisa Mukenenya mu n’ensi yonna. Asabye abafirika okukomya okwekwasa eddogo buli lwe wabeerawo ekirwadde kye batategeera, naye batuukirire obukugu bamanye ekituufu n’engeri gye basobola okubuvvuunuka. Owek. Mayiga abalabudde ku kabi akava mu butanywerera ku biragaano bye bakuba mu bufumbo obutukuvu, kitaase obulamu. Katikkiro Mayiga akuutidde abantu naddala abavubuka okukomya okulowooza nti Siriimu takyaliyo olwo ne beegadanga awatali agamba, abasabye okumanya nti ekirwadde kino kikyaliyo era kikyattira ddala abantu. Kamalabyonna asabye abasajja okumanya nti be basaale mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kubanga be batandika ebintu bino era nga n’okusalawo okwekuuma kuli mu ngalo zaabwe kuba abakyala oluusi batya okubagamba okwambala obupiira. Owek. Mayiga asabye abantu okwekebeza bamanye we bayimiridde kubanga ekijjomanyi kinyaga bitono, ate bwe bamanya bwe bayimiridde ne batandika eddagala ettuufu, basobola okubeerawo ne bawangaala. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti essaawa etuuse abavubuka n’abaana abavubuse babagambe kkaati ku ngeri ez’enjawulo mwe basobola okufunira ekirwadde kino, kisobole okubataasa. Owek. Mayiga alagidde abavubuka okwetaba mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino nga bwe bakoze ku bya tekinologiya n’ebyobufuzi, naye bafuuke abazira abanajjukirwa mu lutalo lw’okulwanyisa Mukenenya. Asabye abali mu lutalo luno okukozesa olulimi abantu ab’enjawulo okukozesa olulimi olugwanidde kiyambe obubaka okutuuka butereevu ku bantu abalina okubufuna. Ate ye minisita w’ebyobulamu, ebyenjigiriza awamu ne woofiisi ya Nnaabagereka era ssentebe w’olukiiko oluteesiteesi lw’emikolo gy’amazaalibwa, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, asabye abataka kuba abantu babawuliramu nnyo, okunnyikiza obubaka bwe bagenda okuggya mu lukung’aana luno. Ye omukugu wa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, Prof. David Sserwadda, nga y’abadde omwogezi omukulu mu lukung’aana luno, ategeezezza ng’okutondawo ebibuga bwe kyeraliikiriza nti kiriko engeri gye kigenda okwongera ku kirwadde kino. Bino byonna bitambulidde wansi w’omukago gw’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda gwe bwakoze ne minisitule y’ebyobulamu eya gavumenti eyaawakati okulaba ng’ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kirwanyisibwa. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu abakulembeze mu Bwakabaka omuli baminisita n’abakungu awamu n’abalala okuva mu gavumenti eyaawakati.

headline: Omuntu anaakulaakulana alina kubeera mulamu – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu bulijjo okusoosowaza ensonga z’ebyobulamu bwe baba baagala okukulaakulana kuba tewali kiyinza kutuukibwako singa ababeera nga balwadde n’abakuutira obutagajjalira byabulamu. Bino Katikkiro Mayiga abyogeredde ku Buvuma Health Centre IV ku Mmande bw’abadde atongoza okugema abantu awamu n’okutongoza enteekateeka y’Emmwanyi Terimba mu kitundu kino ng’omu ku kaweefube w’okuggya abantu ba Kabaka mu bwavu. “Anaalima emmwanyi alina kusooka kubeera mulamu, anaavuba alina kusooka kuba mulamu, anaasuubula alina kusooka kuba mulamu. Nze mu ndaba yange ey’ebintu, abantu abasinga okuba ab’omugaso ye musomesa n’omusawo kuba ne bw’oba olina ebirowoozo ebifaanana bitya, bifa ttoge ng’oli mulwadde. Tuteekwa okusoosowaza ensonga z’ebyobulamu bwetuba twagala Buvuma ebeera ku ntikko mu masaza ga Buganda.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, abantu balina okusigala nga balwanyisa obulwadde bwa Corona era n’abasaba okwewala ebisaasaanyizibwa ku bulwadde buno era bakimanye nti Beene abaagala balamu, noolwekyo beegemese nga Nnyinimu bwe yakola. Owek. Mayiga abasabye okwekuuma ekirwadde kino nga bagoberera amateeka g’abasawo okusobola okusigala nga balamu. Abakuutidde okwekuuma ekirwadde kya Mukenenya era beekebeze bamanye bwe bayimiridde kuba kizuuliddwa nti mu kitundu kino, akulira ku bitundu 6 ku buli 100. Abasabye era okukomya omuze gw’okugabana abakyala nga beekwasa nti abakyala batono mu kitundu kino. Akulira eddwaliro lino erya Buvuma Health Centre Iv, Dr. Abubaker Kanyike alaze obwetaavu we buli naddala ku bisinga okubasoomooza, n’asaba bayambibweko. Oluvannyuma Katikkiro Mayiga agenyiwadde ku kigo kya St. Kizito Namunyolo okwebaza Katonda okubasomosa amazzi obutafaananko lwe baabula mu mwaka gwa 2017 era ng’eno Bwanamukulu w’ekigo kino, Fr. Henry Mukasa y’amwanirizza n’abayizi ku ssomero ly’Ekelezia. Katikkiro mu kulambula kuno yawerekeddwako Minisita w’ebyobulimi Hajjat Mariam Nkalubo Mayanja, Ow’ebyamawulire Owek. Noah Kiyimba, ow’Abavubuka Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ne Ssenkulu wa Bboodi ya BUCADEF, Omuk. Ishak Lukenge. Katikkiro waakumala ku bizinga bino ennaku 3 era ng’olwenkya lw’agenda okutongoza enteekateeka ya Mmwanyi Terimba, ekitundu ekisooka 2022 wakati mu kuzza Buvuma bw’eba si Buganda ku ntikko.

headline: Ab’e Kyotera balaajanye; bamaze emyaka 5 nga tebalina kyuma kya X- Ray
text: Abakulira eddwaliro ekkulu erya Kaliisizo Hospital mu disitulikiti y’eKyotera, balaajanidde gavumenti ebafunire ekyuma ekikebera n’okukuba ebifaananyi ekiyitibwa X-Ray, kisobole okubayambako okujjanjaba obulungi abalwadde abazuuliddwamu COVID-19 wamu n’ebirwadde ebirala. Bano bagamba nti ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kitabuse nga kati abantu lukumi (1000) okwetooloola Kyotera yonna, kizuuliddwa nti bakirina nga ku bano 9 baamaze dda okufa okuli n’omusawo. Akulira eby’obujjanjabi ku ddwaliro lino, Dr. Ssekyeru Emmanuel, okuwanjaga kuno yakutuusizza eri omubaka wa Kyotera mu Palamenti, John Paul Lukwago Mpalanyi , bwe yabadde alambula eddwaliro lino okulaba embeera bw’eri n’okubawa ebyeyambisibwa. Dr. Ssekyeru yannyonnyodde nti ekyuma kya X-Ray bakyetaaga nnyo mu kaseera kano kuba balina okulaba embeera y’amawuggwe g’abalwadde ba COVID-19 bw’eyimiridde ate nga n’omuwendo gw’abalwadde abalala abeetaaga ekyuma kino nagwo mungi. Ono era yasabye babafunire ku mukka ogussibwa ogwa ‘Oxgyen’ kuba balina sirinda eziwerera ddala 10 kyokka ebyembi balina kusooka kuzitwala Kampala okusobola okufuna omukka guno, ekintu ekibasoomooza ennyo. Yasiimye omubaka Mpalanyi olw’okubawa ebikozesebwa okujjanjaba aba COVID-19, nti kino kijja kukendeeza ku muwendo gw’abasawo abakwatibwa ekirwadde kino. Ono era yasabye ne gavumenti okulowooza ku kasiimo k’abasawo abajjanjaba obulwade bwa kovid e Kyotera kubanga tebakalabangako. Ye Omubaka John Paul Lukwago Mpalanyi bwe yabadde abakwasa obuyambi buno, omwabadde ebyambalo eby’okwambalibwa abasawo, eddagala, Ssabbuuni n’ebirala, yagambye nti okukola kino yamaze kulaba ng’embeera esajjuse ate ng’abakwatibwako ku nsonga y’ebyobulamu tebafuddeeyo, ne yeewuunya embeera eri mu ddwaliro etuusizza okubulwa ekyuma kya X-ray ne oxygyen n’ebirala. Atessentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Kyotera, Patrick Kintu Kisekulo, yalabudde abatuuze okukomya okukaabira ku mirambo gya COVID-19 n’okuginaaza nti kino kye kimu kubiviiriddeko obulwadde buno okwegiriisa mu Kyotera. Bo abatuuze basanyukidde nnyo ekyo ekyakoleddwa omubaka John Paul Lukwago Mpalanyi olw’okutaasa obulamu bw’abatuuze n’abasawo. Omubaka Mpalanyi era alikoabakulembeze ba boodabooda n’aba takisi ku Sport Highway e Kaliisizo n’abawa akawunga n’ebijanjaalo, basobole okuliisa famire zaabwe mu muggalo guno.

headline: Buganda ejjukidde olunaku lwa Mukenenya, Owek. Kiyimba asabye abakalina okulemera ku ddagala
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwegasse ku nsi yonna okujjukira olunaku lwa Mukenenya era wano Minisita w’Olukiiko, Amawulire, era omwogezi w’Obwakabaka, Oweek. Noah Kiyimba wansizidde nasaba abantu abasangiddwa n’akawuka okunywerera ku ddagala. Owek. Kiyimba agamba nti kisoboka bulungi omuntu abeera azuuliddwamu akawuka okuwangaala obulungi singa afuna eddagala mu budde era naalimira nga bwabeera alagiddwa abasawo abakugu. Obubaka buno Minisita Kiyimba yabuwadde eggulo ku Lwokusatu mu Bulange e Mmenga bw’abadde awa obubaka bwa Buganda ku kujjukira olunaku luno olukuzibwa buli Decemba 1 okusobola okwefumiintiriza ku kirwadde kino. Mu bubaka bw’Obwakabaka, kizuuliddwa nti Buganda y’ensingamu abantu abalina akawuka ka Mukenya, n’obutundutundu 8.9%, so nga era y’ensingamu abantu abali kuddagala eriweweeza ku Mukenenya ababalirirwa okuba 500,000. Okusinziira ku Bwakabaka, Kino kivudde ku kubeera nti Buganda yesingamu ebibuga omuli n’ekibuga ekikulu, Kampala nga wano wokka abantu abasoba mu bukadde 12 ate era netwaliramu n’ebibuga ebiralam so nga n’abavubi bangi mukitundu kino. Owek. Kiyimba agamba nti ezimu ku nsonga eziviiriddeko obulwadde buno okwongera okwegiriisiza mu Buganda mulimu; okunywa omwenge n’okukozesa ebiragalalagala, obwenzi, okuba n’ababeezi abangi, obwavu, obutabanguko mu maka oluusi obuleetawo okwesasuza, okuba okunoonya obuweerero ebbali. Okunoonyereza kuno era kunokoddeyo ezimu ku mpisa mu mikolo n’obuwangwa egiwa ebikolwa by’obuseegu ekyaanya, abantu obutakozesa bupiira, abakyala b’embuto okuzaalira mu bamulerwa era nga COVID-19 n’ Ebola nabyo byakola kinene okwongera ku kirwadde kino. Minisita Kiyimba annyonnyodde nti wakati mu nteekateeka ya Buganda okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino, Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasalawo akwate omumuli nga yasiima obuvunaanyizibwa buno bumuweebwe ekitongole ekirwanyisa Mukenenya mu nsi yonna ki UNAIDS, mu 2017. Era Omutanda yawaayo emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ge gissibwe ku mulamwa ogw’okulwanyisa mukenenya okumala emyaka 3, okuva mu 2020 okutuuka mu 2022 okusobola okwongera okukimanyisa abantu. Buganda era eriko emikago gyekoze n’ebitongole ekirwanyisa ekirwadde kino okuli UNAIDS, Uganda Aids Commission, Minisitule y’Ebyobulamu, UNDP, TASO n’ebirala okumalawo ekirwadde kino. Owek. Kiyimba agasseeko nti Obwakabaka buvuddeyo n’enkola ey’Ebyoto ku ggombolola za Buganda zonna okutuusa obubaka ku bantu bamanye engeri y’okwekuuma Mukenenya era nebufuulibwa omulamwa mu mizannyo gy’Obwakabaka okuli omupiira gw’amasaza n’ebika. Minisita ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwasuubira okulaba nga abantu obutundutundu 90 beekebeza; obutundutundu 90 ku balwadde bakkiriza okumira eddala, ate n’okulaba nga obutundutundu 90 kw’abo abamira eddagala, bakendeeza amaanyi ga kawuka. Agambye nti ekigendererwa kino ky’atuukibwako era nga kati baluubirira okuweza obutundutundu 95, ku buli nsonga ekooneddwako waggulu. Obwakabaka bukubiriza abantu okwongera amaanyi mu kwekebeza mukenenya; okwewala okwegadanga mu bavubuka; okwekuumira ku babeezi bammwe; okukozesa obupiira; abakyala okujjumbira amalwaliro nga bali mbuto; okujjumbira eddala eriziyiza akawuka okusaasaana; abaami okutayirirwa ate n’abalwadde okujjumbira okukozesa eddala mu butuufu bw’alyo. Busabye n’abalwadde okufuba ennyo okulya obulungi, omubiri gufune amaanyi agalwanyisa akawuka.

headline: Poliisi Egambye Siyakujja Misanvu Mu Nguudo Ezeetoolodde Kampala
text: Poliisi ya Uganda ng’eyitira mu mwogezi waayo Fred Enanga egambye nti siyakujja misanvu gyayo mu nguudo ezeetoolodde ekibuga Kampala okusobola okukwata abo abajeemera amateeka ku kuziyiza ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri olukungaana lwabannamawulire ku kitebe ky’essengejjero lya mawulire ga gavumenti ekimanyiddwa nga Uganda Media Centre, Enanga agambye nti singa bajja emisanvu gino makubo, kijja kuba kizibu okukwata abavuzi b’emmotoka abatwala abantu abasukka mu basatu, abatakisi abatwala abantu abasukka mu musanvu oba aba boda boda abasaabaza abantu; ebikolwa byonna ebyawerwa gavumenti. “Naye bweweetegereza emisanvu egisinga mukibuga twagijjawo okusobozesa emmotoka okutambula obulungi. Naye egyo gyetwalekawo bakama baffe baakisalawo gisigalewo okutusobozesa okukola emirimu gyaffe,” Enanga bweyagambye. Ono yagasseeko nti ssabbiiti ewedde baakwata boda boda ezigenda mu 1000 wamu ne motoka ezigenda mu 300 okwetoololaa eggwanga wamu n’okusiba abantu era abakkunukkiriza mu 500 bonna lwakujeemera biragiro bya pulezidenti ku COVID-19. “Tulabula abantu baffe nti tujja kubakwata singa munaagenda mu maaso n’okujeemera amateeka gano,” Enanga bweyagambye.

headline: Owek. Waggwa asabye abasajja okwongera okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Omumyuka Ow’okubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibrwa asabye abasajja okwongera amaanyi mu lutalo lw’okulwanyisa Mukenenya kiyambe okwanguya okutuula ekirwadde kino ku nfeete. Okwogera bino, Owek. Waggwa abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu bantu ba Kabaka ab’e Buddu ab’eggombolola ya Mutuba 6 Katwe mu Lubiri e Mmengo ku Lwokusatu. “Okuva Ssaabasajja lweyenyigira mu mulimu ogwo, obutundutundu bw’ abantu abalina Mukenenya mu Buganda buzze bukendeera mwaka ku mwaka. Era bwotunula mu bibalo n’emiwendo ojja kulaba nti Buddu yali bwati era kati ali bwati. Wabaddewo okugenda mu maaso kwamanyi nnyo nga mukama waffe atukulembedde mu nsonga eno,” Owek. Waggwa bw’agambye. Owek. Waggwa ategeezezza nti Beene bweyali alonda omulamwa gw’emisinde gy’omwaka guno, yalagira baami okubeera abasaale mukulwanyisa Mukenenya kiyambe okutaasa abaana ab’obuwala. Nsibirwa alaze okutya nti wadde wabaddewo okukendeera kw’ ekirwadde kino naye kikyasimbye amakanda mu Buganda naddala e Buddu ne Ssese nasaba abaami kuluno okuvaayo mu bungi okubulwanyisa. Ono ajjukiza abantu bano nti ekifundikwa kya Buganda ye Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II era nabasaba bamanye nti amaanyi ge gali mu bantu.  Owek. Waggwa bano abasiimye okunyweza ennono y’okukiika embuga n’okuleeta Amakula kuba eyo yengeri gyebasobola okulabiriramu embiri za Kabaka. Bano ababadde bakulembeddwamu omwami w’ eggombolola eno, Zawedde Gertrude Muteesasira n’Olukiiko lwawereza nalwo baweze okwongera okuwagira enteekateeka za Buganda mu mbeera yonna. Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka omuk. Moses Luutu bano abeebaziza olw’okunyweza ennono zabwe ate n’ebafaayo okuzituukiriza era n’abakubiriza okwewala okuggyibwa ku mulamwa ebyogerwa ku mmwannyi wabula bannyikize okugirima kubanga kya bugagga. Amakula agaleeteddwa mubaddemu ebisolo , emmere , ebibala n’ebintu ebirala.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni atabukidde bannayuganda abagaanye okukuuma ebiragiro bya Ebola, bandituleetera omuggalo
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Tibuhaburwa Museveni, atabukidde bannayuganda abalemedde ku kunyooma ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo Minisitule y’ebyobulamu okulwanyisa ekirwadde ky’ Ebola nti bayinza okuzza eggwanga ku muggalo. Bino Museveni yabituuseeko bweyabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga ku mbeera y’ekirwadde kino eggulo ku Lwokusatu. Okusinziira ku Museveni obunkenke bweyongedde kuba Ebola kati atuuse mu disitulikiti eziwera 8 omuli; Mubende, Kassanda, Kyegegwa, Bunyangabu, Kampala, Wakiso, Jinja ne Kagadi, wadde nga engeri y’okumulwanyisaamu emanyiddwa. Museveni agambye nti singa banna Kampala, tebakomye nkola zakumenya biragiro ebyabaweebwa nabo boolekedde okukolebwako n’amaanyi, era nabalabulabula ne kunkola yokwekwata mu ngalo ekomezebwe bunnambiro. Ono era alabudde abagoba ba bodaboda mu disitulikiti eziri ku muggalo, nti tabakkirizangako kuweekako bantu okuggyako emigugu kikendeeze ku nsaasaana y’ekirwadde kino. Kaguta yagasseeko nti nsinga abantu tebaawulirize biragiro byabaweebwa wakukola eky’obulabe ekisingako, nalabula abavuga ebimotoka ebisaabaza ebyamaguzi okukomya okukusa abantu nga babayingiza n’okubafulumya disitulikiti eziri ku muggalo. Bino webijjidde nga abakazuulibwamu Ebola kati bali 141 , abaakafa bali 55, abalala 73 basiibuddwa so nga mu malwaliro wasigaddeyo 13 bokka. Waliwo abalala 4,147 abaabadde mu kalantiini, 2,784 baamazeyo ennaku zaabwe 21 ez’okulondoolwa era abasawo nebazuulwa nti tebalina Ebola. Mu ngeri ey’enjawulo, Pulezidenti Museveni yeebazizza abakulembeze mu disitulikiti ye Mubende olw’okukola ennyo okumalawo ekirwadde kino kuba kati kitutte akaseera nga tebafuna mulwadde w’ Ebola okuva mukitundu kino. Ono yalabudde ab’e Kassanda gyagambye nti yewasinga okusaasaana obulwadde olw’okumala geeyisa mu ngeri etategeerekeka. Museveni bano era yabalangidde okulonda ab’oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu 2021 abatamanyi kituufu kirina kukolebwa.

headline: Ssenfuka eyavumbula eddagala lya Ssukaali alaajana, baagala kumutta
text: Kampala Omuvubuka David Ssenfuka, agambibwa okuvumbula eddagala lyaffe ery’obutonde erijjanjaba Ssukaali, Kkookolo n’obulwadde obw’olukonvuba addukidde ku poliisi n’amawulire ayambibwe ku baagala okumutta. Ssenfuka agamba baagala kumutta Ssenfuka yategeezezza bannamawulire eggulo e Makerere, nti afuna essimu ezimutiisatiisa nti bw’aba ayagala obulamu yeesonyiwe eby’okufulumya eddagala erijjanjaba ebirwadde bino. David Ssenfuka ye mutandisi wa kkampuni enoonyereza ku ddagala ly’ekinnansi eya Leona-NNN-Medical Research and Diagnostics center, era gavumenti emabegako yakakasa nti eddagala lye lisobola bulungi okuwonya Kkookol.o ne Ssukaali oluvannyuma lw’okuligezesa. Eggulo ku Lwokuna, Ssenfuka yategeezezza bannamawulire nti essimu ezimutiisatiisa ziyitiridde era byonna bijja ku ddagala. “Omu yang’ambye nti bamupangisizza anzite.  Yambulidde engeri gye nnyambaddemu era n’ayogera ebimu ku bigambo bye nayogedde mu lunaku okunkakasa nti atambulirako.” Ssenfuka bwe yannyonnyodde. Ssenfuka yagasseeko nti aliko abantu abamulinnya akagere era nga bano bagenderera kimu kya kumutta. Omu ku bakozi ba Ssenfuka, Samuel Ampaire, yagambye nti ababalondoola bava wabweru wa ggwanga. “Abamukubira bamugamba kuva ku bya kunoonyereza ku ddagala oba si ekyo ne b’akola nabo bajja kuttibwa.” Ampaire bwe yategeezezza. Ssenfuka agamba nti wadde balina endwadde endala ze babadde batandise okunoonyerezaako naye bakizudde ng’obulamu bwabwe buli mu matigga era atandise n’okulowooza ku ky’okudduka mu ggwanga banoonye abasobola obabudamya.  Omwogezi wa Poliisi mu Kampala, Patrick Onyango, yategeezezza nti ensonga za Ssenfuka bazimanyi era bayogera naye ne bamubuulira ky’alina okukola. Emabegako Ssenfuka yakuba gavumenti mu kkooti ng’agivunaana okulemwa okumuwa olukusa okutunda eddagala lye ate nga liriko abanene be lyawonya omuli n’omulamuzi John Bosco Katutsi. Ono oluvannyuma gavumenti yamusaba okuggyayo omusango bateese balabe engeri gye bagenda okukwatagana okutaasa bannayuganda ku ndwadde zino naye ate tewali kyakolebwa.

headline: Museveni ayongezzaayo ennaku kalantiini
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni  Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Genero Yoweri Kaguta Museveni olwaleero eyongezzayo ennaku za kalantiini ne kafiyu okutuuka nga May 05.  Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwapulezidenti e Nakasero, Museveni yategeezezza nti kyetaagisa okwongezaayo ennaku zino okusobola okwongera okutangira okusasaana kw’akawuka ka Coronaviru mu ggwanga.  Museveni yagambye nti bukyanga batandika kukebera bantu okuzuula oba balina akawuka, omuwendo gutuuse ku bantu 5664 nga kubbo, 54 bokka bebasangibwa n’ekirwadde kya coronavirus ekimanyiddwa ennyo nga COVID-19.  “Okuba n’abalwadde 54 bokka kitegeeza nti enkola gyetwateekawo ebadde ekoze bulungi. Naye nsaba Bannayuganda mweyongere okugumiikiriza okutaataaganyizibwa kuno pakka ng’ennaku zino ziweddeyo olwo tutandike okuta mpolampola,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Ekirwadde kya coronavirus kyakatta abantu abasoba mu mitwalo kkumi n’ebiri mu nsi yonna nga n’abakunnukiriza mu bukadde obubiri bamaze okusiigibwa.  Ng’ebyo bikyalyawo, Museveni alabudde abantu abakuba abasirikale amayinja n’agamba oyo yenna gwebanaakwatako kajja mujjuutuka.  Museveni yalagidde abasirikale bonna abalumbibwa nga tabalina bisseppewo by’okumutwe oba ebisowani ebiziyiza amayinja, okukuba abo ababakuba amayinja amasasi mu bifo ng’amagulu oluvanyuma babasibe.  “Okuba otya omusirikale amayinja, lwaki weeretera ebizibu,” Museveni bweyagambye.

headline: Kkooti Enkulu Eyimbudde Abakwatibwa Olwa Kafiyu
text: Bnnamateeka ba Aciro  Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala esazizzaamu ekibonerezo ekyali kyaweebwa Lililian Aciro, omukyala alina abaana omusanvu olw’okujeemera ebiragiro by’omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni eky’obutatambula mu budde bwa kafiyu atandika essaawa emu eyakawungeezi n’akoma essaawa kumina bbiri en’ekitundu ez’okumakya. Omukulemelembeze w’eggwnga yassaawo ebiragiro eby’enjawulo okusobola okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe owa coronavirus. Aciro kukibonerezo eky’emyezi esatu yali akikola wamu ne; Rodgers Keyi, Josephat Aceyi , Brenda Akao, Ben Aleper, James Jamel Alumal, Mary Nambi, John Paul Burusi, Felix Nyeko, Jackson Kamwaga, Daniel Muwanguzi, Tonny Kaziba, Isa Wapisa, Hassan Anguzo, Benard Atoroti, Fred Walusimbi, Josephine Acen. Gasi Madalema, Kerry Owori ne Akram Mwanje.Bano omulamuzi wa kkooti ento etuula ku Buganda Road ng’ekulembeddwamu omulamuzi Stella Maris Amabilis eyali abasindise mu kkomera e Kigo. Kyokka omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu Justice Wilson Kwesiga yagambye kkooti ya Buganda Road yakola ensobi mukuwuliriza omusango guno.  Yagambye tekikkirizibwa kuwozesa abantu bataliiwo.Bano yalagidde bayimbulwe mangu kubanga eddembe lyabwe ery’okuwulirwa lyali lirinyiriddwa.

headline: Owek. Ssekabembe asabye abavubuka okugaba omusaayi
text: Minisita wa bavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, asabye abavubuka ba Buganda okugenda e Mmengo mu bungi olunaku lwenkya, baweeyo omusaayi bayambe ku bagwetaaga. Minisita Ssekabembe n’abamu ku bavubuka abeetabye mu kugaba omusaayi Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti abantu abatasobodde kugenda Mmengo mu nnaku zino ezasoose, basobola bulungi okugaba omusaayi olunaku lw’enkya. Bino Minisita Ssekabembe abyogeredde mu Bulange bw’abadde yeetabye mu kugaba omusaayi era n’akunga abavubuka mu bibiina ebyenjawulo okuvaayo bajjumbire. Owek. Ssekabembe yabadde omugabi w’omusaayi omukulu olunaku lwaleero era yeebazizza abavubuka olwokuvaayo mu bungi ne bagaba omusaayi. Wano w’asinzidde n’asaba abavubuka okujjumbiranga buli Ssaabasajja lw’asiima Obuganda okwetaba mu nsonga ez’ekikula kino, kubanga abavubuka be balina okuba abasaale mu nteekateeka za Buganda. Olunaku lw’enkya, Omulangira David Kintu Wassajja, y’agenda okuba omugabi w’omusaayi omukulu era aggalewo enteekateeka eno eyawomebwamu omutwe, ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation, Nakasero Blood Bank ne Red Cross. Leero abavubuka b’ekibiina kya Nkobazambogo okuva ku Ssetendekero wa Makerere ne Muteesa 1 awamu n’abakozi ba CBS ne BBS Terefayina, nabo beenyigidde mu nteekateeka eno okusobola okuyamba ku bantu abagwetaaga. Akulira entambuza y’emirimu ku BBS Terefayina, Steven Dunstan Busuulwa, annyonnyodde nga bwe waliwo obwetaavu bw’okumalawo ebbula ly’omusaayi nga kibadde kibakakatako nga Terefayina okwetaba mu nteekateeka eno.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga agugumbudde abakola Masiki ezitatuukana mutindo
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga atabukidde kkampuni n’abantu abaweebwa omulimu gw’okukola obukookolo (Masiki) olw’okwolesa omululu nebakola obutatuukana mutindo ekintu ekitadde obulamu bwa bannayuganda mu matigga. Katikkiro Mayiga, Minisita Ssekabembe n’olukiiko olwalondeddwa     Okwogera bino Katikkiro Mayiga abadde atongozza olukiiko oluggya olugenda okukulembera okulondesa abakulembeze mu bibiina bya bavubuka mu Buganda ku Lwokutaano mu Bulange e Mmengo. Olukiiko luno olutongozeddwa lwakukulirwa Owek. Joseph Balikuddembe Ssenkusu, amyukibwe Oweek. Rose Nantumbwe, Oweek. Kiyemba Hassan nga ono ye muwandiisi, oweek. Kazibwe Israeli, oweek. Victoria Bukirwa n’omwami Emmanuel Matovu. Katikkiro Mayiga yategezeeza nti,emyaka egy’obuvubuka gyegisinga okuba egy’enkizo mu bulamu bw’omuntu era gyegisalawo ki kyanabeera nga akuze era nasaba abakulembeze okutegeera obuvunanyizibwa obubawereddwa okusobola okulungamya abavubuka mu Buganda Kamalabyonna yagambye nti, “Abakulembeera abavubuka balina okuba abasajja n’abakazi abalimu ensa, nga beesigika nga babuvunanyizibwa kubanga ebintu ebyo by’ebibumba omuvubuka okutuuka ku ddala elyegombeesa” Ow’omumbuga yabasabye okubeera abeesimbu basobole okuvumbulira Ssaabasajja abavubuka abalina akiruubirirwa ky’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. “Omuntu agenda mu bukulembeeza nga asuubira okulyayo ebifi by’enyama oyo taba nakirubirirwa kya kuzza Buganda ku ntikko kubanga ajja kubanga akulembeza bibye so ssi eby’abo bakulembeera era abantu bwebatyo tebayinza kukulembeera bannabwe babeera banonya byabwe ate Buganda tebetaaga,” Mayiga bweyagasseeko. Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuza Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, bwabadde ayanjula olukiiko luno yasiimye olukiiko olukadde olwo’buweereza obulungi bwe balaze ate nategeeza nga olukiiko luno bwelugenda okusigala nga birondoola ebibiina bino nga okulonda kuwedde. Ate yye Ssentebe w’olukiiko omuggya Oweek. Joseph Ssenkusu Balikudembe yalaze nga bwewabaddewo okusomoozebwa mukulondoola abalondebwa naye nasuubiza ku murundi guno okwongeramu amaanyi kisobole okusitula Obwakabaka okubutwala ku ntikko. Bano baweze okukola ennyo basobole okuggusa olubimbi olubawereddwa.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe akunze abantu okwetaba mu misinde okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Minisita w’abavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuza mu Bwakabaka, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, akunze abantu ba Buganda okwetaba mu misinde gy’amazaalibwa nga 29/November/2020 kiyambe okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Siriimu. Minisita Henry Ssekabembe nga  ayogerako eri bannamawulire Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti wadde abasinga essira balitadde ku kulwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona naye balina okukimanya nti siriimu akyalimu w’ali era ng’omumuli guweereddwa basajja, okukuliramu olutabaalo kiyambe okutaasa abaana ab’obuwala. Bino Ssekabembe abyogeredde Bulange Mmengo mu Kampala ku Mmande bw’abadde alambulula ku nteekateeka y’emisinde gino eri bannamawulire. “Tusuubira abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka ffenna nga tetweyawuddemu mu nzikiriza n’amawanga mu myaka, abavubuka, abakadde twandijumbidde nnyo enteekateeka eno kubanga esimbiddwa wakati mu kiruubirirwa eky’okulwanyisa obulwadde buno obwa Mukenenya.” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Minisita Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye n’akendeeza ku nsimbi z’omujoozi gw’okuddukiramu ogwabadde ku 15,000 nezidda ku 10000 olw’ensonga nti alabye abantu be nga bakoseddwa ekirwadde ky Ssennyiga Corona. Ssekabembe akubirizza abantu ba Kabaka okwekebeza ekirwadde kya Mukenenya era singa bakizuula nti balwadde batandike eddagala era n’abasangibwa nga balamu beekuume ekirwadde kino. Ono alambise abantu ba Kabaka ku ngeri emisinde gino gye gigenda okuddukibwamu olw’embeera ya COVID-19. Ssekabembe agambye nti Beene asiimye asimbule abaddusi kikumi bokka mu Lubiri e Mmengo ate abantu abalala baddukire mu bitundu byabwe mu nkola ya Ssaayansi. Ategeezezza nti emijoozi bagenda kugisindika mu Masaza ag’enjawulo okulaba nga gituuka ku bantu ba Nnyinimu. Akkaatirizza nti okuva ku ntandika buli mwaka emisinde gino gibaddeko omulamwa ogw’enjawulo nga okulwanyisa ekikulukuto mu bakyala (Fistula), Nnalubiri (Sickle Cell) era nga giyambye okukendeeza ebirwadde bino. Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti basuubira nti omwaka 2023 we gunaatuukira nga balina we batuuse mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya.

headline: Buganda ekwataganye ne Gavumenti ya wakati okutangira Mukenenya
text: Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu Gavumenti yaawakati ekwataganye n’Obwakabaka okulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Mukenenya nga bayita mu nkola y’okugabira abantu obupiira bukakuumabulamu. Olwaleero abakungu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu gavumenti eyaawakati basisinkanye Minisita w’ebyobulamu mu Buganda, Dr. Prosperous Nankindu, ne batonera Obwakabaka obupiira bugalimpitawa obuweredde ddala obukadde 3 omuli n’obwabakyala okusobola okukuuma abantu ba Nnyinimu. Minisita Dr. Prosperous Nankindu ategeezezza nti ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kisinga mu Buganda nga kisinga mu Kalangala n’emyalo. Kyokka kakasizza nti mu biseera by’amazaalibwa baakugabira abakyala kkondomu zino awamu n’okubasomesa enkozesa yaazo. “Mu by’obuwangwa bya Buganda bwe tuba tusomesa abaana tulaba ng’abaana okwegadanga kivve era tetukyogerako naye bwe twatuula wansi twalaba nti bwe budde kuba Siriimu alemedde wano.” Owek. Nankindu bw’agambye. Owek. Nankindu annyonnyodde nti kkondomu zino zigenda kugabirwa mu baami ba Ssaabasajja ab’enjawulo okutuuka wansi ku byalo, kiyambe okumalawo ekirwadde kino. Ono ategeezezza nti bagenda kweyambisa eby’obuwangwa okulaba nga balwanyisa ekirwadde kino nga beeyambise obupiira buno, kiyambe okutangira ekirwadde. Minisita Nankindu alaze nga bwe bagenda okwogerezeganya n’abakyala abakazibwako erya Nneekoleragyange okubabangula ku ngeri y’okwekuuma wamu n’okuboogereza bafune emirimu emirala beewala ekirwadde kino. Ate ye Dr. Daniel Byamukama agamba nti okunoonyereza kwe bakoze ku kizudde ng’abantu balemereddwa okukozesa enkola y’okwekuuma n’okwegenderez ezaali zissiddwako essira mu kusooka. Wabula agasseeko nti enkola y’okukozesa obupiira y’esinze okwettanirwa ku ezo endala ezimanyiddwa nga (ABC), ekivvuunulwa nti (A- Abstain, B- Be careful, C-Use condom).

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza okugema COVID-19 okw’ekikungo
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga atongozza enteekateeka y’okwegemesa okw’ekikungo okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era kisobozese eggwanga okuggulwawo mu bujjuvu awamu n’okutumbula embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Omukolo gubadde ku mbuga enkulu mu  ku Lwokubiri era Katikkiro asinzidde wano n’asaba abantu okwegemesa kuba Buganda okudda ku ntikko yeetaaga abantu nga balamu. “Twagala okugumya abantu mu Buganda nti eddagala erigema teririna kabi. Okusookera ddala Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda mwalaba nga agemebwa, mwalaba Katikkiro ng’agemebwa. Eddagala oba lya Astra Zenac oba lya Pfizer tewali ligenda kubalemesa kuzaala.” Owek. Mayiga bw’ategeezezza.  Ono asabye abantu wonna okugoberera amateeka agateekebwawo abasawo okusobola okwetaasa ekirwadde kino kuba wadde bingi ebyogeddwa okuzimba Obuganda naye ek’obulamu kye kisinga obukulu. “Tosobola kuzimba Buganda okuggyako ng’abantu balamu era nkakasa nti omuntu omukulu ali mu mulembe Omutebi, kizibu okuba nga tannaba kutegeera nsonga za byabulamu n’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Tosobola kuzimba Buganda okuggyako ng’abantu balamu, Lumiimamawuggwe tasosola.” Owek. Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti kituufu waliwo abantu abafuna akasujja oluvannyuma lw’okubagema naye kino tekirina kubatiisa kuba buli omu eddagala limuyisa bubwe. Ono annyonnyodde nti okwegemesa kye kintu ekisaanidde okukolebwa abantu bonna abagezi kuba wadde obulwadde busobola okumukwata naye ate tebumuyisa bubi era tafa. Kamalabyonna asiimye aba Medical and Molecular Labarotories olw’okuwaayo obukookolo obuwera omutwalo mulamba okuyambako abantu okwetangira ekirwadde kino era n’asaba abantu okulya obulungi kibayambe okuzimba obusobozi bw’emibiri gyabwe okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino era batumbule n’obuyonjo. Ye Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Buganda ekya Majestic Brands, Omuk. Ronald Kawadwa ategeezezza nti emu ku ensonga lwaki baasalawo okwegatta ne Uganda Breweries okugema abantu, kwe kuba nti ebintu by’Obwakabakang’Engule byali biserebye olw’abantu obutasobola kukung’aana na kusanyuka nga bwe gwali emabegako nga singa abantu beegemesa mu bungi, eggwanga lijja kuggulwawo. Omukungu okuva mu Uganda Breweries, Jackie Tahakanizibwa agambye nti abantu ba Kabaka bafunye omukisa okwegemesa awatali kusimba nyiriri wadde okusindikagana bw’atyo n’asaba abantu okuvaayo mu bungi eggwanga lisobole okuggulwawo. Enteekateeka eno ewagiddwa aba Uganda Breweries, ekitongole kya KCCA,Private Sector Foundation Uganda, Coca Cola ne Medical and Molecular Labarotories nga yaakubeerawo ku wiikendi eno nga 6 ne 7 November mu bimuli bya Bulange.

headline: Enanga : Abaduumizi abamu batya okukwasisa ebiragiro bya Corona ku ba NRM
text: Kampala Omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Enanga, ategeezezza nti ekiremesa abaduumira poliisi mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo okuyimiriza enkung’aana z’ekibiina kya NRM ezikubibwa mu bukyamu, kwe kutya okufiirwa emirimu gyabwe. Omwogezi wa poliisi Fred Enanga Enanga ategeezezza nti wadde ekiragiro kya Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi tekirina gwe kitaliza naye abamu ku bano bakikola olw’okuba batiitiizi era nga balowooza singa banaagaana aba NRM okukuba enkung’aana, bandigobwa ku mirimu ekintu ekitali kituufu. Enanga ategeezezza bannamawulire olwaleero nti nga poliisi tebalina muntu yenna gwe balina kuttira ku liiso singa asangibwa ng’amenya ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. “Ssaabaduumizi yavaayo n’agamba nti omuntu yenna amenya amateeka avunaanibwe awatali kufaayo ku langi mwava.” Enanga bw’agambye. Wabula ono agambye nti okwemulugunya okuva mu bantu nga kulaga ng’aba NRM bwe batakwatibwako, ekiraga obunafu obuli mu bakulira poliisi mu bitundu ebyenjawulo. Enanga alaze nga poliisi bw’etalina ludda era n’amenya abamu ku bannakibiina kya NRM be bakutte olwokukuba enkung’aana ezimenya amateeka. Ono agasseeko nga Minisita w’ebibiina by’obwegassi, Haruna Kasolo bwe yayitiddwa poliisi e Masaka era ng’enkya ya leero yeeyanjudde ku bigambibwa nti yakubye olukung’aana olunene ne lufiiramu n’omuntu omu ate abalala ne batwalibwa mu ddwaliro nga bataawa. Okusinziira ku Enanga bino byabadde Nabigasa ku Lwokutaano oluvannyuma lw’abawagizi ba Kasolo ne John Paul Mpalanyi, avuganya ku bubaka bwa Kyotera mu palamenti, okusisinkana ne batandika okulwanagana era poliisi n’ekuba amasasi okubagumbulula. Enanga agamba nti Kasolo ne Mpalanyi bagenda kuvunaanibwa era nga fayiro zaabwe zitwaliddwa ew’omuwaabi wa gavumenti. Ono alabudde bannabyabufuzi okufaayo ku bulamu bw’abantu baabwe era bakimanye nti ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kikyaliyo.

headline: Ab’e Ssembabule bajjumbidde emisinde gy’amazaalibwa
text: Mawogola Abantu ba Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Mawogola bazze mu bungi okwetaba mu misinde gy’amazaalibwa era bano bakung’aanidde mu magombolola ag’enjawulo okwetaba mu lutalo lw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Siriimu. Muteesa Sserwadda nga akulembeddemu abaddusi Emisinde gino gikuliddwamu Muteesa w’essaza Mawogola, Sserwadda Muhammed Ssaalongo era nga yagisimbudde ku ssaza. Ate Omumyuka wa Muteesa asooka, Suzan Namukwaya, n’asimbula abakung’aanidde ku ggombolola y’e Mateete okusobola okusigala nga batangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona mu bantu ba Beene. Muteesa ng’ali ku mbuga e Lwebitakuli agambye nti, abantu bajjumbidde nnyo enteekateeka eno era n’abasaba banyweze ensonga balwanyise ekirwadde kya Mukenenya mu Buganda ne Uganda. Emisinde gino gyetabiddwamu n’omu ku beesimbyewo mu ssaza Mawogola North, Aine Kaguta Sodo era nga yaguze emijoozi 100 kw’ossa okwetaba mu baatwala oluwalo embuga. Sodo agambye nti ali mu Buganda era nga tayinza kujeemera kiragiro kya Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka era ne yeeyama mu Bannamawogola okulwanirira ebintu Buganda by’ebanja singa anaaba alondeddwa okukiika mu Palamenti. Omwami wa Kabaka Mutuba I Lugusuulu, Amida Nantume yeebazizza abantu olw’obuwulize eri Nnamulondo era n’abasaba bulijjo okujjumbira enteekateeka zonna ez’Obwakabaka. Ate Dez Byuma Oswaldo ng’ono y’akwatidde aba NRM bbendera mu ssaza lya Mawogola, akunze abantu ba Kabaka naddala abaami okubeera abasaale mu kulwanyisa Siriimu nga Nnyinimu bwe yalagidde. Amyuka Muteesa w’essaza Mawogola, Suzan Namukwaya era nga y’atwala ebyemizannyo ku lukiiko lw’essaza, akubirizza abantu ba Kabaka obutakoma ku kwambala mijoozi, naye omulamwa gw’okulwanyisa Siriimu bagutwale nga nsonga nkulu.

headline: Ssennyiga Corona: Abantu 318 bebakwatiddwa mu lunaku lumu
text: KAMPALA Minisitule y’ebyobulam ekakasizza nga abantu 318 bwebazuuliddwa n’ekirwadde ki ssennyiga Corona, bano bakebeddwa eggulo ku Lwokutaano, ekituusizza omuwendo gw’abakakwatibwa ku bantu 2,166. Bwabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lwomukaaga, Minisita Jane Ruth Aceng yagambye nti, guno gwe muwendo ogukyasinze okubeera waggulu okuzuulibwa  okuva ekirwadde kino lwekyabalukawo. Minisita  Aceng nga ayogerako ne bannamawulire. Aceng yategezezza nti abasangiddwa n’obulwadde tekuli ali mu mbeera mbi. Ku 154 kuliko abasibe okuva mu kkomera lya Amuru wamu n’omukozi w’ekkomera lino omu. Ono yanyonyodde nti gyebabayise olw’okwekengera wamu nabo abateeberezebwa okubanga babaddeko n’abalwadde, bazudde abantu 65 okuva mu Kampala, 9 bazuuliddwa Mbarara, Kiryandongo 14, ate e Gulu basanzeeyo 9. Aceng yalambuludde nga abasawo 20 nabo bwebasangiddwa ne COVID19; Bano 9 b’e Kitgum, 6 bavudde Kampala, 2 Arua, Adjumani basanze 1, Kiryandongo 1 n’e Luweero bazuddeyo 1. Ku muwendo oguzuuliddwa leero kuliko abavuzi b’ebimotoka abayita ku nsalo ez’enjawulo 8, Aceng era yakakasizza nga omuwendo gw’abavudde bwegutuuse ku Bantu 20. “Kati omuwendo gw’abafudde guweze 20, tufiriddwayo omuntu era nga ono mwami wa myaka 49 okuva e Mbale,” Aceng bweyakakasizza. Minisita Aceng yagambye nti, omuwendo gw’abantu abasinze okukwatibwa ekirwadde kino gusinga mu kibuga Kampala n’emirilaano nga eno okuva March 23 bakafuna abalwadde 540.  Ku bano 342 bazuuliddwa mu wiiki emu yokka wakati wa August 15 ne 21, era nga mu bbanga lyerimu abakafa Corona mu Kampala bali 5. Aceng yagasseeko nti, “Amakampuni mangi omuli; Malaysia Furnishing, Royal Pharma, Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development, IGG,KCCA, Toyota, NRM Secretariat, Eagle Holdings,Megha Industries, n’emikutu gy’amawulire wasangiddwayo abalwadde, Kkampuni zonna tuzisaba zongere okuteeka amateeka n’ebiragiro bya COVID19 mu nkola. Aceng yagambye nti kizuuliddwa nga omusibe eyasangiddwa e Amuru bwabadde yakamala okusiiga abantu abalala 20 ekirwadde kino, ono n’omukozi w’ekkomera mu kiseera kino batwaliddwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Gulu gyebali mukujjanjabibwa. Kitegeerekese nti Minisitule y’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga wamu n’ekitongole ky’amakomera, bamaze okusengula abasibe 152 abasangiddwa ne COVID19 nebatwalibwa mu kkomera lya Gulu Central Prison bafune obujjanjabi. Bino webigidde nga Minisita wa Kampala Betty Amongi, yakamala okulabula bannakampala nga bwebayinza okudda ku muggalo ssinga bagenda mu maaso n’obutagondera biragiro bya COVID19.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akkunze abantu okujjumbira emisinde gya ‘Rotary Cancer Run’
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akoowodde bannayuganda bonna okwetaba mu misinde gya Rotary Cancer Run, kiyambe okusaasanya amawulire agakwata ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde ki Kkookolo. Katikkiro Mayiga n’abamu ku bakungu  “Obulwadde bwa kkansa bwagala kufaanana ssennyiga corona kubanga tebulina gwebutaliza. Kkookolo kumpi Teri amanyi kwava,omuntu amukwata bukwasi. tetusobola kuddaawo netukungiriza. Ekisinga obukulu kwekusala amagezi nga aba Rotary gebasala nebazimba woodi ya Kkookolo, “ Bwatyo Mayiga bweyategeezezza. Bino Mukuumaddamula yabyogeredde mu nsisinkano ye ne banna Rotary abamusanze mu Bulange ku Lwokubiri nga bamwanjulirira enteekateeka y’emisinde gya Rotary Cancer Run egy’omwaka guno. Katikkiro Mayiga yanyonyodde nga obulamu bwebujjudde ebizibu era nga singa bibeera birumbye omuntu abeera n’ebyokusalawo bisatu okuli; okubyogerako, okukkuluma oba okubisalira amagezi. Mayiga yatendereza obuvumu banna Rotary bwebalaga bwebasalawo okulumba ekizibu kya kkansa nebasalawo bakisalire amagezi nga bazimba waadi abantu basobole okufuna obujjanjabi. Ono yasabye abantu okujjumbira kaweefube w’emisinde nga buli omu agiddukira waali kubanga kiyambako okubunyisa amawulire agakwata ku kirwadde kino. Katikkiro Mayiga yakuutidde abantu nga okulwanyisa kkookolo bwekitakoma ku kuzimba woodi, kukola bbanka oba okugula ebyuma ebikalirira abalina kkookolo naye kiri nnyo mu mbeera gyetweyisaamu. Yabakubirizza okufaayo ku ndya yabwe, okukola dduyiro naddala emisinde nga gino egitegekeddwa kubanga giyamba kinene mu wetaasa ku kirwadde kino. Emisinde gino Mubunabyalo ku murundi guno abategesi basalawo gibeere mu nkola ya ’Sayansi nga omuntu agenda kuddukira wonna waali awatali kukungaana nga bwekitera okubeera olw’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Ensimbi eziva mu misinde gino egivugirirwa bbanka ya Centenary, ziweebwayo okuyamba ku kujjanjaba abantu abalina ekirwadde ki Kkookolo.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga abangudde aba Ssese ku Mukenenya
text: Katikkiro Mayiga olutalo lw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde ki Mukenenya alwongeddemu amaanyi, leero abangudde abavubi n’abatuuze ku mwalo gwe Kachanga ku ngeri gyebasobola okwekuuma, okulwanyisa wamu n’okwejjanjaba ekirwadde kino. Owek. Mayiga abatuuze ku mwalo guno abasabye basooka kwekebeza kirwadde bweba bakwetaba mu bikolwa eby’omukwano era bakomye okukebeza amaaso kuba omuwala oba omusajja asobola okulabika obulungi kyokka nabeera nga mulwadde. “Muve ku baana abato mubaleke basome, abaana abato gano amabujje mugagazaaki? Olaba ne nnume tesobola kuwalampa nnyana etanasala, ggwe nogenda ku mwana omuto. Mutye siriimu kubanga atta ate ekirabo ekisinga byonna bulamu,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye.  Ono asabye abavubuka okugenda bakeberwe era bwebakizuula nti balwadde bafeeyo okugenda ku ddagala era balye bulungi basobole okutwala obulamu bwabwe mu maaso. Owek. Mayiga bonna abaneetaba mu nsonga z’omukwano abasabye okukozesa obupiira mu ngeri yeemu Abalunnyanja gyebakozesa ‘Life Jackets’ nga banaseeseeya ku mazzi. Mayiga abawangaalira eno abasabye balumirirwe omwana omuwala era bweba balina bebaagala okuganza balowooze ku bannyinabwe, bannyabwe awamu ne bawala babwe.  Abazuuliddwamu ekirwadde abagaanye okwekubagiza naye basigalemu essuubi kuba obulamu buba tebuweddewo singa omuntu agoberera amagezi g’abasawo. Kinajjukirwa nti Katikkiro Mayiga e Kalangala yagenze kwongera maanyi ku nteekateeka y’okulwanyisa ekirwadde ki Mukenenya ku bizinga bye Ssese era yawerekeddwako baminisita n’ abakungu abenjawulo mu Bwakabaka ne gavumenti eyawakati. Akiikiridde akulira eby’obulamu e Kalangala Sarah Subo ategeezezza nti ekizibu ekisinga okuba e Ssese kwekuba nti abantu batambula nnyo okuva wano okudda ewalala ate nga tebatambula nabakyala baabwe ekireetera obulwadde bwa Mukenenya okwegiriisa ngekigotta entula.

headline: Ekibiina ky’ Abasawo kyegaanye okukozesebwa okulwanyisa Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Ekibiina ekitaba abasawo ki ‘Uganda Medical Association (UMA)’ kyegaanye ebyogerwa Pulezidenti wabwe, Dr. Samuel Oledo okukozesebwa ab’oludda oluvuganya okumulwanyisa awamu ne Pulezidenti Museveni. “Njagala okulabula omuntu yenna ow’oludda oluvuganya ayagala okunwanyisa ne Pulezidenti Museveni nga yeeyambisa ekibiina ki UMA nti tajja kumalako. Njakukulwanyisa awamu ne badokita bonna. Ffe tuli beetegefu okukola ne Pulezidenti Museveni kuba yaliko awamu ne gavumenti ye okusobola okutereeza eby’obulamu,” bwatyo Dr. Oledo bweyaweze oluvannyuma lwa kkooti okumuzza ku bukulu kwebaali bamugobye. Wabula ekiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwa ekibiina kino kyesambye ebigambo bya Dr. Oledo nga bagamba nti obutakkanya bwabwe buli ku ngeri gyakolamu erimu gye etali ya bukugu. “UMA erabye ebigambo ebyogerwa Dr. Odong Samuel Oledo ku butambi oluvannyuma lw’ensala ya kkooti nga agamba nti abamu ku bammemba ba UMA bakozesebwa ab’oludda oluvuganya okulwanyisa Pulezidenti Museveni ne gavumenti ye. Ebigambo bino tebyayogerwa mu mutima mulungi,” ekiwandiiko bwekityo bwekyasomye. Ekibiina kigamba nti ebigambo ebyogerwa Dr. Oledo biri wala n’amazima era tebiriiko mutwe namagulu kuba bo ekigendererwa kyabwe kukyuusa mbeera y’abasawo awamu n’ebyobulamu mu ggwanga n’okulaba nti buli kimu kikolebwa mu ngeri ey’ekikugu. Ekiwandiiko kisabye abasawo okusigala nga bakakkamu era basigale nga bakola emirimu gyabwe n’obukugu kuba kimanyiddwa nti bakolagana bulungi ne gavumenti awamu n’abantu bonna awatali kweyingiza mu byabufuzi. Wiiki ewedde, kkooti enkulu yalagira Dr. Oledo addizibwe ekifo kye nga Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kino bwetyo nesazaamu ebyali byasalibwawo olukiiko lw’ abasawo bwebamugoba mu woofiisi nga bamulumiriza okumenya Ssemateeka w’ekibiina oluvannyuma lw’okufukamira neyeegayirira Pulezidenti Museveni addemu yeesimbewo mu 2026. Oledo baali bamusikizza Dr. Edith Nakku-Jalobo eyaliko omumyuka wa Oledo. Wabula Oledo teyamatira nebyo byasalibwawo banne bwatyo kwekuddukira mu kkooti nga agamba nti yagobeddwa mu bukyamu. Ono akyawera nga bwewatali muntu yenna agenda kumulemesa kulwanirira basawo nebwekiba kitegeeza kuwagira gavumenti eri mu buyinza ajja kukikola mu lwattu.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abantu okukulembeza eby’obulamu mu mwaka omuggya
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga akubirizza abantu okussa ku mwanjo ensonga zebyobulamu mwebyo byebaba bateeseteese okukola mu mwaka ngebimu ku byebalina okukola mu mwaka ogwo. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti abantu batera okuteekateeka ebyo byebalina okukola mu mwaka omuli okugula poloti okuzimba ennyumba, okuwasa nebirala neberabira ensonga yebyobulamu songa engeri omuntu gyasobola okutuukirizaamu bino kwekubeera omulamu obulungi.  Bino Mukuumaddamula abyogeredde mu kuziika mutoowe Juliet Mary Nabitaka Kasujja e Janda Sakabusolo mu wakiso mu Ssaza Busiro nasaba abantu okwekebeza endwadde ng’omusujja neezo Omutanda zataddeko amaanyi . ” Omusujja gwa bulabe nnyo era y’emu ku ndwadde ezisinga okutawaanya Bannayuganda. Kyokka abamu bagugayaalirira ne batagujjanjaba. Kino nno kya bulabe nnyo gyemuli. Mbakubiriza okufaayo ennyo ku bulamu bwammwe mu mwaka guno omuggya. Bye mutegese okukola tebiggya kutuukirira singa temuube balamu. Omwoyo gw’Omugenzi Omukama agulamuze kisa.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde.  Mukuumaddamula era akozeseza omukisa guno naddamu okukaatiriza ensonga yabantu okwekebeza endwadde naddala ezo omutanda zataddeko omulaka okulwanyisa mu bantu be babe balamu basobole okukola okuzza buganda ku ntikko. Bba w’omugenzi Vincent Kasujja alambuludde ku mbeera mweyafiiridde ereetedde abantu bangi okwoza ku mmunye kubanga mukyala we teyalwadde nebateegera obulwadde nti buno bwebumuluma nasaba abantu okumyamba wakati mukuzza abaana abasatu bamulekedde.  Omukolo guno gwatandise n’ okusaba okwokwebaza katonda olwobulamu bwomugenzi okukuliddwamu Rev. Emmanuel Lutaaya nga ye musumba w’e Kisaasi omuggya era nga mu nju eno abeera muko. Omugenzi Juliet Mary Nabitaka Kasujja yazaalibwa 1, October, 1970 nga afiiridde ku myaka 52 era alesse abaana basatu.              .

headline: Aba NUP balabuddwa ku by’okulya ssente za Museveni
text: Bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform abagenda okutuula mu Palamenti y’e 11, balabuddwa obuteetantala kulya ssente eziteekeddwateekeddwa okubaweebwa Pulezidenti Museveni okuggusa by’ayagala nti bwe banaakikola abalonzi baakubakangavvula. Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa Rev. Fr. Richard Mugisha okuva mu kigo ky’e Bisanje mu kibuga Masaka , bw’abadde akulembeddemu ekitambiro kya Mmisa ekitegekeddwa omubaka w’essaza lya Bukoto East, Munna NUP Ronald Evans Kanyike, okwebaza Katonda okumuwanguza akalulu ku kyalo Kitoma mu muluka gw’e Kanywa mu ggombolola y’e Buwunga mu disitulikiti y’e Masaka. Wano Fr. Mugisha w’asinzidde n’alabula ababaka ba palamenti naddala abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti obutagezaako kulya ssente za Pulezidenti Museveni kubanga za kikolimo era nga yenna anaagezaako okuzirya, abalonzi baakumubonereza. “Nneewuunya okulaba nga n’okutusa kati ssentebe wa kkooti ya magye, Gen. Guti ne Pulezidenti Museveni bakyagaanye okuyimbula abavubuka abaakwatibwa ku byekuusa ku nsonga z’ebyobufuzi nga nti ebyobufuzi byaggwa nga kino kye kiseera bayimbulwe awatali bukwakkulizo basobole okweyagalira mu nsi yaabwe era nsaba ababaka ba palamenti mukulembeze obumu ssaako okussa essira ku bintu ebiruma bannyuganda naddala nga mulwanirira abaana abali mu makomera ssaako n’abanyigirizibwa” Fr. Mugisha bwe yategeezezza Wabula asekeredde ababaka abaagwa ssaako ne baminisita abaali beeyita ab’ekitalo era n’abawa amagezi bulijjo okukimanya nti mukama Katonda abeera n’enteekateeka ze. Ye omwami wa Kabaka atwala essaza ly’e Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke, awabudde ababaka bonna abava mu Buganda okwerabira enjawukana zaabwe mu byobufuzi wabula beegatte basobole okwogera eddoboozi limu ku nsonga z’okubanja ebintu by’Obwakabaka. Bo ababaka bannakiibiina kya DP abeetabye ku mukolo guno nga baakulembeddwamu John Paul Lukwago Mpalanyi omubaka w’essaza ly’e Kyotera ne Fortunate Rose Nantongo omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Kyotera, baasinzidde ku mukolo guno ne beegatta ku bannayuganda bonna okuyozaayoza Oweekitibwa Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba, eyalondeddwa okubakulira mu Palamenti era ne beeyama okukolagana naye. Mu kwogera kwe, nannyini mukolo guno omugole era omubaka w’essaza lya Bukoto East, Ronald Evans Kanyike, yabotodde ekyama nga Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yatandise edda okubakubira essimu nga abaperereze okumwegattako, ky’agambye nti ye tagenda kukikkiriza kubanga amanyi abalonzi be kye baagala. Bo bannakibiina kya NUP okuli Mmeeya w’ekibuga Masaka, Hon Florence Namayanja, omubaka omukyala ow’ekibuga Masaka Juliet Kakande Nakabuye, Dr. Twaha Kagabo omubaka wa Bukoto South, Omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Masaka, Joan Namutawe n’abalala, baasabye Hon. Kanyike obutabaswaza my buweereza bwe, ssaako okukulisa Oweekitibwa Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba olw’obuvunaanyizibwa obwamuweereddwa nga bagamba nti bamulinamu essuubi.

headline: Tetunakkiriza kibiina ki NUP kukozesa langi mmyufu – Omulamuzi Byabakama
text: Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama. Ekif. File  Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama, akizzeemu nga bwebatanaba kukkiriza kibiina ki ‘NUP’ kukozesa langi mmyufu kuba si yaakyo. Bwabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku kitebe ky’akakiiko kano mu Kampala ku nteekateeka y’akalulu ka 2021, Byabakama agambye nti ekibiina ekikulemberwa Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) kituufu kyasaba okukyusa langi naye nebagaana kubanga langi emmyufu erudde nga ya kibiina ki UPC. “Twabagamba era nga n’etteeka liraga bulungi, bwoyagala okukyusa ekibiina, mu mateeka okukkiriza akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kamala kulanga mu ‘Uganda Gazette’ naye si bwekyali ku kibiina ki ‘NUP’ kubanga kyebasaba tetwakikkiriza, Byabakama bweyategezezza. Ono anokoddeyo akawaayiro nnamba 11 ak’ etteeka erifuga ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi akagamba nti okukyuka kw’ekibiina oba okukyusa mu bubonero ne langi zaakyo kutandika amangu ddala nga akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kamaze okukkiriza ebikyuusiddwa. Wabula bannakisinde ki People Power, bakalambira nti langi zabwe ziri ssatu okuli; Bulu, emmyufu n’enjeru naye nga bakulembeza mmyufu kubanga tewali alina buyinza ku langi yonna. Byabakama era yakakasizza nga bwewaliwo bammemba ba ‘NUP’ abawandikidde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga beewunya engeri ekibiina kino gye kyakyusaamu erinnya awatali kugoberera mateeka era nga bakasaba katereeze ensobi ezaakolebwa.

headline: Embiranye ku kifo kya Mmeeya wa Masaka, buli omu awera
text: Bya Muwuluzi Yusuf Masaka – Buddu Embiranye yeeyongedde ku ani alina okutwala ekifo kya mmeeya wa Masaka City, nga w’osomera bino nga abavuganya abawerera ddala 9 era buli omu amatiza abalonzi okulaba nga bamuwandako eddusu atuuse ekibuga kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ku mulembe. Florence Namayanja,  Emmaneul Lwasa ne Bamwesigye Willis Kino kiddiridde Masaka okusuumusibwa n’eteekebwa ku mutendera gwa City kiganyule disitulikiti 9 eziri mu ssaza lya Beene erya Buddu awamu n’ebibuga ebirala 6 okuli; Arua, Gulu, Jinja, Mbarara, Fort Portal ne Mbale. Abavuganya ku kifo ky’obwammeeya wa Masaka City asookedde ddala bawerera ddala 9 okuli; Mbabali James Lumbuye (FDC), Kabanda Charles (DP) ne Namayanja Florence (NUP). Abalala ye Ssembajja Muhammad, Bamwesigye Willis Mbabazi (NRM), Kabiswa Pius Kirwowa, Ssengabi Francis, Lwasa Emmanuel Kaweesi ne Kaweesi Robert Danny. Bano buli afuna omukisa talemwa kutegeeza bantu lwaki ye mutuufu alina okukulembera Masaka City era nga bagezaako nnyo okulambulula entegeka zaabwe eri ekibuga kino nga baziguza bannamasaka. “Okuzimba ekibuga Masaka kyetaaga okukolera awamu, kyetaaga amaanyi mangi, kyetaaga amagezi mangi, kyetaaga okukolera awamu, kyetaaga obumanyirivu nga bwenina. Kuba nabeerako omumyuka wa Mmeeya mu KCC era baddeko mu gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Palamenti wamu n’ebitongole noolwekyo nina enkizo okuweereza bannamasaka obulungi.” Bw’atyo Florence Namayanja nga ye mubaka wa Bukoto East mu Palamenti bwe yategeezezza. Ye akwatidde NRM kkaadi ku kifo kino Bamwesigye Willis Mbabazi, yagambye nti, “Abavubuka nga bwe mubalaba bangi tebalina mirimu. Tugenda kulwana okulaba nga bonna bafuna emirimo.” Bamwesigye bw’atyo bwe yasuubizza Bannamasaka singa anaaweebwa omukisa. Ate ye atalina kibiina kw’ajjidde, Lwasa Emmanuel Kaweesi, yagambye nti alina ettoffaali ly’atadde ku kuzimba Masaka era nga singa anaalondebwa bannamasaka bajja kuba bafunye omuntu anaabakulaakulanya. Lwasa yeeyamye okukozesa emikwano gy’alina asikirize Bamusigansimbi okujja batandikewo amakolero bannamasaka bafune emirimu n’enkulaakulana. Alina bbendera Democratic Party (DP), Charles Kabanda, asuubizza okukyusa embeera y’ekibuga Masaka era ayambe okuwa abantu enkulaakulana ng’ateeka essira ku by’obulamu n’ebyenjigiriza. Mu kalulu kano embiranye ey’amaanyi eri wakati wa Munnakibiina kya NUP; Florence Namayanja, Omusuubuzi Lwasa Emmanuel, Owa DP Charles Kabanda ne Bamwesigye Willis Mbabazi ali ku kkaadi ya NRM. Wadde ng’okulonda kubulako omwezi gumu abalonzi mu bitundu ebikola Masaka City bagamba nti, abeesimbyewo tebabamanyi bulungi era nga tebannafuna mukisa kubasisinkana kumanya birowoozo byabwe. “Tetulina kye tumanyi tuli awo bwetutyo, okulonda kugenda kutuuka ebintu tubitabule.” Omukadde Kiggwa Joseph ow’oku kyalo Kayamuyimbwa mu ggombolola y’e Kimaanya-Kabonera bw’atyo bwe yategeezezza. Ekibuga kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka kino kisuubira okuganyula disitulikiti eziwera 9 mu ssaza ly’e Buddu era ng’okusinga abantu bamwo beesigamye ku bulimi na bulunzi. Wano abamu ku beesimbyewo we basinzidde ne basuubiza okwongera ku mutindo gw’ebirime n’okutondawo amakolero, kikendeeze ku bbula ly’emirimu era ng’ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba ani anaawangula emitima gya Bannamasaka mu kalulu ka 2021.

headline: Ababaka baakufulumya olukalala lwa bannayuganda abawambibwa
text: Kampala Sipiika wa Palamenti ya Uganda, Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga, alagidde ababaka okuva mu bitundu ebyenjawulo okufulumya olukalala lw’abantu ababuzibwawo kuba gavumenti eremeddwa okulufulumya nga bwe yasuubiza.  Sipiika Kadaga alagidde ababaka okuleeta enkalala z’abawambibwa Kino kiddiridde Sipiika Kadaga okulagira gavumenti Ssabbiiti ewedde okuleeta olukalala lwa bannayuganda abagambibwa okutwalibwa ab’ebyokwerinda era Minisita w’ensonga ez’omunda yabadde asuubirwa okwanjulira ababaka olukalala luno eggulo ku Lwokubiri, wabula ono teyalabiseeko. Wano Omubaka wa Kalungu West, Joseph Ssewungu, yennyamidde olwa Minisita okulemwa okuleeta olukalala nga bwe yabadde asabiddwa. “Owek. Sipiika, wasabye Minisita w’ensonga ez’omunda okuleeta olukalala lwa bannayuganda abaawambibwa mu kaseera k’okulonda. N’okutuusa leero tetulina kye twali tufunye okuva mu gavumenti. Owek. Sipiika bw’eba gavumenti eremeddwa, nze nsobola okuleeta olukalala lwe nnina.” Omubaka Ssewungu bwe yagambye. Omubaka w’ekibuga ky’e Mukono, Betty Nambooze, yannyonnyodde nti abantu bangi bakyagenda mu maaso n’okuwambibwa mu ngeri etategeerekeka. “Owek. Sipiika, Kizibwe wange Bukenya Victor abadde abuze okumala Ssabbiiti bbiri. Era waliwo n’abantu abalala bangi abongera okubuzibwawo. Sipiika nkusaba okkirize ababaka okuleeta okwemulugunya kwabwe mu Palamenti era wabeewo ekisalibwawo.” Nambooze bwe yategeezezza. Mu kwanukula, Sipiika Kadaga yakkirizza ababaka abalina enkalala z’abantu okuzireeta basobole okuteeka Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda ku nninga asobole okunnyonnyola abantu bano gye bali. Gye buvuddeko, Pulezidenti Museveni yavaayo n’ategeeza nti tewali muntu yabula wabula gavumenti yaliko abantu be yali ekutte ku mivuyo gya November 18 ne 19 oluvannyuma lw’abantu okwekalakaasa nga Bobi Wine akwatiddwa, nti ra bano balina obwegugungo bwe baali bategese ng’okulonda kuwedde. Museveni yalagira amagye okufulumya olukalala lw’abantu abakwatiddwa, abantu baabwe basobole okumanya gyebali. Ssabbiiti ewedde, Poliisi yali erina okwanjula olukalala lw’abantu abakwate wabula amyuka omuduumizi wa poliisi, Maj Gen Paul Lokech, n’akisazaamu awatali kuwa nsonga yonna. Waliwo ebigambibwa nti ekikyagaanye poliisi okufulumya olukalala kwe kwagala okumanya embeera abakwate bye balimu naddala abali mu mikono gy’amagye.

headline: Bannayuganda bakooye amasasi ne ttiyaggaasi – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezezza abakungu ba poliisi nti, Bannayuganda bakooye okukubwa ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi nga noolwekyo balina okukoma ku bikolwa bino. Katikkiro Mayiga n’abakungu ba poliisi oluvanyuma lw’okwetonda “Uganda ekooye obusambattuko, Uganda ekooye amasasi n’omukka ogubalagala, ensonga eno esaana okwetegerezebwa n’okutereezebwa,” Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti abapoliisi bangi bakozesa eryanyi eriyitiridde nga bakwata abamu ng’abamu babakuba ate nga n’abalala battiddwa olw’obukambwe buno.
