Mayiga agasseeko nti abapoliisi balina okukimanya nti si buli lwe balaba abantu nga bakung’aanye balina kubakubamu ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi kuba okukwasisa amateeka n’ebiragiro obulungi bwetaaga bukugu okusinga obukambwe. Owoomumbuga okukangula ku ddoboozi abadde mu nsisinkano n’abakungu ba poliisi abakulembeddwa omukwanaganya wa poliisi n’ebyobufuzi, Asan Kasinge, leero ku Lwokubiri mu Bulange e Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti mu poliisi mulimu abasirikale abonoona linnya lyayo nga bakozesa obukambwe obuyitiridde okukwasisa amateeka n’ebiragiro. Katikkiro Mayiga agambye nti wadde bakkiriza okwetonda kwa poliisi naye aduumira poliisi y’e Mityana, Alex Mwine Mukono, alina okubonerezebwa ku kikolwa kino kubanga yatyoboola obuwangwa bw’ennono era nga n’olulimi lwe yakozesa lwali lukyamu. “Omuduumizi ono asaana okubonerezebwa kubanga Omuntu teyeetaaga kubeera Mukatoliki okumanya nti ekitambiro kya Mmisa ssaala nkulu nnyo etasaana kutaataaganyizibwa,” Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti ono teyeetaaga kusooka kubeera muganda okumanya nti Omukolo guno gwabadde gwa nnono n’okumanya nti alina okussa ekitiibwa mu mawanga. Ono era yennyamidde olwa Mwine alina ennyota okweyisa mu ngeri etyoboola ennyota ze wamu n’obutassa kitiibwa mu bakulembeze abalala omuli ne bannaddiini. Afande Kasingye ategeezezza Katikkiro Mayiga nti bazzeemu nebeetegereza obutambi nebakizuula nti waliwo ensobi ezaakolebwa basajja baabwe abaali ku bikwekweto bino kubanga guno Omukolo gwali gwa nnono. “Oluvannyuma lw’okumanya ensobi yaffe, twatudde netulaba ng’ekintu ekituufu okukola kwe kwetonda eri Obwakabaka bwa Buganda kubanga Omukolo guno gwabadde gwa nnono,” Kasingye bwe yeetonze. Ono agasseeko nti Omukolo guno tegwategekebwa ku olwo era ng’akakiiko akalwanyisa Corona kalina okutuula n’abeekika ky’Embogo nebagonjoola ensonga okusooka singa waaliwo ebyali bitannaggwa. Kasingye asuubizza nti bagenda kunoonya Omutaka Kayiira Gajuule bamwetondere awamu n’abantu bonna ab’ekika ky’Embogo era neyeeyama okukwatagana ne bannaddiini awamu n’ab’ennono okwewala ebikolwa nga bino okuddamu okubaawo. Kinajjukirwa nti, Omuduumizi wa poliisi e Mityana, Alex Mwine Mukono, yalemesezza omukolo gw’okwebaza olw’obuweereza bwa Jjajja Kayiira Gajuule ng’Omukubiriza w’abataka obukulu bwe yamalako emyaka 7, bwe baali basisinkanye ku Butaka bwabwe e Mugulu mu Mityana. Afande Kasingye ne Katikkiro oluvanyuma lw’okwetonda Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omutaka Muteesaasira nga yakiikiridde Omukubiriza w’Abataka omuggya, Namwama Augustine Mutumba, baminisita n’abakungu ba Kabaka.

headline: Ab’ebijjambiya bataamye; RDC Bamwine bamukyusizza
text: Abadde omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Masaka City, Fred Bamwine, akyusiddwa okuva e Masaka n’atwalibwa mu disitulikiti y’e Nakaseke nga’omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu kitundu ekyo. Okukyusibwa kwa Bamwine kulangiriddwa Minisita w’ensonga z’Obwapulezidenti, Milly Babalanda bw’abadde ayogera ku nkyukakyuka ezikoleddwa mu babaka ba Pulezidenti awamu n’abamyuka baabwe ku Mmande Enkyukakyuka zino we zijjidde nga waliwo obukenke mu ssaza ly’e Buddu olw’abatemu b’ebijambiya abaazingako ebitundu bino nga okusinziira ku poliisi, abaakatemula bawera 36 mu bbanga lya wiiki ttaano zokka. Mu kiro ekyakesezza ku Lwomukaaga waliwo abantu 2 abattiddwa wadde ng’ebyokwerinda byabadde binywezeddwa mu kitundu kino. Abatuuze baavuddeyo ne bategeeza ng’obunafu bwe buva ku batwala ebyokwerinda mu kitundu kino era nga Bamwine y’abadde omu ku bo. Tekinnategeerekeka oba okukyusibwa kwa Bamwine kwekuusa ku mbeera y’obutemubw’ebijambiya obukolebwa mu kitundu kino, obulabise nga butandise okuzitoowerera ab’ebyokwerinda. Minisita Babalanda abadde yaakamala okusuubiza nga bw’agenda e Masaka okulaba embeera bw’eri kuba walabika waliwo obubinja bw’abatujju obwagalaokuvumaganya gavumenti ya NRM. Olwaleero omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga ategeezezza nga bwe baliko abantu abawera 60 be bakutte ne basunsulamu abalala 15 abagambibwa okubeera ne kye bamanyi ku nsonga eno era ng’abasinga ku bano baana nzaalwa za ku byalo bino. Enkya ya leero abatemu bano baliko ebibaluwa bye basudde awamu n’okuwandiika ku nnyumba z’abatuuze nga babategeeza nga bwe bagenda okudda babakoleko nga tewali kigenda kubayamba ke bayite poliisi oba okutegekawo ssente. “Twagala emitwe 20, musigale mu nju munda ate temutya nnyo.” Obumu ku bubaka obwasuuliddwa bwe busoma.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM: Rukutana awangudde kkaadi ya NRM n’obululu 20
text: Kampala Akulira akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu kibiina kya ‘National Resistance Movement (NRM), Dr. Tanga Odoi, alangiridde Minisita omubeezi ow’abakozi, Mwesigwa Rukutana ku buwanguzi bw’ akamyufu k’omubaka w’e Rushenyi oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Kabasharira bwe babadde ku mbiranye n’obululu 20 bwokka. Minisita Mwesigwa Rukutana                                            Dr. Odoi ono yamulangiridde ku Lwakusatu ku kitebe ky’ekibiina mu Kampala oluvannyuma lw’okuddamu okubala obululu. Akulira eby’okulonda e Ntungamo, Maria Mirembe Baitwa yali alangiridde Naome Kabasharira ku buwanguzi, bwe yafuna obululu obusinga mu kulonda okwasooka nga yali afunye obululu 24,006 ate nga Rukutana yali afunye obululu 23,966. Mu kalulu kano, Bob Karabayi yafuna obululu 2,266, Nicholas Niwahereza yalina 1,202 so nga ate Norman Kashereka yafuna 346. Bino Rukutana yabigaana era ne yeekubira enduulu eri akakiiko k’ekibiina era Ssentebe waako Dr. Tanga Odoi n’alagira obululu buno buddemu okubalibwa. Odoi yagambye nti obululu bwe babaze bulaga nti Rukutana yawangudde n’obululu 25310 ate nga Kabasharira yafunye obululu 25290 ng’enjawulo yabadde ya bululu 20 bwokka. Okusinziira ku byavudde mu kuddamu okubala obululu, Bob Nahabwe yafunye obululu 2270, Nicholas Niwahereza 129, Elia Rwagara Mwesigwa 256 ate Norman Kashereka Beingana n’afuna 350. “Nangiridde Mwesigwa Rukutana eyafunye obululu obusinga obungi n’ebitundu 46.27 ku 100 era n’awangula okukwata kkaadi ya konsitityuwensi y’e Rushenyi mu Palamenti.” Odoi bw eyategeezezza. Kinajjukirwa nti akamyufu kano kalimu emivuyo era gye byaggweera nga Minisita Rukutana asimbiddwa mu kkooti n’avunaanibwa okugezaako okutta Daniel Rweburingi wamu n’okwonoona ebintu wadde ng’oluvannyuma yayimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti. Sabbiiti ewedde, abawagizi ba Kabasharira baagobaganye ne poliisi nga bawakanya eky’okulwawo okulangirira ebyavudde mu kuddamu okubala obululu.

headline: Tugenda kuteereza ensobi ezaakoleddwa – Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP
text: Bya Gladys Nanyombi Kamwokya Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) David Lewis Lubongoya ategeezezza nti bagenda kwekenneenya ensobi entono ezaakoleddwa mu kuwa abantu kkaadi era baakufulumyawo ekiwandiiko mu bwangu ku nsonga eno. Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP Lubongoya Lubongoya bino yabyogeredde ku kitebe ky’ ekibiina e Kamwokya ku Mmande bwe yabadde asisinkanye abamu ku bantu abaabadde baleese okwemulugunya kwabwe ku ngeri gye bammiddwamu kkaadi. “Twafulumizza enkalala ku bifo bya bakkansala, Mmeeya ne bassentebe ba disitulikiti era ne tusaba omuntu yenna atamatidde akuleete okwemulugunya kwe. Mbakakasa tutaddewo akakiiko k’abakugu okusunsulamu abalina ensonga n’obukakafu obumala era tusaba abantu okubeera abagumiikiriza nga bwetutereeza ensonga eno.” Lubongoya bwe yagambye. Ono yakakasizza nga bwe bayimirizza okugaba sitampu ezirina okutwalibwa mu kakiiko k’ebyokulonda eri abo ababadde batandise okwewandiisa okutuusa okwemulugunya nga kukoleddwako. “Tetusobodde kuwa bantu ba Kampala, Wakiso ne Mukono kubanga tetusobola kuzigaba nga wakyaliwo abeemulugunya.” Lubongoya bwe yalambudde. Abamu ku bannakibiina abakung’aanidde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina baasabye ensonga eno ekwatibwe n’obwegendereza kubanga esobola okwabuluzaamu ekibiina ate nga kibadde kirina obuwagizi mu bantu. Abakulu beevumbye akafubo akatakkiriziddwamu bannamawulire n’ababadde beemulugunya era nga kye tutegeddeko kiri nti abakulu basuubiza okuteekawo obwenkanya n’okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti waliwo abasabye ssente okuyisaawo abamu ku beesimbyewo. Omu ku beemulugunya, Ssonko Muhammed ng’abadde yeegwanyiza bwakkansala bwa L.C5 ku lukiiko lwa Munisipaali y’e Kira yategeezezza nti tewabaddewo bwenkanya mu kugaba kkaadi era abakulu basaanye ensonga eno okugitunulamu. “Baleese ffe abasajja abamanyi ne batwala abantu abanafu abagenda okuzza ekibiina emabega era tusaba abakulu okwongera okwekenneenya n’okunoonyereza ku bantu be baalonze okuwa kkaadi y’ekibiina,” Ssonko bwe yannyonnyodde. Ate ye Muhusin Kakande eyabadde yeegwanyiza ekifo kya ssentebe wa L.C5 mu Kawempe North yasabye banne basoyiwagane kubanga ekigendererwa ekikulu kiri mu kukyusa bukulembeze bwa ggwanga lyonna nga baggyako Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni. “Buli akkiririza mu nkyukakyuka nkusaba okusooka okwesonyiwa obukuubagano obuli mu kibiina tusooke tufe ku kintu kimu eky’okuwanika omukulembeze waffe Robert Kyagulanyi kubanga y’agenda okututaasa ku Museveni,” Kakande bwe yalambuludde. Ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba ebinaava mu kakiiko akateereddwawo okugonjoola endooliito zino.

headline: Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo akyalemedde mu musango gwa Kyagulanyi
text: Kampala Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo agaanye okuva mu musango gwa Robert Kyagulanyi gwe yawaba ng’awakanya obuwanguzi bwapulezidenti Yoweri Museveni mu kalulu ka 2021. Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo Munnamateeka Male Mabirizi yawandiikira Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny- Dollo ng’amusaba okuva mu musango gwa Kyagulanyi kuba yaliko looya wa Museveni mu 2006 nga Dr. Kizza Besigye awakanya obuwanguzi bwa Museveni. Amakya ga leero ku Lwokubiri, Ssaabalamuzi ategeezezza nti awuliriza bulungi okusaba kwa Mabirizi naye tagenda kuva mu musango guno. “Mpuliriza bulungi okusaba kw’omuwaabi era ensonga azisengese bulungi naye olw’ensonga zange ze nzija okuwa mu maaso awo, sigenda kuva mu musango guno kuba siraba nsonga lwaki nguvaamu.” Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo bw’agambye enkya ya leero. Mu mpaaba ye Male Mabirizi ategeezezza kkooti nti Ssaabalamuzi talina kubeera ku balamuzi omwenda abalina okuwulira omusango gwa Kyagulanyi kuba yali munnamateeka we mu 2006 mu musango ogufaanana bweguti. “Tagenda kwetengerera kuba yali looya wa muwawaabirwa mu 2006. Kitegeeza ebyo bye yayitamu ng’awolereza Museveni mu 2006 tebisobola kumukkiriza kubeera mwenkanya mu musango guno era tasobola gusalira yali mukama we.” Mabirizi bw’annyonnyodde. Ono agattako nti Ssaabalamuzi azze asisinkana Pulezidenti Museveni enfunda eziwera era n’ategeeza nti abantu bamulaba ng’alina kyekubiira mu musango guno. “Abalamuzi basobola okwetegerera naye ate tulina okulowooza ku bantu kye balowooza. Abantu bakimanyi nti abadde agenda ewa Museveni era omuntu yenna asobola okukiraba.” Mabirizi bw’agasseeko. Abalamuzi ba kkooti eno abawera 9 batadde Mabirizi mu kaseera akazibu abakakase oba Ssaabalamuzi Museveni yamusisinkana ku nsonga ze ng’omuntu oba kyali kikwata ku kitongole ekiramuzi ky’akulembera. Mu kwanukula Mabirizi ategeezezza nti si nsonga oba ensisikano yali ekwata ku kitongole kiramuzi oba nedda kuba abantu balowooza bulala. Bino we bijjidde nga Kyagulanyi Ssentamu yaakalangirira nga bw’aggyeeyo omusango gwe mw’awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Museveni ng’agamba abalamuzi balina kyekubiira. Wabula Kyagulanyi tannaba kuwandiikira kkooti mu butongole ng’agisaba okuggyayo omusango.

headline: Latif Ssebaggala avudde mu lwokaano lw’ obwaloodimeeya
text: Omubaka Latif Ssebagala nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire Kampala Munnakibiina kya ‘National Unity Platform (NUP)’, Latif Ssebaggala alangiridde nti, avudde mu lwokaano lw’okuvuganya ku bwa Loodimmeeya. Ssebaggala. Agambye nti kino akikoze okugatta ekibiina ekibadde kitandise okweyawulamu olw’abantu abamu balowooza nti kkaadi teyamuweereddwa mu bwesimbu. Bino Ssebaggala yabitegeezezza bannamawulire abamusanze ku kitebe ky’ekibiina ku Lwokubiri wano mu Kampala. “Nkyali mu NUP era nga ng’enda kuwagira Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu okutwala obukulembeze bw’eggwanga,” Ssebaggala bwe yagambye. Kino kiddiridde munne gwe babadde bavuganya ku kkaadi Joseph Mayanja amanyiddwa nga Chameleone okuwandiikira akakiiko k’ekibiina ak’ebyokulonda nga yeemulugunya ku ky’okuwa Ssebaggala kkaadi ng’agamba nti yabadde nsobi erina okutereezebwa. Ssebaggala asabye abawagizi b’ekibiina kya NUP okumutegeera obulungi kuba kino akikoze ku bulungi bwa Kibiina n’asuubiza okubanjulirira ky’agenda okuzzaako mu maaso awo.  Gambuuze g’afunye mu nsonda ezeesigika galaga nga Latif Ssebaggala bw’ayinza okugenda ku bubaka bwa Palamenti obw’omukago gwa East Africa. Ono abadde akyalemeddwa okusalawo ku kifo ekituufu ky’ayagala nga waliwo lwe yayagala addeyo ku bubaka bwa palamenti obwa Kawempe North ate olulala n’ategeeza nti ajja okusingukulula Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago. Abakungu ba NUP baavuddeyo ne bategeeza ku wiikendi ewedde nga Kkaadi bwe baagiwadde Ssebaggala olw’okuba alina obumanyirivu mu by’obufuzi ate ng’abaddewo nnyo ku lwa Bobi Wine. Kkampu ya Chameleone bino yabiwakanyiza n’etegeeza ng’omuntu waabwe bw’akoze ennyo okuleeta enkyukakyuka ng’ayimbira Bobi Wine ennyimba. Bano bakkiriza nti kituufu omuntu waabwe talina bumanyirivu naye bulijjo Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) asaba abavubuka okwenyigira mu by’obufuzi era beebereremu nga kino ne Chameleone ky’akola.Kati ekirindiriddwa kwekumanya ppulaani empya Ssebaggala gy’asuubizizza okulangirira.

headline: Bannannyini Uganda bebantu so si bakulembeze – Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ategeezezza akakiiko akafuzi aka Palamenti nti buli kyebakola bakikole nga bamanyi nti eggwanga lino lya bantu so si bakulembeze. “Bwobeera omukulembeze obeera oweereddwa buvunaanyizibwa. Mulina okumanya nti eggwanga lino si lya babaka ba Palamenti naye lya bantu bonna abaliwangaaliramu,” Museveni bwe yagambye. Okwogera bino Museveni yabadde asisinkanye akakiiko akafuzi aka Palamenti akakulira Sipiika Anita Among n’omumyuka we Thomas Tayebwa, eggulo mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti agasangibwa e Nakasero mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Pulezidenti Museveni amasiga gonna agakola gavumenti galina kukolera wamu ku lw’obulungi bw’ eggwanga naye ate olumu abakulembeze baago bakola kinene mukulemesa enkulaakulana.   Museveni awadde eky’okulabirako nti mu 2005 nga eggwanga litawanyizibwa amasanyalaze agaali gavaako buli kadde yagezaako okuzimba amabibiro amalala naye Palamenti eyaliwo nemulemesa. “Wetwakwatira obuyinza, Uganda yali efulumya amasanyalaze ga ‘Megawatts’ 60 ku gano nga 30 tugatunda Kenya, nasaba tuzimbe amabibiro naye Palamenti nelemesa. Kuno kwali kulya lukwe mu Palamenti eno,” Museveni bwe yagasseeko. Museveni yannyonnyodde nti bweyagangula akalulu mu 2006 yamatiza Kabineeti bongere ku ssente zebateeka mu nguudo n’amasanyalaze era nebakaanya n’okumatiza akabondo k’ekibiina era kino kye kivuddeko enguudo ezizimbibwa awamu n’amasanyalaze ebiyambye okwongera enkulaakulana. Museveni abalabudde ku kweyongeza emisaala nabategeeza nti abakuumaddembe, abasawo n’abasomesa bakyafuna ssente ntono nnyo nga eky’okwongera omusaala gw’ ababaka kisobola okulindako nekijja mu maaso awo naye basoosowaze abalala. Ono asiimye Palamenti ye 11 gyagambye nti emirimu egitandise bulungi kuba ekwatagana n’amasiga amalala aga gavumenti nga kigenda kwanguya olugendo lw’okuggya bannayuganda mu bwavu. Sipiika wa Palamenti, Anita Anite Among yasinzidde wano neyeebaza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okubwa obuwagizi n’okubalung’amya ku nsonga ez’enjawulo era nasuubiza okwongera okukolera awamu okusobola okutuusa enkulaakulana ku bannayuganda. Among alaze ebimu ku byebatuuseeko nga Palamenti y’ e 11 mu myezi 11 gyebamaze nga bakola nga muno bayisirizaamu amabago agawera 12 kwago 20 agayanjulwa awamu n’ebintu ebirala. Ono agamba nti basaasaanya obuwumbi 20 buli mwaka okupangisa ababaka webakolera nga kyekiseera bazimbe ekifo ekyabwe basobole okutaasa ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu Ssaabaminisita, Robinah Nabbanja, Minisita w’ebyensimbi Matia Kasaija ne Kalaani wa Palamenti Adolf Mwesigye awamu ne bakamisona ba Palamenti ab’enjawulo.

headline: Museveni : “Ddiiru yange ne Mao teyaliimu kukyuusa buyinza
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yeesambye eby’okukaanya ku kutandika enteekateeka y’okukyuusa obuyinza bwebaali bakola omukago ne Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ki Democatic Party, Norbert Mao mu July w’omwaka guno. Bweyabadde awayaamu n’omukutu gwa ttiivi ye Kenya ogwa KTN, Museveni yagambye nti ekyabaleese Mao kwali kusikiriza baludda oluvuganya okwegatta ku gavumenti ye so si kuyambako ku nteekateeka ya kukyuusa buyinza kuba teriiwo akaseera kano. “ Enteekateeka yaffe yakuteekawo obumu mu ngeri zonna ezisoboka eri abo abasobola okukaanya naffe tusigaze abatuwakanya nga beebatono. Eno y’enkola yaffe kati era tujoogera mu lwattu,” Museveni bwe yategeezezza. Okwogera bino, Museveni abadde ayanukula ekibuuzo ku bigambo Mao byazze ayogera nalaga nga bweyalondebwa mu gavumenti okusobozesa okuteekawo enteekateeka y’okukyuusa obuyinza mu mirembe. Mao yalondebwa mu kkabineeti mu July, 2022 oluvannyuma lw’okukola endagaano ne Pulezidenti Museveni . Ebigambo bya Pulezidenti Museveni byejjeereza abazze balabula Mao nga bategeeza nga Pulezidenti Museveni bw’atakuuma kigambo kye nga asobola okwefuula akadde konna. Kino kiddiridde abamu ku bannakibiina okutabukira Mao nga baagala ave ku bwa Ssenkaggale nga bagamba nti endagaano ya Mao ne Museveni erimu bingi ebitategeerekeka. Okusinziira ku Museveni, ekyamuleesa Mao kwekuba nti yali omu ku bakulembeze mu Acholi ababadde balwanyisa NRM oluvannyuma lw’okuggyako Tito Okello Lutwa. Okello yali ava mu Acholi era yaliko Pulezidenti wakati wa 1985-1986. Pulezidenti Museveni agamba nti omusika we ajja kulondebwa nga bagoberera amateeka g’ekibiina ki NRM nga Mao byatambuza tamanyi gyabijja.

headline: NRM efunye Obwumbi 4.2 mu baagala okwesimbawo
text: Bya Chris Ssemakula Akulira eby’okulonda mu NRM, Dr. Tanga Odoi Kyaddondo Akulira eby’okulonda mu NRM Dr. Tanga Odoi ategeezezza nga bwebakungaanyizza obuwumbi obuwera 4.2 okuva mu beegwanyizza okwesimbawo ku bifo eby’enjawulo mukulonda kwa 2021. Odoi yawakkanyizza ebibadde byogerwa nti ssente eziyimirizzaawo ekibiina ziva mu gavumenti nti kino sikituufu wabula ziva mu bamemba b’ekibiina. Ku murundi guno abagala bbendera y’ekibiina ku kifo ky’ Obwapulezidenti basasudde obukadde 10, abanaavuganya ku bwa ssentebe bw’ekibiina nabo obukadde 10 ate ababaka ba palamenti obukadde 2, bameeya obukadde 5 kuno kwogatta n’ebifo ebirala.

headline: Richard Todwong alondeddwa ku bwassaabawandiisi bwa NRM, Namayanja ye mumyuka
text: Eyali Minisita ataliiko kifo kya nkalakkalira, Ricahrd Twodong, alondeddwa nga Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement(NRM). Mu nkyukakyuka zino ezalangiriddwa Pulezidenti Museveni olunaku lw’eggulo, Twodong azze mu bigere bya Justine Kasule Lumumba eyalondeddwa ku bwa Minisita bwa guno na guli mu woofiisi ya Ssaabaminisita. Mu ngeri y’emu, munnakibiina kya NRM Rose Namayanja abadde omuwanika w’ekibiina alondeddwa okubeera omumyuka wa Ssaabawandiisi. Barbara Oundo Nekesa abadde Kamisona wa Uganda mu South Africa yakomezeddwawo ku butaka okudda okuwanika ensimbi z’ekibiina nga Namayanja bw’abadde akola.

headline: Abavubuka eby’obufuzi temubitwala nga kazannyo – Owek. Mayiga
text: Bulange Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, alabudde abavubuka abaagala okwesimbawo ku bifo ebyenjawulo mu by’obufuzi okwewala ebibatwala ng’akazannyo n’okubaako bye bagezesa. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga. Ekif: File Okulabula kuno akukoze asisinkanye munnamateeka Simon Ssenyonga eyeegwanyiza okukiikirira abavubuka mu Buganda mu Palamenti leero ku Lwokutaano e Bulange Mmengo. “Ebyobufuzi si kazannyo, ebyobufuzi bigendereddwamu okukyusa obulamu bw’abantu. Olina okubeera n’obuvunaanyizibwa n’osobola okulwanirira by’okkiririzaamu,” Mayiga bw’amusibiridde entanda. Ono amusabye okuyamba abavubuka ng’abateesezza ebyo ebisobola okukyusa obulamu bwabwe. Ye Simon Ssenyonga ategeezezza Katikkiro nti abadde mu bukulembeze era ng’asuubira nti asobola okukyusa obulamu bw’abavubuka mu Buganda. Ssenyonga yeeyamye okuyamba abavubuka okuyiga enkozesa ya tekinologiya obulungi, kibayambe okumusikamu ensimbi era basobole okukulaakulana. Ono annyonnyodde Kamalabyonna nti singa aweebwa omukisa waakuyamba okutumbula eby’obulimi kiyambe okutondawo emirimu. Ssenyonga agamba nti n’ebyensoma bya Uganda birina okukyuka kubanga, abayizi basomesebwa kubeera baddu mu kifo ky’okubeera abayiiya abasobola okutondawo emirimu. Asuubizza okukolaganira awamu ne gavumenti yaawakati, gavumenti ya Buganda wamu ne gavumenti ez’ebitundu okusitula embeera z’abavubuka mu ggwanga.

headline: Munna NRM Muwonge alangiriddwa ku bwassentebe bw’e Kayunga, Nakweede abigaanye
text: Akaiiko k’ebyokulonda kalangiridde munnakibiina kya NRM, Andrew Muwonge nga ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Kayunga omuggya oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula akalulu akabaddemu vvaawompitewo owaamaanyi. Akulira eby’okulonda e Kayunga, Jennifer Kyobutungi alangiridde Muwonge eri eggwanga ku makya ga leero ku Lwokutaanobw’afunye obululu 31,830ate Munnakibiina kya NUP, Harriet Nakweede nafuna 31,380, ng’enjawulo abadde ya bululu 450 bwokka. Akalulu kano kabaddemu abavuganya abawera mukaaga okuli;Majid Nyanzi eyakutte ekyokusatu n’obululu 1297, addiriddwa Musisi Boniface Bandikubi (Independent) n’obululu 470, Jamiru Kamoga, 279 ate Munnakibiina kya Democratic PartyAnthony Wadimba n’afuna obululu 158. “ Ng’akulira okulonda e Kayunga n’oluvannyuma lw’okugatta n’okukakasa obululu obubadde ku mpapula ezironderwako ng’etteeka bwe ligamba. Nangirira Muwonge Andrew afunye obululu obungi ng’omuwanguzi w’akalulu kano.”Kyobutungi bw’agambye. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira abamu ku bawagizi be bajaguza era mu kwogerako gyebali Muwonge ategeezezza nti ayagala kulaba ng’obumu budda mu Kayungabasobole okugenda mu maaso. Wabula okulangirira ebimu ku byavudde mu kulonda kwakeereyo nnyo ng’abakakiiko bagamba nti kyavudde ku byuma bikalimagezi bye baakozesezza okukyankalana wabula byamaze ne bitereera. Wadde okugatta obululu kwatandise ku ssaawa 8 ez’okumakya ku Lwokuna, kitutte essaawa 13 nnamba okusobola okulangirira omuwanguzi w’akalulu kano. Akulira eby’okulonda mu ggwanga, Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama yeebazizza abeesimbyewo ne baajenti baabwe olwobugumiikiriza bwe balaze n’abasaba nti Kayunga nkulu nnyo okusinga obuwanguzi bwabwe oba okufiirwa akalulu n’abasaba okwegatta bakolere abantu. Nakweedeabigaanye Bino Nakweede abadde amaze essaawa eziwerera ddala 10ng’agoberera akalulu abigaaniddewo n’ategeeza nti bibadde bikyusiddwa. “Tekisoboka kubeera kituufu. Sisobola kubikkiriza. Okusinziira ku bye tulina waliwo enjawulo ya mutwalo gumu n’ekitundu, wano waliwo ekikyamu. Ebifo bingi gye baggye obululu ate nga businga abalonzi abaliyo.”Nakweede bw’annyonnyodde. Nakweede era yeekokkodde engeri ab’ebyokwerinda gye baagobyemu abantu be okuli John Mary Ssebuwufu we babalira obululu n’ategeeza nti lino lyonna lyabadde kkobaane.

headline: Lumumba atabukidde abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe mu NRM
text: Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Kasule Lumumba, atabuse n’alagira abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe, bakomye okwefuula abaagala ekibiina bwe baba tebasobola kulekera baafuna bbendera kuvuganya mu kalulu ka 2021. Ssaabawandiisi Lumumba nga atabukira abeesimbyewo “Kisingako ekibiina okiveemu mu kifo ky’okwefuula nti oyagala NRM ate nga weesimbyewo okuvuganya omuntu alina kkaadi y’ekibiina, temukozesa kibiina ate okukisuula n’okukinafuya nga mwawulamu obululu bwakyo.” Lumumba bwe yagambye Lumumba okutabukira bano, yabadde mu bitundu bya Ankole eggulo ku Lwomukaaga ng’asimbula ebibinja by’abavubuka ebigenda okuwenjeza abeesimbyewo ku kkaadi z’ekibiina obululu wansi mu byalo. Ono yasinzidde wano n’asaba bannayuganda okulonda bakukwate mu ddembe era bawuliziganye wadde basobola okuba nga tebakkaanya mu ndowooza za byabufuzi. Oluvannyuma Lumumba yeeyongeddeyo e Ntungamo mu kutongoza ekibiina kya Ntungamo Action Network abawera 350 nga bano nabo bafunvubidde okunoonyeza abalina bbendera z’ekibiina obululu mu byalo, basobole okudda n’obuwanguzi. Ekibiina kino ng’omuyima waakyo ye mubaka wa Rushenyi, Mwesigwa Rukutana, kyawaddeyo Ppikipiki 2 ezibalirirwamu obukadde 8 n’essente enkalu obukadde 2, ziyambeko mu kaweefube w’okunoonya akalulu wansi mu byalo. Lumumba era yazzeemu n’asaba abantu okumanya we bayimiridde ku nsonga y’ebyokwerinda, ebyobulamu, emirimu n’ebyenjigiriza, olwo basobole okukuuma ebiseera byabwe eby’omu maaso nga balonda NRM kubanga y’ebagaliza ebisinga.

headline: Dr. Besigye  ne Bobi Wine bagobaganye ne Poliisi, Ttiyaggaasi anyoose
text: Dr Kizza Besigye ne Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) bakeeredde mu kugobagana ne poliisi wakati mu kukuba ttiyaggaasi bwebadde egezaako okubagumbulula okuva e Nsambya Sharing Hall mu Kampala gyebabadde bategese okusaba okumalako omwaka. Besigye ne Kyagulanyi babadde bakunze abawagizi babwe okubeegattako mukusaba kuno okwategekeddwa ab’oludda oluvuganya wansi w’omukago gu ‘United Forces of Change.’ Wabula Besigye nga yakulira ekisinde ki ‘People’s Front for Transition (PFT) ne Kyagulanyi nga ye Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform (NUP), poliisi tebaganyizza kutuuka mu kifo kino okusobola okwetaba mukusaba okubadde kutandika ku ssaawa 3 ez’okumakya.  Wadde bagezezaako okwegayirira poliisi ebakkirize beetabe n’abawagizi babwe mukusaba, poliisi ebigaanye era nebalagira okwamuka ekifo kino. Abakulembeze abalala okuli omwogezi wa NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi ne Ssaabawandiisi David Lewis Rubongoya bonna balabiddwako nga basobeddwa ekiddako. Bano oluvannyuma basazeewo okusabira wabweru w’ekifo wakati mukuyimba ennyimba ezisuusuuta abakulembeze baabwe. Kyagulanyi bw’abadde ayogera ku nsonga eno ategeezezza nti kikwasa ensonyi okulaba nga poliisi yeyisa bweti naye nabalabula nti bino byonna byakukoma mu bwangu nga Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni avudde mu buyinza. “Nga tukolera wamu tujja kusobola okukomya embeera eno. Okwegatta ng’oludda oluvuganya kikulu y’ensonga lwaki tulina essuubi nti embeera eno egenda kukyuuka. Tetugenda kukkiriza mbeera eno, mulabe engeri gyebatuyisizzaamu leero, baleese abasirikale kumpi kubamalayo,” Kyagulanyi bw’annyonnyodde.  Wabula omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’ emirilaano, Patrick Onyango ategeezezza nti okusaba kuno bakugaanye olw’okwekengera olw’ebikolwa by’ ebitujju ebyeyongera buli kadde nga ababi bayinza okukozesa omukisa guno nebakola aba Opozisoni ekibi. Afande Onyango bano abawadde amagezi okukozesa amasinzizo amalala begatta kubaliyo era nalabula abantu ba bulijjo okwewala okusaba okutegekebwa abantu bano. Ye omumyuka wa Loodimmeeya wa Kampala, Doreen Nyanjura ategeezezza nti omwaka 2022 gubadde muzibu gyebali naye asuubira 2023 okusingawo bwatyo nasaba ab’oludda oluvuganya okwongera okwegatta.

headline: Gen Muhoozi asabye kkooti egobe omusango ogwamuwaabirwa ku bubaga bw’amazaalibwa
text: Mutabani wa Pulezidenti Museveni era omuduumizi w’eggye ly’okuttaka erya UPDF, Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba, asabye kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka egobye omusango ogwamuwaabirwa olw’okweyagaliza obwapulezidenti n’okutegeka obubaga bw’amazaalibwa obw’emyaka 48 nga akyali mu majje mu nteekateeka egambibwa nti ayagala kusikira kitaawe ku bwapulezidenti. Kino kiddiridde munnamateeka Gawaya Tegulle okutwala Muhoozi, Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti n’Omudduumizi w’eggye ly’eggwanga mu kkooti ku bikolwa bya Muhoozi. Kati Muhoozi wamu ne bano basabye kkooti egobe omusango guno kuba Tegulle yaguwaaba mu kkooti nkyamu nga tegwetaagisa kutaputa Ssemateeka. “ Abawawaabirwa (Muhoozi, AG and CDF), bagamba nti teguliimu nsa era gwawaabwa mu kkooti nkyamu kuba teguliimu nsonga yeetaaga kutaputa Ssemateeka era basaba gugobebwe era omuwaabi abaliyirire ssente zonna zebasaasaanyizza,” Okwewozaako kwa Muhoozi ne banne bwekusomye. Gen Muhoozi annyonnyodde nti ebikujjuko by’ amazaalibwa ge aga 48 tebirina ngeri yonna gyebimenyamu Ssemateeka nga Tegulle bw’agamba. “Omuwawaabirwa asooka (Gen Muhoozi) akakasa nti obubaga bw’amazaalibwa bweyategeka tebulina gwebumenyamu mateeka naddala ennyingo 2, 3, 208, 209, ne 2010 eza Ssemateeka w’eggwanga,” bwatyo bweyataddemu okwewozaako kwe. Mu mpaaba ye gyeyakola mu mwezi gwa May. Tegulle yagamba nti ebikolwa bya Muhoozi byeyategeka ku mutendera gwe ggwanga lyonna awamu n’ebitundu ebimu yali abikozesa okulangirira nga bw’agenda okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti era bino yabiteeka neku mukutu gwe ku mutimbagano gwa Twitter ekintu ekikontana n’ennyingo 208 (2) eya Ssemateeka egamba nti abajaasi n’eggye lya UPDF teribeere nakyekubira ku nsonga yonna. “Ng’omujaasi akyaweereza mu UPDF, Omuwawaabirwa Asooka (Gen Muhoozi) yeyisa mu ngeri etali ya mpisa era yamenya amateeka alambika n’okufuga abajaasi mujje lya UPDF,” Ebimu ku biri mu mpaaba ya Tegulle. Ye Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, ategeezezza nti ku nsonga y’obubaga bwa Muhoozi yali tasobola kumulambika nakuwa ndowooza ye mu by’amateeka kuba buno tebulina webwogerwako mu Ssemateeka. Gen Muhoozi era ategeezezza nti omuwaabi talina bujulizi bwonna bwaleese kulaga nti obubaga bwatemamu eggye ly’e ggwanga oba bwaggyawo obwesige abantu bwebalirinamu. Bweyali awaaba, Munnamateeka Tegulle yategeeza nti Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti yalemererwa okulambika n’okulaga Gen Muhoozi nti ebikolwa byeyali agenda nabyo mu maaso byali bimenya Ssemateeka w’eggwanga. Tegulle nga ayita mu bannamateeka be aba Thomas & Michael Advocates ne Nalukoola Advocates & Solicitors, yasaba kkooti ekome ku Muhoozi okugenda mu maaso n’ebikolwa bino ebirimu eby’obufuzi ebyawula nga akyali mu ggye lya UPDF kuba kimenya Ssemateeka.

headline: Palamenti ekkirizza omuwendo gwa baminisita okutuuka ku 80
text: Palamenti y’e 11 eyisizza ekiteeso ekisemba okwongeza omuwendo gwa baminisita okutuuka ku bantu 80, kisobozese okutuusa empeereza ku bannayuganda. Pulezidenti Museveni emabegako yasabye Palamenti emukkirize ayongere ku muwendo gwa baminisita agatteko omu anaakola ku nsonga z’abakadde. Ku Lwokuna, omubaka wa West Budama North, Fox Odoi yaleese ekiteeso okulinnyisa ku muwendo gwa baminisita ng’asinziira ku nnyingo 113 ne 114 ekya Ssemateeka wa Uganda era kino kyasembeddwa omubaka omukyala owa Dokolo Cecilia Ogwal. “Nsaba mukkirize muwagire ekiteeso kino n’abakadde basobole okufuna alondoola ensonga zaabwe.” Ogwal bwe yasabye. Palamenti ebadde ya bbugumu ng’ababaka bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga eno. Bw’abadde awagira ekiteeso kino, Minisita Chris Baryomunsi agambye nti waliwo obujulizi obweraga nti buli omuwendo gw’abakulembeze bwe gulinnye n’empeereza eri abantu yeeyongeddeko. “Waliwo obujulizi obwoleka nti omuwendo gwa baminisita n’abalondoola bannabyabufuzi, kitumbudde enkulaakulana era n’obuwangaazi bw’abantu ng’omuwendo gw’abaana abafa nga baakazaalibwa gukendedde ate nga ne bannansi beeyongedde okuwangaala.” Baryomunsi bw’annyonnyodde. Aba Opozisoni bakiwakanyizza Ababaka ku ludda oluvuga basoose kuwakanya kiteeso kino nga bagamba nti tebalaba mugaso gwabwe ate nga basaasaanyizibwako ssente mpitirivu. “ Si ffe tusalawo omuwendo gwa baminisita naye tetwetaaga muwendo gwa baminisita munene. Kenya erina obukadde bw’abantu 70 naye erina baminisita 23. Tanzania nnene ku ffe naye erina baminisita batono nnyo, bano tetulina nsonga ebongerako kuba tebabeera mu Palamenti.” Omubaka Joseph Ssewungu bw’awakanyizza. Ye omubaka wa Makindye West, Allan Ssewanyana ategeezezza nti mu butuufu omuwendo gwa baminisita gulina kukendeezebwako kuba basaasaanyizibwa ssente nnyingi. Ono agamba nti singa Palamenti ekkiriza okwongeza omuwendo gwa baminisita eba ng’etalina mugaso kubanga Pulezidenti yasoose ku mulonda nga tebannamuyisa. Ate ye Nnampala w’oludda oluvuganya omuggya, John Nambeshe, ategeezezza nti ekiteeso kino ekyongeza omuwendo gwa baminisita tekirina kye kigenda kukola ku kutumbula mpeereza okuggyako okuyamba Pulezidenti Museveni. Ono agamba nti kino Pulezidenti Museveni akikozesa okwongera okwenywereza mu buyinza so si kutuusa buweereza ku bannansi n’aba NRM bwe ba gamba. Oluvannyuma lw’okukubaganya ebirowoozo, ekiteeso kino kiyise era palamenti ne yeeyongerayo okuteesa ku nsonga endala.

headline: FDC eyagala walondebwewo Minisita w’ebyenjigiriza omulala, egamba Janet Museveni eby’okukola alina bingi
text: Omwogezi w’ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda ategeezezza nti eggwanga lyetaaga Minisita w’ebyenjigiriza omuggya kuba Janet Museveni aliko kati alabika akwasaganyizza ebintu bingi. Ssemujju, nga ye mubaka wa munisipaali y’e Kira agamba nti Minisita Janet Museveni tatuukikako kyokka mu kiseera kino ebyenjigiriza biri mu katyabaga. Omubaka Ssemujju bino abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire ku Mmande ku kitebe ky ‘ekibiina e Najjanankumbi mu Kampala. “Okusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa okuliwo mu byenjigiriza, eggwanga lyetaaga Minisita w’ebyenjigiriza asobola okutuukikako akadde wonna okusobola okusalira ebizibu ebiriwo amagezi.” Ssemujju bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Ssemujju, okulondebwa kwa Kataaha Museveni ku kifo kya Minisita w’ebyenjigiriza kyajja nga kasiimo okuva ewa Pulezidenti Museveni ng’akawa mukyala we bw’atyo n’asaba ono atwalibwe mu Minisitule endalaetalina mirimu mingi. “Alina ebyokukola bingi ate si kyangu kumutuukako mu katyabaga kano mwetuli. Museveniosobola okuwa mukyala wo, Minisitule etalina mirimu mingi ng’eno etalina mulimu gwa nkalakkalira.” Ssemujju bw’annyonnyodde. Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga ku Lwokusatu lwa wiiki ewedde yagambye ntiamatendekero aga waggulu okuli Yunivaasite n’amatendekero amalala balina okutandika ku ntandikwa y’omwezi gwa Novemba. Wabula Pulezidenti Museveniyategeezezza nti okuggulawo amasomero ga ssekendule ne Pulayimale, abasomesa n’abawagizi abawera obukadde 4.8 nga bamaze okugemebwa. Okusinziira ku Ssemujju, FDC kino tekikkiririza mu nnaku za mwezi ezaateereddwawo kuba ebyenjigiriza bikoseddwa nnyo era amasomero geetaaga okuggulwa mu bwangu nga bwekisoboka. FDC eyagala Pulezidenti amasomero agaggule gonna omwaka guno, kiyambe abayizi okukozesa akadde kano.

headline: Kyagulanyi asabye aba NUP obutasojja ba NRM abawanguddwa
text: Lwengo -Buddu Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine asabye bannayuganda okukomya okusojja banna NRM abaawangulwa mu kalulu wabula babagumye kuba tebagenda kuddamu kuwangula bukulembeze ku mutendera gwonna.  Omubaka Mpuuga nga ayogerako eri abakungubazi Kyagulanyi bino abitadde mu bubaka bw’atisse omumyuka w’ekibiina mu Buganda, Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba ku mukolo gw’okuziika Ssenga we, Nalubega Leonia ku kyalo Nakawanga mu ggombolola ya Kisekka mu disitulikiti y’e Lwengo. Mu bubaka bwe Kyagulanyi akuutidde bannakibiina obutawalana banna NRM naye banywerere ku nsonga era tebeetaaga kwekubagiza ku ngeri gye baalondamu. Ono era alabudde abantu abatandise okutiisatiisa banna Lwengo olw’okulonda ekibiina kya NUP n’abasaba okukikomya kuba tebajja kumalako nakyo. Mu kwogera kwe, Omubaka Mpuuga yeebazizza Ssenga we Nalubega kati omugenzi olw’omukwano gw’abadde nagwo eri abantu era abadde alafuubana okulaba nti obugunjufu buteekebwawo essira.Ye Omwami wa Kabaka atwala e Ssaza Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke mu bubaka bwe bw’atisse omumyuka we owookusatu, Muwalimu Kato Abdallah, asabye abavubuka bonna okukomya okulowooza nti bato kyokka bekkiririzeemu nga b’oleese obwongo bwabwe mu bintu ebyenjawulo. Ono era yennyamidde olw’abaana b’eggwanga abakwatibwa kyokka bazadde baabwe ne basigala mu maziga nga tebamanyi mayitire g’abantu baabwe. Ate ye Mmeeya wa Masaka omulonde, Florence Namayanja, asinzidde wano n’awagira ekikolwa ekyakoleddwa omukulembeze wa NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, okuggyayo omusango mu kkooti kubanga kuba yali eraze kyekubiira . Omukadde Nalubega Leonia yafiiridde ku myaka 82 egy’obukulu ng’agalamiziddwa ku kyalo Nakawanga mu ggombolola y’e Kisekka mu Lwengo era ng’omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abakungu okuva mu gavumenti eyaawakati ne y’e Mmengo.

headline: Boogeredde gav’t ebisongovu mu kuziika Owek. Sserubogo
text: Abakungubazi ab’enjawulo boogeredde gavumenti ebikikinike mu kuziika abadde ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Kayunga, Owek. Muhammad Ffeffekka Sserubogo e Kayunga ku Lwokuna ne bawakanya ebyavudde mu alipoota y’abasawo ebyalaze nti Sserubogo yeetuze. Omu ku bakungubazi era akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti, Owek. Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba nga y’atuusizza obubaka bwa Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, ategeezezza nti Sserubogo abadde muntu wa nsonga ate omwetowaze. “Mwebale kulonda Sserubogo n’obumalirivu nga temutidde, mmwe abasigadde temuva wano kusiita bigere kuba omulabe akyaliwo yeeswanta naye mutuwe Sserubogo omulala.” Owek. Mpuuga bw’agambye. Owek. Mpuuga asabye ab’e Kayunga bamalirire basobole okuggusa ensonga Sserubogo z’abadde ayimirirako era n’abasaba okulema okutya ababatiisatiisa naye beegatte wamu bayambe ekitundu kino. “Sserubogo tafudde bufi nti kiyenje kyakooye ne kifa naye afiiridde wakati mu lutabaalo. Naye nnina amaanyi nti eggwanga lino lijja kudda mu mikono gya bannyini lyo baliwe obwekanya n’abadde omulabe aganyulwemu.” Owek. Mpuuga bw’ategeezezza. Omubaka Sseggona asabye abantu abagula ettaka mu kitundu ky’e Kayunga ne Bugerere okwegendereza ku ani gwe bagulako era bagula batya kuba abaana ba Buganda bajja ku bibabuuza akadde konna. Ono awakanyizza alipoota y’abasawo n’ategeeza nti ebibuuzo ku nfa ya Sserubogo bikyali bingi. Abaganda tebaziika muntu yeetuze, sandivudde Busiro kujja wano kuziika muntu yeetuze naye tuli wano okuziika mulwanyi munnaffe. Ate ye omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Kayunga, Aidah Nantaba, annyonnyodde nti Kayunga efuuse ekirala naye waliwo ebibuuzo ku nfa ya Sserubogo. “Tuyinza kuba tulinda alipoota y’abakugu ku nfa ya Sserubogo naye ffe eyaffe tugirina. Tetwalabye baleeta mbwa kuwunyiriza naye tulabye kimu miggo gikuba bazze kuziika. Okukulembera Bugerere kati kufuuse buzibu, bw’okwata ku nsonga y’ettaka entaana oba ogisimye.” Omubaka Nantaba bw’annyonnyodde. Ate akulira ekibiina kya NUP mu Mukono, Betty Nambooze Bakireke, agambye nti abadde amanyiganye ne Ffeffekka Sserubogo era abadde musajja wa Kabaka ateerya ntama. “Tuli wano naye ne Katonda amanyi ekyabaddewo, wabaddewo ang’amba nti Ffeffekka atambuza omuggo yawalampye atya omuti mu kkanzu, waliwo ebintu ebikolwa ne Shaitwani naye bye yeewakana nti nange eyo sabaddeyo.” Omubaka Nambooze bw’annyonnyodde. Oluvannyuma omugenzi aziikiddwa ku biggya e Kayunga mu ssaza lya Beene ery’e Bugerere era nga Mugerere yatuusizza obubaka bwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka obukungubagira musajja we.

headline: Abawagizi ba Bobi Wine beekalakaasizza nga bawakanya omukwata
text: Kampala Abawagizi beeyesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti ku kkaadi y’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) , beekalakaasizza mu bitundu bya Kampala ne Masaka nga bawakanya eky’okumukwata bw’abadde anoonya akalulu e Luuka mu bitundu by’e Busoga.  Amawulire g’okukwatibwa kwa Kyagulanyi olwategerekese, abantu ab’enjawulo okuli; ewa Kisekka, Kibuye, Nasser Road, Masanafu, Kireka, Bweyogerere n’awalala ne batandika okwekalakaasa. Bano bazibye amakubo wamu n’okukuma omuliro mu nguudo ez’enjawulo era gye biggweeredde ng’abakulira eby’okwerinda bayimbudde abamagye ne poliisi okuggya batereeze embeera. Okusinziira ku Poliisi Kyagulanyi akwatiddwa olw’okujeemera ebiragiro ebitangira Ssennyiga Corona kuba abadde akung’aanyizza abantu abasoba mu 200 abakkiribwa mu mateeka. Kyagulanyi atwaliddwa e Nalufenya mu Jinja gy’ali mu kukuumirwa wabula nga poliisi ekyagenda mu maaso okukozesa ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okugumbulula abawagizi be mu bibuga ebyenjawulo.

headline: Kkooti egobye Joyce Bagala mu Palamenti, Akalulu kaakuddibwamu
text: Kkooti enkulu e Mubende esazizzaamu okulondebwa kwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Joyce Bagala Ntwatwa ng’omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti ye Mityana nga egamba nti akalulu kano kaalimu ebirumira. Mu kalulu ka bonna akaakubwa nga January 14 2021, Bagala yafuna obululu 64633 nawangula Minisita w’ebyettaka Judith Nabakooba eyafuna obululu 48322 era nga yeyali mu kifo kino. Wabula Nabakooba yaddukira mu kkooti nga alumirizza Bagala okwekobaana n’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nebabba obululu nga balondesa abantu abakyamu, okulondera mu mannya g’abalala awamu n’okulonda emirundi egisukka mu gumu. Okusinziira ku Nabakooba aba Bagala batiisatiisa ba Agenti be nebalemesa abalonzi be okumuwa akalulu. Enkya ya leero, Omulamuzi Emmanuel Baguma ategeezezza nti waliwo obujulizi obumala okukakasa nti Bagala nga ayita mu ba Agenti be era nga akimanyiko bamenya amateeka g’ebyokulonda n’okugulirira abalonzi. “ Kkooti esazeewo nti omuwawabirwa ow’okubiri era omubaka omukyala owa Mityana, Joyce Bagala addeko ebbali,” Omulamuzi bw’ategeezezza. Omulamuzi alagidde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okuddamu okutegeka akalulu okujjuza ekifo kino era nalagira Bagala okuliyirira Nabakooba ssente zasasaanyizza mu musango guno. Ye Joyce Bagala ategeezezza nti agenda kujjulira kuba omulamuzi alemeddwa okuwa ensonga ez’essimba zasinziddeko okusazaamu okulondebwa kwe. Ate ye Nabakooba asanyukidde ensala eno nagamba nti kyaddaaki eddoboozi lya bannamityana liwuliddwa kuba obuwanguzi bwe bwali bumutwaliddwako.

headline: Bobi Wine waakutumbula eby’obujjanjabi e Namisindwa.
text: Robert Kyagulanyi Ssetamu amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine era nga ono y’akwatidde ekibiina kya NUP bbendera ku kifo ky’obwapulezidenti, asuubizza okutumbula eby’obujjanjabi mu disitulikiti y’e Namisindwa.  Okwogera bino yasinzidde ku kisaawe e Magale bwe yabadde anoonya akalulu n’agamba mbu amalwaliro mu disitulikiti eno gali mu mbeera eyeeraliikiriza mbu olw’okuba agamu tegaliimu ddagala ekireetera abatuuze obutafuna bujjanjabi bumatiza. Kyagulanyi yasuubizza okukakasa nti amalwaliro gonna galimu ebyeyagisa awamu n’eddagala singa akwata obuyinza. Yasabye abantu okuvaayo balonde mu bungi ng’ennaku z’omwezi 14 omwezi guno ate balonde ku lw’enkyukakyuka. Kyagulanyi yamazeewo okutya kw’abalonzi abasuubira nti akalulu kagenda kubbibwa okwetooloola eggwanga bw’abagambye nti alina bannamikago mu America n’ensi endala abatunuulidde akalulu kano n’eriiso ejjogi. Ku Lwokuna akalulu agenda kukanoonyeza Namayigo ate ku Lwokutaano addeyo ku bizinga by’e Kalangala.

headline: Ogwa Bobi Wine ne Kibalama gwongezeddwayo
text: Kampala Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala eyongezzaayo okuwa ensala yaayo ku musango oguvunaanibwa omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Robert) ne banne okweddiza obuyinza bw’ekibiina kya National Unity Reconciliation and Development Party (NURP) nebakikyusa n’erinnya okukifuula, abamu ku bammemba kye bagamba nti kyakolebwa mu bukyamu. Kibalama lweyawa Bobi Wine ekibiina Omulamuzi wa kkooti eno, Musa Ssekaana yali yateekawo olwaleero ku Lwokutaano okuweerako ensala ye naye omwogezi w’ekitongole ekiramuzi Jameson Karemani, ategeezezza nti okuwa ensala mu musango guno kwongezeddwayo okutuuka wiiki ejja. “Mutegeezebwa nti ensala y’omusango gwa NUP tegenda kubaayo leero naye ejja kuweebwa wiiki ejja ku lunaku olunaabategeezebwa,” Karemani bw’ategeezeza mu bubaka bw’asindise ku makya ga leero. Kinajjukirwa nti, mu mwezi gwa August abaali bannakibiina ki NURP, Basile Difas ne Hassan Twaha baatwala mu kkooti abantu 11 nga bawakanya eky’okukyuusa erinnya ly’ekibiina n’okukwasa obukulembeze bwakyo eri Bobi Wine ky’abagamba nti kyali kimenya mateeka. Bobi Wine avunaanwa n’abalala okuli ; akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, eyali Pulezidnti waakyo Moses Kibalama, Paul Ssimbwa Kagombe n’abakulembe ba NUP okuli; David Lewis Rubongoya, Aisha Kabanda, Joel Ssenyonyi, Flavia Kalule Nabagabe, ne Fred Nyanzi Ssentamu. Basile ne munne, bagamba nti Ttabamiruka eyatuula mu kiseera ng’eggwanga liri ku muggalo gwa Ssennyiga Corona okuwa Kyagulanyi ekibiina yatuula mu bukyamu nga yalimu bammemba b’ekibiina 51 bokka nga abalala balekebwa ebbali. Bano basaba kkooti erangirire nti kyali kikyamu Kibalama okukwasa obukulembeze bw’ekibiina eri Kyagulanyi, era basaba kkooti ekiyise ekiragiro ekisazaamu byonna ebyakolebwa era ekibiina kiddizibwe bannyini kyo abatuufu. Kibalama okusooka yakuba ekirayiro nga kiraga nti buli ekyakolebwa kyali mu mateeka kyokka ate oluvannyuma nakuba ekirala nga agamba nti yawubisibwa era byonna ebyakolebwa byali bikyamu era nga yali tabisomyemu.

headline: Bobi Wine ekibiina ki NUP akirina mu mateeka- Nkonge Kibalama
text: Bya Nyanzi Timothy Kamwokya Omubaka Kyagulanyi  ne  Nkonge Kibalama nga batongozza ekibiina Eyali ssentebe w’ekibiina ki ‘National Unity Reconciliation and Development party (NURP) ekyafuuka National Unity Party (NUP)Moses Nkonge Kibalama, yawakkanyiza abeeyita abakulembeze baakyo nebawakkanya okukikyuusa erinnya, n’okukiwa omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine). Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire olutudde e Kamwokya, Kibalama yategeezezza nga bano okuli Lilian Odinga ne Edward Sseremba bwatabamanyi nga abakulembeze baakyo. Yagasseeko nti balina olukalala lw’abantu abawera emitwala etaano nga bamemba naye amannya gabo waggulu tegalimu era abuusabuusa okuba nga balina kaadi y’ekibiina kino. Kibalama yagambye nti obwa memba bwa Kyagulanyi mu kibiina kyeyali akulembera buli mu makubo matuufu kubanga yayingira mu 2019 era nga tewali tteeka lyamenyebwa nga bamukwasa obukulembeze bwakyo. Ye omwogezi w’ekibiina ki NUP Joel Senyonyi akukkulumidde poliisi olw’okubasosola n’okulemesanga Omubaka Kyagulanyi okwogerera ku mikutu gya leediyo gyaba ayitiddwa okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Kinajjukirwa nti, Odinga ne Sseremba bawandikira akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga bayita mu munnamateeka James Byamukama nga bawakkanya engeri Omubaka Kyagulanyi gyeyafunamu ekibiina kino, gyebagamba nti yalimu ebirumira.

headline: Aba NRM abaagwa mu kalulu basabye Museveni abayambe ku mabanja
text: Bannakibiina kya NRM abaalemwa okuyitamu mu kalulu ka 2011 basabye Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni n’ekibiina kyabwe okubayamba ku mabanja ge batubiddemu oluvannyuma lw’okulemererwa okuyitamu mu kalulu. Bano abawerera ddala203 okwetooloola eggwanga abeegattira mu kibiina kyabwe ekya ‘NRM Parliamentary Flag bearers Outside Parliament (NPAFOP),’bino babitegeezezza bannamawulire ku Lwokutaano e Kyaddondo mu Kampala. “Tulinawo ekizibu ky’ebbula ly’emirimu mu bannaffe.Bannaffe abaalina bbizineesi zaagwa olw’ensonga nti baafiirwa ssente nnyingi mu kalulu. Ekizibu kino kinene kuba bangi baalekulira emirimu gyabwe ne beesimbawo ku bubaka bwa Palamenti.” Julisu Bigirwa Junjura, eyali yeesimbyewo e Buhaguzi mu Kikube bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Junjura, tebali mu kusabiriza wabula baagala kuyambibwako basobole okugenda mu maaso n’obulamu bwabwe. “Oluvannyuma lw’okufiirwa akalulu, baatusuulawo era abantu baffe abamu tebalina mirimu. Si ffenna nti twagala mirimu naye olw’ensonga nti twali tetwetegese kye twetaaga bwe buyambi. Tetwagala muntu yenna yali yeesimbyewo kufuuka asabiriza. Kye twetaaga kwe kwekuyambibwako mu byenfuna,” Julisu Bigirwa Junjura bw’agasseeko. Bannakibiina kino era baagala ekibiina kiyambe ku bantu baabwe abaawaaba emisango mu kkooti nga baagala okununula obuwanguzi bwabwe nga babasasulira ensimbi za bannamateeka. Bano era basuubizza okwetuma obuvunaanyizibwa okulondoola enteekateeka za gavumenti ezitali zimu mu bitundu byabwe. “Twagala okunoonyeza ekibiina obuwagizi. tukkiriza nti ebitundu 58% bye twafuna mu kalulu akawedde ntono nnyo era twagala okufuna ebitundu 75% mu kulonda kwa 2026.” Junjura bw’agambye. Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina, Richard Todwong, abeebazizza olw’okwetegeka obulungi era n’abasuubiza nti ekibiina kigenda kutunula mu nsonga zaabwe kirabe bwekisobola okubayambako.

headline: Bobi Wine atiisatiisizza okubaako kyekolawo singa poliisi eddamu okusattulula enkiikoze
text: Abamu ku bawagizi ba Bobi Wine nga badduka poliisi  Bannakisinde ky’ebyobufuzi ekya People Power, bagambye bandiwalirizibwa okubaako kyebakolawo singa poliisi terekeraawo kulinyirira ddembe lyabwe ng’ebalemesa okukuba enkungaana z’okwebuuza ku bantu.  Bano abakulemberwa Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa ennyo nga Bobi Wine, baagala kutalaaga ggwanga nga beebuuza ku bantu oba omuntu waabwe yeesimbawo ku bwa pulezidneti oba nedda.   Omwogezi wabano, Joel Ssenyonyi, yagambye nti newankubadde ng’akakiiko akakola ku by’okulonda kaabakkiriza okwebuuza ku bantu, poliisi kino ekyakiremesezza nga n’ogusembyeyo yabadde ggulo bwebaalemeseddwa okukuba olukungaana ku wooteeri ya Pope Paul mu Ndeeba.  Bano poliisi yabagambye nti baabadde balemereddwa okutuukiriza obukwakkulizo bonna nga webulambikiddwa mu tteeka erifuuga enkungaana. Ssenyonyi agamba okusinziira ku kyebaalabye mu Ndeeba, eno eyinza okuba nga yeegenda okuba enkola ya poliisi.   Yagambye nti kino kigenda kubawaliriza okusala amagezi amalala agali mateeka okulaba nga bagenda mu maaso n’enkugaana zaabwe.  Omwaka oguwedde Bobi yalangirira nti yali waakwesimbawo okuvuganya ku ntebe y’omukulembeze w’eggwanga, n’gamba nti wakutambula eggwanga lyonna ng’asisinkana abantu.  Yawandiikira akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nako akamukkiriza okugenda mu maaso yeebuuze nga bwekirambikiddwa mu tteeka erifuga okulonda kwa pulezidenti.  Amyuka omwogezi wa poliisi Polly Namaye yagambye baasabye Bobi olukangaga lw’ebintu kkumi byalina okusooka okutuukiriza nga poliisi tennamukkiriza kukuba enkiiko wabula nga kino kyamulemye okukola.

headline: Tumukunde asiindikiddwa e Luzira lwakulya mu ggwanga lukwe
text: Tumukunde asooka ku ddyo  Munnamajje Lt. Gen. Henry Tumukunde olwaleero ekisula waakukikwatira mu kawome e Luzira gyasindikiddwa kkooti ento etuula ku KCCA.  Ono yakwatibwa wiiki ewedde ku misango gy’okulya munsi olukwe.  Wiiki nga ssatu eziyise, Tumukunde yalangirira nti yali agenda kuvuganya ku ntebe y’omukulembeze w’eggwanga omwaka ogujja.  Kigambibwa mbu nga ali ku leediyo ne TV ez’enjawulo, Tumukunde yasaba eggwanga ly’e Rwanda okuyambako Uganda okujjako Pulezidenti Museveni eyakafugira eggwanga emyka 34.  Ono era avunaaniddwa omusango omulala ogw’okusangibwa n’emmundu mu ngeri emenya amateeka.  Waakudda nga March 30 okusomerwa emisango gye.

headline: Abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi 6 bagudde ku kabenje e Mukono
text: Kyaggwe Enkambi ya NUP eyakedde mu ssaza Kyaggwe okunoonyeza abakwatidde bbendera ku bwapulezidenti Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, eguddemu ekyekango oluvannyuma lw’abawagizi baabwe mukaaga okufuna akabenje ne baddusibwa mu ddwaliro nga bazirise. Abamu ku bantu abafunye ebisago nga bayambibwa Bano 6 ababadde batambulira mu mmotoka kika kya Super Custom, baddusiddwa mu ddwaliro e Kawolo nga bali mu mbeera mbi. Okusinziira ku beerabiddeko , emmotoka eno egudde mu bikajjo by’e Nagojje, poliisi ng’egezaako okulemesa Kyagulanyi okuyingira ttawuni y’e Mayangayanga, Nantaba ne Kayanja. Omu ku bafunye ebisago, Bernard Ssempaka, ategeezezza nti bana ku bannaabwe bali mu mbeera mbi era nga bazirise. Ate omu ku basimattuse akabenje kano, era mukyala w’akutte bbendera ya NUP ku bubaka bwa Nakifuma mu palamenti, Margret Ssimbwa, ategeezezza nti omugoba emmotoka emulemeredde oluvannyuma lwa poliisi okubakubamu ttiyaggaasi nga babalemesa okugoberera Kyagulanyi. Mu kaseera kano ebyentambula bisannyaladde ku luguudo lwa Kampala- Jinja oluvannyuma lwa poliisi okusuula emisanvu mu bibuga ebyenjawulo ng’etangira abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi okumwegattako mu bitundu by’e Mukono.

headline: Mwenyigire mu bukulembeze bw’eggwanga – Omulangira Nakibinge
text: Omulangira Kassim Nakibinge asabye bannayuganda okwenyigira mu by’obufuzi by’eggwanga era basalewo bulungi nga okulonda kutuuse. “Mwenyigire mu nsonga z’obukulembeze bw’ eggwanga era muwe abeesimbyewo bonna omukisa okubawuliriza n’oluvanyuma mukole okusalawo okutuufu,” Nakibinge bweyategeezezza. Bino yabyogeredde Kibuli bwabadde asisinkanye Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi ne ttiimu ye ku Lwokuna. Ono yasiimye Kyagulanyi ne banna NUP okukunga abavubuka beenyigire mu by’obukulembeze bw’eggwanga. Nakibinge yabasabye okugenda mu maaso n’enjiri eno kasita ebeera nga ya mirembe nga tebamenya mateeka wadde okukola efujjo. Omulangira yalabudde poliisi okukomya ebikolwa eby’efujjo nga egaana abakulembeze okwogerera ku leediyo ezimu ekintu ekitali kituufu. Ku kirwadde ki COVID19, Omulangira yasabye abantu okwekuuma ekirwadde kino kubanga gyekiri. Yabasabye okwewala okuwuudisibwa bannabyabufuzi abamu abatagoberera mateeka gateekebwawo okulaba nga kitangira. Ttiimu Kyagulanyi gyeyagenze nayo okusisinkana Omulangira Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi, yasiimye omulangira Nakibinge olw’okubazzaamu amaanyi era nategeeza nti bagenze kweyanjula nga NUP era bamulage ebigendererwa byabwe nga ekibiina. E Kibuli Kyagulanyi yawerekeddwako bannakibiina ki NUP okwabadde, Omumyuka wa pulezidenti w’ekibiina mu Buganda Mathias Mpuuga, Latif Ssebagala, Omwogezi w’ekibiina Joel Ssenyonyi ne Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP David Lewis Rubangoya.

headline: Okusibira Kyagulanyi ewaka kyamulemesa okukung’aanya obujulizi  – Bannamateeka ba NUP
text: Kampala Bannamateeka abawolereza munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert kyagulanyi Ssentamu, basabye kkooti ensukkulumu ebakkirize babeeko obujulizi obupya bwe bawaayo wakati mu kuwakanya obuwanguzi bwa Yoweri Kaguta Museveni mu kalulu ka 2021. Bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi nga beegeyaamu Bano abakulembeddwamu Medard Lubega Sseggona, bategeezezza abalamuzi ba kkooti eno abawera 9 nti oluvannyuma lw’okulonda Kyagulanyi yasibirwa mu maka ge ekintu ekyamulemesa okukung’aanya obujulizi okuwanirira omusango gwe. “ Oluvannyuma lw’okulonda, omuwaabi yaggalirwa ewaka era okusobola okuvaayo yalina kufuna kiragiro kya kkooti enkulu. Ono we yayimbulirwa obudde bwali butambudde ng’asigazza ennaku ttaano zokka mwe yalina okukung’aanyiza obujulizi era kino kyamutaataganya.” Omubaka Sseggona bw’ategeezezza kkooti. Ono asinzidde wano n’asaba kkooti eno ekkirize okusaba kwabwe batereeze mu mpaaba gye bassaayo, kisobozese kkooti okutunula obulungi mu nsonga zino era n’okuteekawo obwenkanya mu kalulu k’obwapulezidenti aka 2021. “Osobola otya okwekenneenya ebyali mu kalulu ng’obujulizi obumu obuleseeyo nga nabwo kkooti yandisobodde okubutunulamu? Engeri yokka gye tusobola okuzuula amazima ku kalulu k’obwapulezidenti kwe kukkiriza okusaba kwaffe.” Sseggona bw’agasseeko. Aba NUP bagamba nti kkooti bw’ebakkiriza ne baleeta obujulizi obupya, tekiganyula bo bokka naye ne ggwanga lyonna kuba ensonga eno ekwata ku bukulembeze bwa ggwanga. Abalamuzi ba kkooti eno nga bakulembeddwa Ssaabalamuzi Alphonse Owiny Dollo baakudda ku ssaawa 10 okuwa ensala yaabwe ku musango guno.

headline: Ttiyaggasi anyoose ku kitebe kya FDC
text: Poliisi ng’efuuyira Dr Besigye amazzi ku Mmande  Omukka ogubalagala gunyoose ku kitebe ky’ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzi ekya Forum for Democratic Change [FDC] nga poliisi yeezooba n’abakazi ababadde bagala okutambula okwolerekera ekitebe kya poliisi ekikulu mu Kampala. Abakazi ba FDC ababadde nga 30 babadde bakutte ebipande nga biraga okwemulugunya kwabwe eri poliisi olw’okukozesa obukambwe obusukiridde ku Bbalaza ya wiiki eno nga bakwata eyali Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina kino Dr Kizza Besigye. Poliisi yafuuyira Besigye amazzi okuva mu kimotokota kyayo agaali gamuwanudde ku mmotokaye waggulu gyeyali ng’awuubira kubantu. Era poliisi yakuba amukka ogubalagala mu bantu babulijjo ekyaleetawo akajagalalo mukabuga ke Kireka ne Banda. Abakazi bano babadde batwala kiwandiiko kyabwe eri poliisi wamu ne palamenti. Mukavuvungano kano abakazi abawerako bakwatiddwa nebatwalibwa ku poliisi ez’enjawulo.

headline: 2 bafiiridde mu kabenje, Amuriat ayimirizza kampeyini ze
text: Nebbi Eyeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti ku kkaadi ya FDC, Patrick Amuriat, ayimirizza z’okunoonya akalulu oluvannyuma lw’emmotoka ye ebaddeko ebidongo, okugwa ku kabenje n’etta abantu babiri ate abalala ne bagendera ku bisago mu bitundu by’e Pakwach. Emmotoka eyatuze bannakibiina kya FDC “Kano akaseera kazibu gye tuli era olw’ensonga eyo tusazeewo okuyimiriza mu kunoonya akalulu.” Amuriat bw’ategeezezza. Akabenje kano kagudde ku kyalo Kimor, mu ttawuni kkanso y’e Panyamur mu disitulikiti y’e Pakwach oluvannyuma lw’emmotoka nnamba UBB 856W okulemerera omugoba waayo ne yeefuula. Amuriat yasookedde Nebbi ku makya ga leero Olwokubiri nga mu ttuntu abadde alina okubeera mu disitulikiti y’e Nebbi gy’anava ayolekere ebitundu bya Bunyoro ku Lwokusatu. Abafunye ebisago batwalibwa mu ddwaliro lya Panyamur Health Centre ne Angal Hospital erisangibwa e Nebbi. Bw’abadde e Nebbi, Amuriat ajjukizza abantu nti olutalo lw’okununula Uganda lunaatera okuggwa era ng’abalwanyi balina okugumira obulumi obusinga ku ebyo gavumenti ya Pulezidenti Museveni bye bayisizzaamu. Abafudde bategerekese nga Hellen abadde akwatidde FDC bbendera ku bwakkansala bw’ekibuga kya Nebbi wamu ne Kkansala aliko Zulaika era ng’ono abadde omu ku bakunzi b’ekibiina mu kitundu kino. Abafunye ebisago kuliko; akulira abavubuka ba FDC e Nebbi; Walter, Grace Owonda n’abalala.

headline: ‘ Ebya Kenya Tebinaggwa……………’ Martha Karua alabudde ku  kulangirirwa  kwa Ruto
text: Ab’omukago gwa Amizio La Umoja nga bakuliddwamu abadde yeesimbyewo ne Raila Odinga nga omumyuka wa Pulezidenti, Martha Karua awakanyiza okulondebwa kwa William Ruto ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu akalangiriddwa olw’eggulo lwa leero. Karua obubaka buno abutadde ku mutimbagano gwe nasaba abawagizi babwe obutaggwamu maanyi wakati mu b’oludda lwa Odinga okukakasa nti akalulu kano kabaddemu ebirumira. Bw’abadde tanalangirira bivudde mukulonda, ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda aka IEBC, Wafula Chebukati abadde akulira ttiimu ya Odinga ebadde erondoola akalulu kano, Saitabao Ole Kanchuri ategeezezza nti omutimbagano gw’ Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda gwabadde gwayingiddwamu nga ebibadde bigenda okulangirirwa si byebyo ebituufu. Bw’abadde ayogerera e Bomas ewabadde wagenda okulangirirwa akalulu kano ku Mmande, Kanchuri ategeezezza nti waliwo abayingidde mu mutimbagano guno nebakyuusa akalulu. Okusinziira ku tteeka omuntu yenna awakanya ebivudde mu kalulu kano alina okukikola mu nnaku 7 nga bimaze okulangirirwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda era kkooti ensukkulumu okwemulugunya kuno eba erina okukuwulira mu nnaku 14 neewa ensala yaayo.

headline: Bobi Wine alabudde okuddukira mu kkooti y’abantu singa tufuna bwenkanya mu kkooti ensukkulumu
text: Kampala Eyavuganyizza ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine atiisizatiisiza okuggyayo omusango mw’akanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Yoweri Museveni addukire mu kkooti y’abantu singa tafuna bwenkanya mu kkooti ensukkulumu. Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu  Kyagulanyi ategeezezza nti kkooti ensukkulumu okugaana obujulizi bwabwe teyabadde ya bwenkanya ate nga n’abalamuzi basussizza okulaga kyekubiira kuba balina enkolagana ey’enjawulo ne Museveni.  Bobi Wine ategeezezza bannamawulire mu Kampala olwaleero nti, abasatu ku balamuzi 9 abali mu musango gwe, ayagala baguveemu kuba balina kyekubiira. Bano kuliko; Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo, Mike Chibita awamu ne Ezekiel Muhanguzi. Kyagulanyi alumirizza Ssaabalamuzi aliko okubeera munnamateeka wa Museveni mu musango gw’ebyokulonda Dr. Kiiza Besigye mwe yali awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwe mu 2001 ate era n’abeerako ne Minisita mu gavumenti ye. “Ssaabalamuzi ali mu musango gwaffe y’omu yalina okusaba okw’enjawulo kw’asaba Museveni nga Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, tulowooza nti tasobola kubeera mwenkanya gye tuli.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Agattako nti Omulamuzi Chibita yaliko omuwandiisi mu woofiisi ya Pulezidenti Museveni ate ye Muhanguzi wa luganda ne Minisita Elly Tumwine. Kyagulanyi atabukidde kkooti olw’okumulemesa okukola ennongoosereza mu musango gwe wamu n’okugaana obujulizi bwe. Agamba nti byonna babikola olw’okubulwa obwetengerera kwa kkooti eno era byonna bikolwa kusanyusa Pulezidenti Museveni. Bobi Wine agamba nti tebagenda mu kkooti eno nga basuubira okufuna obwenkanya naye baayagala ensi erabe kyekubiira ali mu kkooti eno n’alabula nti singa tafuna bwenkanya waakuddukira mu kkooti y’abantu basalewo. Ono era avumiridde ekiwamba bantu ekigenda mu maaso wamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo abazze battibwa okuli munnamawulire Hadad Mubiru wamu n’akulira aba boodabooda e Ssemuto nga bano balangibwa kubeera na nkolagana naye. Aweze okwongera okulwanirira abakwate omuli ne banne abavunaanibwa mu kkooti y’amagye n’ategeeza nti bano n’emisango gye bavunaanibwa okusinziira ku mpaaba bagiddiza mu kaseera we baali abasibe mu kkomera e Masaka, ekintu ekitasoboka.

headline: Kyagulanyi Poliisi emukutte
text: Luuka Eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, akwatiddwa e Luuka bw’abadde atandika okunoonya akalulu mu kitundu kino. Kyagulanyi nga atereddwa mu mmotoka ya Poliisi Tekitegeerekese nsonga ki ekwasizza Kyagulanyi wadde ng’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kabadde kaakavaayo okutegeeza nti kawagira ekya poliisi okukozesa amaanyi okugubulula abamenya ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. Abalala abakwatiddwa wamu ne Kyagulanyi kuliko bannakibiina kya NUP ne bannamawulire ababadde batambula awamu ne Bobi Wine, poliisi eyazizza emmotoka zaabwe wabula nga tekimanyise kiki kye babadde banoonya, wakati mu kukuba ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi mu bawagizi ba Kyagulanyi. Bobi Wine atwaliddwa mu kifo ekitannaba kutegeerekeka wabula nga waliwo munnamawulire afuuyiddwa kaamulali mu maaso era atwaliddwa mu ddwaliro ng’ali mu mbeera mbi. Kyagulanyi abadde alina okubeera mu disitulikiti y’e Luuka, Buyende ne Kamuli olunaku lwaleero. Ebirala tubireeta.

headline: Palamenti ekakasizza Jessica Alupo ku ky’obumumyuka bwa Pulezidenti
text: Kampala Palamenti y’eggwanga enkya ya leero ku Mmande ekakasizza okulondebwa Jessica Alupo ng’omumyuka wa Pulezidenti. Ekiteeso ky’okukakasa omubaka omukyala wa Katakwi, Jessica Alupo kyaleeteddwa omubaka wa Ruhinda North, Thomas Tayebwa. Okuyitamu kwa Alupo kwalangiriddwa omumyuka wa Sipiika Anita Among oluvannyuma lw’ababaka bonna ababaddewo okumusemba era omubaka omu yekka y’akiwakanyizza. Oluvannyuma lw’okuyitamu, Alupo yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okumuwa omukisa okuweereza mu kifo kino era ne yeeyama obuvunaanyizibwa obumuweereddwa okubukola n’amaanyi ge gonna. Kati Alupo y’azze mu bigere bya Edward Kiwanuka Ssekandi era ye mukyala owookubiri okutuula mu kifo kino ng’eyasooka ye Specioza Wandera Kazibwe. Alupo ng’ono musomesa mutendeke, yayingira mu by’obufuzi mu 2001 ate mu 2006 n’avuganya ku ky’Omubaka ku kkaadi ya NRM era n’awangula. Mu 2009 yalondebwa nga Minisita omubeezi ow’ensonga z’abavubuka n’abaana. Mu 2011 yaddamu okulondebwa ng’omubaka era ku kabineeti eyaddako n’afuulibwa Minisita omujjuvu ow’ebyenjigiriza n’adda mu bigere bya Namirembe Bitamazire. Wiiki ewedde yalondeddwa okubeera omumyuka wa Pulezidenti. Alupo muyivu ng’alina ddiguli mu by’obufuzi n’ennimi era ne ddipulooma mu nkulembera y’abantu okuva mu Makerere University. Ono alina ddiguli eyookubiri mu nkolagana z’amawanga ne ddipulooma endala mu nkulembera y’abantu okuva e Makerere.

headline: Anaavuganya ku bwa Sipiika tujja mulondera Kyankwanzi – Nampala Nankabirwa
text: Nnampala wa gavumenti era Omubaka Ruth Nankabirwa, ategeezezza olunaku lwaleero nti anaakwatira ekibiina kya NRM bbendera ku bifo okuli ekya Sipiika n’omumyuka we, bajja kubalondera Kyankwanzi. Nampala wa gavumenti, Ruth Nankabirwa  Bino Nankabirwa abyogeredde mu nsisinkano gy’abaddemu ne bannamawulire abagasakira mu Palamenti. Nankabirwa ategeezezza nti olukiiko olufuzi olw’ekibiina olumanyiddwa nga CEC lugenda kutuula okulaba gwe lunaalondawo okukwata bbendera. Enkalu okusinga ziri ku kifo kya Sipiika nga aliko Rebecca Kadaga agenda kuvuganya n’abadde omumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah okulaba anaakubiriza Palamenti y’e 11. Omubaka Nankabirwa agamba nti guno si gwe mulundi ogugenda okusooka naye enkola bw’etyo bw’ebadde nga bannakibiina bonna abeegwanyiza okufuuka basipiika, amannya gaabwe gaweerezebwa mu CEC, abakulu ne balondawo agwanidde. Ono ategeezezza nti singa banaalemwa okukkaanya ku ensonga y’ani agwanidde okwesimbawo ku babiri bano bajja kudda bategeeze Palamenti ku oyo ekibiina gwe kironze. Alabudde oyo yenna asuubira okujeemera ekibiina obutakemebwa kwesimbawo ku lulwe. W’osomera bino ng’olwokaano lukyalimu Sipiika Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga, omumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah ne Munnakibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda. Ebbugumu eryamaanyi liri wakati wa Kadaga ne Oulanyah era buli ludda luwuliddwa nga lwogerera lunnaalwo amafuukuule.

headline: Eby’okuwamba abantu n’okubatulugunya tusaba bikome – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwa Buganda baagala ebikolwa eby’okuwamba abantu n’okubatulugunya bikomezebwa mu bwangu kuba bino bigikyayisa era nga bisobola bulungi okugisuula. Katikkiro Mayiga n’abamu ku bakulembeze ba BYC abayiseemu “Obwakabaka bwa Buganda busaba abakulu mu gavumenti okumalawo obunkenke, tubasaba okuwamba abantu, okubakuumira mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa n’okubatulugunya bikomezebwe.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Katikkiro Mayiga okulaga obwennyamivu abadde asisinkanye abavubuka ba Buganda Youth Council abaawangula ebifo eby’enjawulo mu nsisinkano ebadde mu bimuli bya Bulange e Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga awanjagidde abakulu okumanya nti abalabe baayo si bantu bagivuganya ng’abasiika Capati naye abo abagikyayisa abantu. “Omuntu ayagala okusuula gavumenti y’oyo akola ebikolwa ebikyayisa gavumenti. Okuwamba abantu ne baggalirwa mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa, okubonyaabonya abakwatiddwa ne batuuka n’okubatta, omwana Ssegawa bamuggyeemu enjala oba okubookya ppaasi, ebikolwa eby’engeri eyo bikyayisa gavumenti. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ono alaze eby’okulabirako ku basajja ba Idi Amin ne Obote abawambanga abantu wabula kino kyanafuya gavumenti zino era ne zigwa. Kamalabyonna agamba nti abatambulira mu mmotoka z’ekika kya ‘Drone’ balabe ba gavumenti era baagala eveeko. “Si buli lw’ovuganya gavumenti nti ogiggyako naye buli lw’ogikyayisa oba ogireetera okugwa.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Owek. Mayiga asabye abalowoozebwa okubeera n’emisango basooke kunoonyezebwako era bakwatibwe mu ngeri eteeka ekitiibwa mu ddembe lyabwe. Bano Katikkiro Mayiga abasibidde entanda bulijjo obutatiirira Ssaabasajja Kabaka era bwe wabaawo ensonga yonna badde embuga basobole okulambikibwa. Ate ye Minisita w’obuwangwa n’ennono, David Kyewalabye Male, agambye nti ye ne Minisita Ssekabembe beetikka omulimu okukulembera abavubuka bano n’okubalaga ekkubo. Ono asiimye abavubuka olw’okubeera abamalirivu ne bavaayo okukiikirira abantu baabwe. “Bano basobodde okulaga eggwanga nti abantu ba Buganda basobola okubeesiga ne babateeka mu by’obukulembeze nga tewali kye babawadde.” Owek. Kyewalabye bw’agambye. Ye omubaka omulonde owa Nakaseke Central era y’abadde omukubiriza w’olukiiko lw’abavubuka Ttabamiruka, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya, agambye nti olutabaalo terubadde lwange naye olw’amaanyi g’abantu basobodde okuwangula. “Tuwera mu maaso go, okulwanirira ekyo abantu kye batulabyemu okukituukiriza naye nga mu byonna z’ensonga za Buganda Ssemasonga ettaano era ensonga enkulu mu zino y’ensonga ya Federo.” Omubaka Ssebunnya bw’asuubizza. Abalala abakomyewo okuwoza olutabaalo kuliko; Bukenya Farok Sansabula, Ssemanda Mathias, Solome Nangooba, Mwagalanyi Ali mudde, Ssemindi Salim, Kibira Aloysious, Kamuli Joseph, Namboowa Rashida awamu n’abalala.

headline: Omuloodi Lukwago aweze okulwanyisa bamafiya n’ ekibbattaka
text: Wakaliga Loodimeeya wa Kampala Erias Lukwago aweze okulwanyisa ekibbattaka mu bitundu bya Kampala ebyenjawulo wamu ne bamafiya abaagala okumalako bannakampala eddembe lyabwe. Omuloodi Erias Lukwago atongozza kampeyini ze      Bino Lukwago yabyogeredde mu makaage e Wakaliga ku Lwokusatu bwabadde atongoza kampeyini z’okuddamu okuvuganya ku bukulu buno nga ku murundi guno ali ku kkaadi ya FDC. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Meeya wa Lubaga Owek. Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo, omwogezi wa FDC Ssemujju Nganda wamu n’abakungu abalala bangi. Lukwago alaze byagenda okutandikirako okukola singa addamu okulondebwa ku bukulu buno nga wakulaba nti bannakampala basigaza eddembe lyabwe. Omuloodi Lukwago yasuubizza okulwanyisa obuli bw’enguzi, okukozesa obubi ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo wamu n’okulwanyisa bamafiya abaagala okweddiza ekibuga. Ku murundi guno, Lukwago agenda kuvuganya n’Omuyimbi Joseph Mayanja amanyiddwa nga Chameleone, Latif Ssebagala, Beatrice Kayanja ne Daniel Kazibwe amanyiddwa nga Raggae Dee. Lukwago ekifo kino eky’Omuloodi akibaddemu okuva mu 2011 era nga okusooka yawangulira ku kkaadi ya Democratic Party (DP), wadde yamala nacankalana n’obukulembeze bwa Norbert Mao gwalumiriza okutambuza obubi ekibiina.

headline: Pulezidenti wa Chad afiiridde mu kulwanagana n’abayeekera
text: Pulezidenti wa Chad abadde yaakalondebwa ku kisanja ekyomukaaga, Idriss Déby Itno (68) afudde. Okusinziira ku magye ga Chad, Pulezidenti Idriss Deby afudde oluvannyuma lw’okufuna ebiwundu ebyamaanyi bwe yabadde akulembeddemu basajja be okulwanyisa abayeekera.  Bino we bijjidde ng’amagye ga Chad gali mu kwalagana n’abayeekera abagezaako okulumba ekibuga ekikulu N’Djamena. Omwogezi w’amagye,  Gen. Azem Bermandoa Agouna, bw’abadde alangirira okufa kwa Deby ategeezezza nti ono okufa yabadde alwanirira ekitiibwa ky’eggwanga lye ku nsalo ya Chad n’eggwanga lya Libya. Deby abadde yaakalondebwa ku kisanja ekyomukaaga mu kalulu akaabaddewo nga 11-April era abadde yaakamala mu buyinza emyaka 30 malamba oluvannyuma lw’okuwamba obuyinza mu 1990.  Okusinziira ku bibadde bisuubirwa okulangirirwa, Deby akalulu yakawangulidde ku bitundu 80 ku buli 100. W’osomera bino nga Palamenti ne gavumenti bisattuluddwa era ne walondebwawo akakiiko k’amagye akagenda okukulembera eggwanga lino okumala emyezi 18 n’oluvannyuma wategekebwewo okulonda.  Omukutu gwa AFP gutegeezezza nti  bannamagye balonze mutabani we, General Mahamat Idriss Deby Itno,  okudda mu bigere bya kitaawe ng’akulira akakiiko k’amagye akagenda okukulembera eggwanga eryo.

headline: DP e Masaka basobeddwa ku by’okuwagira Mao, abalonzi baagala Bobi Wine
text: Masaka Bannakibiina kya Democratic Party (DP) mu ttundutundu lya Masaka basobeddwa ku by’okuwagira Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ku bwapulezidenti nga bagamba nti, baagala kuwagira Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu. Ssenkaggale Nobert Mao Mao y’omu ku bantu abaavuddeyo okwewandiisa ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka bonna ak’omulundi guno wabula nga n’okukakasibwa e Kyambogo yagenda kikeerezi. Abakulembera ekibiina mu Masaka naddala ku mitendera egya wansi bakombye kw’erima nga bagamba nti tebasobola kunoonyeza Mao kalulu kuba bakkiriziganya dda okuwagira Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine). Omumyuka wa ssentebe wa DP e Kingo mu Lwengo, Charles Fidel Kaboggoza, y’omu ku bagaanye okuwagira Mao. Kaboggoza yategeezezza nti ng’ekibiina baasalawo okuwagira Kyagulanyi ng’okukyusa bawagire Mao kati, kibeera kibuzaabuza abalonzi era nga nabo ng’abakulembeze bajja kulabika ng’abatalina mugongo. Ye ssentebe w’ekibiina e Kiteredde mu Masaka, Polly Kafeero, annyonnyodde nti tebalaba nsonga lwaki ekibiina kisimbawo omuntu mu ngeri y’okupapirira. Kafeero agamba nti amaanyi ekibiina kye gaagala okuteeka mu kunoonya akalulu, bagateeke mu kuzimba ekibiina wamu n’okuziyiza bammemba okukyabuulira. Omwogezi wa DP mu Bukomansimbi, Muhammad Kigongo Matovu, yakakasizza nti bakyasanze obuzibu okumatiza bannakibiina okuwagira Ssenkaggale Nobert Mao ku bwapulezidenti. Kigongo wabula yatabukidde bannakibiina kya NUP abaava mu DP olw’okwwogerera ekibiina amafuukuule naye basaba okukimanya nti DP ye yaabwe. Ebikonge bya DP mu Masaka okuli; omubaka Mary Babirye Kabanda, Jude Mbabali, nabyo byegasse ku bantu okuwagira Kyagulanyi ne balekawo Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina, Nobert Mao.

headline: Bobi Wine bamukutte agezaako okwegugunga
text: Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine akwatiddwa bw’abadde yeegugunga okuwakanya eky’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda okuwamba abantu be oluvannyuma lw’akalulu akaakubwa nga Januray 14, 2021. Kyagulanyi n’abamu ku babaka babadde nabo nga bagobagana ne poliisi  Kyagulanyi nga yakwata kyakubiri mu kalulu akaawangulwa Pulezidenti Museveni, yakwatiddwa ku Mmande bwe yabadde agezaako okugenda ku City Square ne bannakibiina okuli ababaka abalonde ng’ayagala Gavumenti eyimbule abantu bagamba nti batulugunyiziddwa byansusso. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Enanga, yakakasizza okukwatibwa Kyagulanyi wamu n’abantu abalala abaabadde bakubye olukung’aana olutali mu mateeka.  Okusinziira ku Enanga, Kyagulanyi yadiziddwayo mu maka ge era n’asaba bannayuganda obutamugoberera ku byaliko. Bino we bijjidde nga Pulezidenti Museveni yaakamala okulabula ab’oludda oluvuganya abategeka okumulemesa okulayira nti tebageza kuba amagye ne poliisi gali bulindaala okubang’anga. “Bategeka okulemesa okulayira kwa Pulezidenti naye tebajja kumalako. Bategeke ebintu ebiwerako omuli okutta abantu ku ludda oluvuganya olwo bagambe nti Gavumenti y’ebasse.” Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yannyonnyodde. Museveni era agamba nti ekibiina kya Kyagulanyi ekya NUP kyabba akalulu wadde yali bwe yali ayogerako eri ensi oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula akalulu yalaga nti akalulu k’omulundi guno kayingira mu byafaayo ng’akasinga okubaamu amazima n’obwenkanya. Museveni yalayidde n’agamba nti abo bonna okuli poliisi n’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda abaayamba Kyagulanyi okubba akalulu bagenda kuvunaanibwa era bagobwe ne ku mirimu. Wadde Kyagulanyi akyakunga abantu okuvaayo beegugunge mu mirembe, Minisita w’ebyokwerinda Gen. Elly Tumwine yamulabudde obutagezaako kuba yeekwese mu kwegugung okw’emirembe naye ng’agenderera kutabangula ggwanga. Buli lukya poliisi n’ebitongole ebirala eby’okwerinda byongera amaanyi mu kulawuna enguudo za Kampala era n’abamu ku bawagizi ba Kyagulanyi bakwatiddwa ku bigambibwa nti baagala kutabangula mirembe.

headline: Tugenda kukunga ebitundu ebirala bituwagire ku nsonga ya Mayiro – Omubaka Kanyike
text: Omubaka wa Palamenti akiikirira Bukoto East, Evans Kanyike ategeezezza nti bagenda kukunga abantu okuva mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebirala okubawagira ku nsonga ya mayiro okusigala singa gavumenti eremerako neyagala okuliggyawo. Bino Kanyike yabyogeredde ku kyalo Gulama mu kudduukirira abalonzi be n’ensigo za kasooli awamu n’ebijjanjalo ebibalirirwamu obukadde bwa silingi obuwerera ddala 25 okubayamba okwegobako enjala n’okweggya mu bwavu. Kanyike abantu ba Buganda yabasabye okubeera obumu era bagume kuba bbo nga ababaka abava mu Buganda engabo bagilumisizza mannyo nga nebwekiba kyetaaga kwogereza bannabwe abava mu bwakabaka obulala babeegatteko bagenda kukikola. Ono yannyonnyodde nga bwebatandise edda okwogerezeganya n’ababaka abalala okusobola okusuuza gavumenti ettaka lya Buganda ne bannansi lyeyagala okutwala kuba kimenya mateeka. Okusinziira ku Kanyike, amateeka agaliwo mu kiseera kino gamala nga singa buli kitongole kya gavumenti ekikola ku ttaka kituukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwakyo emivuyo ku ttaka gisobolera ddala okukendeera. Ku nsonga y’ensigo eziweereddwayo, Kanyike ategeezezza nti abantu mu kitundu kino babadde bubi kuba byonna byebalina mu sizoni ewedde byafa nga bano abasuubizza n’okubawa ebigimusa awamu ne bomba ezifuuyira okubanguyiza embeera. Mungeri yemu yasinzidde wano nawabula abavubuka okukomya obwa ssemugayavu nga baagala okusabiriza n’okulindanga okuweebwa naye batandiike okulunda n’okulima kuba mwemuli ssente. Ye ssentebe wa disitukiti ye Masaka, Andereya Lukyamuzi Batemyetto, yalabudde abatuuze abakyalina emmere obutagyetundako kuba basuubira enjala mu mwezi oguwedde. Abatuuze basiimye Kanyike olw’okubadduukirira n’ensigo era nebamusuubizza okuzikozesa obulungi.

headline: Ab’e Ssembabule balumirizza ab’ebyokwerinda okubatulugunya
text: Bya Kintu Noah Ssembabule Abatuuze mu bitundu eby’enjawulo ebikola disitulikiti ya Ssembabule, balaajanidde ab’obuyinza okubayamba ku b’ebyokwerinda abasusse okubatulugunya mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda, olw’okwawukanya endowooza mu by’obufuzi. Bano bino baabyogeredde mu lukiiko olwakubiddwa ab’ekitongole kya Centre for Conflicts Solution mu ttawuni kkanso y’e Ssembabule ku Cristo Center. Olukung’aana luno olwabaddemu ab’ebyokwerinda, abeesimbyewo wamu n’abalonzi, lwagendereddwamu okulondoola okulonda bwe kutambula mu kitundu kino, n’okulaba awali ekizibu. Wano munnakibiina kya NUP, Ibrahim Mpuuga we yasinzidde n’ategeeza nti bo ng’aba NUP mu kitundu kino, batulugunyizibwa ab’ebyokwerinda, ekiraga kyekubiira ate nga balina okuweereza bannayuganda bonna. Abamu ku baabadde mu lukiiko bategeezezza ng’abakulu mu kitundu kino, bwe bakozesa emmundu n’abapoliisi okulagira abatuuze okubaako abantu be bawagira, ekintu ekikyamu. Omutuuze Happy Kafiriyooko yagambye nti wadde baatwala emisango ku poliisi olw’abantu abaabatulugunya mu kamyufu ka NRM, naye tewali kyakolebwa era nga batya nti ebikolwa bino, biyinza okuddamu mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Omu ku bavuganya mu kitundu kino, Kisekka, teyalumye mu bigambo bye bwe yategeezezza nti Minisita Sam Kuteesa ne poliisi be batabudde buli kimu mu kitundu kino. Kisekka yannyonnyodde nti bangi ku bantu mu kitundu kino basibiddwa era nti yawandiikidde Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi, Martin Okoth Ochola, nga yeemulugunya ku nsonga eno. Wabula bino akulira poliisi y’e Ssembabule, Luka Mbusa, yabiwakanyizza n’ategeeza nti tafunanga ku musango gwonna ng’omuntu yatulugunyiziddwa poliisi. Ku lw’abakozi mu Ssembabule, Pamera Kobutungi yasabye abantu mu kitundu kino okunyweza obumu kubanga buli omu yeetaaga munne. Omukungu Centre for Conflicts Solution, Patrick Bwire, yagambye nti ekyabaleese kwe kulaba nga batabaganya abantu bano era n’asuubiza okwongera emisomo mu kitundu kino, kitaase ku biyinza okuddirira. Omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Ssembabule, Nickson Kabuye, yeeyamye okufuba okulaba ng’ekitundu kino tekiddamu buvuyo bwa byakulonda mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Yasabye abali ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti, okuteekawo enkolagana ennungi n’abeebyokwerinda, kiyambe okunyweza emirembe mu kitundu kino.

headline: Omuloodi  Erias  Lukwago:  Ekisinde kya ‘Red Card’ kye kigenda okukomya Museveni
text: Omuloodi wa Kampala, Erias Lukwago era amyuka ssentebe w’ekisinde kyaPeople’s Front for Transition (PFT) kye batongozza, agamba nti kye kigenda okuggya PulezidentiMuseveni mu buyinza kuba kyanjawulo ku bisinde n’emikago ebizze bibeerawo. Ekisinde kino kikulemberwaDr. Kizza Besigye era nga kyaweereddwa omubalagwa ‘Red Card,’kyatongozeddwa wiiki ewedde ku woofiisi za JEEMA e Mmengo era kyegattiddwako ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi ebiwerako mu ggwanga. Abamu ku batunuulizi b’ebyobufuzi mu ggwanga bategeezezza nti guno mukago ng’emirala gyonna era tewali njawulo okuggyako okuwa bannayuganda essuubi eritaliiyo. Lukwagobwe yabaddeayogerako eri bannamawulire,ategeezezza nti ekisinde kino kyolekedde obuwanguzi era kyanjawulo ku bisinde ebirala. “Ebibaddewo gibadde mikago. Kati twogera ku kisinde ekigenda okuleetawo enkyukakyuka n’okuwa bannayuganda essuubi eritali lya kulonda kwokka nga tutandikiraku by’obufuzi ebiriwo ebitali bya bwenkanya n’oluvannyuma tutereeze eby’okulonda.” Lukwago bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Lukwago, eggwanga kati livugibwa na lyanyi lya mmundu era ekigendererwa ky’ekisinde kinokwe kulikomya, obuyinza busobole okukyuka kuba akalulu kalabika kalemeddwa. Ku ky’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) okubeera wabweru w’ekisinde kino, Lukwago agambye nti kino kya kaseera buseera naye basuubira mu maaso awo ebibiina byonna bigenda kubeegattako. Ono ayanirizza okukugabanya ebirowoozo ku kisinde kino ng’erimu ku makubo ag’okukomya obukulembeze bwa Pulezidenti Museveni, wabula n’alabula abo abalowooza nti bayinza okugusuula nti, basale malala.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga aggaddewo Oluwalo lwa 2022, nalaga obukulu bwa Federo ku kusoosowaza ebikulu eri Buganda
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti wadde Obwakabaka babulina era nga bwaddawo naye beetaaga enfuga ya Federo okusobola okusoosowaza ebyo eby’ensonga eri Buganda n’abantu baayo, enkulaakulana esobole okubaawo. Bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mengo bw’abadde aggalawo oluwalo lw’omwaka 2022 ku Lwokubiri. “Okuggyayo amakulu g’Obwakabaka kyekitwagaza enkola ya Federo kubanga etuwa enkyanya okusoosowaza byetulaba ng’ebikulu.
