Omulala alaba Luswayiri nti lwe lukulu naye ffe tulaba Luganda. Obuwangwa n’Ennono omulala tamanya bukulu bwabyo. Enkola eyo ey’okugabana obuyinza eya Federo etusobozesa okugabana ku nsimbi enkumu gavumenti zekung’aanya wano mu Buganda,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kino kyandibawadde omukisa okugabana nebakozesa ensimbi ezo okunyweza Nnamulondo n’okutumbula eby’enkulaakulana.  Ono annyonnyodde nti wadde Obwakabaka babulina naye tekwagirako nsimbi ezeetaagisa okubuyimirizaawo nalaga obukulu bw’okusigala nga bayiiya awamu n’okukola nga bwebagenda mu maaso n’okubanja. Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abantu ba Kabaka okunyikira okukola wakati nga balina okusoomozebwa okwenjawulo okusobola okutwala Buganda mu maaso. Ono annyonnyodde nti olw’abantu abewaayo okulwanirira Buganda abantu basobodde okuleeta Oluwalo lwa kawumbi kalamba mu mwaka 2022. Mukuumaddamula agumizza abantu be Kkooki okusigala ngabagumu nti ebigenda mu maask eyo tebibatiisa kubanga Kabaka bwaba nga yasobola okuzzaawo obwakabaka, ensonga ye Kkooki teyinza kulema. Kidiridde omukwanaganya wessaza lino okuwoza olutabaalo mu ssaza lino.  Minisita omubeezi owa Gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Joseph Kawuki asinzidde ku mukolo guno neyebaza abantu, amasomero abaleese oluwalo omwaka guno olubadde olwenjawulo olwamasaza agasituse mu kujjumbira enteekateeka eno. Ye Omukwanaganya w’essaza Kooki, Gertrude Nakalanzi Ssebugwawo agamba nti bakunywerere ku Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu mbeera yonna era tebajja kumutiiririra. Abakiise embuga kuliko; Amasaza g’ebweru erya North West Pacific , Home Connect Properties, Bannabitone, essaza Kkooki, Busujju naba Buganda Golf Association. Bano baleese Oluwalo lwa bukadde 113 okusobola okuwagira enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka.

headline: Ebyokwerinda binywezeddwa nga Kyagulanyi anoonya akalulu e Kalangala
text: Ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda biyungudde abawanvu n’abampi ne boolekera ekizinga ky’e Kalangala okunyweza eby’okwerinda wakati nga munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), anoonya akalulu akamuteeka mu ntebe ennene. Abamu ku bapoliisi nga balinnya okugenda e Kalangala Kyagulanyi yasinzidde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire e Kamwokya eggulo n’ategeeza nti waakuddamu okunoonya akalulu olwaleero e Kalangala oluvannyuma lw’okuyimiriza kkampeyini ze ng’awakanya eky’okutta omukuumi we Frank Ssenteza. Ebimotoka bya poliisi bigunduuza, bakuntumye awamu n’abapoliisi abawerako, bakedde kuteekebwa ku kidyeri kya MV Ssese okwolekera ekitundu kino. Waliwo ennyonyi erabiddwako ng’erawuna obwengula ku kizinga kino okwetegereza embeera. Kyagulanyi ku Lwokubiri yalangiridde nti agenda kwongera okukuba enkung’aana ze ne mu disitulikiti 12 aba kakiiko k’ebyokulonda gye bagaanye kkampeyini. “Ngenda kutuuka ku bawagizi bange mu ngeri yonna esoboka, mu buntu oba mu ngeri ya Ssaayansi.” Kyagulanyi bwe yalayidde. Okusinziira ku Ssaabawandiiisi wa NUP, Louis Lubongoya, Kyagulanyi leero agenda kubeera Kalangala ate enkya ku Lwokuna abeere e Mpigi ne Bukomansimbi.

headline: Museveni alagidde Muhakanizi  anoonyezebweko ku bya DGF
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’eggwanga, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, alagidde Minisita w’ebyensimbi Matia Kasaija wamu n’ebitongole ebirwanyisa obukenuzi okunoonyereza ku muteesiteesi omukulu mu Minisitule y’ebyensimbi, Keith Muhakanizi,wamu n’abalala, ku bya ssente za Democratic Governance Facility (DGF).  Bino biri mu bbaluwa Museveni gye yawandiikidde Minisita Matia Kasaija, akakiiko akalwanyisa enguzi aka Lt. Col. Edith Nakalema, Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti wamu n’ebitongole ebirala, Museveni mwe yalagidde nti kizibu okutegeera lwaki Muhakanizi yakkiriza ssente zino okusaasaanyizibwa wadde baali tebatuukirizza bukkwakulizo, ate nga wadde Minisitule y’ebyensimbi yagezaako okuwaayo omuntu atuule ku bboodi ya DGF, bano baakigaana nga bagamba nti tekyetaagisa. “Kisoboka kitya nti ensonga za bannayuganda eziri wano ate tebakkirizibwa kuzirondoola wabula okuziraba obulabi. Kuno si kuteeka ssente mu kkampuni ya bwannannyini, naye kuteeka ssente mu bibiina ebyenjawulo ebyagala okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’abagwira. Kyajja kitya era lwaki bakkiriza ekintu bwe kiti ekiteeka Uganda mu katyabaga era ne bikolebwa awatali kutegeeza ku Kabbineeti.” Ebbaluwa bw’egambye. Pulezidenti Museveni ategeezezza nti kino tasobola kukikkiriza era abo abalina kye bamanyi ku nsonga eno balina okubonerezebwa. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa eriko omukono gwa pulezidenti Museveni eyawandiikiddwa nga 2, 01, 2021, ono atadde ku nninga abakulu mu minisitule y’ebyensimbi bannyonnyole lwaki bakkiriza ssente eziwera obukadde bwa Pawundi 100 kiramba (mu za Uganda obuwumbi 500.8) okuyingira munda mu ggwanga nga Kabbineeti tezimanyiiko. “Nategeezeddwa nti Minisitule y’ebyensimbi ng’ekulirwa Omuteesiteesi omukulu, Keith Muhakanizi, baayingiza ssente eziwera obuwumbi bwa Pawundi 100 mu ngeri emenya amateeka nga zino zaali zaakulabirirwa mawanga g’ebweru awatali kwebuuza ku gavumenti ya Uganda.” Ebbaluwa ya Museveni bw’esomye. Museveni agamba nti ku nsimbi endala ezibadde zisaasaanyizibwa nga gavumenti ebaako n’omuntu azirondoola okuva mu gavumenti n’ekiteekawo obwerufu, ekintu ekitakoleddwa ku mulundi guno. Pulezidenti Museveni eyawulikise nga mukambwe mu bbaluwa gye yawandiikidde Minisita Kasaija, yagambye nti kyategeerekese nga obuwumbi 500.8 ku nsimbi z’ekitavvu kino, zaaweebwayo okutabangula emirembe n’okulwanyisa gavumenti nga beekwese mu kutumbula demokulasiya. Wabula aba Democratic Governance Facility (DGF) bagamba nti ekitavvu kino kyatondebwawo mu 2011 okulondoola obuvujjirizi bw’amawanga okuli; Austria, Denmark, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom n’omukago gwa Bulaaya. Ekitavvu kino era kyagendererwamu okukendeeza ku nsimbi ezisaasaanyizibwa okulondoola pulojekiti ez’enjawulo amawanga gano ge ziteekamu ssente kuba ezimu ku zino zibeera zifaanagana. Ensimbi zino zibadde zivujjirira emirimu gy’ebibiina by’obwannakyewa ebyenjawulo okuli ; Advocates Coalition for development and environment (ACODE), African Leadership Institute, Alliance for Campaign Finance Monitoring (ACFIM), ActionAid International Uganda ne African Centre for Media Excellence awamu n’ebirala. Bino we bijjidde nga Pulezidenti Museveni azze ategeeza mu kkampeyini nga bwe waliwo abantu abaagala okutabangula emirembe mu ggwanga nga bino byonna bikolebwa abagwira.

headline: FDC egaanye okwetaba mu lukung’aana lwa IPOD
text: Kampala Abakulembeze b’ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), bawandiikidde abakulembeze b’omukago ogutaba ebibiina by’obufuzi ebiri mu Palamenti ogwa Inter party Organisation for Dialogue (IPOD) ne kiwa ensonga lwaki tekigenda kwetaba mu lukung’aana lw’omukago guno ogubindabinda. Ssaabawandiisi wa FDC, Nandala Mafabi Ku Lwokutaano lwa Ssabbiiti eno, Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni era akulira ekibiina kya NRM asuubirwa okukubiriza olutuula lwa IPOD mu kiti kye ekya ssentebe wa NRM. Endagaano eyakolebwa mu mukago guno n’eteekebwako omukono ebibiina okuli; DP, FDC, JEEMA, NRM ne UPC, eragira omukago guno okutuula buli luvannyuma lwa myezi mukaaga. Ensisinkano y’omulundi guno yaakubeera ku kisaawe e Kololo wansi w’omulamwa ogugamba nti, “Okutabaganya eggwanga.” Mu bbaluwa aba FDC gye bawandiise ng’eriko omukono gwa Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino, Nathan Nandala Mafabi, yagambye nti bakyekenneenya ebyava mu kulonda kuba byalimu ebirumira. “Nga bwe mumanyi twakava mu kalulu akaavulugibwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga bayambibwako ebitongole by’okwerinda okuli amagye ne poliisi.” Nandala bwe yategeezezza. “Tutegeezeddwa nti mwagala kutegeka lukung’aana awatali kukkiriza bibiina kutuula munda mu byo kukkaanya ku ebyo ebirina okuteesebwako nga bwe kirina okubeera. Ffe tulowooza nti IPOD yandisoose kukuba ttooci mu byava mu kalulu ka 2021 kuba kaalimu vvulugu mungi.” Nandala bwe yagasseeko. Mafabi yannyonnyodde nti okusinziira ku kyamanyi, omukago gwa IPOD gutuula nga kkanso yaayo erina omukiise okuva mu buli kibiina, bamaze okukkaanya ku ebyo ebigenda okuteesebwako. “Ffe nga FDC tulina okusooka okwebuuza ku bakulu mu kibiina. Ekibiina ekyaffe si kya muntu omu, tulina okusooka okukkaanya ku nsonga. Tetujja kwetaba mu lukung’aana luno olutegekeddwa mu bwangu nga n’ebyo ebigenda okuteesebwako tetusoose bikkaanyako.” Mafabi bwe yalambuludde.

headline: Ab’omukago gwa Bulaaya basisinkanye Bobi Wine
text: Kampala Ababaka b’omukago gwa Bulaaya omwegattira amawanga agawera 11 basisinkanye abakulembeze b’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP)ne bateesa ku ebyo ebiri mu ggwanga. Omubaka Kyagulanyi ne b’Ambasada ba European Union Abakulembeze kubaddeko; Pulezidenti w’ekibiina, Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, Omumyuka wa Pulezidenti ow’amambuka Dr. Zedriga, Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP, Lewis Lubongoya, Omwogezi Joel Ssenyonyi awamu n’abalala. Bo b’Ambasada bavudde mu mawanga ageegattira mu mukago gwa Bulaaya ogwa European Union nga kuno kuliko akulira; European Union, owa Ireland, Sweden, France, Netherlands, Denmark, Belgium ne Italy. Bano ababasanze mu maka ga Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kino, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine e Magere leero ku Lwokuna, basoose mu kafubo akatakkiriziddwamu bannamawulire akakulungedde essaawa eziwerako, oluvannyuma boogeddeko eri bannamawulire. “Tubasisinkanye kuba bakimanyi nti NUP kye kimu ku bibiina ekyetaba mu nteekateeka ezigenda mu maaso. Abakulu bano basindikibwa ensi zaabwe ezirina enkolagana ne Uganda era balaze obwennyamivu ku biriwo mu ggwanga.” Ssenyonyi bw’ategeezezza. Omwogezi wa NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi, ategeezezza bannamawulire nti b’Ambasada bano balaze okutya olw’okuwamba abantu, okusibira abantu mu makomera n’engeri akalulu kano gye kaategekebwamu wamu n’ebyo ebizze bibeerawo. “Tubasabye obutafuuka bakyesirikidde ku biriwo, tetubasaba kuggya kukulembera ggwanga lyaffe nga Mwami Tibuhaburwa bw’abadde ategeeza.” Ssenyonyi annyonnyodde nti Mwami Tibuhaburwa talina kugenda mu maaso nakuwamba bantu n’abamu okuttibwa nga tewali amugambako nga twekwese mu ky’okubeera nti eggwanga Uganda lyetwala. Ono agamba nti basabye b’A0mbasada bano okusigala nga bawagira bannayuganda so si kibiina kyonna nga NUP oba ekirala naye bafeeyo ku ddembe lya bannayuganda eryongera okutyoboolwa buli kadde. Ate ekiwandiiko ekivudde mu mukago gwa European Union kitegeezezza nti ekigendererwa ky’ensisinkano eno kwongera kunyweza enkola ya demokulaasiya mu Uganda wamu n’okwongera okusaba bannakibiina kino okunywerera ku mirembe. Bano balabudde bannakibiina ku bubaka obusosola mu mawanga obuva mu bawagizi baabwe, basabye abakulembeze okwewala obukuubagano wamu n’okukuma mu bantu omuliro.

headline: Enguudo ziggaddwa nga Museveni atambula ku by’enguzi
text: Abantu nga batambula mu Kampala  Enguudo ezisinga obungi mu Kampala zigaddwa ng’omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yeegasse ku Bannayuganda abalala okutambula mukaweefube w’okulwanyisa enguzi. Kino kireeseewo akalippagano k’ebidduka okwetooloola Kampala n’emirirwano. Aduumira Poliisi y’ebidduka mu Kampala n’emirirwanao Norman Musinga, eggulo yalaze enguudo ezigenda okuggalibwa kyenkana nga zonna eziyingira ekibuga azitwaliddemu. Ekiwandiiko era kyasabye abantu ababadde bagenda okwetaba mu kutambula, obutajja n’ammotoka. Bannayuganda bangi nga bayita kumitimbagano gyabwe nga Facebook ne Twitter, beemulugunyizza olw’okutaatagana kwebaddeko. “Museveni alimba nti alwanyisa nguzi, ngate ye giriisi atambuza emmotokaye era nga gemafuta agatambuza Uganda. Batulemesezza okukola mbu batambula ebitaliimu makulu,” Bwatyo Andrew Mwenda, munnamawulire omuguundiizu mu Kampala bweyategeezezza. Ate ye Sayidi Lukenge gwetusanze mu kkalippagano e Wandegeya agambye nti yabadde teyakitegedde nti enguudo zigenda kuggalwa. “Poliisi yandibadde alangirira bukyali nti olwaleero teri kujja mu Kampala okusinga okutuggalira amakubo gwonna,” Lukenga bweyategeezezza.

headline: Nancy Kalembe yeewandiisizza, asoose kusasula obukadde 20
text: Kyambogo Nancy Kalembe Linda kyaddaaki awandiisikiddwa ng’omu ku bagenda okuvuganya mu kalulu ka bonna ak’omwaka 2021 mu kisaawe kya Kyambogo University, oluvannyuma lw’okusasula ssente obukadde 20 ezaabadde zimulemye okusasula olunaku lw’eggulo. Kalembe nga ali mu kuwandiisibwa Kalembe ne Katumba eggulo ku Mmande baalemeddwa okukakasibwa ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda olwobutabeera na lisiiti y’obukadde 20 ezibalagirwa okusasula mu mateeka. Linda naye olwaleero akakiiko kamukakasizza era ng’ono addiridde Katumba mu kuwandiisibwa. “Twekenneenyezza empapula za Nancy Kalembe Linda. Era Nze Omulamuzi Byabakama Mugenyi Simon nga nze nkuliddemu okuwandiisa abeesimbyewo, nangirira Nancy Klembe Linda ng’omu ku bantu abeesimbyewo ng’atuukirizza obukwakkulizo bwonna obwa ‘Presidential Elections Act,” Byabakama bw‘annyonnyodde. Kalembe oluvannyuma lw’okukakasibwa alangiridde nga bw’agenda okuteekawo obukulembeze obulungi era obwesigamye ku buntubulamu. Ono asuubizza okuwa bannayuganda ebiseera by’omu maaso ebirungi beerabire ebikadde. Ono ategeezezza nga bw’agenda okukwata ku nsonga y’ebyobulamu kubanga kino kye kimu ku bizibu ebimazeeko bannayuganda emirembe era akole nnyo okukyusa ebyenjigiriza bya Uganda, kisobole okukendeeza ku bbula ly’emirimu. Kalembe nga ye mukyala yekka ali mu lwokaano luno, asabye bannayuganda okumuwagira ku lw’ebiseera bya Uganda eby’omu maaso naddala eri abakyala n’abavubuka nga bano be basinga okunyigirizibwa embeera eriwo mu ggwanga.

headline: Abaduumizi ba poliisi balabuddwa okwerinda okwekalakaasa kwa NUP
text: Akulira ebikwekweto mu poliisi, AIGP Edward Ochom, alabudde abaduumizi ba poliisi mu bitundu eby’enjawulo naddala mu Kampala, okwerinda bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), abagambibwa okutandika okwegugunga olunaku lwaleero. Ezimu ku mmotoka poliisi zekozesa okugumbulula abekalakaasi Mu bubaka bwe obuweerezeddwa eri abaduumira poliisi mu bitundu eby’enjawulo, abasabye okubeera obulindaala okutandika olunaku lwaleero, olw’ebigambibwa nti waliwo ab’oludda oluvuganya abaagala okulemesa Pulezidenti Museveni okulayira. “Abakessi baffe bazudde olukwe lw’abamu ku b’oludda oluvuganya naddala aba NUP, bategeka okwekalakaasa. Ba RPC, DPC n’abaduumizi bonna abalala balagiddwa okwerinda era bafune buli kimu ekisobola okubayamba okufufuggaza abantu bano.” Ebbaluwa ya Ochom bw’esomye ku Mmande.Ochom yasabye yalagidde abaduumizi okulawuna ku bigere wamu n’emmotoka era basuule emisanvu ku nguudo ez’enjawulo naddala eziyingira mu kibuga. “Essaawa ya Kafyu erina okukwatibwa n’amaanyi era bakakase nti ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona bigobererwa.” Ochom bwe yategeezezza.Kino kiddiridde ebipande ebyenjawulo ebyatimbiddwa nga birabula okulemesa okulayira kwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni. Ebipande bino biriko ebigambo ebisoma nti , “Museveni Tajja Kulayira” era kigambibwa nti byatimbiddwa ab’ekisinde kya ‘Time is Now’ ekivuunulwa nti ‘Eno y’essaawa.’Ekisinde kino gyebuvuddeko kyategeezezza nti nga kikolagana n’ebibiina by’obwannakyewa wano n’ebweru, kigenda kukola buli kimu okulaba nti Museveni talayizibwa ku lunaku lwa May 12.Amyuka omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Owoyesigire eggulo ku Mmande yategeezezza nti bagenda kukola buli kimu okulaba nti tewabaawo atabula mirembe.

headline: Lubaga South : Bannamateeka ba Mukasa bawakanyizza obujulizi obupya obuleeteddwa Eugene Nassolo
text: Bannamateeka b’omubaka wa Lubaga South, Aloysious Mukasa bawakanyizza obujulizi obupya obuleeteddwa Eugene Nassolo ng’awakanya ebyava mu kalulu ka January 14. Omumbejja Nassolo nga ye yakwata ekyokubiri yaddukira mu kkooti ng’awakanya okulondebwa kwa Mukasa olw’ensonga nti yagulirira abalonzi ng’abawa obukookolo, ssabbuuni, ssukaali n’amatooke ate nga n’ebitabo bye tebiwera. Leero ku Lwokubiri bannamateeka ba Nassolo okuli;Caleb Alaka, Samuel Muyizzi ne Kenneth Paul Kakande bategeezezza kkooti nti balina obujulizi obulala bwa mirundi etaano bwe baagala okuwaayo mu musango guno. “Tulina obujulizi obulala bwa mirundi etaano era tusaba kkooti ebukkirize tusobole okubuwaako abawawaabirwa era twetegese okutwala okulung’amizibwa kwonna kkooti kw’eneetuwa.” Kakande bw’ategezeezza kkooti. Wabula kino bannamateeka ba Mukasa bakigaanyenga bagamba nti etteeka erifuga emisango gy’okulondebwa kw’ababaka terikkiriza kuwaayo bujulizi bulala kuba obudde bw’okuleeta obujulizi bwaggwaayo.  “Omuwaabi (Nassolo) yalina obudde obumala okuleeta obujulizi. Kati wayise emyezi 5 era kkooti tesobola kumukkiriza kubeera ng’akyusa obujulizi buli kadde.” Munnamateeka Justin Ssemuyaba bw’agambye. Munnamateeka w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Hamidu Lugoloobi akkaanyizza ne Ssemuyaba n’ategeeza nti waliwo ekiseera obujulizi mwe bulina okuleetebwa so si muntu w’abeera ayagalidde. Wabula bannamateeka ba Nassolo nga bakuliddwa CalebAlaka bategeezezza nti kye bakoze kwe kusabakkooti erabe oba enakkiriza obujulizi bwabwe era kiri eri mulamuzi okubukkiriza oba okubugaana kuba baakosebwa nnyo embeera y’omuggalo ne balemererwa okuwaayo obujulizi mu budde. OmulamuziWinifred Nabisinde omusango agwongeddeyo okuwa ensala ye ku bujulizi buno okukkirizibwa oba nedda.

headline: Amasasi ne ttiyaggaasi binyoose nga Kyagulanyi atabaala Busoga
text: Busoga Amasasi ne ttiyaggaasi byefuze kampeyini z’Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu era nga y’akutte bendera y’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform ku bwapulezidenti, bw’abadde atalaaga ebitundu bya Busoga okuwenja akalulu. Omubaka Kyagulanyi nga ayogerako eri abawagizi be mu Busoga Poliisi obwedda ekuba ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okugumbulula abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi naye nga bano naddala abavubuka bongera kugoberera mmotoka ye wakati mu kuyimba ennyimba ezimuwaana. Abavubuka bano Kyagulanyi abategeezezza nga bw’agenda okuwa bakadde baabwe essuubi eryaggwaawo olw’obukulembeze bwa Pulezidenti Museveni obubakuumidde mu bwavu. Kyagulanyi kampeyini e Busoga yazitandikidde mu Mayuge nadda e Iganga wakati mu kubwatuka kwa ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi. E Mayuge, Kyagulanyi agambye nti, “Mu kiseera Pulezidenti Museveni we yajjira mu buyinza kitange yalina eddembe lye era nga yeeyagala naye w’afiiridde nga yafuuka muddu. Abazadde baffe bangi baggwaamu essuubi, tubaddize essuubi eryo nga tuggyako Museveni.” Obwedda buli w’atuuka ng’asaba abavubuka okweddiza ensi yaabwe, alaze nga Busoga bwe yalina amakolero naye nga kati bino byafuuka lugero. Kyagulanyi agamba nti Busoga erima ebikajjo naye bye batalinako buyinza kugereka bbeeyi. Ono asuubizza nti bw’anaafuuka Pulezidenti ajja kuwa abantu b’e Busoga obuyinza okusalwo ku bbeeyi y’ebikajjo. Kyagulanyi asabye abawagizi be okuggwaayo nga January 14, 2021 bamulonde era bakuume akalulu kaabwe kaleme kubbibwa.

headline: Abampadde obwaminisita bwe banaaba tebampuliriza nja kulekulira- Owek Ssebuggwawo
text: Abadde Mmeeya wa Lubaga era Minisita omubeezi ow’amawulire ne Tekinologiya, Owek. Joyce Juliet Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo, alabudde bakama be abaamuwadde ekifo ky’obwaminisita nti singa banaalemwa okumuwuliriza ajja kulekulira. Okulabula kuno, Owek. Nabbosa yakukoledde ku Masengere bwe yalabadde awayaamu ne bannamawulire ku ntandikwa ya wiiki eno. “Njagala abampadde obukulu buno bampulirize bwe nnaabaako ne bye njagala kubanga nze saabubasaba era simanyi bwe baabironda. Nze saagala mivuyo era nabo bakimanyi. Noolwekyo bwe nnaalaba nga tebampuliriza nga ndekulira.” Owek. Ssebuggwawo bwe yagambye. Owek. Ssebuggwawo agamba nti okusinga nti wakutalaaga mu bantu, amanye ebizibu byabwe kuba kisinga okutuula mu woofiisi, kimuyambe okumanya ebizibu byennyini ebiruma abantu. Ono agamba nti ebimu ku bintu by’agenda okufaako kwe kulaba ng’asitula omutindo gwa bannamawulire era abasembeze ku mwanjo era basobole okunyweza obumu, okusobola okutuuka ku bintu ebinene n’okufuna omusaala okutandikirwako. Minisita Ssebuggwawo awakanyizza ebigambibwa nti alina obutakkaanya n’ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) n’agattako nti bannakibiina abasinga obungi bali mabega we wadde nga tasobola kubasanguza. Ono era alabudde bannabyabufuzi abamwogerera amafuukuule nga bamunenya okutwala ekifo kino kye bayita okubalyamu olukwe, kyokka nga nabo ebifo bye balimu nabyo bigwa mu gamu ku masiga agakola gavumenti. Owek. Nabbosa asabye bano okuva mu by’obufuzi ebyekito naye bakolere abantu kuba gwe mulamwa omukulu essaawa eno.

headline: Gavumenti eyagala okulonda kwa Sipiika wa Palamenti kwongezebweyo
text: Kampala Ssaabaminisita w’eggwanga era nga y’akulira entambuza y’emirimu gya gavumenti mu lukiiko lw’eggwanga olukulu, Dr. Ruhakana Rugunda, awandiikidde Sipiika wa Palamenti, Rebecca Kadaga ku lwa gavumenti, ng’asaba atuuze akakiiko akafuzi aka  Palamenti, kasobole okwongerayo okulonda kwa Sipiika awamu n’omumyuka we. Okusinziira ku mitendera, okulondebwa kwa Sipiika n’omumyuka we bye bimu ku bintu ebirina okusooka okukolebwa oluvannyuma lw’ababaka okulayira, ababaka mu Palamenti y’e 11 balina kulayira nga 17 ne 18 Omwezi guno. Ebbaluwa Ssaabaminisita gye yawandiikidde Sipiika Kadaga nga 4, omwezi guno, eyagala okulonda kuno kwongezebweyo okutuuka nga 21 omwezi gwe gumu. Rugunda yategeezezza nti ebibiina ebirina ababaka mu Palamenti ye 11 byetaaga okutuuza obubondo bwabyo okusalawo ku bantu be birina okusimbawo ku bwasipiika wamu n’omumyuka we nga noolwekyo byetaagayo akadde. Ebiriwo biraga nti abantu bana bokka be balaze nti beetaaga okuvuganya ku kifo kya Sipiika ekirimu Rebecca Kadaga essaawa eno era y’omu ku bali mu lwokaano. Abalala ye mumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah, omubaka omukyala owa Rakai, Juliet Kinyamatama nga bano bonna ba NRM awamu n’owa  FDC, Ssemujju Nganda. Ate bo abaagala eky’omumyuka bawerako nga ku bano kuliko; Omubaka wa Lwemiyaga, Theodore Ssekikubo, Anita Among (Bukedea woman), Jacob Oboth Oboth (West Budama ), Thomas Tayebwa (Ruhinda North) ne David Bahati (Ndorwa West).

headline: Museveni agamba eby’okuyimiriza kkampeyini tebyamusanyudde
text: Mukono Avuganya ku bwapulezidenti ku kkaadi ya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, ategeezezza nti teyasanyukidde kiragiro kya kakiiko ka byakulonda ekiyimiriza enkung’aana ne kkampeyini mu bitundu ebimu okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Uganda’s President Yoweri Museveni waits for Ethiopia’s Prime Minister before a welcome ceremony at State House in Entebbe on June 8, 2018. (Photo by Sumy SADRUNI / AFP)        (Photo credit should read SUMY SADRUNI/AFP/Getty Images) “Nze sikubangako ku nkung’aana naye akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kantadde wamu ne Kyagulanyi, naye Katonda abalaba.” Museveni bw’agambye ng’ali e Mbalala mu Mukono olwaleero bw’abadde atongozza ekifo ekigenda okubunyisa amasannyalaze. “Tusisinkana bakulembeze bokka era bwe tusisinkana abawagizi tetufuluma naye olwokuba ye ssentebe w’akakiiko Byabakama alagidde, tujja mugondera.” Pulezidenti Museveni bw’agasseeko. Museveni wadde emabegako abadde ayambala ssaati za kyenvu ez’ekibiina kye, leero abadde mu ssuuti. “Leero nninga mukungu era sisuubira nti waliwo anaagamba nti nkoze kkampeyini, Byabakama mumugambe nti twalabye omusajja afaanana abakozi b’ekibiina kya UN,” Museveni bw’annyonnyodde. Kino kiddiridde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ku Lwomukaaga, okuwera kkampeyini mu disitulikiti 11 okuli; Masaka, Kampala ne Wakiso, olwa Ssennyiga Corona eyeeyongedde ennyo mu bitundu bino. Okusinziira ku mwogezi w’akakiiko kano, Paul Bukenya, kkampeyini zino ze zivuddeko ekirwadde okweyongera era kwe kusalawo okuziwera. Mu bitundu ebirala kuliko; Kazo, Kabarole, Mbarara, Luweero, Jinja, Kalungu, Kasese ne Tororo. Ekiragiro ky’Omulamuzi Byabakama we kyajjidde nga Pulezidenti Museveni ewasinga yamazeeyo nga asigazza Wakiso, Kampala ne Mukono, amalirize kkampeyini ze.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni tafaayo ku Bakaramoja  – Bobi Wine
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) ategeezezza nti abantu be Karamoja mu kiseera kino beetaaga obuyambi bw’emmere nabuli ngeri kuba bangi bakyagenda mu maaso n’okutondoka olw’enjala. Bino Kyagulanyi yabyogedde awaayo ttani z’emmere n’ebijjanjalo eri Abakaramoja olunaku lw’eggulo okusobola okubataasa ku mbeera eno nasaba ne bannayuganda abalala okubaduukirira nakatono kebalina. “Fenna tukimanyi nti bannayuganda tebalina kyakulya wadde Karamoja yeesinze okukosebwa. Naye Gen Museveni ne banne batunuulidde kimu ngeri gyebasobola kwongera kwegagawaza nakulemera mu buyinza awatali kufaayo ku bantu be Karamoja ne bannayuganda abalala,” Kyagulanyi bwe yagambye. Ono yalabudde nti mubanga ttono, bannayuganda bajja kuwulira nti obusente obutono obwaweereddwayo okuyambako ku bantu bano nti ate bubbiddwa oba babukozesezza ebirala. Okusinziira ku Kyagulanyi, ebbeeyi y’emmere eri waggulu etadde bannayuganda mu kaseera akazibu nga bangi tebakyasobola kulya mmere egwanidde. Okusinziira ku kitongole ki ‘Intergrated Food Security Phase Classification (IPC) kigamba ekitundu kiramba ku bantu ababeera e Moroto bamalako olunaku lulamba nga tebalabye ku kakulya nga kino kibeerawo ennaku satu nnamba mu mwezi ekintu ekyongedde okwelariikiriza. Aba IPC bagamba abantu 518,000 ( by’ebitundu 40 ku buli 100) e Karamoja bali mu katyabaga k’enjala nga omuwendo guno gulinnye okuva ku bantu 361,000 (ebitundu 30 ku 100) mu 2021. Bino webijjidde nga Ssaabaminisita Robinah Nabbanja ku Lwokubiri yalaze nga gavumenti bwewaddeyo obuwumbi 135 okukola ku njala eri mu kitundu kino.

headline: Aba gavumenti ez’ebitundu bawandikidde Pulezidenti Museveni abasisinkane nga tebaneediima
text: Ekibiina ekitaba abakulembeze ba gavumenti ez’ebitundu mu ggwanga ki Uganda Local Government Association (ULGA) batabukidde gavumenti ku musaala omutono gwebafuna nebategeeza nti singa tebongezebwa musaala bakuteeka wansi ebikola. Okulabula kuno bakukoledde mu bbaluwa gyebawandiikidde Pulezidenti Museveni nebamusaba okumusisinkana bongere ku nsonga eno mu bwangu ddala oba sikyo beediime ng’eno eteereddwako omukono gwa ssentebe w’ekibiina Richard Rwabuhinga. Bagamba nti ng’abakulembeze abaalondebwa abantu bakola emirimu mingi,n’obuvunaanyizibwa bwebatuusa ku bantu bungi wabula basasulwa akasente katono nga mu mbeera eriwo mu ggwanga baba tebakyasobola kumalako. Abamu ku bassentebe badisitulikiti bagamba nti ebitundu byabwe binene kyokka nga beetaaga okutuukira ddala ku muntu asembayo wansi kyokka baweebwa omusaala gwa bukadde 2 bwokka nga tezisobola kubamala. Kati bano baagala omusaala gwabwe gukubisibwemu emirundi 4 batuuke ku bukadde 8 n’abakulembeze abalala bwebatyo. Bano okusaba okusisinkana Pulezidenti Museveni kizze yakamala okusisinkana abasomesa b’embeera (Arts) ababadde mu kwediima nga bawakanya ekya gavumenti okusooka okwongeza abasomesa ba Saayansi omusaala kyebagamba nti kikolwa kya kusosola. Wabula oluvannyuma lw’ensisinkano eno, Pulezidenti Museveni yabasabye okudda mu bibiina byabwe basomese nga bwebateeseganya era nebakkiriza okusazaamu akeediimo akabadde kamaze wiiki ezisoba mu 3.

headline: Abamu ku bawagizi ba NUP beekweka ne bagamba nti baawambibwa – Minisita Odongo
text: Kampala Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga era Munnamagye Jeje Odongo akalambidde ng’agamba nti balina abawagizi ba National Unity Platform (NUP) 58 bokka mu bifo byabwe. Odongo abadde ayanukula omubaka w’ekibuga Masaka era omumyuka wa Pulezidenti wa NUP mu Buganda, Mathias Mpuuga eyaleese alipoota mu Palamenti nga eraga ng’abawagizi baabwe  423  bwe batalabikako. Ku bano 423, Odongo agamba balinako 58 bokka era abamu baamala dda n’okubayimbula.  “Alipoota eziva mu bakessi baffe ziraga nti abamu ku bantu bano bagenda mu byalo ne beekweka nga batya okukwatibwa bavunaanibwe.” Odongo bwe yagambye. Minisita Odongo agamba nti abamu ku baakwatibwa baasindikibwa ku alimanda era bavunaanibwa mu kkooti era n’agattako nti ekitundu ekisinga ku lukalala Mpuuga lwaleese mu Palamenti tebasobola kukakasa bantu baluliko. “Ku bantu 1035  abaakwatibwa mu kaseera k’okulonda 901 baavunaanibwa mu kkooti era om ku bo ye Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) yennyini, 734 baasindikibwa ku alimanda, 167 baayimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti, 113 baayimbulwa ku kakalu ka poliisi ate 21 ne bayimbulwa poliisi nga tebalina musango.” Odongo bwe yannyonnyodde. Wabula akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti, Betty Aol Achan, yategeezezza nti alipoota ya Minisita Jeje Odongo tematiza nga waliwo ebibuuzo byetaddamu.

headline: Aba NUP e Ssembabule basuddewo owaabwe ne beegatta kw’atalina kibiina
text: Ssembabule Okulonda kw’akalulu ka bonna aka 2021 nga kwongera okusembera, agava mu ssaza lya Kabaka erya Mawogola, galaga nga bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform NUP, bwe basuddewo alina kkaadi y’ekibiina ku bubaka bwa Mawogola North ne bawagira ali ku bwannamunigina. Abamu ku bawagizi abasaze eddiiro Bano abasoba mu kikumi bagamba nti basazeewo okuwagira Nakayiza Catherine atalina kibiina kubanga alina bbendera mu NUP, yalemwa okugenda wansi mu bantu okunoonya akalulu. Bano okuli; Jjuuko Herman, Luwemba Emmanuel kwosa, Ndugga Kamada n’abalala, basinzidde ku Cristo centre mu ttawuni kkanso y’e Ssembabule ne balangirira nga bwe basaze eddiiro. Bano balumiriza nti munnakibiina kyabwe, Nyanzi Henry Mawejje, okulabikako mu bantu yakoma ku kwewandiisa ng’alinga eyava edda mu lwokaano. Nakayiza nga ayogerako eri abasaze eddiiro Bannyonnyodde nga Mawejje bw’atalina ky’akoze ku bannaabwe abasibwa mu makomera n’okutulugunyizibwa, oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa Kyagulanyi lwe yali e Ssembabule ng’anoonya akalulu. Ekirala, kye bavunaanye Mawejje kwe kuba ng’ebizibu byabwe ebibaluma tabimanyi bulungi kuba si nzaalwa ya kitundu kino, nga kigenda kumubeerera kizibu okubikolako kuba wadde akalulu tekannakubibwa naye abakozesezza awatali kubayamba mu ngeri yonna. Bagattako nti wadde Nakayiza si y’alina kkaadi ya NUP naye yakola buli kimu okwaniriza Kyagulanyi nga Mawejje atunula butunuzi. Ate ye Nakayiza Catherine bw’abadde ayaniriza abantu bano, abasabye okunywerera ku Kyagulanyi awangule obwapulezidenti kubanga y’alimu omulamwa era baleme kutiisibwatiisibwa. Bwe tutuukiridde Nyanzi Henry Mawejje ku nsonga eno, agambye nti abamwabulidde tabalinaako buzibu era nga ddembe lyabwe okuwagira omuntu yenna gwe baagala wadde nga baguliddwa obusente ssente. Agambye nti si kituufu nti tali mu bantu kuba kkampeyini azze azikola ng’atambula mu bantu kw’ossa n’okuteeka obulango ku mikutu egyenjawulo mu kitundu, n’agamba nti abaguliddwa baweereddwa waragi.

headline: Ababaka ba Palamenti balayidde obutaganya gavumenti kuggyawo mayiro
text: Ababaka ba Palamenti ku ludda oluwabula gavumenti nga bakulembeddwamuMinisita w’ebyettaka ku ludda oluwabula gavumenti, Eng.Ronald Nsubuga Balimwezo n’omubaka wa Mityana South, Richard Lumu, baweze obutaganya gavumenti kuggyawo ttaka lya mayiro kuba kikontana ne Ssemateeka. Bano ekirayiro kino bakikoze basisinkanyeMinisita w’ebyettaka mu Buganda, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo wamu n’abakungu okuva mu Buganda Land Board ku Lwokuna e Bulange Mmengo. Mu nsisinkano eno, omubaka Lumu yawadde Obwakabaka amageziokulondoola ensonga y’ettaka nga butunuulira Ssemateeka wa 1962 kuba annyonnyola bulungi obwannannyini bw’ettaka wamu n’obukulu bwa mayiro mu Buganda. “Ssemateeka wa 1962 annyonnyola bulungi ensonga y’ettaka ng’eva ku ndagaano ya 1900 newankubadde nga baagiggyawo era kubanga yali erina engeri gy’ennyonnyola obwannannyini bw’ettaka nawanga 15. Era nnina ekirowooza nti singa tuddayo ne twebuuza ku Ssemateeka wa 1962 n’ebizibu bye tulimu biyinza okuggwaawo.” Munnamateeka Lumu bwe yagambye. Ono era ategeezezza nti waliwo ebyekusifu ebikwekeddwa mu tteeka lye baagala okukolamu ennongoosereza mu kawayiro 26, wano n’asaba Obwakabaka okukwatagana n’abakulembeze b’ennono abalala kuba kino kikosa bonna. YeEng. Ronald Balimwezo, agamba nti bagenze batambula mu bantu ab’enjawulo abakwatibwako ensonga y’ettakaokusobola okumalawo emirerembe egiriko awamu n’okulaba nti bannanyini ttaka tebalyamanyizibwa. “Buganda ekwata kyakubiri ku balina ettaka eringi ng’eddirira gavumenti eyaawakati nekuddako abakatoliki. Nasobodde okufuna omukisa n’enjogerako nabo era tumanyi bulungi nti waliwo okusoomoozebwa ku ttaka.” Balimwezo bwe yannyonnyodde. Owek. Mariam Nkalubo yasoose kubabuulira ensonga ezaanokolwayo Kamalabyona wa Buganda ezisibukako enkaayana ku ttaka n’asaba nti singa zino zitunulwamu mu ngeri y’obukkakkamu tewali kuwannaanya, ensonga y’ettaka esobola okumalirizibwa. “Twagala tugonjoole ebintu ebyo nga tugendera ku nkola ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka gye yalambika ng’ayita mu kitongole kya Buganda Land Board bwe yagamba nti bw’oba tolina busobozi owa busuulu ate afunye ku busobozi asobola okusasula busuulu era bonna ne basigala ku ttaka.” Minisita Nkalubo bwe yagasseeko. Kinajjukirwa nti Omutanda bwe yali ku Matikkira ge ag’omulundi ogwa 28 e Nkoni yakakasa nga Buganda bw’etagenda kukkiriza muntu yenna kutwala bintu byayo by’erinako obwannannyini nga muno mwe muli n’ettaka.

headline: Owek. Kiyimba asabye gavumenti eyimbule Ssewanyana ne Ssegiriinya
text: Minisita w’ensonga z’Amawulire mu Buganda, Owek. Noah Kiyimba asabye gavumenti erowooze ku ky’okuyimbula ababaka okuli Muhammad Ssegiriinya nowa Makindye West Allan Ssewanyana basobole okufuna eddembe lyabwe eribaweebwa Ssemateeka. Okwogera bino Owek. Kiyimba abadde atikkula Amakula ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka okuva mu Bannakawempe ab’eggombolola ya Mutuba II Nabweru ne Mutuba V Kawempe ku Lwokusatu mu Lubiri e Mmengo. “Tulabye abazizza emisango eminene okusinga negino naye nebaba nga bayimbulwa ku kakalu aka kkooti naye ne bano abakulembeze Ssegiriinya ne Ssewanyana tusaba kkooti ebayimbule bawoze nga bava wabweru kuba tetulowooza nti basobola okudduka mu ggwanga lino kuba waliwo n’abantu abagundivu abasobola okubeeyimirirwa,” Owek. Kiyimba bw’asabye. Asabye amasaza amalala okuyigira ku Kyaddondo basobole okuyigiriza abaana ennono n’obuwangwa awamu n’obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe kuba kibeera kikulu okubaateekateeka okusinga okubategekera olwo ensi lwesobola okubanguyira nabo okugiganyulwamu. Ono yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni okulaga nga bwagenda okukwasizaako abalimi b’emmwaanyin kuba kino kigenda kwongera ku bulimi bwazo awamu n’okulaakulanya eggwanga kuba Omuyitale Enrica Pinetti tasobola kulumirirwa Uganda kusinga bannansi.  Minisita Kiyimba abasabye okulima emmwaanyi basirike nasaba abantu bonna okudda mu bitundu byabwe gyebava bweba baagala okubikulaakulanya era nakunga Abaami ba Kabaka okulondoola emikolo gy’Obuwangwa n’ennono ebikolebwa mu bitundu byabwe kitaase okusereba kw’Ennono. Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk.Moses Luutu yeebaziza abakiise embuga olwokukufaayo okutuukiriza obuvunanyizibwa bwabwe era nasaba nabalala okubalabirako. Abaami ba kabaka abamulamulirako eggombolola ezikiise embuga banjudde Alipoota omubadde ebituukiddwako kwosa nebibasomooza mu buweereza kyoka nebawera okusigala nga bakozi okwongera okunyweza Nnamulondo. Abakiise embuga kubaddeko abaana ba masomero , abaami ba ssaabasajja ku mitendera egyenjawulo , abakulembeze mu Bwakabaka ne gavumenti eyawakati era bano baweze okuweereza Beene awatali kumutiiririra okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Ebireeteddwa kubaddeko emmere , ebibala ebisolo nebintu ebiralala

headline: Museveni ayise Kadaga ne Oulanyah bateese ku kifo kya Sipiika
text: Kampala Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRm) era Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ayise Sipiika wa Palamenti Rebecca Kadaga n’Omumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah bateese ku kalumanywera ali ku kifo kya Sipiika anaakubiriza Palamenti y’e 11. Pulezidenti Museveni nga asisinkanye Sipiika Kadaga n’Omumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah gyebuvuddeko Embiranye eyamanyi eri wakati wa Sipiika aliko kati era amaze emyaka 10 nga ali mu kifo kino Rebecca Kadaga n’omumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah. Ensonda ezeesigika mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti zitegeezezza nga Pulezidenti Museveni bwagenda okusisinkana ababiri bano olwa leero, nga ekikulu ekigenda okwogerwako lwe lwokaano lwa Sipiika. Waliwo amaloobozi agabadde gawulirwa nti akakiiko ka NRM ak’okuntikko akamanyiddwa nga CECE nti kawagira Jacob Oulanyah kuba bakkiriziganya kino kibeere ekisanja kya Kadaga ekisembayo wadde Kadaga agamba nti kino ssi kituufu abakulu bonna bawagira ye. Wadde Kadaga yatongozza kakuyege w’okunoonya akalulu yeddize ekifo kino, Oulanyah ye tannavaamu kyamaanyi nga buli ensonga eno lwevaayo ajjuliza kimu nti abakulira ekibiina bajja kusalawo anavuganyiza ku kaadi y’ekibiina. Obutakkaanya bwa bano bweyongedde nga buli ludda lulumiriza lunnaalwo okumansa ebigambo ku lunnaalwo ekyawaliriza Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina, Justine Kasule Lumumba okusaba enjuyi zombi okwekomako. Wabula olwa leero kisuubirwa nti akulira ekibiina kya NRM agenda kwogerako nabo basobole okutta ku bigere n’okweyogerera amafukuule kuba kittatana ekibiina. Yo NRM ng’ ekibiina egenda kubeera n’olusirika lw’ababaka abalonde e Kyankwanzi okusalawo ani anaakwatira ekibiina bbendera ku kifo kino. Ssentebe wa NRM era asuubirwa okwogera n’abavuganya ku kifo ky’omumyuka wa Sipiika abali mu kibiina kya NRM. Abavuganya ku kifo kino kuliko omubaka omukyala owa Bukedea Annet Anita Among, Minisita David Bahati ne Robinah Rwakoojo. Wadde obukakafu bwebyo ebigenda okuteesebwako tebimanyiddwa, ensonda mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti zikakasa nti Dr. Ruhakana Rugunda yagenda okukubiriza ensisinkano zino.

headline: Mao agudde mu bintu, M7 amulonze okubeera Minisita wa Ssemateeka n’Obwenkanya
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alonze Ssenkaggale wa Democratic Party (DP), Nobert Mao okubeera Minisita w’ensonga za Ssemateeka n’Obwenkanya nga wakayita olunaku lumu lwokka nga batadde emikono ku ndagaano okukolera awamu. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa efulumiziddwa ku Lwokuna, ng’eriko omukono gwa Pulezidenti Museveni egamba nti, “Nga nkozesa obuyinza obumpebwa Ssemateeka mu nnyingo 113 (1) ne 114 (1) eya Ssemateeka wa 1995, nangirira Mao nga Minisita omuggya ow’obwenkanya.” Kino era Pulezidenti Museveni akikakasizza nga ayita mu bubaka bw’atadde ku mutimbagano. Bino webijjidde nga wakayita olunaku lumu lwokka nga Ssenkaggale wa DP Mao ne Ssaabawandiisi Gerald Siranda bakamala okusisinkana mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti Entebbe nebakkanya okukolera awamu. Mu ngeri yeemu, Omubaka Hamson Obua alondeddwa okubeera Nampala wa gavumenti ng’ekifo kino kibadde kikalu oluvannyuma lw’eyakirimu Thomas Tayebwa okulondebwa nga Omumyuka wa Sipiika wa Palamenti. Ye Peter Ogwang asikidde Obua nga minisita w’ebyemizannyo so nga Beatrice Okello, nga ye mubaka omukyala owa Agago, alondeddwa nga minisita alondoola emirimu gya gavumenti.

headline: Bobi Wine akakasiddwa okuvuganya mu kalulu ka 2021
text: Kyambogo Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kawandiisizza Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ng’omu ku bagenda okuvuganya mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Omubaka Kyagulanyi ne mukyala we nga bagenda okwewndiisa “Nze Omulamuzi Byabakama Mugenyi Simon nga nze mpandiisa abantu abagenda okwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti, nangirira Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) ng’omu ku beesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti oluvannyuma lw’okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by’etteeka erirambika okulondebwa kwa Pulezidenti erya ‘Presidential Elections Act erya 2005,” Byabakama bw’agambye. Ono ow’emyaka 38 tasobodde kukweka ssanyu lye oluvannyuma lwa ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Byabakama okumuyita okunona empapula ezikakasa nti ono awandiikiddwa. Byabakama alabudde Bobi Wine obutagezaako kujeemera biragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona ebibaweereddwa akakiiko kano. “Okukuba enkung’aana n’okuyisa ebivvulu n’oluseregende lw’emmotoka tebikkirizibwa,” Byabakama bw’alagidde Kyagulanyi, obwedda agambibwa okujja ng’ayogerako n’abawagizi be bw’abadde agenda okwewandiisa. Byabakama amusabye okwewala okukung’aanya abantu abangi kubanga kino kiteeka obulamu bw’abantu be mu matigga. Kino kiddiridde abawagizi okuli aba boodabooda n’abantu abalala bawerekedde Kyagulanyi okuva ewaka we e Magere okutuuka e Nakawa Era wano wabaddewo Vvaawo mpitewo ng’abeebyokwerinda bagezaako okuziyiza abawagizi okumugoberera. Abamu ku bano balemeddeko era okukkakkana ng’abamu bakubiddwa omukka ogubalalagala ate abalala ne babayisaako ow’embuya okusobola okubagumbulula.

headline: Kabuleta: Omulamuzi Byabakama bye yasoma tebikwatagana na byava mu bifo eyalonderwa
text: Kampala Eyavuganyizza ku ntebe y’Obwapulezidenti mu kalulu akawedde aka 2021, Joseph Kabuleta, yeegasse ku banne abalala n’awakanya ebyava mu kulonda.  Munnamawulire Joseph Kabuleta Kabuleta yagambye nti ku byonna ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Simon Byabakama Mugenyi, bye yasoma byali tebikwatagana n’ebyo ebyava mu bifo ebyalonderwamu. Ono eyafuna obululu obuwera 45,424 nga bukola obutundu 0.44% bw’atyo bwe yeemulugunyizza ng’ayogerako n’omukutu gw’amawulire ogumu. “Tewali kyanneewuunyisa ku ebyo byonna ebyaliwo. Nayingira mu lwokaano luno nga mbisuubira. Ebibalo ebyalangirirwa byonna byali biyiiye buyiiya.” Kabuleta bwe yagambye. Yannyonnyodde nti mumativu nti eggwanga liriko ekkubo lye likutte. “Nkyali ku kununulwa mu byenfuna kubanga gwe musingi gwa buli kimu, twagala Museveni y’aba Nnakyemalira asembayo okufuga eggwanga lyaffe.” Kabuleta bwe yagasseeko. Kabuleta yawagidde Kyagulanyi olw’okuddukira mu kkooti okuwakanya ebyava mu kalulu n’agattako nti tewali ngeri yonna Museveni gye yali asobola kuwezaamu bitundu 50%. Okusinziira ku byava mu kakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Museveni yawangula akalulu n’obukadde 6,042898 obukola ebitundu 58.38% ate Kyagulanyi n’akwata kyakubiri 3,631,437 n’ebitundu 35.08%. Mu kalulu kano Patrick Amuriat Oboi owa Forum for Democratic (FDC) yafuna obululu 337,589 by’ebitundu 3.26 %, Nancy Kalembe n’afuna 38,772 obukola ebitundu 0.37%, John Katumba yafuna 37,554 by’ebitundu 0.36%, Nobert Mao n’afuna obululu 57,682 by’ebitundu 0.56%. Mu balala, Willy Mayambala yafuna 15,041 obukola 0.15%, Mugisha Muntu Gregg n’afuna 67,574 by’ebitundu 0.65%, Fred Mwesigye yakung’aanya 25,483 nga buno bukola 0.25% ate munnamagye Henry Tumukunde n’afuna 51,392 by’ebitundu 0.50%.

headline: Tetwagala beegwanyiza bukulembeze nga tebakiika Mmengo – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezezza nti nga Buganda tebandyagadde kufuna mukulembeze atakiika Mmengo kuba ensonga za Buganda abeera tamanyi ngeri yakuzikwatamu. Bannakibiina kya Abassa ekimu nga bali ne Katikkiro Mayiga “Ffe Kabaka ye Kitaffe eno y’embuga ye, era saagalira ddala kuwulira munnabyabufuzi ang’amba nti nze ebya Buganda tebimukwatako ng’ali wano mu Buganda. Oba ebya Buganda tebikukwatako genda okiikirira ab’e Pongdong yo tewaliiyo bifo bironderwamu, lwaki oyagala okwesimbawo mu Buganda nga ebya Buganda tebikukwatako?” Mayiga bw’agambye. Bino Katikkiro abyogeredde mu nsisinkano n’ekibiina ky’abakyala abakatoliki ab’ekibiina kya Abassa ekimu okuva e Rubaga ababadde bakiise Embuga n’ettu lya ssekukkulu. Owek. Mayiga bannabyabufuzi abawadde amagezi okukulembeza ensonga za Buganda basobole okufuna emikisa n’obuwagizi bw’abantu ba Buganda kuba Kabaka gwe mutwe. Ono asabye abantu okujjumbira okulonda kw’omulundi guno wadde nga waliwo okusoomoozebwa era balondoole okulonda kuno era banoonyeze abalimu ensa obululu, basobole okuwangula Kamalabyonna agamba nti tekisoboka kuzimba ggwanga Uganda okuggyako ng’abantu bawang’ana amagezi. Agasseeko nti obwegassi mu bibiina eby’enjawulo kiyamba okuwang’ana amagezi ne basobola okukulaakulana, bw’atyo asiimye ekibiina kino olw’okwolesa obumu. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti eggwanga lyetaaga bannabyabufuzi abalimu ensa era abajja okukiikirira abantu n’obuvunaanyizibwa. Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, akuutidde abantu ba Beene okwongera okusengejja abeesimbyewo bakole okusalawo okulungi. Abakiise Embuga, babadde bakulembeddwamu Omumbejja Eugenia Nassolo era ng’oggyeeko okugula Satifikeeti z’Obwakabaka, Katikkiro bamutonedde ekirabo kya Ssekukkulu. Omumbejja Nassolo ayanjulidde Katikkiro Mayiga enteekateeka z’okwesimbawo ku bubaka bwa Lubaga South mu Palamenti era n’awera okulwanirira ensonga za Buganda Ssemasonga ettaano bw’anaaba alondeddwa. Nassolo annyonnyodde nti ekitundu kya Lubaga South kikulu nnyo mu Buganda kubanga kye kirimu ebifo bya Buganda ebyenkizo nga mwemuli; Olubiri lw’e Mmengo, Bulange, Olubiri lwa Mujaguzo wamu n’ebifo ebirala, nga byetaaga omuntu ategeera ensonga za Buganda. Bano baguze Satifikeeti okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko era ne beetikka ettu okusiima Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okukulembera obulungi Obuganda.

headline: Raila Odinga mu Lubiri e Mengo
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II akyazizza Hon. Raila Odinga okuva mu ggwanga lya Kenya.  Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga ali ne Raila Odinga owa Kenya.  Odinga agambye nti Ssaabasajja mukwano gwe nnyo nti era tasobola kujja mu Uganda natagenda ku mu buzaako. Boogedde ku ngeri gyebayinza okweyambisaamu obufuzi Obw’ensikirano okunyweza omukago gw’obuvanjuba bwa Africa (East African Community). Ensisinkano eno ebadde mu Lubiri e Mengo yetabiddwamu omubaka wa Kenya mu Uganda (Ambassador) His Excellency Kiema Kilonzo, ababaka ba Palamenti ya Kenya, Hon. Florence Mutua, ne Mishi Mbogo.  Raila Odinga yavuganyako ku bukulembeze bw’Eggwanga lya Kenya ate era nga yaliko katikkiro (Prime Minister) mu palamenti ya Kenya.

headline: Mulonde bannabyabufuzi abeesigika – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, alabudde abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka ku kulonda bannabyabufuzi abatali beesigwa naye balonde abo abanaasobola okulwanirira Buganda awatali kwekomomma. Mukuumaddamula Mayiga nabaleese oluwalo “Bannabyabufuzi abeesigika ntegeeza abantu abasobola okulwanirira Ssemasonga ettaano awatali kwekomomma, abalimu ensa era abaagala Kabaka waabwe nga tebamwegaana, bakalabakalaba era nga bayiiya, be bafuzi abeesigika.” Katikkiro bw’ategeezezza. Okulabula kuno, Katikkiro okukoledde mu Bulange e Mmengo bw’abadde atikkula oluwalo lwa bukadde obusobye mu 21 okuva mu ggombolola ezivudde e Kyaddondo ne Kyaggwe, leero ku Lwokubiri mu Bulange. Eggombolola zino kubaddeko; Ssaabaddu Ntenjeru, Musaale Nagojje, Ssabagabo Lufuka, ne Musaale Busukuuma ezikiise embuga enkya ya leero ku Lwokubiri. Mukuumaddamula asinzidde wano n’akubiriza abantu ba Beene okubeera abayiiya ate nga bagezigezi batuuke ku buwanguzi olwo Buganda nayo esobola okutuuka ku ntikko, kubanga ebisoomoozo bajja kuba basobodde okubivvuunuka. Mayiga agambye nti Obuganda bubadde bulina abasekeeterezi okuva ku mirembe Emiteesa naye olw’okubeera abatetenkanya basobola okuleeta enteekateeka y’Ettoffaali eyazaala ebibala nga Masengere ne BBS Terefayina. Owek. Mayiga abasabye okubeera abagezigezi n’abakuutira okukomya okwekubagiza mu biseera nga basanze okusoomoozebwa naddala mu mulembe Omutebi kuba okwesaasira tekulina we kubayambira. Ono akubirizza Abaami ba Kabaka okubeera obumu nga bakola emirimu gy’Obwakabaka kiyambe ebitundu byabwe okukulaakulana era nabeebaza okunyikira okuwagira pulojekiti za Buganda nga bayita mu nkola eno ey’Oluwalo. Ono asinzidde wano n’asiima bannabyabufuzi obakoze obutaweera okulaba nga Buganda n’ebitundu bye bakulembera bikulaakulana.Mu bakiise Embuga kubaddeko Omubaka wa Makindye, Ssaabagabo Ssempala Kigozi Ssajjalyabeene, Lulume Bayiga n’abalala. Ate ye Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, owek. Joseph Kawuki, asabye abantu ba Buganda okwongera okujjumbira Oluwalo era n’abakubiriza okugula emijoozi gy’emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Beene agagenda okubaayo nga 29/11/2020. Ye Omwami w’eggombolola ya Ssaabaddu Ntenjeru okuva mu ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe, Sekaggya Richard, asabye Katikkiro okutunula mu nsonga z’ekibbattaka mu ssaza lyabwe kubanga abantu bangi abeezizza ettaka eritali lyabwe ate newatabaawo kibakolebwako. Omukola guno gwetabiddwako abakulembeze b’amasaza okubadde Ssekibobo Elijah Bogere Lubanga, Ow’essaza ly’e Kyaddondo, Nakibirige Agnes Ssempa, bannabyabufuzi n’abalala bangi. Bano baguze ssatifikeeti za Buganda era nebaweebwa n’epipalati ebibajjukiza okwekuuma akawuka ka Mukenenya.

headline: Kamalabyonna Mayiga akunze abantu okwettanira omwoleso gwa Buganda
text: Mukuumaddamula Charles Peter Mayiga akunze bannayuganda yonna gyebali okwettanira omwoleso gwa Buganda kibayambe okumanyisa byebakola n’okwerula emikisa gyabwe egy’okulaakulana. Bino Katikkiro Mayiga abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde alambika ku nteekateeka y’omwoleso guno ogwa ‘Omwoleso Gaggadde Expo ogugenda okuyindira mu lubiri e Mmengo nga 19 okutuuka 28 omwezi guno omwaka 2022 . “Omuntu yenna anaagaggawala ateekwa okubaako kyatunda ekyamaguzi kiyinza okuba ekikalu oba ekitali kikalu, nze ndi munnamateeka era eky’okubagagga kyetunda ge mateeka genasoma. Tetusobola kubaako bugagga bwetutuukako nga byetukola tebimanyiddwa,” Owek. Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga mu mwoleso guno abantu bajja kulaga emirimu gyabwe emirala gyebakola bwatyo nasaba abantu okuvaayo okujjumbira basobole okulaakulana kuba obugagga buva mukutunda ebyamaguzi. “Obwakabaka bwategeka omwoleso guno nga bwagala ensi etumanye. Bwoba n’ekintu ekirungi naye nga abantu tebakimanyi ofaanana n’oyo atakirina. Tusoosowaza eby’obulambuzi n’ebyobulimi mu mwoleso guno ogwa Buganda kuba eby’obulambuzi byetulina abantu tebayinza okubyeyunira okuggyako nga babitegedde,” Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Kinajjukirwa nti enteekateeka eno etegekeddwa ekitongole kya Buganda Heritage and Tourism Board wamu naba Luba Events. Omu ku bategesi, Moses Lubuulwa agamba nti ebyokuyiga bigenda kuba bingi mu mwoleso guno okuva ku by’obulimi obulunzi nebirala. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwako Minisita w’ebyobulambuzi, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male, Kitunzi wa BHTB Carol Nnalinnya awamu n’abakungu abalala.

headline: Mukomye okutabiikiriza ebyobufuzi mu buli nsonga – Owek. Kaawaase
text: Owek. Kaawaase asabye bannabyabufuzi okumanya nti n’ebirowoozo by’abantu abalala bwe biri ebikulu era n’alabula abali ku ludda oluwabula gavumenti, okukimanya nti si buli ekiva mu gavumenti nti kibeera kikyamu. Wabula bateekewo enkola ey’okuwuliziganya kuba kye kisobola okutwala eggwanga mu maaso. Okusaba kuno Owek. Kaawaase akukoledde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atikkula Oluwalo ku lwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga okuva mu bakkansala ba Kampala Capital City Council Authority, nga bakulembeddwa Sipiika Zahara Luyirikan’abakulembeze okuva e Mawogola okubadde n’ababaka ba Palamenti. “Munnabyabufuzi omutuufu nga tannawakanya nsonga na kugiteekamu byabufuzi, asooka kunoonya mazima ku nsonga ez’enjawulo. Ensonga bw’ebeera ya byabulamu ng’okugema bantu ate nga gwe obumanyirivu olina bulala, sooka owulirize abakugu b’ebyobulamu, bagamba ki? Sooka ogyetegereze buli ky’oyogera osimbe bwino.” Omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro Kaawaase bw’agambye.  Ono akubirizza abaami ba Kabaka okukozesa emikisa gye balina gye bali kuba omukisa gujja lumu, basobole okusakira Obwakabaka era mu byonna bye bakola beewale ebyo ebikosa ensonga Ssemasonga, Obwakabaka bwa Buganda kwe butambulira. Omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek.Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo agamba nti amateeka galina okuweebwa ekyanya okukola era bwe gaba gagamba nti omuntu alina okutwalibwa mu kkooti mu ssaawa 48, kye kiba kikolebwa era ekisaanidde kwe kusooka okunoonya obujulizi ng’abantu tebannakwatibwa. “Tugatta eddoboozi lyaffe ku kugamba nti amateeka gakole kye galina okukola awatali kunyigiriza bantu.” Owek. Kaawaase bw’agambye. Abasabye okusooka okwekenneenya Pulaani Nnamutayiika y’ekibuga Kampala okusobola okubalambika, beewale okusaba ebyo ebitali mu nteekateeka eno era n’okulowooza nti ensimbi ezibaweebwa ntono nnyo, olwo basobole okutwalaemirimu mu maaso. ku nsonga eziri e Mawogola, Owek. Kaawaase agambye nti RDC amusuubizza okukola ku nsonga z’ettaka mu kitundu kino, okulaba ng’abantu ba Kabaka abali mu kitundu kino baganyulwa mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo omuli eya Bonnabagaggawale. Owek. Kaawaase asabye abaami ba Kabaka okukwatagana n’abakulembeze mu gavumenti eyaawakati, basobole okusakira abantu baabwe ate beewale n’okuweebuuka mu mpisa kuba kivumaganya Obwakabaka. Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu mu Buganda, Owek. Joseph Kawukiasiimye abakulembeze okuva mu KCCA ne Mawogola olw’okumanya nti Buganda bwe buddo bwabwe era ne yeebaza bannamawogola olw’okulwanirira ettaka lya Buganda erya Mijwala. Omwami wa Kabaka akulembera essaza Mawogola, Muteesa Hajji Muhammad Sserwadda, asiimye bannamawogola naddala ababaka, abakulembeze awamu ne RDC olw’okuggyayo amaanyi gonna okutereeza ensonga z’ettaka lya Buganda mu kitundu kino. Ate ye kkansala wa Lubaga North II, Kizza Hakim Sawula ye ategeezezza nti tewali mukulembeze ayinza kukulembera bantu nga tomanyi Buganda kye ki, kuba ettaka KCCA ly’ekozesa lya Buganda nga n’abantu abasinga obungi mu Kampala bali ku ttaka lya Kabaka. Kizza agambye nti baagala okulaba engeri gye bagatta omutindo ku nnyanja eno era basobole okugiggyamu obucaafu era n’abagyetooloddeko bakomye okugisuulamu kasasiro nga bw’eneetereera basobola okugifuula ekyobulambuzi.

headline: Amerika eremeddeko ku bya Kony, emutaddeko obuwumbi 17
text: Eggwanga lyaUnited States of America (USA) littukizza omuyiggo ku Ssaabayeekera Joseph Kony eyali omuduumizi w’okuntikko owa kabinja ka Lord’s Resistance Army (LRA) asobole okuvunaanibwa ku bikolwa by’okulinnyirira eddembe ly’obuntu bye yakolamu bitundu by’omu mambuka. Kino kyalangiriddwa Minisitule y’Amerika eya US Department of State mu nteekateeka yaabwe ey’okuyigga abazza emisango gy’entalo nga bayita mu kuwaayo ebirabo eri abo abalina amawulire agabakwatako gye beekukumye. “Joseph Kony abadde awenjebwa okumala emyaka 15.Osobola okutuyamba okuleetawo obwenkanya n’ofuna ssente obukadde bwa ddoola 5 bulamba (Eza Uganda obuwumbi 17) amawulire g’otuwa gajja kukuumibwa nga gakyama,” Abakulira enteekateeka eno bwe bategeezezza nga bayita ku mukutu gwa Twitter. Mu myaka gywa 1990, Joseph Kony eyali akulidde mu kigo yaggula olutalo ku gavumenti ya Uganda era okukkakkana nga abantu abawera bafudde, abalala batemuddwako ebintu by’omubiri ate abalala nga b’abulidde amaka gaabwe ne basenga mu nkambi zababundabunda. Oluvannyuma eggye lya UPDF lyatandika okubakolako ennumba era ne baddukira mu ggwanga lya Central African Republic. Enfunda eziwera, gavumenti egezezzaako okwogerezeganya n’abayeekera naye tewali kyamaanyi kyatuukibwako. Ku nsonga eno gavumenti y’Amerika egamba nti bamaze emyaka 15 miramba nga banoonya Kony naye nga tebamufuna ne basaba alina amawulire agamukwata ko gye yeekukumye abayambe.

headline: Ababaka b’ensi ezaaliko amatwale ga Bungereza bakyaddeko ku Bulange.
text: Ababaka ba Palamenti ab’ensi ezaali amatwale ga Bungereza  nga batuuka ku bulange Ababaka ba Palamenti ab’ensi ezaaliko amatwale ga Bungereza bakyaddeko ku Bulange. Ekibinja kino kibadde kikulembeddwamu omubaka omukyala owa district ye Mpigi Hon.Sarah Nakawunde Temulanda ne Hon.Allan Ssewanyana owe Makindye, era nga baaniriziddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda Owek Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule n’omumyuka we Owek Ahmed Lwasa. Katikkiro nga ayogerako eri ababaka.Hon.Sarah Nakawunde Temulanda nga anyonyola ensonga eyabelese mu bwa Kabaka. Katikkiro mu kwogera kwe abayitiddemu era n’abanyonyola  ebyafaayo ne gyenvudde w’obwakabaka bwa Buganda. Ye omumyuka wa Katikkiro ow’okubiri era Minisita w’eby’ensimbi Oweek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ayogedde  era n’alaga enteekateeka z’obwakabaka wamu n’emirimu Obwakabaka gyebukola okulaba nti abantu ba Buganda badda ku ntikko nga buyita mu kubazimbira enzizi okusobola okufuna amazzi amayonjo, okuzimbira abantu enyumba az’ensimbi ensaamusaamu okusobola okubeera mu bulamu obweyagaza ate nga balamu bulungi. Oluvanyuma Katikkiro alambuzza ababaka ekisenge ky’olukiiko ekiteesezebwamu (Buganda Parliament) era ne wano ababuulidde ebyafaayo by’olukiiko wamu n’emirembe gya ba Ssekabaka egizze gibeerawo. Ababaka bano bwebavudde ku Bulange balambuziddwa ebintu ebirala omuli Olubiri, Enyanja ya Kabaka, Ebibumbe by’ebika okusobola okulaba emirimu egy’enjawulo egikolebwa Obwakabaka. Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka era Minisita w’eby’emirimu n’obuyiiya, Owek Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, yakoze nga omukubiriza w’olukiiko ow’ekiseera era yabadde kalabaalaba w’omukolo. Omukolo gwetabiddwako, Omulangira David Kintu Wasajja, Nnaalinya Sarah Kagere, Owek Bbaale Mugera, Ssaabalangira Godfrey Musanje, Baminisita ba Kabaka, Abataka abakulu b’obusolya, abakulu b’ebitongole by’obwakabaka, n’abaweereza b’obwakabaka. Ababaka okuva mu nsi ezaali amatwale ga Bungereza bali wano mu Uganda mu lukungaana olubagatta olw’omulundi ogwe 64th (Commonwealth Parliamentary Conference) oluyindira ku speak resort e Munyonyo.

headline: Lwaki Omulamuzi agobye ogwa NUP, oguvunaanibwa Bobi Wine ne banne
text: Kampala Bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) bafunye ku buweerero oluvannyuma lwa kkooti enkulu ey’engassi mu Kampala okugoba omusango ogubadde guwakanya okukyusa erinnya ly’ekibiina kino wamu n’obukulembeze bwapulezidenti waakyo Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine). Pulezidenti wa NUP, Bobi Wine ne bannakibiina Bannakibiina babiri okuli Basile Didas ne Hassan Twaha, baatwala Bobi Wine n’abalala 10 mu kkooti era nga baagala erangirire nti byonna ebyakolebwa okukyusa ekibiina kino okuva ku National Unity and Reconcilliation Platform n’okukikwasa Bobi Wine ng’omukulembeze waakyo byali bikyamu. Baali basaba kkooti ekibiina kino ekiddize bannyini kyo abatuufu, bino olwaleero, omulamuzi Musa Ssekaana mu nsala ye gyawadde ku Email abigobye era n’alagira oludda oluwaabi okuliyirira abawawaabirwa. Omwogezi w’ekibiina kya NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi agambye nti ensala eno ebasanyusiza nga kati kibongedde amaanyi kubanga kitegeeza nti NUP eri mu mateeka. Omulamuzi Ssekaana ategeezezza nti Basile ne Twaha tebagoberera mitendera nga beemulugunya ku kukyusa ekibiina kyabwe. “Mu musango guno abawaabi balina okusaba kkooti etunule mu nsonga zaabwe nga wayise ebbanga lya myezi 3 ng’ekibiina kimaze okukyusibwa erinnya naye bano balinda omwaka mulamba negumala okuyitawo,” Ensala bw’esomye. Omulamuzi Ssekaana era anenyezza omuwaabi okuleeta omusango guno mu kiseera ky’okulonda okwagala okwekolera ku ssente naye nga teyalina nsonga nnung’amu. Ono agasseeko nti kkooti ebadde terina ngeri gy’eyinza kuyambamu bawaabi ate nga n’omusango gwennyini okuguwaaba tebaagoberera mateeka. Wabaddewo okutya ng’abawagizi b’Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi balowooza nti singa omusango gumusinga ajja kuba takyasobola kwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti nga bano ensala eno ebawadde akaseko ku matama.

headline: Basabye kkooti egobe ogwa 2010 oguvunaanibwa Ssekikubo
text: Masaka Munnamateeka w’omubaka wa Lwemiyaga mu Palamenti, Theodore Ssekikubo, asabye Omulamuzi wa kkooti ento e Masaka agobe omusango oguvunaanibwa omuntu waabwe ogw’okukuma omuliro mu bantu mu kamyufu ka NRM ak’omwaka 2010. Omubaka Theodore Ssekikubo Kino kiddiridde Omuwaabi wa gavumenti, Sheba Byakutaga, okutegeeza Omulamuzi wa kkooti eno, Charles Yitesi, okwongerwa ku budde aleete abantu abalala abavunaanibwa ne Ssekikubo wamu n’bajulizi mu musango guno. Byakutaga yategeezezza kkooti eggulo ku Lwokuna nti abajulizi b’alina, baalemeddwa okujja mu kkooti era n’asaba bongerwe ku budde, basobole okutereeza ensonga eno. Kino munnamateeka wa Ssekikubo, Alexander Lure, yakigaanye. Lure yasabye kkooti egobe omusango guno n’ategeeza nti okugukomyawo mu myaka gwa 2020 kyakolebwa mu nsobi, kubanga kkooti yali yagugoba mu mwaka gwa 2010 oluvannyuma lw’okubulwa obujulizi. “Omusango guno gwa 2010 naye gwakomezeddwawo mu 2020 lwa nsonga za byabufuzi. Omusango bagukomezzaawo nga bwe gwali mu 2010 nga tewali kye bakyusizzaamu era nga tusaba kkooti omusango guno egugobe, ensonga gye beekwasa yeeyo eyaliwo okusooka. Naye ate baagaana okutereeza ensobi entono eziri mu musango guno nga baddamu okuguwaaba.”” Alexander bwe yannyonnyodde. Omulamuzi Yitesi yeewuunyizza lwaki oludda oluwaabi lulemeddwa okuleeta abavunaaanibwa ne Ssekikubo, ekintu ekisibye omusango. “Mulina buli kyetaagisa naye ndaba buli mulundi omuntu omu yekka yaleetebwa mu kkooti ate ng’empaaba eriko abantu abalala. Bwe luba oludda oluwaabi terusobola kufuna bantu bano, bakole ennongoosereza mu musango babagyeko ku mpaaba, omusango gusobole okuwulirwa.” Omulamuzi Yitesi bwe yagambye. Omulamuzi omusango yagwongeddeyo okutuuka nga December 10, 2020 okusobozesa oludda oluwaabi okwekenneenya omusango guno. Ye Ssekikubo yeemulugunyizza lwaki gavumenti eremedde ku musango guno ogwa 2010 ogwali mu kamyufu ka 2010. Yagasseeko nti alowooza nti kino bakikola kumuggya ku byakulwanirira bantu be abanyigirizibwa mu kitundu kye. Ono yagambye nti kikuba ensonyi okulaba ng’abantu abeeyagaliza ebyabwe basazeewo okukozesa kkooti z’amateeka okumulwanyisa.

headline: Eyavuganya Museveni mu 2016, Gen Biraro afudde
text: Gen benon Biraro Munnamagye ga UPDF era nga yavuganyaako ku ntebe y’obwa pulezidenti mu 2016, Gen. Benon Biraro afudde.  Biraro, abadde ajjanjabibwa ekirwadde kya kansa afiiridde mu ddwaliro lya Kampala hospital enkya yaleero.  Ono abadde amaze akabanga ng’ali ku ndiri era eb’enjuye bategeeza gyebuvuddeko nti baali banonya ssente ku mutwala mitala wa Mayanja okusobola okufuna obujjanjjabi obusingako.

headline: Amerika etandise okuluma, abanene abaali mu mivuyo gy’akalulu ka 2021  ebataddeko natti
text: Gavumenti y’Amerika etabukidde abanene mu Uganda abeenyigira mu mivuyo gy’akalulu ka 2021 bw’ebataddeko natti ng’ebavunaana okulinnyirira eddembe ly’obuntu. Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa Minisita w’ensonga z’ebweru owa Amerika, Antony John Blinken, ategeezezza nti Uganda ezze nnyo emabega mu nsonga za Demokulaasiya era kino kyeyolekera mu kalulu akawedde aka 2021.  “Leero tulangirira natti ku ntambula z’abakungu ba Yuganda abaayisa olugaayu mu demokulaasiya w’eggwanga eryo mu kalulu akawedde aka 2021 akaakubwa nga January 14 n’emivuyo egyali mu kkampeyini.” Ekiwandiiko kya  Blinken bwe kisomye. Kino kiddiridde bannansi abawera 50 okufiirwa obulamu mu kwekalakaasa okwaliwo mu Novemba 18 ne 19 oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine bwe yali e Luuka ng’anoonya akalulu era ekyaddako abantu abawerako baakwatibwa ne baggalirwa. Oluvannyuma lw’okwekalakaasa ab’ebyokwerinda okwali amagye ne poliisi baayolesa obukambwe  ku bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform ekikulirwa Bobi Wine. Bannakibiina bateeka gavumenti ku nninga ku by’okukwata abawagizi baabwe era nayo n’ekkiriza nga bwe waaliwo abaakwatiddwa. Olunwe okusinga Amerika erutadde mu b’ebyokwerinda okulinnyirira eddembe ly’obuntu n’esaba wabeewo ekikolebwa okuvunaana abakulu bano. “Gavumenti ya Uganda erina okubaako ky’ekola evunaane abantu baayo abeetaba mu mivuyo gy’okulonda, okutiisatiisa wamu n’okubatulugunya. Amerika ejja kugenda mu maaso n’okwekenneenya engeri ensonga za demokulaasiya gye zikwatiddwamu.” Ekiwandiiko bwekigasseeko. Wadde Amerika erangiridde natti ku bannayuganda naye tefulumizza lukalala lwa amannya g’abo abasongeddwamu olunwe. Bino we bijjidde nga Minisita w’ensonga ez’ebweru mu Uganda, Sam Kuteesa yaakamala okutegeeza akakiiko k’ebyokwerinda ak’amawanga amagatte nga mu Yuganda bwe mutali kiwambabantu nga bwe kibadde kyogerwa.

headline: Ssemujju Nganda alangiridde, waakuvuganya Sipiika Kadaga
text: Omubaka akiikiririra Munisipaali ya Kira mu Palamenti, Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda, alangiridde mu butongole nti waakuvuganya Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga ku bukubiriza bwa Palamenti y’e 11. Omubaka Ssemujju Nganda nga annyonnyola bannamawulire Ssemujju kino akirangiridde nkya ya leero ku Olwokubiri wali ku Palamenti bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire. “ Ngenda kubeera Sipiika wa Palamenti era Sipiika wa bannayuganda.” Bw’atyo Ssemujju bw’alangiridde. Omubaka Ssemujju yeegasse ku lukalala lw’ababaka abaavuddeyo edda okuvuganya ku kifo kino nga ku bano kuliko Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga n’omumyuka we, Jacob Oulanyah, wadde bano tebannalangirira mu butongole. Bw’abuuziddwa ku kyagenda okukola okumegga Sipiika Kadaga, Ssemujju agambye nti yamaze dda okuwandiikira abakulira ebibiina ebivuganya ebirina ababaka mu Palamenti n’abasaba okumuwagira. Ono annyonnyodde nti abadde mu Palamenti okumala akaseera era amanyi ebintu bwe bitambula nga kino kimufunidde obuwagizi okuva mu ba NRM. Ssemujju yeeyamye nti singa anaalondebwa tagenda kubeera Sipiika wa ludda luvuganya naye ow’ababaka bonna omuli naba NRM. Nganda agamba nti yayingira Palamenti okusooka nga munnamawulire naye n’afuuka omubaka mu 2011 nga kati ali ku kisanja kye ekyokusatu era kino kimuwadde obumanyirivu ku nsonga engeri gye zitambula mu lukiiiko Olukulu. “Ngenda kukozesa obukodyo buno bwenfunye mu myaka 20 nga ndi ku Palamenti, okusooka nga ow’amawulire ate era ng’Omubaka okufuula Palamenti eyaamaanyi.” Ssemujju bw’agasseeko.

headline: Muhammad Ssegiriinya bamuzizzaayo mu kkomera
text: Omusango oguvunaanibwa omubaka wa Kawempe South mu Palamenti, Muhammad Ssegiriinya ogw’okukuma omuliro mu bantu eggwanga bwelyali ligenda mukulonda kwa 2021 gwongezeddwayo okutuuka nga February 10, 2023. Ono leero ku Lwokuna aleeteddwa mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa Buganda Road, Sienna Owomugisha nga asuubira omusango gwe okuwulirwa wakati mu by’okwerinda. Kkooti bwetandise, omu ku bakugu bapoliisi anoonyereza ku misango gy’oku mutimbagano ategeerekeseeko erya Billy nasituka okusobola okusoyezebwa ebibuuzo wabula bannamateeka ba Ssegiriinya nga bakuliddwa Geoffrey Turyamusiima nebagaana obujulizi bwe. Bano bategeezezza nti Billy alemeddwa okukakasa kkooti nti obubaka bweyawandiika buliko omuntu yenna gwebwakosa oba okusikiriza akole obutabanguko. Era wano, Turyamusiima ategeezezza omulamuzi nga oludda oluwaabi bwelusigazza abajulizi basatu wabula ekyewuunyisa bonna bapoliisi. Oludda oluwaabi lulumiriza nti wakati w’omwezi gwa August ne September wa 2020, Ssegiriinya yasinziira mu Kampala nawanika ku kibanja kye ekya Facebook ku “Ssegirinya Muhammad Fans Page ” obubaka obukuma mu bantu omuliro nga ayagala beekalakaase. Obubaka buno okusinziira ku ludda oluwaabi bwali bugamba nti,”Ndabula abo bonna abaagala okugezaako okutemula Hon. Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nti ekijja okubeera wano kijja kukubisaamu ekittabantu ekyali e Rwanda mu 1994 emirundi 40.” Omubaka Ssegiriinya kati wakudda mu kkooti omwezi ogujja okwongera okuwulira omusango guno ogumuvunaanibwa.

headline: Balagidde amagye okuleeta olukalala lw’abawagizi ba NUP be gavunaana
text: Kampala Ababaka ba Palamenti abatuula ku kakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu balagidde eggye lya UPDF okubawa olukalala lw’abawagizi ba National Unity Platform (NUP) abasimbiddwa mu kkooti y’amagye ne bavunaanibwa. Ku bano kuliko abawagizi ba Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) abaakwatibwa mu kkampeyini wamu n’abo abaakwatiddwa oluvannyuma lw’akalulu ka 2021. Bw’abadde ayanukula ababaka leero ku Lwokuna, omwogezi w’amagye, Brig Gen. Flavia Byekwaso, asabye aweebwe akadde asobole okuleeta olukalala olulaga abavunaaniddwa nabo abatannaba. “Abantu be tulina bawera 177 era olwo lwe lukalala olwaweebwa Palamenti. Naye okuva ku olwo ne leero wali ebintu ebizze bikyuka,” Byekwaso bw’agambye. Kino kiddiridde omubaka wa Kawempe North, Latif Ssebaggala, okwemulugunya ku muwendo gw’abantu ba bulijjo omungi oguvunaaniddwa mu kkooti y’amagye. “Tuyambe tusobole okutambulira awamu okututegeeza omuwendo gw’abantu ba bulijjo abavunaaniddwa mu kkooti y’amagye.” Ssebaggala bw’abuuzizza. Akulira ensonga z’amateeka mu UPDF, Brig Gen. Godard Busingye annyonnyodde nti abawagizi ba NUP babavunaanira mu tteeka lya UPDF erya 2005 era buli kimu kiri mu mateeka. Ssentebe w’akakiiko kano era omubaka omukyala owa Bugiri, Agnes Wejuli Taaka, awadde amagye obutasukka lunaku lwaleero nga bamaze okuwaayo olukalala olwo. Ababaka bategeezeddwa nti waliwo bannamawulire babiri abaakwatibwa ne Kyagulanyi e Kalangala abakyaggaliddwa okuli Musa Mulimira ne Richard Kalema.  Ku nsonga eno, Omubaka w’amagye, Brig Gen. Felix Kulaigye ategeezezza nti bannamawulire bano baggalirwa oluvannyuma lw’okulemwa okulaga ebiboogerako nga bannamawulire. Byekwaso ategeezezza nti baakwataganye ne bannamawulire abaakubwa mu kalulu ne bwekaali kawedde okulaba bwe babayambamu era n’akakasa nti bakyalabirira munnamawulire wa Reuters James Akena eyakubwa mu 2019. Ono agasseeko nti nga UPDF balina eddimu okutereeza byonna ebyasoba era bakukola buli kimu okulwanirira ekifaananyi kyabwe.

headline: Aba NUP bavumiridde eky’okugoba abatembeeyi mu Kampala, baagala abaasibibwa ku by’obufuzi bayimbulwe
text: Ekibiina kya National Unity Platform kitabukidde gavumenti olw’okugoba abatembeeyi ku nguudo z’ekibuga Kampala awatali kusooka kubafunira we bagenda kudda. Bino we bijjidde ng’ekitongole kyaKampala Capital City Authority kyatandika okusengula abatembeeyi oluvannyuma lw’okumala ekiseera nga babalabula. Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kino, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) agamba nti eggwanga limaze emyaka ebiri ng’ebyenfuna biggaddwa nga tekikola makulu mu kaseera kano okugobaabatembeeyi mu kaseera kano n’alaga nti kyandibadde kyamakulu okubalindamu. “ Kino si kye kiseera ekituufu okugoba abatembeeyi ku nguudo. Bamaze emyaka ebiri nga bali waka tebakola naye ate we babadde bafunidde essuubi okuddamu okukola ku ssente ate ne mubagoba nga temufunye waakubateeka.” Kyagulanyi bwe yagambye. Ate Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino, David Lewis Rubongoya, ategeezezza nti baagala gavumenti ekuume emirimu gy’abantu bano ng’ebalaga we bagenda okukolera. NUP era ezzeemu n’esaba bannakibiina kyabwe abaakwatibwa ku misango gy’ebyobufuzi bayimbulwe. “Gavumenti eyimbule abasibe abakwatibwa olw’ebyobufuzi oba ebatwale mu kkooti. Bano basoba mu 100 naye buli lunaku abantu batutuukirira nga bagamba nti abantu baabwe tebalabikako, baawambibwa mu mmotoka za ‘Drone’ naye tebalabikangako mu kkooti.” Rubongoya bwe yagasseeko. Bannakibiina kya NUP,bagamba nti abenganda okuli bannyinaabwe, abaana n’eikwano gyabwe gimaze omwaka mulamba nga tebalabikako kyokka ne mu kkooti tebaliiyo.

headline: Ssegirinya asindikiddwa ku alimanda, asuze Kitalya
text: Kampala Omulamuzi wa kkooti ya Buganda Road, Gladys Kamasanyu, asindise omubaka omulonde owa Kawempe North mu Palamenti, Muhammad Ssegirinya ku alimanda mu kkomera e Kitalya okutuusa nga 08, omwezi ogujja lw’anadda okulaba oba yeeyimirirwa. Omubaka Ssegirinya asuze Kitalya Kino kiddiridde Omubaka Ssegirinya okusimbibwa mu kkooti leero ku Lwokubiri oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa nga yeekalakaasa ng’abanja bannakibiina kya NUP abaawambibwa n’avunaanibwa okukuma mu bantu omuliro wadde ng’omusango guno agwegaanye. Kigambibwa nti Sseggirinya yabadde wamu n’abantu abalala nga bakutte ebipande ebibanja abakwate wamu n’okuvumirira ebikolwa ebivvoola eddembe ly’obuntu. Bano baabombye oluvannyuma lw’okulaba poliisi wabula oluvannyuma Ssegirinya n’akwatibwa era n’aggalirwa. Oludda oluwaabi lutegeezezza nti Ssegirinya wamu n’abalala abaliira ku nsiko bakung’aana nga 25 /March/ 2021 ku Mini Price mu Kampala ne batandika okukuma omuliro mu bantu nga bakutte ebipande ebibanja obuwanguzi bwa Bobi Wine, Mubiru James, Nubian Lee, Eddy Mutwe be bagamba nti bakwatibwa lwa ndowooza zaabwe ez’ebyobufuzi wamu n’okuwagira Robert Kyagulanyi

headline: Owa ANT awakanyiza eby’okuwandiisa mutabani wa Jacob Oulanyah agamba kwalimu ebirumira
text: Munnakibiina ki ‘Alliance for National Transformation (ANT)’ eyeesimbyewo mu kalulu k’e Omoro okunoonya anaddira eyali Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah mu bigere, Kizza Oscar, awakanyiza okwewandiisa kwa munnakibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM)’ Andrew Ojok Oulanyah nga agamba mwalimu ebirumira. Mu kwemulugunya kwatutte eri akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Kiiza agamba nti amannya ga Ojok tegakwatagana nga agali ku ndagamuntu ga njawulo nagali ku mpapula ze ez’obuyigirize era nga alemedde ku kozesa erinnya Oulanyah eritalina weriri ku mpapula ze ez’obuyigirize. “ Njagala okuteekamu okwemulugunya kwange ku kuwandiisa munnakibiina ki NRM gwebayita ‘Ojok Andrew Oulanyah,’ omuntu ono taliiwo era talina mpapula zonna zabuyigirize zimwogerako era empapula zakozesa za Ojok Andrew O,” Ekiwandiiko kya Kizza bwekisomye. Kiiza agamba nti tekisoboka kwewandiisa nga amannya agali ku mpapula gawukanira ddala nagali ku ndagamuntu kuba kino kiba kitegeeza nti bano bantu babiri banjawulo. Okusinziira ku Kiiza ekikolwa ky’ Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okuwandiisa Ojok mu mbeera bweti kikontana ne tteeka erifuga okulonda ababaka erya ‘Parliamentary Act 2002’ akawaayiro nnamba 13 nga kati ayagala akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kakkirize nti kakola ensobi era kalangirire nti Ojok yawandiisibwa mu bukyamu. Bwabuziddwa ku bino, Ojok ategeezezza omukutu guno nga bwatanafuna kwemulugunya kuno mu butongole nga tasobola ku kwogerako. Ojok agamba nti tatidde kuba alina ebisaanyizo byonna n’obusobozi ebyetaagibwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda era akalulu ajja kukawangula nasaba bwebali mu lwokaano okukomya okupalapalanya.

headline: Tewali bwetaavu bwakukyuusa Ssemateeka ku bikwata ku Sipiika – Prof Kanyeihamba
text: Eyaliko omulamuzi wa kkooti ensukkulumu, Prof. George Kanyeihamba era eyakulira akakiiko k’ebyamateeka mu ‘Constituent Assembly’ okukola Ssemateeka wa 1995 awakanyiza eby’okukola ennongoosereza mu nnyingo 82 okuggyamu eky’okulonda Sipiika mu bwangu singa ekifo abaddewo ava mu bulamu bw’ensi. Kino kiddiridde amaloboozi agawera okuvaayo nga gasaba ennoongosereza zikolebwa mu tteeka lino oluvannyuma lw’ okufa kwa Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah nga okusinziira ku tteeka tewali kirala kisobola kukolebwa mu Palamenti okuggyako nga Sipiika omuggya amaze okulondebwa. Pulezidenti Museveni y’omu ku bawakanyiza kino nga bweyabadde ku mukolo gw’okulonda n’okulayiza Sipiika omuggya Anita Among, yategeezezza nti ekola eno siyabuntu bulamu nga omufu abeera alina okuweebwa ekitibwa sosi bantu kuvaayo kutandika kulwanira kifo kyabaddemu nasaba kino kitereezebwe. Prof. Kanyeihamba agamba nti bwebaali bakola ssemateeka eno teyali nsobi nga abamu bwebalowooza era baalina ensonga lwaki bakireka bwebatyo. Okusinziira ku Kanyeihamba wadde ng’ etteeka liragira omumyuka wa Pulezidenti okutwala obuyinza singa Pulezidenti abaddeko afa naye ku kya Sipiika kya njawulo kuba ekifo kino kifugibwa mu kulonda era asinga okuweza omuwendo gw’ababaka abamulonda yatuula mu ntebe eno. Kanyeihamba asabye wabeewo okwebuuza nga ennongoosereza zino tezinakolebwa era bamanye lwaki abakola ssemateeka ensonga eno baalina okugireka nga bweri era ayagala bakomye n’okukola ennoongosereza mu Ssemateeka buli webabeera baagalidde.

headline: Ab’ebyokwerinda bekobaana n’oludda oluvuganya  mu kwekalakaasa – Minisita Mbayo
text: Bya Yusufu Muwuluzi Kampala Minisita w’ensonga z’Obwapulezidenti, Esther Mbayo, ategeezezza nti batandise okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti abamu ku b’ebyokwerinda beenyigira mu kwekalakaasa kuno ne balemwa okukola omulimu gwabwe. Minisita Mbayo nabamu ku beetabye mu lusirika luno e Masaka ku Brovad Bino Mbayo yabyogeredde mu lusirika lw’abatwala eby’okwerinda okuli; ba RDC, DISO ne bassentebe ba NRM mu disitulikiti ez’enjawulo ezikola ettundutundu lya Masaka, olwayindidde ku Hotel Brovad eggulo ku Lwokusatu. “Waliwo ab’ebyokwerinda abalwanyisa gavumenti era tubamanyi era tukola buli kimu okubakolako. Ggwe bw’oba olwanyisa gavumenti obeera okolerera ani? Ebintu bino bitegeke era abamu wakati mu kwekalakaasa baatuula butuuzi ne bagaana okufaayo okukuuma abantu.” Mbayo bwe yagambye. Minisita Mbayo yagambye nti kyewuunyisa okulaba ng’amawanga g’ebweru gavumirira enneeyisa ya b’ebyokwerinda kyokka ne batavaayo ku beekalakaasa abaakola effujjo n’okwonoona ebintu. Ono yagasseeko nti gavumenti yeetegese ekimala okukuuma bannayuganda ne byabwe era n’asaba abeesimbyewo okukuuma obulamu bwa bantu. Mbayo agamba nti wadde waliwo ensobi ezaakolebwa ku ludda lw’abapoliisi, naye bannayuganda balina okukimanya nti tewali muntu atuukiriddde. Kino kyaddiridde okwekalakaasa okwali mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) e Luuka. Okwekalakaasa kuno kwafiiramu abantu abasoba mu 50 era ng’ebintu ebiwerako byayonoonebwa. RDC wa Kyotera, Maj. David Matovu yasinzidde mu lusirika luno n’asaba gavumenti okuvaayo ekome ku bakulembeze b’ennono ne bannaddiini b’agamba nti batandise okukuma mu bantu omuliro. Matovu yannyonnyodde nti abamu ku bannaddiini n’abakulembeze b’ensikirano, balina obukyayi ku gavumenti.

headline: Ebizibu bya Uganda by’erina biva ku butatambulira ku mateeka -Owek. Mayiga
text: Bulange Mukuumaddamula wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezezza nti ekizibu kya Uganda be bannabyabufuzi okulemwa okutambulira ku nkola essa ekitiibwa mu mateeka ne Ssemateeka era ng’ebizibu bino biviira ddala mu 1966. Bannakibiina kya Democratic Party abakyadde embuga Bino Owek. Mayiga abitegeezezza bannakibiina kya Democratic Party nga bakulembeddwamu Ssenkaggale Nobert Mao abamukyaliddeko leero ku Lwokuna mu bimuli bya Bulange okumwanjulira manifesito yaabwe “Tewabangawo abalimba nti ebizibu bya Uganda biva ku baganda kwagala nnyo Kabaka, oba Omukaramoja nti ayagala nnyo ente ze, kuba ennono ye etambulira mu nte oba Abagisu baagala nnyo embalu, ebyo si bye bizibu byaffe.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Olw’okulemwa okutambulira ku Ssemateeka Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti eddembe ly’obuntu lyatyoboolwa, gavumenti zaggwa, obululu bwabbibwa, entalo ezeekiyeekera era nga n’okutuusa olwaleero tukyalaba obutabanguko. Katikkiro Mayiga agasseeko nti ebyaliwo mu 1966 ne 1967 byava ku Obote okulemwa okussa ekitiibwa mu nkola etambulira ku mateeka, ssemateeka wamu n’ebyo abantu bye baagala era nga n’okutuusa kati kye kikyali ekizibu. Owek. Mayiga asabye Aba DP okunyikiza enkola y’amateeka mu bibiina byabwe olwo ne Uganda ejja kutereera singa ebibiina binaatambuzibwa mu ngeri ennung’amu. Kamalabyonna abasiimye olw’okutegeera ensonga za Buganda ssemasonga ettaano era n’ategeeza nti singa bagenda mu maaso n’okutambulira ku mateeka n’ebyo Buganda by’eruubirira byangu wakati mu kukkaanya. Owek. Mayiga asabye bannabyabufuzi okusoosoowaza ensi Uganda n’abantu ba bulijjo kuba wadde ng’okulonda kutadde ensi ku bunkenke naye ate ebyobufuzi bigenda kuggwa oluvannyuma lw’okulonda. Mao ategeezezza Kamalabyonna nti ebbanga lye lyonna erisinga alimaze mu Buganda era n’awera nti ekibaleese kwe kukakasa ebyo bye bakkiririzaamu nga DP muno nga mwe muli obufuzi bw’ensikirano. “Nga DP tukkiririza mu kutaasa n’okukuuma Nnamulonda era nga DP tukimanyi bulungi nti etteeka lye baateekawo mu kunyweza Obufuzi obw’ensikirano n’ennono, obuwaayiro obumu bukontana ne Ssemateeka w’eggwanga era tuzze tukyogera ne bannaffe. Bassebo ne bannyabo, Ssaabasajja Kabaka yalwana mu lutalo olwaleeta gavumenti eno mu buyinza.” Mao bw’ategeezezza. Mao agambye nti gavumenti ya wakati esaanye ebeera nnambulukufu era eddize Buganda ebintu byayo byonna kubanga yakola ky’amaanyi okugiteeka mu buyinza. Annyonnyodde Katikkiro nga bwe batunuulidde okutwala obukulembeze basobole okutabaganya bannayuganda abasowaganye ku njuyi ez’enjawulo era nga bino byonna byakukolebwa mu mazima n’obwenkanya. Ssenkaggale Mao agasseeko nti batunuulidde okutumbula obwerufu era bamalewo obubbi bwa ssente mu bitongole bya gavumenti kikendeeze ku ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo ezifaafagana. Mao agambye Katikkiro nti bagenda kunoonyereza ku by’obugagga bya bakozi ba gavumenti, kiyambeko okukendeeza omuze gwa bannayuganda okusinza ababbi ba ssente. Mu birala aba DP kye batunuulidde, kwe kuzimba Uganda ekulaakulanira awamu kisobole okutwala Uganda mu maaso. Ono ategeezezza nga bw’atwala Katikkiro Mayiga ng’ekyokulabirako era ng’agenda kwongera okugatta ekibiina kya Democratic Party n’okukitwala mu maaso. Mu kiseera kino, Mao atabaala ebitundu bya Buganda ebyenjawulo ng’anoonya obululu obunaamutuusa ku bukulembeze bwa Uganda mu kalulu ka bonna akakubye kkoodi.

headline: Ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi binyoose mu kulonda kw’abavubuka e Kamwokya
text: Kamwokya Poliisi ewalirizddwa okukuba Ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okutangira abavubuka b’ekibiina ki ‘National Resistance Movement (NRM) naba National Unity Platform-(NUP) okubatangira okweggwa mu malaka mukulonda kw’abavubuka ku byalo. Abavubuka ku bimu ku bifo ebironderwamu e Kamwokya Kalumanywera okusinga yabadde mu Zzooni ya Kifumbira A ne Kifumbira B e Kamwokya ng’ eno okulonda kw’eggulo tekwawedde bwekutyo nekuddibwamu leero ku Lwokubiri. Ebifo bino byombi biri ku ssomero lya Homisdallen Primary School e Kamwokya mu Kampala. Omu ku balonzi mu Kifumbira B Alex Mugisa, ategeezezza nti embiranye bwebadde wakati wa munna NRM Philip Olobo ne munnakibiina ki NUP Edward Mujeza, nga bano eggulo basibaganidde ku bululu 55 buli omu.
