Enjuyi zombi zagaanye ebyavudde mu kalulu era okukakana nga okulonda e Kifumbira B kuyiise. Ate mu Kifumbira B olukalala lw’abalonzi lwabiddwa ekintu ekyawalirizza abalondesa okuddamu okutegeka okulonda kuno  ku makya ga leero ku Lwokubiri. Eby’okwerinda  byakedde kunywezebwa poliisi,  era okulonda nekuddamu wabula obwedda abawagizi ba NUP balumiriza aba NRM okukozesa poliisi okugaana abalonzi babwe okutuuka awalonderwa. Kino kitabudde embeera ekiwalirizza poliisi okukozesa ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okukakkanya abavubuka, olwo dduka dduka naddamu ekiwalirizza  aba LDU n’Amajje okuleetebwa bayambe ku poliisi olwo embeera neteleera era okulonda nekuddamu. Oluvanyuma owa NRM Philip Olobo, alangiriddwa ku buwanguzi bwafunye obululu 67 ate ye Edward Mujeza nga alina 64. Bino aba NUP  olubitegedde nebatambula nga balumba ababadde balondera ku Kifumbira A  wabula poliisi nebatangira ekintu ekizzeemu okutabula embeera. Wetukoledde eggulire lino nga okulonda kukyagenda mu maaso mu Kifumbira A. Okusinziira ku batunuulizi b’ensonga,  okulonda  kw’abavubuka  wonna mu Ggwanga kubaddemu emivuyo mingi ekiwalirizza poliisi okuyingirawo etaase embeera. URN

headline: Bakunze ebitundu ebirala okwettanira Federo
text: Bannayuganda mu bitundu ebyenjawulo basabiddwa okwettanira okumanya ensonga ya Federo era bakimanye nti enkola eno teganyula kitundu kya Buganda wabula n’ebitundu ebirala ebikola Uganda. Okukunga kuno kukoleddwa aboogezi ab’enjawulo ku mukolo gw’okutongoza ekitabo ekikwata ku Federo, ekituumiddwa Federalisim for a New Uganda, ekitongozeddwa Omubaka Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya. “Federo ayogerwako mu kitabo kino ya Uganda yonna era ezingiramu ebitundu 13 okuli; Bunyoro, Buganda, Busoga, Acholi, Lango awamu n’ebirala wadde nga waliwo ebitundu ebigezaako okuteekebwawo n’ekiruubvirirwa ky’okutabangula ebitundu ebyasangibwawo.” Sserunjogi bw’agambye Sserunjogi agamba nti Federo tekitegeeza Buganda ng’abantu bwe bakitwala kuba ekigendererwa kya kugabana buyinza wakati w’ebitundu bino awamu ne gavumenti eyaawakati. Ono agamba nti tewali muntu yenna ayinza kugonjoola bizibu by’abantu bonna okuggyako ng’obuyinza bugabaniddwa mu ngeri y’obuvunaanyizibwa era mu bwerufu, ebitundu ne bisobola okukola ku bizibu byabyo. Okusinziira ku Sserunjogi, singa Uganda yonna eweebwa Federo, kijja kuyamba okukendeeza ku muwendo gw’ababaka ba Palamenti abangi kuba buli kitundu kijja kuba kirina Palamenti yaakyo ng’ababaka abaawamu tebasobola kusukka 200. Omuwandiisi Sserunjogi agamba nti disitulikiti ez’enjawulo zikung’aanya ssente nnyingi kyokka ate ne zizitwala mu gavumenti ezigabanyizeeko era nga n’ensonga ya disitulikiti ennyingi erina okutunulwamu kuba abantu banoonya buweereza so si bungi bwa disitulikiti. Ono ayagala ebitundu byonna okuli; Busoga, Acholi, Bugisu ne Bunyoro, okusoosowaza ensonga ya Federo kuba y’egenda okuyamba ebitundu byabwe mu bwenkanya, kiyambe okuyimusa embeera z’abantu baabyo. Sserunjogi ategeezezza nti Uganda erimu amawanga mangi nga kijja kwanguya okukolera awamu n’okutwala eggwanga mu maaso. Ate ye omubaka wa Nakaseke Central, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya ategeezezza nti Federo erina kutandikira ku kugisomesa bantu yonna gye bali, okutegeera ensonga eno kuba singa ebitundu biweebwa obuyinza okusalawo, eggwanga lino lisobola okutambula obulungi. “Ebitundu ebisinga biraba nga Buganda y’egenda okufunamu mu Federo naye kino kya Uganda yonna kuba n’endagaano ya 1900 yali ekirambika nti ebitundu bino ebya Uganda 13 bye byali bitambulirako ensonga. Buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okuddayo okusomesa abantu baffe obukulu bwa Federo.” Omubaka Mayanja bw’annyonnyodde. Kinajjukirwa nti Buganda ezze ebanja gavumenti okugiwa enkola ya Federo kigiyambeko okwekolera ku nsonga zaayo, kiyambe okutumbula embeera z’abantu mu kitundu kino.

headline: Abeekalakaasa bazzeemu, baagala Bobi Wine ayimbulwe mu bwangu
text: Kampala Poliisi ezzeemu okugobagana n’abeekalakaasa mu bitundu bya Kampala okuli; Mulago, Kawempe ne Wandegeya, nga baagala poliisi eyimbule Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform (NUP) Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine).  Kyagulanyi yakwatiddwa eggulo ku Lwokusatu okuva e Luuka, n’aggalirwa e Nalufenya mu Jinja olw’okumenya ebiragiro by’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ebigendereddwamu okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi okuli aba boodabooda, abooza emmotoka n’abantu abalala be bamu ku bakedde okubanja Kyagulanyi okuyimbulwa awatali kakwakkulizo konna. Poliisi wadde yalabudde abantu okukomya okwekalakaasa n’okwokya ebipiira, bano bakedde kuggala nguudo e Mulago n’e Wandegeya wakati mu poliisi okugezaako okubagumbulula. Abantu abasoba mu 50 bagambibwa okuba nti be batwaliddwa mu ddwaliro e Mulago nga bakoseddwa ttiyaggaasi. Abamu ku beekalakaasizza, Arnold Tumwine, asabye Pulezidenti Museveni okulagira Kyagulanyi ayimbulwe mu bwangu kuba talina musango gwe yakoze. Bizineensi ku luguudo lwa Kampala –Gayaza ng’eno ye wasangibwa amaka ga Kyagulanyi, zisanyaladde olw’abatuuze mu kitundu kino okukeera okubanja Bobi Wine, ne bano bookezza ebipiira n’okuggala enguudo okuviira ddala ku Kaleerwe okutuuka e Kasangati. Emmotoka ezitambula ku luguudo luno ntono nnyo era ng’abamu ku basuubuzi balabiddwako nga batudde wabweru w’amaduuka gaabwe. Ku ssaawa 4:30 poliisi, n’amagye bisazeeko obutawuni ku luguudo luno era ne bagobaganya abamu ku bavubuka ababadde bagambibwa okukuma omuliro mu nguudo. URN

headline: Banyankole nabo  baavu bazibu, abafunye mu gavumenti be batono –  Kabuleta
text: Akulira ekisinde ki National Economic Empowerment Dialogue (NEED), Joseph Kizza Kabuleta agamba nti bannayuganda mu bitundu eby’enjawulo banonaabona wadde waliwo abatono abeeyagala mu kitundu kya Ankole. Kabuleta nga yavuganyako ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021, bino yabyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire ku kitebe kya NEED mu Kampala ku Mmande. “Si nti abanyakole bonna bafunye mu gavumenti eno, abasinga bali mu buzibu ng’ abalala era batubidde mu bwavu naye waliyo abatono abeeyagala era bano bebagezaako okusiiga ekifananyi nti abantu b’ekitundu kino bali bulungi,” Kabuleeta bwe yagambye. Okusinziira ku Kabuleta okuva NRM lweyatandikibwawo ebadde etiitiibya nnyo Abahima n’Abatuusi nga bebaluka enteekateeka y’okulembera Uganda okumala emyaka 50, wadde okusooka bannayuganda babiraba nga lusaago naye bagenze okulaba ng’emyaka 50 gibulako katono okukongoka. Kabuleta agamba nti bano bakozeseza bbanka okwezza ebintu bya bantu nga babawola amabanja ku magoba amangi bwebalemererwa nebatwala ebizimbe n’ettaka lyabwe era bakola nnyo okulaba nti abantu babakuumira mu bwavu basobole okubafuga. “Ebya Uganda bigenda biggwawo mpola. Kyetulina kati be Bahima abeefuze buli kantu,” Kabuleta bwe yannyonnyodde n’asaba bannayuganda okusitukiramu beerwaneko nga ekiseera tekinayita kufuuka baddu mu nsi yabwe. Eyaliko omubaka wa Isingiro North mu Palamenti Prossy Ayebare yategeezezza nti Abanyankore n’Abakiga tebalina kyebafunye mu gavumenti eno kuba Abahima n’Abatuusi bebasalawo ku ani atuula mu kifo era ne ani asalawo ku nsonga ez’amakulu mu ggwanga. Ayebare yasabye bannayuganda bakomye okubatwalira awamu kuba si nti buli Munyankole alina kyafunye mu gavumenti eno kuba nabo amasomero, amalwaliro byonna biri mu mbeera mbi era nabo beesanze babbiddwako ettaka abanene abali mu gavumenti. Omu ku bantu abavuddeyo okukakasa kino ye Edwin Akoragye, omutuuze we Biharwe mu Mbarara city eyagambye nti Abahima n’Abatuusi be basalawo mwana wa ani alina okufuna sikaala za gavumenti okusomera ebweru n’okubeera mu bifo era bafudde bannansi abasibe mu nsi yabwe. “ Balina enteekateeka y’okuyonja Kampala naye nga baagala kumwefuga. Baagala baleete amatooke nga bamaze okugawaata okuva e Rubindi, baagala ente batandike kuzittira mu lufula gyebazimbye e Birabwe. Baagala okwefuga buli kantu okuva ku mmwaanyi, amata, amatooke awamu n’ebirala,” Akoragye bwe yannyonnyodde. Ono yategeezezza nti ettaka mu Ankole libbibwa, e Rwenjeru omuntu omu yaweebwa sikweya Mayiro 500 ku bwerere alundireko ente. Ono alina akakwate ku banene mu gavumenti era abaavu abaliwo bagobwawo era tebalina wakubeera. Akoragye agamba nti Abanyankole si basosoze, era ssi babi nga bannayuganda bwebalowooza olw’ebikolwa by’abantu abamu abali mu gavumenti. Akwanaganya ekisinde ki NEED mu ggwanga, Asuman Odaka, agamba nti baagala okulaba ng’eggwanga ligabana kyenkanyi eby’obugagga kiriyambe okulaakulanira awamu Odaka yategeezezza bannamawulire nti abantu b’e Bukedi balowooza nti Abanyankole bali bulungi ekintu ekitali kituufu.

headline: Abalonzi tebakyalina bwesige mu balondesa – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti ekivuddeko emivuyo egyalabiddwa mu kulonda kw’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM) n’ebibiina ebirala, kwe kuba nga tebakyalina bwesige mu nteekateeka ya kulonda munda mu bibiina n’okulonda kw’eggwanga lyonna. Katikkiro Mayiga ne Minisita Kiwanda mu Bulange Mayiga okwogera bino yabadde akoona ku by’agamba nti bye byavuddeko emivuyo mu Kamyufu. Okwogera bino yabadde asisinkanye amyuka ssentebe w’ekibiina kya NRM, Godfrey Kiwanda Ssuubi ne bannakibiina abaamukyaliddeko mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokusatu. “Ekivaako obusambattuko lwakubanga abalonzi tebakyalina bwesige mu abo abalondesa. Ate era n’embeera yonna ey’okulonda babeera tebagirabamu mazima na bwenkanya.”Katikkiro Mayiga bwe yategeezezza Katikkiro Mayiga yalambuludde nga abeesimbawo mu Kamyufu ka NRM bwe baalabibwako nga bagabira abantu ssente n’abasaba okukimanya nti Uganda yeetaaga eby’obufuzi eby’emirembe ng’abantu beerondera abantu be beesimidde. Mayiga yawabudde nti singa okulonda kubeera kumaamiddwa vvulugu nga n’abavuganya tebakkirizibwa kukuba nkung’aana, tewali ngeri balonzi bwe bayinza kukkiriza biva mu kulonda kwa ngeri eno n’asaba kino kitunulwemu. Yasabye ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza okubeera eky’okulabirako olwo kyanguyire ebibiina ebirala okubatwala ng’ekyokulabirako. “Eky’obugagga NRM ky’esaana okulekera Uganda, kwe kulaba nti okulonda mu bibiina munda okutandikira ddala mu NRM ne mu kulonda okwa Uganda yonna kubeera kwa mirembe, kw’amazima kwa Bwenkanya.” Owek. Mayiga bwe yalambuludde. Katikkiro yabasabye bakimanye nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okutegeka okulonda mu mirembe ne mu bwenkanya kyanguyire ebibiina ebirala okugoberera. Ono yasabye abeesimbyewo baveeyo balage bye bagenda okukolera abantu olwo bakole okusalawo okutuufu ku ani gwe baagala okuwa akalulu kaabwe. Yakiggumiza nga bwe batagenda kuwanda ddusu ku muntu wabula n’abasaba baveeyo balage we bayimiridde ku nsonga Ssemasonga eza Buganda ettaano. “Twagala omwana wa Kabaka aveeyo nti nze Ssemasonga ettaano nti ng’enda kuzikwata bwenti, tuzikutte bwetuti kuba nabagambye nti ffe buli omu assa mu nnono yaffe ne mu Kabaka ekitiibwa tumwaniriza.” Mayiga bwe yagasseeko. Mayiga yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni ku ky’okuzza emmotoka ya Ssekabaka Muteesa II eya Rolls Royce wabula n’ategeeza nti kino tekigenda kubalemesa kubanja emmotoka essatu endala. Ono yasabye gavumenti okukwasizaako Buganda okusobola okuddaabiriza emmotoka eno kubanga akimanyi bulungi nti gavumenti ya Uganda y’evunaanyizibwa ku kwonooneka kwayo. “Twagala tuzeewo emmotoka eno era tusaba gavumenti okutukwatirako ku mulimu gw’okugiddabiriza wabula kino tekitukugira kubanja “Benteri” Namasole, Sarah Nalule mwe yatambuliranga ne Rolls Royce endala ennya ezaawambibwa.” Mayiga bwe yasabye. Mukuumaddamula yakulisizza Minisita Kiwanda olw’okulondebwa nga omumyuka wa Ssentebe wa NRM n’ategeeza nti amutaddeko amaaso okulaba engeri gy’atambuzaamu emirimu. Ye Minisita Omubeezi ow’ebyobulamuzi Godfrey Kiwanda Ssuubi yeetonze olwa vvulugu eyali mu kamyufu ka NRM n’ategeeza nti ebyatuukawo baali bagezaako okuteeka mu nkola emu ku mpagi za NRM ey’okunnyikiza demokulaasia. Kiwanda yagambye nti olw’ensonga nti olutalo olwaleeta NRM mu buyinza lwasinga kulwanirwa mu Buganda, Buganda yafuuka obuvo era obuddo bwa NRM. Ono okukyala embuga yawerekeddwako abantu ab’enjawulo okuli; Magrate Nantogo Zziwa , Faridah Nambi , Ruth Nankabirwa ne Rogers Mulindwa.

headline: Bobi Wine ayimbuddwa ku kakalu ka kkooti
text: Iganga Eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya National Unity Platform (NUP) ku bwapulezidenti, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine, ayimbuddwa ku kakalu ka kkooti etudde e Iganga leero ku Lwokutaano.     Kyagulanyi eyakwatibwa e Luuka nga anoonya akalulu, yaggaliddwa mu kkomera e Nalufenya ku Lwokusatu okutuusa olunaku lwaleero, kkooti lw’emuyimbudde. Ono avunaanibwa omusango gw’okukuba olukung’aana olumenya amateeka wamu n’okujeemera ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. Bw’alabiseeko mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa kkooti ento e Iganga, emisango gyombi agyegaanye. “Ndi wano okugamba Museveni nti tetuli baddu mu ggwanga lyaffe, Uganda nsi yaffe era tujja kuginunula.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Kyagulanyi ayimbuddwa ku kakalu ka kakadde kalamba akatali kabuliwo ate abamweyimiridde ne basasibwa obukadde butaano ezitali za buliwo Oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Kyagulanyi abantu beekalakaasizza era ng’olunaku lw’eggulo we lwazibidde ng’abaakafa baweze 38 nga poliisi egezaako okubagumbulula. Ku Lwokusatu n’Olwokuna abavubuka baggala amakubo n’okwokya ebipiira mu nguudo era kyawaliriza abamagye okuyingira mu nsonga eno okuyambako poliisi okunyweza emirembe. Waliwo n’obutambi bw’abantu abaabadde bambadde engoye eza bulijjo abaalabiddwako nga bakutte emmundu era nga bagezaako okutugumbulula abantu abaabadde beekalakaasa. Ab’ebyokwerinda baakutte Kyagulanyi ku Lwokusatu ku bigambibwa nti yabadde amenya ebiragiro ebitangira Ssennyiga Corona ng’akung’aanya abantu. Yonna Bobi Wine gy’ayise ng’akuba enkung’aana abantu babadde bamukung’aanirako era nga kino kizze kitabula abawagizi b’ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement (NRM). Bwe yabadde e Kotido, Pulezidenti Museveni yagambye nti abantu abaabadde beekalakaasa olwa Bobi Wine okukwatibwa baabadde bakozesebwa abagwira abatayagala Uganda kutebenkera.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM: Akakiiko ka NRM katandise okuwulira okwemulugunya kw’ abawangulwa
text: Kampala Ekibiina ki NRM kitaddewo akakiiko okutunula mu kwemulugunya kwa beesimbyewo abeemulugunya  ku buwanguzi bwabwe okubbibwa mu kamyufu akeetabikamu obukubagano, okubba obululu wamu n’okulya enguzi. Amyuka Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM Richard Todwong Bweyabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku lunaku lwa Ssande, amyuka Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina ki NRM Richard Todwong yategeezezza nti, ttiimu yabwe eya bannamateeka esuubirwa okutandika okuwulira okwegulunya n’okutunula mu nsonga zino enkya ku Lwokubiri wali ku kitebe ky’ekibiina. Todwong yategeezezza nti, ebinaava mu kunoonyereza kuno byebigenda okulambika ekibiina ku kirina okukolebwa eri abo abeetaba obutereevu mu bikolwa by’okubba obululu n’okutabangula emirembe kubanga NRM kibiina kya mirembe. Kinajjukirwa nti, mubitundu ebimu bannakibiina bakubwa, abamu bafuna ebisago nga enjuyi ez’enjawulo ziyombagana ate nga waliwo nabafuna ebisago n’okukubwa amasasi ab’ ebyokwerinda ku lunaku lw’okukuba akalulu n’okukabala. Amyuka Ssaabawandiisi Todwong yakakasizza nga bwewalina okubaawo ekikolebwa eri abo abanasangibwa nga gubasinga kisobole okuyigiriza abalala nti ebikolwa nga bino tebirina kifo mu by’obufuzi by’ekibiina. “Tetuyinza kufuuka kibiina kiwagira bubbi n’obutabanguko wamu naabo ababwetabamu, tugenda kuggyamu abantu ab’ekikula kino mu kibiina,”Todwong bweyagambye. “ Nsaba ab’ebyokwerinda wamu n’essiga eddamuzi okukakasa nti, abo abeetaba mu bikolwa bino bavunaanibwa emisango gyebakola era bagaanibwe okuddamu okwetaba mukulonda mu biseera eby’omu maaso kubanga ebikolwa byabwe bivumaganya ekibiina,”Todwong bweyalambuludde.

headline: Aba NUP batandise okwogereza abaagala okwesimbawo ku lwabwe
text: Ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) kitandise kaweefube okwogereza bannakibiina abasubiddwa okufuna kkaadi baleme kwesimbawo ku lwabwe okwewala obuwanguzi bw’ekibiina okugabanyizibwamu. Omwogezi wa NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi Okusinziira ku mwogezi w’ekibiina kino Joel Ssenyonyi batandise okwogera nabo wadde nga tebaatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. “ Tuli mukwogerezeganya n’abantu bano wadde si byangu kubanga buli muntu kkaadi yali agyetaaga. Naye nga ekyamazima tikeeti yali erina kuweebwa muntu omu. Abamu bakkiriza okudda ebbali era nti tusuubira nti n’abalala bajja kukkiriza,”Ssenyonyi bw’agambye. Ssenyonyi ategeezezza nti okuva lwebafulumya olukalala lw’abagenda okukwata bbendera yabwe bangi abammibwa kkaadi tebaakyagala era beewera okwesimbawo ku lwabwe. Kino kyawaliriza abakulira NUP okuteekawo akakiiko katunule mu kwemulugunya kwabwe naye era bangi basigadde si bamativu. Ssenyonyi anyonyodde nti bano bali mukwogerezeganya nabo naye bwebigaana, ekibiina tekigenda kubeera nakyakusalawo okuggyako obutabawagira. Ono agambye nti tebagenda kufaayo ku nkolagana gyebalina na kibiina oba omukulembeze wakyo Robert Kyagulanyi naye bakuwagira abo abafuna kkaadi y’ekibiina. Abeesimbyewo abawerako bavaayo nebalaga obutali bumativu ku ngeri ekibiina gyekyagabamu kkaadi zino nga abamu balumiriza abakulu okulya enguzi.

headline: Ssaabasumba omuggya atuuzibwa 25 omwezi guno
text: Eklezia Katolika etegeezezza nga Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu ery’eKampala omuggya, Paul Ssemogerere bw’ajja okutuuzibwa mu ntebe eno mu mwezi guno nga 25. Kino kirangiriddwa Ccansala w’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala, Rev.Fr. Pius Male Ssetumbweku Lwokuna mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lw’atuuzizza ku Lutikko e Lubaga. Okusinziira ku Fr. Ssetumbwe, Ssaabasumba agenda kutuuzibwa omubaka wa Ppaapa mu Uganda, Luigi Bianco nga gwakubeera ku Lutikko e Lubaga. Kino kyaddiridde Ppaapa Francis okulangiriraokulondebwa kwa Ssemogerere okubeeraSsaabasumba w’essaza lino ng’adda mu bigere byaDr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga eyafa gyebuvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga,Bisoopu Ssemogerere yalondebwa okubeera omukuumi w’entebe ya Ssaabasumba w’essaza lino okutuusa lwe yalondeddwa okubeera Ssaabasumba omuggya.

headline: Engeri abazigu gye baalumbye amaka ga Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Kampala Poliisi e Naggalama eri mu kattu okuzuula abazigu abasoba mu 15 abagambibwa okuyingira mu maka ge eyali Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga mu kiro ekyakeesezza olwaleero ne banyaga ebimu ku bintu. Okusinziira ku batuuze bano, amaka gano baagayingiridde ku ssaawa 7 ez’ekiro e Kyabakadde mu ggombolola ye Kyampisi mu Mukono ne babba essimu abiri, emitwalo 25 ze baggye ku bamu ku bantu abakuuma amaka gano. Amyuka omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Owoyesigire, agamba nti abazigu bano baasoose kusala kikomera n’oluvannyuma ne bayingira munda nga bambadde obukookolo obwebuzaabuza. Ono agattako nti bano babadde babagalidde emiggo n’ejjambiya era olwayingidde munda abaabadde ne babasiba obundooya nebakuliita n’ebintu ebiwerako. Poliisi egamba baliko omu ku bantu ababeera mu nnyumba eno abaakwatiddwa bayambeko ku kunooonyereza okugenda mu maaso. Okusinziira ku Oweyesigire bye bazudde biraga nti yabuzeewo kyokka n’akomawo ku makya ku ssaawa 12 nga bateebereza okuba nti yabadde amanyi ku lukwe luno. Mu kiseera kino amaka nga Ssaabasumba awaabadde obubbi buno gazingiddwako poliisi nga tewali muntu yenna akkirizibwa kugenda yo ssaako n’okwogera n’abo abamu ku bantu ababiri abaanyagiddwako ebintu byabwe.  Ebimu ku bintu ebyabadde bibbiddwa poliisi ebizudde era ng’omukwate akuumirwa ku poliisi y’e Naggalama.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asaasidde Eklezia olw’okufa kw’omusumba Kaggwa
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asaasidde abakulisitu mu Eklezia Katolika, ab’ekika kye Mbogo awamu ne bannayuganda bonna olw’okufa kw’omusumba w’e Masaka eyawummula John Baptist Kaggwa. Katikkiro Mayiga mukuziika Bisoopu Kaggwa Nga ayita mu bubaka bwe obumusomeddwa Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga, Omutanda amwogeddeko nga omuntu abadde alungamya abantu be awatali kutya kwonna era eddoboozi ly’abantu bonna era abadde ayagala ennyo ekika kye. Beene ayogedde okusaasira omukulu w’ekika kye Mbogo Omutaka Kayiira Gajuule awamu ne bannayuganda bonna. Ate ku lulwe Katikkiro Mayiga ayogedde ku mugenzi nga omusajja abadde akola omulimu ogwetendo okulyowa emyoyo gy’abantu ba Katonda wamu nokulwanirira obwenkanya mu bantu bano. Omusumba Kaggwa aziikiddwa olunaku lwa leero mu Seminaliyo ye Bukalasa era nga ekitambiro kya mmisa ekimusiibula kikulembeddwamu gukulembeddwamu Ssentebe w’olukiiko lw’abasumba mu Uganda, omusumba Anthony Zziwa. Abasumba ab’enjawulo basiimye omugenzi nga omusumba abadde awereza n’okwagala mu keleziya ya Uganda n’eyensi yonna era nti abadde afaayo okulabirira endiga za mukama mu mbeera yonna. Bano banokoddeyo ebirungi munnabwe byeyakola omuli okuggulawo obusumba n’amatendekero mu bitundu eby’enjawulo,okubeera omulwanirizi w’eddembe, emirembe kwossa amazima n’obwenkanya ate nga kwotadde n’okubeera omugunjuzi w’abasaaseredooti. Omusumba zziwa yeebazizza olw’ obukozi bw’omusumba Kaggwa nawa n’ekyokulabirako mbu ebiseera nga yakulira sseminariyo y’omutume Mbaaga nti ono yavuganga engendo empaavu nga akozesa loole asobole okutuusa ebyetaago nga emmere eri baakulembera. “Mukama awadde omusumba kaggwa ebitone bingi era abitulekedde tulabireko” omusumba Zziwa bweyategezezza era nasaba abantu okujjukira omugenzi nga bateeka byabayigiriza mu nkola. Omusumba Kaggwa yali omusumba we ssaza ly’emasaka okumala emyaka 20. Era ye yadda mu bigere by’omusumba omugenzi Adrian Kivumbi Ddungu sso nga ate yye yasikirwa omusumba Serverus Jjumba, afiiridde ku myaka 77.

headline: Omulabirizi Kironde Nsubuga avumiridde ettemu erikyaase
text: Omulabirizi w’ Obulabirizi bwe Luweero, Bp Elidard Kironde Nsubuga avumiridde ettemu n’ebikolwa ebya kiyiwa musaayi naddala ebijjambiya ebikyase ennyo byagamba nti bitatanye ekifananyi ky’ eggwanga kyokka nga tewali kyamaanyi kikolebwa kubirwanyisa. Okwogera bino, Omulabirizi Nsubuga abadde akulembeddemu abagabi b’omusaayi mu ggombolola ya Mutuba 8 Kikamulo n’agamba nti okugaba omusaayi kujjidde mu kiseera ng’ebikola bye ttemu b’ebaana baliwo ebirina okukoma ekituufu kuba ebikolwa by’ettemu byongedde obwetaavu bwagwo. ” Njagala okuvumirira ebikolwa byonna ebikolebwa omusaayi ogutaliiko musango neguyiika. Ensangi zino ebikolwa eby’ebijambiya ebiyiwa omusaayi kubanga omusaayi bulamu ate nga n’omusaayi mulimu obulamu,” Omulabirizi Nsubuga bw’ategeezezza.  Ye Omwami w’essaza Bulemeezi Kangaawo Ronald Mulondo agambye nti omulimu gw’abakulembeze kwekusalira amagezi ebizibu ebisomooza abantu mu kifo ky’okubyogerako obwogezi entakera. Omubaka wa Nakaseke Central Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya agambye nti ekimu ku bireesewo okusomooza okungi mu by’obulamu bebakulembeze ababulankanya ssente eziba ziyisiddwa okutumbula embeera z’abantu era ababaka bafuba okuzisesemya ababeera bazibulankanyiza. Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation omukungu Eddy Kaggwa Ndagala asinzidde wano nasaba ababaka okwongera okukola enkaliriza ku mbalirira era bakakase nti ensimbi eziweebwa Minisitule n’ebitongole zibeere ezeegasa. Olunaku olw’enkya okugaba omusaayi kuli mu ggombolola ya Ssaabagabo Nakaseke, Ssaabaddu Kapeeka, ne Mutuba 10 Semuto.

headline: Eddaali ly’ekizimbe ku Fido Dido kagwiridde abagoberezi
text: Abantu abawerako baddusiddwa mu ddwaliro nga bali mu mbeera mbi oluvannyuma lw’eddaali ly’ekizimbe ewali Fido dido ku Kampala Road, okuggwamu wakati nga bali mu kusaba. Abasawo nga batwala banonye abamu ku balumiziddwa  Bano abaddusiddwa mu ddwaliro bagoberezi ba House of Rest era baabadde bakung’aanye ku kimu ku bisenge by’ekizimbe kino nga bali mu kusaba okumanyiddwa nga ‘Lunch Hour.’ Omu ku bakolera mu kizimbe kino Kato Ibra yategeezezza nti ekizibu kyavudde ku muntu eyabadde alinnye waggulu mu ddaali (Ceiling) okulaba ekyaggyeeko amasannyalaze wabula ono teyabandaddeyo n’aggwa n’eddaali lino. “Ceiling ebadde nkadde nnyo. Abantu abawera bataano bafiiriddewo. Nze nkozesezza emmotoka yange okutwala abamu ku bantu mu ddwaliro.” Omulala ku baabaddewo Nkumbi Kenneth bwe yategeezezza. Omu ku baasimattuse, Ibrahim Ssegandi yategeezezza nti abantu abasoba mu 30 be baafunye ebisago naye ku bano 13 baabadde mu mbeera mbi. We twakoledde eggulire lino nga poliisi ekyagenda mu maaso n’okusikayo abantu mu kisenge ekyaguddemu era 15 ku bano baabadde bamaze okusikibwayo. Eby’okwerinda byanywezeddwa okuliraana ekitundu kino era poliisi obwedda tekkiriza bantu kuyingira munda mu kizimbe kino awaagudde ekizibu.

headline: Omusumba w’e Masaka akyaddeko e Mmengo, asiimye enkolagana Obwakabaka gyebulina n’Ekeleziya
text: Omusumba Jjumba wamu ne Katikkiro mu maaso ga Bulange  Omusumba w’essaza ly’Ekeleziya ery’e Masaka, Serverus Jjumba enkya ya leero akyaddeko ku Bulange e Mmengo embuga enkulu ey’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda. Ono e Mmengo ayaniriziddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ngali wamu ne baminisita mu gavumenti ya Kabaka wamu n’abakungu abalala.  Mu kumwaniriza, Oweek. Mayiga agambye nti ng’Obwakabaka, baasanyuka nnyo Jjumba bweyalondebwa okuddira Omusumba John Baptist Kaggwa eyawummula omwaka oguwedde.  “Ebyenjigiriza wano mu Uganda tuyinza okugamba nti Buddu ekwata kisooka olwa masomero enkumuliitu, Omusumba Joseph Kiwanuka geyateeka kumpi ku buli kigo. Bw’okola ku by’obulamu neby’enjigiriza kumpi buli muntu oba omaze okumuteekateeka,” Mayiga bwagambye.  Mayiga agambye nti Omusumba Jjumba bamulinamu essuubi ddene era n’amusuubiza enkolagana ennungi ku lw’omubulungi bw’abantu Ekeleziya wamu n’Obwakabaka bwebaweereza. Katikkiro ng’ayaniriza Omusumba Serverus Jjumba mu Bulange Ajjukizza Omusumba nti essaza ly’avaamu ery’e Buddu kkulu nnyo si mu Ekeleziya mwokka wabula Obwakabaka wamu ne mu by’obufuzi bya Uganda.  Agambye ssaabaminisita wa Uagnda eyasooka Ben Kiwanuka, nzaalwa y’e Masaka, abalala mulimu Katikkiro Mayanja Nkangi, ne Joseph Mulwanyammuli.  Katikkiro era asiimye nnyo Omusumba olw’okwerekereza emirimu emingi nasalawo okugenda okubalamusaako olw’omukago gwebalina okukuza eggwanga eddungi “Ennaku zino Obwakabaka bulina kaweefube w’obuntu bulamu naye tukimanyi awo Ekeleziya wesimbye. Bwetunaakolaganira awamu tujja kujjawo enjogera egamba nti Uganda bwetyo. Tetusobola kukkiriza bintu bikyamu bitwalibwe ng’ebituufu olw’okuba ensi eyise mu bintu eby’enjawulo n’ekirowoozesa abantu nti obubbi, obugwenyufu n’ebirala ebifaanana bwebityo bituufu,” Mayiga bwagambye.  Mungeri endala, Katikkiro era atangaazizza nti tewali kukoonagana wakati w’eddiini n’obuwangwa.  “Eddiini etunyweza mu buwangwa n’ennono zaffe. Sirowooza nti Yeezu yajja kudibya byamunsi muno. Bishop bwajja kabonero kanene nnyo akalaga nti eddiini, obuwangwa n’ennono abitegeera bulungi era kyakuyiga eri ffe ffenna,” Mayiga bwagambye.  “Nebaza aba CBS ne BBS olw’enkolagana eno etuzzaamu nnyo amaanyi,” Jjumba bwagambye.  Mu kwogerakwe, Omusumba Jjumba abadde awerekeddwako ssaabakiristu w’eMutukula Regina Nalubega Kitaka, omubaka wa Kakuuto mu palamenti Kalemba Christopher, Everest Kayondo wamu n’omukungu Kiyimba Freeman, agambye nti basanyufu nnyo olw’enkolagana Obwakabaka gyebulina n’Ekeleziya gy’asabye okugenda mu maaso.  Yagasseeko nti Obwakabaka, gavumenti yawakati wamu n’Ekeleziya enkolagana yaabwe siyakyeyagalire wabula eteekeddwa okubaawo kubanga baweereza abantu bebamu.  Asiimye Obwakabaka olw’okutumbula ekirime ky’emmwanyi n’agamba nti ddala kituufu emmwanyi terimba. “Ekigambo kino nagamba nti kiteekeddwa okussibwako omulaka; amaka gafune omulimu oguyingiza essente era akabonero kaffe mmwanyi,” Jjumba bwagambye.

headline: Olulyo Olulangira lutonedde Buganda Kulaani.
text: Olulyo Olulangira olwe United Arab Emirates lutonedde Obuganda ebitabo eby’enzikiriza y’Obuyisiraamu (Quran) lukumi (1000) awamu n’ebiwempe (carpets) bitaano ebyokutuulako mu muzikiti. Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka Dr. Twaha Kawaase nga ali wamu n’abasiramu abafunye kulaani. Sheikh Saeed Bin Makhtoum Bin Rashid Al Makhtoum owe Jebel Ali,mu Dubai yatonye ebitabo bino.Bino bizze oluvannyuma lw’okukyala kwa Nnabagereka Sylivia Nagginda mu Lubiri e Jebel Ali, nga 17 February 2019 n’ekigendererwa eky’okunyweza enkolagana n’obwakabaka bwa Buganda.Olwaleero omumyuka waKatikkiro asooka era Minisita w’eby’emirimu n’obuyiiya, Prof. Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, akwasizza mu butongole abantu ab’enjawulo ebitabo bino bagende banyikize wamu n’okusasaanya enjiri ya Allah subhanahu wa ta’ala.Owek Kaawaase abasibiridde entanda ey’okwekwata Quran nga eky’okulwanyisa mu biseera ebizibu.

headline: Ab’e Masaka bakungubagidde Omusumba Kaggwa
text: Masaka – Buddu Essaza lya Ssaabasajja Kabaka erya Buddu wamu n’ebitundu ebirilaanyewo bali mukiyongobero nga bagenda mu maaso okukungubagira omusumba omuwumuzze Rt. Rv. Dr. Bishop John Baptist Kaggwa eyafudde ku Lwokuna. Omusumba w’essaza lye Masaka eyawummula kati omugenzi Bisoopu Kaggwa “Bishop Kaggwa ng’ essaza lye Masaka ate n’eklezia katolika mu Uganda okutwaliza awamu tugenda kumusubwa nnyo olw’ensonga nti abadde atakabanira nnyo obumu mubantu bonna nga tasosodde ggwanga nga tasosodde ddiini” bwatyo Fr. Ronald Mayanja ow’amawulire mu sssazza lye Masaka bwe yagambye. Fr. Mayinja yatendereza okwagala Bisoopu Kaggwa bwabadde alina eri abaana abato kuba abadde abasembeza era nga olumu asamba nabo omupiira. Omusumba Kaggwa abadde yakamala okujaguza emyaka 25 egy’obusumba era nga omwaka ogujja abadde agenda kujaguza emyaka 50 mu buweereza bw ‘obusaseredooti. Okusinziira ku Fr. Mayinja, Omusumba Kaggwa yakola nnyo okuddaabiriza lutikko era nga aguddewo ebigo eby’enjawulo nga alwana okulaba nti abakulisitu bafuna emmisa yonna gyebali. Ono yagambye nti Omusumba Serverus Jjumba afiiriddwa nnyo kuba kano ke kaseera wabadde asinga obwetaagira omusumba Kaggwa asobole okumulung’amya olw’ensonga nti yeyamuddira mubigere. Era ategezezza nti enteekateeka z’okuziika zijja kufuluma oluvanyuma lw’olukiiko lw’abepiskoopi okutuula e Nsambya. Bbo bannamasaka boogedde ku mugenzi nga omuntu abadde ayimirira ku mazima era atalya bigambo bye era nga singa wabaawo ekitagenda bulungi nga abakulu abagambako. Kato Ronald yannyonnyodde nti Bisoopu Kaggwa yabawa ente z’amata ez’olulyo nga ayitira mukitongole ky’ekrezia ekya Karitas Maddo wabula nga abaganyulwamu tebawulibwa mu diini n’amawaanga. “Omusumba Kaggwa tuviriddwako omuntu abadde atuwumbawumba, atukumaakuma, atubuulirira era atugambako”. Bwatyo Mmeeya w’ekibuga kya Masaka omulonde, Florence Namayanja bwayogedde kumugenzi. Ate ye omubaka Mary Babirye Kabanda yamwogeddeko nga abadde amusajja omwetowaze, atasosola mubantu omuli abagagga n’abaavu era nga buli muntu amuyita kumukolo ajja. Ebyafaayo by’omusumba John Baptist Kaggwa Bishop Kaggwa yazaalibwa e Bulenga mu Wakiso mu mwaka 1943. Yafuna obusaseredooti mu 1972, naweebwa obusumba nga 19/12/1994 ate natuuzibwa nga omwepiskopi nga 24/6/1995.  10//10/1998 lweyakwasibwa okusumba essaza lye Masaka.  Kaggwa yasomera e Lubaga Boys 1952 okutuuka 1957 ate 1958 nayingira Kisubi Seminary. Bweyaveeyo yeegatta ku Katigondo Major Seminary ate bweyava eyo naweerezebwa e Roma okwongera okusoma. Mu 1970 yaweebwa obudyankoni e Roma nga wa myaka 28 era eyo nafunayo Ddiguli ezawererako ddala.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba asabye gavumenti eggulewo amasomero
text: Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda Dr.Steven Kazimba Mugalu, alaajanidde gavumenti eggulewo amasomero abaana basome. Dr. Kazimba yategeezezza nti, “Tusaba gavumenti erowooze ku ky’okuggula amasomero nga abakulembeze bonna bamaze okuwaayo engeri ezinagobererwa okwewala ekirwadde ki COVID19.” Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba Mugalu Okwogera bino Ssaabalabirizi abadde aggalawo omusomo gw’ekibiina ekitaba bannabyanjigiriza mu nzikkiriza ya Kurisito ez’enjawulo wamu ne bannakyewa e Namirembe ku Lwokusatu. Ono yalaajanidde gavumenti obutongezzaayo kusoma kwa mwaka guno naye bweggulawo  ereke okusoma kweyongereyo okutuuka mu mwezi gw’okusatu. Kazimba era yasabye abaana abali mu bibiina ebikomekerezza emitendera egy’enjawulo basooke baweebwe omukisa okudda ku ssomero. Bannabyanjigiriza  balaze nga bwekisoboka abayizi mu bibiina ebimu okusoma ku  mpalo nga  kumakya ate abalala nebasoma olw’eggulo okusobola okukendeeza omujjuzo. Abamu ku beetabye mu musomo Bano bagamba nti, omuggalo gubanyigirizza  nnyo era nga abasomesa tebakyasobola kweyimirizzaawo n’amaka gabwe ate nga n’abazadde abaana babazitoweredde. Kinajjukirwa nti emyezi gigenda kuwera ettaano nga abaana baziddwa eka okwewala okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde ki COVID19 mu ggwanga.

headline: Owek. Nsibirwa asabye bannaddiini okutegeka ebiyinza obayimirizaawo nga bawummudde
text: Omumyuka wa Katikkiro owookubiri, Owek.Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa asabye bannaddiini okutandikawo emirimu egyenjawulo mwe basobola okuggya ensimbi mu kiseera nga bawummudde emirimu gy’okusumba abantu ba Katonda. Bino owek. Nsibirwa abyogeredde Bulemeezi ku mukolo gw’okusonda ensimbi okuzimba Ssemaduuka w’Obulabirizi bw’e Luweero ku Lwomukaaga. Owek.Nsibirwa agamba nti ebiseera ebisinga bannaddiini bwe bava mu buweereza, basanga okusoomoozebwa okwebeezaawo olwokuba ebiseera byabwe ebisinga babimala basumba bantu ne batategekera biseera byabwe bya mu maaso. Omukolo guno gwatandise n’okusaba okwakulembeddwamu Omulabirizi w’Obulabirizi buno, Eldard Nsubuga asabye bannaddiini bonna n’abantu ba Katonda okubwakwasizaako ku mulimu guno gusobole okuvaamu ebibala. Omulabirizi Eldard Nsubuga agambye nti yavaayo n’ekirowoozo ky’okuzimba Ssemaduuka ono okusobola okuwagira abaweereza ba Mukama abeetaaga okukwatizaako mu kiseera nga bawummudde kuba abamu embeera yaabwe okweyimirizaawo ebeera nzibu ddala. Kinajjukirwa nti Omulabirizi Nsubuga ye yatandika enteekateeka eno, era ekizimbe kino kyali kyatandikibwako kyokkaekiseera kyatuuka ensimbi ne ziggwaawo ne kiyimirira, ekyawaliriza okutegeka omukolo guno Obukadde obusobye mu 25 bwe busondeddwa ku mukolo guno nga Owek.Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa awaddeyo obusawo bwa sseminti 120 buyambeko ku mulimu guno.

headline: Ab’e Masaka Beekalakaasa Lwa Kukwatibwa Kw’abakulembeze Babasiraamu
text: Nalubega mukyala wa Ssali n’abaanabe  Okwekalakaasa mu divisoni ya Katwe-Butego ne Kimaanya-Kyabakuza mu kubuga ky’e Masaka kuyingidde olunaku olw’okusatu oluvanyuma lw’okukwatibwa kw’abakulembeze babasiraamu omukaaga okuli, Umaru Nsubuga ow’e Namaseenene, Lamulah Nakyeyune ne mutabaniwe ab’e Butego, Twaha Kayondo ow’e Kijjabwemi, Noordin Ssali n’omulala eyategeerekeseeko erya Bashir ababeera ku kyalo Kigamba. Okujjako Nakyeyune, abasigadde bakulembeze ku mitendera egy’enjawulo mu mizikiti egy’enjawulo. Abenganda zabano bagamab nti abantu baabwe baakwatibwa abasirikale ba gavumenti naye nga tebaabagamba nsonga eyabakwasa. Abenganda wamu n’emikwano baagala kumanya lwaki bano baakwatibwa okumala ennaku ezikkirizibwa mu mateeka ng’ate tebabatutte mu kkootii. Nga bakulembeddwamuAbdu Nasser Mutebi neHadaad Kibirige, baategeezezza nti bagezezzaako okunonya abantu baabwe ku Poliisi ez’enjawulo naye nga buteerere. Omukaaga guno gwakwatibwa okuva nga May 18 nga baasooke ne Nsubuga. Okusinziira ku nnyina, Scholastica Nanteza, ono era yakubibwa amasasi mu magulu bweyali agezaako okudduka. Ono yassibwa ku mpingu era naatwalibwa mu makage agaayazibwa, abasirikale ne bagenda nebiwandiiko byebasangamu. Ono yatwalibwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Masaka ng’avaamu omusaayi muyitirivu. Yateekebwako omusaayi omulala kyokka teyalongoosebwa era enkeera naatwalibwa ku kitebe ky’amagye e Mbuya mu Kampala. Maama we agamba teyakkirizibwa kuyingira era okuva olwo, taddangayo kumuwuliza. Mu kiro kyekimu, Kibirige agamba era abasirikale baakwata Lamulah Nakyeyune owemyaka 53 ne mutabani we. Ate ku Lwokutaano wiiki ewedde, Twaha Kayondo owemyaka 61 nga Imaam w’e Kijjabwemi, Noordin Ssali wamu ne Bashir nabo baakwatibwa. Mukyala wa Kayondo, Mariam Nalubega yakubidde omulanga omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Masaka Herman Ssentongo okuyingira mu nsonga eno okulaba ng’omwamiwe ateebwa oba atwalibwa mu kkooti. Omwogezi w’eggye lya UPDF atwala enkambi y’e Kasijjagirwa, Maj. Flavia Terimulungi, yategeezezza nti sibebalina abakawte bano. Ono kyokka yasabye abengganda bano okuba abakkakkamu ng’a bwebagezaako okuzuula wa abantu baabwe gyebali. Edward Walugembe, ssentebe w’ekyalo Kigamba yategeezezza nti tebeebuuziddwako g’abantu bano bakwatibwa kyeyagambye nti kikyamu kubanga abakozi b’ebikolobero bayinza okukozesa omukisa guno okuwamba abantu. Mu 2017, Nsubuga ne Nakyeyune baakwatibwa kubyekuusa kukuttibwa kweyali omwogezi wa Poliisi Andrew Felix Kaweesi. URN

headline: RCC Bamwine ayimirizza Imam w’Omuzikiti gw’e Masaka
text: Masaka -Buddu Omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Masaka, Fred Bamwine, ayimiriza Imam w’omuzikiti omukulu e Masaka, Abbas Nseera oluvannyuma lw’obutakkaanya obwaliwo ku ntandikwa ya wiiki eno ekyavaako n’Abasiraamu okugajambula Omusiraamu Yasin Kakomo nga bamulumiriza okutunda emmaali y’Obusiraamu. Ku Lwokubiri, Imam Nseera, yategeeza abasiraamu nga Kakomo bwe yali amutumidde omuntu ng’amulabula okumutta singa tamwesonyiwa. Ekiragiro RDC Bamwine akiweeredde mu woofiisi ye mu lukiiko lw’ebyokwerinda lwe yayise omuli amagye, poliisi n’abakulembeze b’Obusiraamu olubadde mu woofiisi ye jjo ku Lwokuna. Ayimirizza n’omumyuka wa Imam ku muzikiti guno, Twaibu Kaweesi Maalo. Bamwine agamba nti okusinziira ku kunoonyereza kwe baakoze baakizudde nti Imam n’omumyuka we baakibogwe era bw’atyo kwe kulagira disitulikiti Kadhi agira abazza ku bbali kuba Imam okwongera nti baagala kumutta, teyasooka kulowooza ng’omukulembeze Awadde Kadhi amagezi bano abazzeeyo mu ttendekero ly’aba Imam bamanye engeri ensonga bwe zirina okukwatibwamu. “Woofiisi ya Imam etwalibwe Disitulikiti Kadhi wabula ba Imam musooke mubazimbe mu ngeri y’obukulembez, baleme okwabuluzaamu abasiraamu.” Bamwine bw’annyonnyodde. Bamwine alumiriza nti ku lunaku lwe baagoba Kakomo mu muzikiti mwalimu abatali basiraamu era ebyonna ebyaliwo byali bitegeke. Kyokka Disitulikiti Khadi w’e Masaka , Swaibu Ndugga  yeemulugunyizza n’agamba nti ensonga eno tekwatiddwa na bukugu kuba Imam Nseera yalondebwa mu lwatu. Shiekh Ndugga agamba  nti obuzibu ku nsonga eno buva ku ttaka lye Ssembabule eryatundibwa nga Sheik Kakomo yeekobanye ne Mufti Mubajje era awakanyizza ne ssemateeka wa Old Kampala gwe baasomye okuyimiriza Nseera kuba bo b’e Kibuli. Eyakiikiridde DPC w’e Masaka, Majidu Wepukulu , yasabye RCC akkirize era alagire n’abo Imam b’alumiriza okwagala okumutta, baleme kudda era naye kye yakkirizza. Wabula abasiraamu ekyokuyimiriza Imam Nseera tekibawomedde era ne bennyamira olwa RCC Fred Bamwine okusalawo nga tamaze kubeebuuzaako.

headline: Ssaabasumba Ssemogerere ayambaziddwa ekyambalo ekimukakasa ku bukulu buno
text: Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu erye Kampala Paul Ssemogerere aweereddwa ekyambalo ekimukakasa ku bwa Ssaabasumba ekiyitibwa Paliyam. Ekyambalo kino kimwambaziddwa Paapa Francis mu missa y’olunaku lw’omutukuvu Paul ne Petero mu eklezia ya St. Peter’s Basilica e Vatican mu Roma. Emmisa eno eyimbiddwa pope Francis etandiise nakusinza Katonda wakati mu maloboozi amasenekerevu okuva mu kkwaaya, n’abasumba okuva mu mawanga ag’enjawulo n’abantu ba Katonda abalala. Mu missa eno pope Francis mwasinzidde nategeza nti Eklezia kifo kya bulyomu omuli abanaku, abaggaga abonoonyi nabantu abebiti byonna era nasaba abantu ba Katonda bulijjo okwaniriza abantu awatali kwelabira.  Paapa era ateegezeza nti eklezia terimu mitendera nga buli muntu yenkanakana ne munne awatali kusosola. Oluvanyuma ba Ssaabasumba abawerera ddala 44 okuva mu mawanga 32 baweereddwa ebyambalo ekibakakasa kubwa Ssaabasumba ekiyitibwa Paliyam nga mubatuuse ku kkula lino mwemuli ne ssabasumba wessaza ekkulu erye Kampala Paul Ssemogerere. Abalala bavudde mu bitundu ebyenjawulo okuli; Italy, Malawi, Congo, Uganda, Argentina, Molovia n’amalala.

headline: Obwakabaka bukungubagidde omusumba Kaggwa
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukungubagidde omusumba w’essaza lye Masaka eyawummula John Baptist Kaggwa eyafudde ku lunaku Lwokusatu muddwaliro e Mulago. Owek. Nsibirwa nga asoma obubaka bwa Katikkiro Mayiga Mu bubaka bwa Katikkiro obumusomeddwa omumyuka wa Katikkiro Asooka era Minisita w’ebyensimbi mu Bwakabaka Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, mukitambiro kya mmisa mu lutikko e Lubaga, Obwakabaka busiimye omugenzi okumakuma abantu b’Omutanda mu ssaza lye Buddu. Kamalabyonna Mayiga atendereza omugenzi olw’okwagala ennyo ekika kye eky’Embogo nga abadde yenyigira mu mirimu gyakyo okulaba nga kikulaakulana. Obwakabaka busaasidde nnyo omukulu w’ekika Jjajja Kayiira olw’okuviibwako omuzzukulu ow’omugaso. “Embeera z’omusumba John Baptist Kaggwa zisaana zibeere eky’okuyiga eri ffe abakulembeze” ekimu kukitundu ky’obubaka bwa katikkiro owek. Charles Peter Mayiga bwekisomye . Ku lulwe, Owek. Nsibirwa ayogedde ku mugenzi nga omusajja omwetowaze era namwebaza olw’okuyamba ku kibiina kya Rotary bwebaali basonda ekizimbe omulina okujjanjabirwa abafunye obubenje muddwaliro e Nkozi era nga naye mukitibwa kye yeetaba mukwoza emmotoka basobole okuweza ssente. Ate akuliddemu okusoma mmisa era Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga, asinzidde wano nasaba abantu okukuuma emirembe era nasabira abakuuma ddembe bakole omulimu gwabwe mubutuufu. Ssaabasumba Lwanga yenyamidde olwa bannabyabufuzi abamu abatandise okulumiriza abaganda nga bwebasosola mu mawanga olw’okulonda bannabwe nagamba nti akaseera katuuse eggwanga litambulire ku nkola ya Federo buli kitundu kikole ku byakyo. Abantu ab’enjawulo bayogedde ku mugenzi nga muno mulimu bwanammukulu wa lutikko y’e Lubaga Archiles Mayanja amwogeddeko nga omulwanirizi w’eddembe ly’obuntu. Ye Cansala w’essaza lye Masaka, Rev. Edward Sekabanja era nga yakiikiridde n’omusumba Jjumba, ayogedde ku mugenzi nga abadde omuntu ate omuzadde omulungi. Ku lwa gavumenti eyawakati Minisita John Chrysestom Muyingo nti obubaka bwa gavumenti bwakujja mukuziika naye atendereza omugenzi olw’empisa era ayagala ennyo abantu. Bbo ab’enju y’omugenzi abakuliddwamu muganda we ategerekese nga Makumbi bamwogeddeko nga omuntu omumalirivu era asonyiwa akaseera konna. Ekitambiro kya mmisa kino kyetabiddwako bannaddiini okuva mu nzikiriza ez’enjawulo, abakungu bagavumenti, abakungu ba Kabaka wamu ne bannabyabufuzi. Emmisa eno ekoleddwa mungeri ya Sayansi Okusaba okutangira okusasaanya ekirwadde kya kovidi 19 wabula kino tekirobedde bantu kweyiwa wabweru wa kelezia okusobola okwetaba mu mmisa eno. Omusumba Kaggwa ajjukirwa nnyo olw’okuvaayo nasonyiwa abakuumaddembe ababalumba ku kiggwa ky’embogo bwebali bakung’aanye okumanyagana naye nebakubwamu ttiyaggaasi olw’ebyali bigambibwa nti Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine yali wakwetabamu.

headline: Omusumba Kaggwa alese alaamidde ensi
text: Masaka Omusumba w’essaza lye Masaka omuwummuze era omugenzi kati Bisoopu John Baptist Kaggwa alina ekiraamo kyalekedde ensi era nasaba abantu okukinywererako basobole okuwangula. Omusumba Kaggwa aziikiddwa e Bukalasa Obubaka buno bwanjuddwa omusumba Serverus Jjumba mu missa y’okusabira omugenzi ku seminale e Bukalasa mu Masaka, leero ku Lwomukaaga. “Katonda kwagala, naffe tumwagale ate buli omu ayagale munne. Buli muntu asonyiwe oyo yenna eyamukola obubi,” byebyo ebigambo Omusumba Kaggwa byeyasembye okukuutira abakkiriza. Okusinziira ku musumba w’essaza lye Masaka Bisoopu Serverus Jjumba obubaka buno kumpi obufuuse ekiraamo yabuwadde omu ku bantu ababadde bagenze okumulaba muddwaliro e Mulago. Omusumba Jjumba n’abantu bonna aboogedde ku mugenzi batendereza obwetowaze bwe wamu nokubeera omukozi era omuntu abadde ayagala ennyo ekika kye. Ono ategeezezza nga bwasaaliddwa ennyo okufa kwa Kaggwa kubanga afiiridde mukiseera nga yakamala okukwasibwa obusumba bw’essaza lino era nga yetaaga okuwabulwa. “omuntu wawansi asembayo, noyo amuddirira , naali mumasekkati, awamu noyo asooka waggulu bonna banyoreddwa olw’okufa kwa musumba Kaggwa olw’engeri ennungi gyabadde yeyisaamu” omusumba Jjumba bw’agambye. Ekitambiro kya Mmisa ekisiibula omusumba Kaggwa kikulembeddwamu ssentebe w’abeepisikoopi omusumba Anthony Zziwa eyasiimye omugenzi olw’okubeera omukozi ennyo. Abakungubazi abalala abeetabye ku mukolo guno kubaddeko Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, bannaddiini ab’enjawulo, abakungu bagavumenti, ababaka ba palamenti awamu n’abantu abalala omuli aba ‘Friends of the Bishops’ ekyatandikibwawo mikwano gy’omugenzi.

headline: Ssaabalamuzi asabye bannaddiini bamuloopere abalamuzi abalya enguzi
text: Kampala Abakulira essiga eddamuzi mu ggwanga, basabye bannaddiini okubaloopera abalamuzi abalya enguzi era babaweereko n’obujulizi, kibayambe okulwanyisa omuze guno oguttattanye ekifaananyi ky’essiga lino.  Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Chigamoy Owiny-Dollo, ye yakoze okusaba kuno bwe yabadde asisinkanye ekibiina ekitaba enzikiriza ekya Inter-Religious Council of Uganda (IRCU) ku Mmande, n’ategeeza nti okulumiriza kwe baafuna tekubaako bujulizi. “Tusaba mwe abaweereza ba Katonda okubeera amaaso n’amatu gaffe ebweru eyo mu bantu. Tujja kubaako bye tutuukako ng’abantu, singa abantu nga mmwe, mutuwa amawulire amatuufu ku balamuzi abalya enguzi,” Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo bwe yagambye. Okusaba kuno kuddiridde akulira abalamuzi, Dr. Flavian Zeija, okusaba bannaddiini okuloopa abakoze b’ekitongole ekiramuzi abalya enguzi wamu n’obujulizi obubaloopa bakolebweko. Bannaddiini bano baabadde bakulembeddwamu; Mufti Shaban Ramadhan Mubajje, Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga, Dr. Daniel Matte, Dr. Joseph Sserwadda ne Bisoopu Joshua Lwere ne Ssaabawandiisi IRCU, Charles Kasibante. Bano baatenderezza bannaddiini olw’omulimu gwe bakoze ng’okutumbula tekinologiya ayambye okwanguya emirimu mu ssiga lino, okusigala nga bawa abantu obwenkanya mu kiseera kya Ssennyiga Corona awamu n’ebirala. Baasabye essiga okukola ku nsonga y’enguzi naddala ng’omuntu aweebwa akakalu ka kkooti, okukozesa obubi obuyinza, abalamuzi okuwulira emisango gye batalinaako buyinza, okukandaaliriza emisango wamu n’abalamuzi abamu okubulwa obuntubulamu. “Abalamuzi abamu tebatya kusaba nguzi era nga bakozesa bakiraaka ba kkooti okugisaba,” Mufti Shaban Mubajje bwe yannyonnyodde. Ssaabalamuzi abasabye okuwaayo olukalala lw’abalamuzi abalya enguzi wamu n’emisango egikandaaliridde wamu ne kye balowooza ekivuddeko kino. Bannaddiini baasuubizza okukolaganira awamu n’essiga eddamuzi okulaba nga bamalawo ekizibu ky’emisango okulwawo okuwulirwa. Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo yagambye nti basuubira okutendeka bannaddiini ku ngeri gye basobola okutabaganyaamu abantu, kiyambeko emisango egimu obutagenda mu kkooti. Bano bakkiriziganyiza okusisinkana buli luvannyuma lw’akaseera okulaba engeri enteekateeka y’okukendeeza ku misango bw’etambula kubanga si buli musango nti gwetaaga kugenda mu maaso ga Mulamuzi.

headline: Bannaddiini bakonkomalidde ku woofiisi ya Ssabawandiisi wa EAC
text: Mufti Mubajje  Bannaddini eb’egattira mu mukago gwa East African Council for Religious Leaders -Religions of Peace, beemulugunyizza ku kyebayise, okutulugunyizibwa n’okuyisibwamu amaaso, Ssabawandiisi w’okumukago ogugatta amawanga agali mu buvanjuba bwa Africa (East African Community), Ambasada Librat Mfumukeko. Abakulu bano nga bakulirwa Mufti wa Uganda, Sheikh Shaban Ramathan Mubajje baabadde bakyaddeko ku kitebe ky’omukago guno ekiri mu kibuga Arusha ekya Tanzania oluvanyuma lw’okuyitibwa Mfumukeko. Bwebaatuuse ku kitebe kino, babawadde obutebe awalindirwa abagenyi kussawa ssatu n’ekitundu wabula zaweze essaawa munaana nga tabannakolwako ekyabawalirizza okwabuka. “Ekikolwa kino kiweebuula nnyo era kiraga butali bugunjufu. Omukago guno gusuubira gutya okukolagana n’abantu nga Ssabawandiisi wago bwati bwayisa abagenyi beyeeyitidde. Abadduggavu tebeeyisa bwebati,” Mubajje bweyategeezezza. Ssabawandiisi wa Bannaddiini bano, Dr Francis Kuria yategeezezza nti bagenda kutuusa okwemulugunya kwabwe eri akulira omukago guno era nga ye mukulembeze wa Rwanda Paul Kagame wamu n’abakulembeze ba mawanga agakola omukago guno okuli Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania ne Burundi.

headline: Omuwereeza Esther Namukasa agatiddwa ne munne Richard Kitaka e Namirembe
text: Omuweereza wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka agattiddwa mu bufumbo obutukuvu. Esther Ruth Namukasa yagattiddwa ne munne Richard Kitaka mu Lutikko ya Paul omutuukirivu e Namirembe. Rev. Abbel Mmereewooma yeyakoze omukolo ogw’okubagatta. Yabasibiridde entanda ey’okubeera abakkakamu era buli muntu agumiikirize munne kubanga baakulira mu maka ga njawulo agalina enneeyisa, empisa n’endabamu y’ebintu ey’enjawulo. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yeebazizza Esther olwemirimu gy’ObwaKabaka gyakola, era naamusaba agende mu maaso. Kamalabyonna yategeezezza nti ebimu kubiremesa abakozi obutanywera ku mirimu kubanga ewaka tewali mirembe. Yasabye abafumbo okwetegekera obufumbo nga bwebeetegekera embaga, okwanjula oba okukyala kubanga bangi beerabira embeera y’omubufumbo nebatunuulira ebirala. Esther Namukasa muweereza mu minisitule y’enkulaakulana y’abantu nensonga za woofiisi ya Nnabagereka. Omukolo gwetabiddwako; Namasole Margaret Siwoza, Ssaabaganzi, Baminisita ba Kabaka, abaweereza b’Obwakabaka nga bakulembeddwamu omuwandiisi w’enkalakkalira Nantege Josephine, n’abakungu abalala bangi.

headline: Dr Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu atuuziddwa nga Ssabalabirizi omuggya
text: Dr Kaziimba ku kkono ng’alabibwa eri abantu   Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda omuggya, Dr. Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu atuuziddwa mu butongole Ku mukolo guno obwakabaka bukiikiriddwa Katikkiro, Charles Peter Mayiga, Nnabagereka Sylivia Nagginda, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ku ddyo mu kanzu, Maama Nabagereka Syliva Nagginda, Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga nga bali n’omulabirizi omuggya Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka era Minisita w’enzirukanya y’emirimu n’obuyiiya Owek Pulofeesa Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, Omumyuka wa Katikkiro ow’okubiri era Minisita w’eby’ensimbi, Oweek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, Omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda Oweek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, Namasole Margaret Siwoza, Omulangira Kassim Nakibinge Kakungulu, Baminisita ba Kabaka, n’abaami ba Kabaka abawerako. Mu bubakabwe, Katikkiro agambye nti, okuva ku kkono, Dr Kassim Nakibinge Kakungulu, Oweek. Twaha Kigobo Kawwase wmau N’okwekitiibwa Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa “Tukwenyumirizaamu nnyo olwobutasuula nnono n’okubeera musajja wa Kabaka . Mu buweerezabwo olumirwa nnyo Bannayuganda n’esonga ezibakwatako. Okubeera Ssaabalabirizi buvunaanyuzibwa bunene. Nesiga nti Katonda ajja kukubeera okozese obuyinza bwakuwadde twongere okufuna emirembe n’okutebenkera wamu nenkulaakulana,” Mayiga bweyasibiridde Kaziimba.  Yagasseko nit ennaku zino ebikolwa eby’obukambwe n’ettemu bingi nnyo, n’abantu bangi nnyo abalina obusungu ku mitima, ate n’abakirisito bangi bali mu bwavu. N’amusaba nga Ssaabalabirizi okufuba okulungamya abantu bonna okusobola okuvuunuka okusomoozebwa oko.  Ssaabalabirizi omuggya, asuubizza okukyuusa embeera z’abantu naddala okukwata ku baana abalenzi nabo basobole okufuuka eb’omugaso mu ggwanga. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abantu abalala bangi omuli bannaddiini okuva mu nzikiriza endala, bannabyabufuzi okubadde n’omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, mukyalawe, Janet Museveni sipiika wa palamenti Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga n’abalala bangi

headline: Kyasusse e Namboole nga Kabaka aggalawo egy’amasaza.
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga akwasa Kapiteni wa Bulemeezi ekikopo Bulemeezi ewangudde empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza bwekubye Busiro goolo 1-0. Kyaddondo ekutte kyakusatu oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Buddu goolo 2-1.Ssesse lye Ssaza eriwangudde ekirabo ky’empisa.  Omugenyi wa Kabaka ow’enjawulo okuva mu UNAIDS, Natalie Rigard, azze okulaba engeri obuganda gyebubugirizaamu Omutanda n’ekigendererwa eky’okusaasaanya enjiri ey’abasajja okubeera abasaale mu kwekebeza akawuka ka mukenenya.

headline: Busiro ekubye Buweekula 3-1 n’etangaaza emikisa gyaayo
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Busiro ekubye Buweekula ggoolo 3-1 ne lyesogga oluzannya oluddako olwa “Kwota fayinolo”  Omupiira guno guzannyiddwa ku kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Center e Njeru Lweza era ng’ekibinja kya “Bulange” leero lwe kifundikiddwa. Ggoolo za Busiro ebbiri ezaasoose zaateebeddwa Gerald Ogweti mu kitundu ekisooka ate mu ddakiika ezisooka, ekyasannyalazza emikisa gya Buweekula okuwangula omupiira guno. Ggoolo eyookusatu eyateebeddwa Arafat Usama mu kitundu ekyokubiri . Ggoolo ya Buweekula emu yokka yateebeddwa Steven Kimayo kibinja kino era nga kino kitegeeza nti Busiro yayiseewo ng’ekulembedde ekibinja n’obubonero 10 wamu ne Busujju eyitiddewo mu kyokubiri . Amasaza okuli erya Kyaggwe ne Buvuma, tevudde mu kibinja nga Kyaggwe ekutte kyakusatu n’obubonero 5 ate nga Buvuma esembye n’obubonero 3.

headline: Kyaddondo eremaganye ne Ssingo 2-2
text: Ttiimu y’essaza ly’e Ssingo erikulemberwa Mukwenda, eggyeeyo n’agoomubuto okufuna akabonero ku ttiimu y’essaza lya Kyaddondo esoose okukulembera omuzannyo ng’omupiira nga gwakatandika wali mu kisaawe kya FUFATechnical Centre e Njeru. Aba Kyaddondo be basoose okufuna ggoolo eteebeddwa omusambi Kenneth Kimera era ekitundu ekisooka kibadde tekinnaggwaako aba Ssingo ne bateeba olwo ne gubeera ggoolo 1-1. Wayise eddakiika ntono nnyo ng’ekitundu ekyokubiri kitandise, omusambi Kenneth Kimera n’addamu okulengera akatimba olwo ne gubeera 2-1. Mu ddakiika ezisembayo ez’omuzannyo, omusambi Micheal Kayongo asobodde okufunira ttiimu ya Ssingo ggoolo eyookubiri olwo ne gubeera ggoolo 2-2. Mu mupiira guno omuzibizi w’essaza Kyaddondo, Fred Ntambi afunye kkaadi emmyufu bw’atyo n’aweebwa ekkoligo lyakusubwa emipiira esatu miramba era eno ye kkaadi emmyufu esoose mu mpaka z’omwaka guno. Ebivudde mu mupiira guno biraga nti Kyaddondo esigaddeyo ku ntikko y’ekibinja Masengerenga bw’erinda ekinaava mu mupiira wakati wa Kabula ne Gomba.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe atongozza akakiiko k’omupiira gw’ebika
text: Minisita wa Buganda ow’abavubuka emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, atongozza akakiiko ak’omupiira gw’ebika ogw’ebigere akagenda okukuza empaka zino era n’okwongera okusitula omutindo gwazo. Minisita Ssekabembe nga atongozza akakiiko k’empaka z’Amasaza  “Enteekateeka eno egenderedde okusitula omutindo, okuzza ekitiibwa, ettutumu n’abawagizi okudda mu kisaawe mu kikopo kino eky’ebika. Ng’Obwakabaka tulowoozezza nti kikulu okuvaayo n’enteekateeka ennung’amu eteekeddwa mu buwandiike. Ffe tujja ne tuweereza naye tuli bayise ng’omuntu yenna anajja wano gy’ajja okugoberera okuzimba ekikopo kino.” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe olukiiko luno olulondeddwa luliko abantu 8 era nga be baweereddwa eddimu ly’okulaba ng’emipiira gy’ebika gikwata abantu omubabiro. Minisita Ssekambebe ategeezezza nti Julius Kabugo yalondeddwa nga Ssentebe, amyukibwa Ssejjengo Sulaiman ne Samuel Mpiima agenda kubeera muwandiisi wa lukiiko. Abalala abatuula ku lukiiko luno kuliko; Hassan Badru Zziwa, Hajji Sulaiman Magala, Katabira David Davis, Samuel Mpoza ne Katikkiro w’ekika ky’Enseenene. Minisita ategeezezza nti obuvunaanyizibwa bw’olukiiko luno butandikiddewo era bano baweereddwa okutuuka mu myezi Gwokusatu okuvaayo ne alipoota ku ngeri gye bagenda okutambuzaamu emirimu gyabwe, esobole okwanjulirwa kabbineeti. Amyuka Ssentebe w’olukiiko luno, Sulaiman Ssejjengo, yeeyamye eri Minisita nti bajja kukola byonna okulaba nti omuzannyo gw’omupiira gw’ebika gudda engulu kuba bagumanyi era babadde bagulaba. “Omukisa ogutuweereddwa tugenda kugukozesa Mukama wange nga twebuuza ku bantu abangi ennyo abakwatibwako ensonga eno, kuba ebika ebisukka mu makumi ataano birimu abantu bangi era bangi ku bano emipiira gino bagitunuulidde.” Ssejjengo bw’agambye.

headline: Ebifaananyi : Ebibadde mu Kabaka Birthday Run 2022
text: Ebimu ku bifaananyi ebiraga engeri emisinde gye gyagenze mu maaso mu Lubiri lwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka e Mmengo mu Kyaddondo.  Beene nga akwasibwa omujoozi gw’emisinde gy’omwaka guno.  Omutanda nga asimbula abaddusi mu buwanvu obw’enjawulo.  Kabaka Mutebi, Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda ne Katikkiro.  Omulangira Wasajja nga awayaamu ne Katikkiro Mayiga  Olubiri lwakubyeko abantu awatali kusosola mu myaka.  Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga bamulaga abamu ku bagenyi ab’enjawulo abeetabye mu misinde gino.  Mayiro ya Kabaka Anjagala yonna yakwatiridde abantu abazze okwetaba mu misinde gino

headline: Gomba ne Buddu zigenze ku fayinolo
text: Ttiimu ya batabani bakitunzi e Gomba ey’omupiira gw’ebigere bawangudde Busiro bwebatyo nebayitawo okugenda okuzannya fayinolo ate nga Buddu ewangudde Bulemeezi nayo neyitawo era nga kati yakubulonda ne Gomba.  Ttiimu zombi zasoose kulemaganya nga tewali alengedde katimba ka munne mu ddakiika z’omuzannyo 90. Bano bagenze mu kakodyo k’okusimuligana peneti era wano Gomba newangula ku mugatte gwa ggoolo 5-4. Enjuyi zombi zakoze buli kimu okunoonya ggoolo naye nga emikisa tegiyitamu era okumaliriza nga ttiimu zombi zirumbye obunnya. Mu mupiira omulala wakati wa Buddu ne Bulemeezi guwedde Buddu eguwangudde ggoolo 1-0 era ng’eno eteebeddwa omusambi Titus Ssematimb mu ddakiika ey’okutaano. Mu ddakiika zonna eziddiridde wadde nga Bulemeezi efunye emikisa naye kibadde kizibu okunyeenya akatimba ka Buddu era bwetyo Buddu newangula. Nga kati egenda kulumba Gomba battunke. Fayinolo ya Buddu ne Gomba yakomwa okulabwako mu mwaka gwa 2016 ku mupiira ogwaliko n’obugombe mu kisaawe e Namboole era nga guno Buddu yaguwangulira mu kakodyo k’okusimula peneti. Olunaku lw’okuzannyirako empaka ez’akamalirizo terunasalwawo wabula nga lusubiirwa okulangirirwa essawa yonna. Era nga Ssabasajja kabaka asuubirwa okusiima okuggalawo empaka zino.

headline: Kabaka agguddewo empaka z’amasaza 2022,  Buddu eremaganye ne Mawogola
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye naggulawo empaka z’omupiira gw’Amasaza ez’omwaka 2022, nga omupiira ogugguddewo gubadde wakati wa Buddu ne Mawogola nga guyindidde mu kisaawe kya Masaka Recreational Grounds mu Buddu. Kabaka azze abuuza ku bantu be mu bitundu eby’enjawulo ku biyitirirwa ebyategekeddwa wabula obudde buzze kubunabwo bwatuuse mu kibuga Masaka wabula olw’abantu abangi ababadde bamulindiridde, Omutanda asiimye nava mu mmotoka ze natambula okulamusa ku bantu be. Ku kisaawe Kabaka Mutebi atuuseewo ku ssaawa 9:00 ez’olweggulo era ayaniriziddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, Minisita w’Emizannyo Henry Sekabembe Kiberu, ne Ppookino Jude Muleke awamu n’abakungu abalala.  Omuteregga alambuziddwa ebirabo ebimuweereddwa oluvannyuma by’asiimye ne gafuuka Amakula era oluvannyuma alambudde ennyiriri z’abazannyi ba tiimu zombi Buddu ne Mawogola. Beene asiimye nawandiika ku mupiira nga akabonero akaggulawo empaka z’omwaka 2022 era nasiima nagusamba olwo omupiira negutandika. Mu kusooka, Katikkiro yatongozza empaka zino era naakwasa abaami b’amasaza emijoozi n’emipiira egiwandiikiddwako amannya g’amasaza gaabwe wamu ne ssemateeka afuga empaka zino okusobola okukuuma omutindo gwazo. Omupiira gubadde gwa bunkenke ku njuyi zombi nga buli ludda lufubye okunoonya ggoolo naye nga buteerere era omupiira guwedde 0:0.  Omuzannyo guno gulamuddwa Vincent Kavuma, ng’ayambiddwako abawuubi b’akatambaala, Zziwa Charles Edward, Mafumu Mustafa, Kiwanuka Vincent awamu ne Ssonko Mark nga kkomisona, ne Sam Mpiima. Kati Buddu ne Mawogola buli omu alina akabonero kamu nga balinze kulaba ani anaawangula ku ttiimu endala bwebali mukibinja Masengere.  MASENGERE GROUP Buddu Mawogola Ssingo Kyaddondo Buvuma Buluuli  BULANGE GROUP Buweekula Butambala Gomba Kooki Kabula Mawokota  MUGANZIRWAZZA GROUP Bulemeezi Ssese Bugerere Busujju Busiro Kyaggwe

headline: Ebitongole byongedde okugula emijoozi okwetegekera emisinde gya Kabaka
text: Ebbugumu mu misinde gyamazaalibwa ga Ssaabasajja buli lukya lyeyongera nga ne leero abantu Ssekinoomu wamu n’ebitongole bakulumuse okutuuka ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange Mmengo ne BBS Terefayina okugula emijoozi okusobola okwetaba mu misinde gino. Ebimu ku bitongole ebiguze emijoozi gino kuliko; Uganda Red Cross Society, BMK Group ne Hotel Africana, Ddungu Estates, CBS PEWOSA, Roofings awamu n’ebitongole ebirala. Bw’abadde akwasa abakungu okuva Ekitongole ki Uganda Red Cross emijoozi omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Prof. HAJJ. Twaha Kawaase Kigongo ategeezezza nti mumativu nti Mukenenya wakulinnyibwa ku nfeete nga kino kyeyolekera ku muwendo gwabantu abategedde ku bukulu bw’abadde abeekebeza awamu n’okwetangira ekirwadde ki Mukenenya.  Ssaabawandiisi wa Uganda Red Cross Society, Robert Kwesiga n’omwogezi w’ekitongole kino Irene Nakasiita bagamba nti nga bwebazze bakola neku mulundi guno basazeewo okwennyigira obutereevu mu nteekateeka eno kubanga ya byabulamu ate nga ekwata ku buli omu. Ye akulira kampuni ya BMK ng’eno yetwala Hotel Africana, Haruna Kalule Kibirige, yeebaziza Ssaabasajja olw’enteekateka zasaawo okutumbula embeera z’abantu era nawera okuziwagira obutakoowa. Mungeri yeemu Owek. Kawaase era akwasiza ekitongole ki Roofings emijoozi gyekigulidde abakozi baakyo nabo okwetaba mu misinde gino. Ate Minisita w’Abavubuka emizannyo nokwewummuzaamu mu Buganda owek. Henry ssekabembe Kiberu bwabadde akwasa Patriko Mujuuka emijoozi egiguliddwa omu ku bawuliriza ba CBS awangalira emitala wa Mayanja era akulira ekitongole ki DDUNGU ESTATES Rogers Ddungu akunze abantu ba Kabaka okugula emijoozi gino mu budde beewale okuseerebwa. Ono era akwasizza ne bannabitone aba B2C emijoozi era nasaba abalala okubalabirako basobole okuyambako okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino.  Mu balala abaguze emijoozi gino ku BBS Terefayina kuliko aba Bika byaffe Foundation nga bakulembeddwamu Bulasio kabule Mutanda ne Jamil Kivumbi, aba Bloemfontein CBS, CBS PEWOSA NSINDIKA NJAKE ETEETEREKERA SACCO e Lubaga. Mu buufu bwebumu Omuk. Guster Ntakke aguze emijoozi egiweze nasaba giweebwe abayizi mu masomero nabo okwetaba mu misinde. Owek. Ntake ategeezeza nti kino akikoze okunnyikiza ensonga eno mu mugigi omuto kubanga rye ggwanga eryenkya. Abalala abaguze emijoozi kuliko; Halal Supermarket, Ettendekero lya Makerere Business Institute awamu n’abalala.

headline: Empaka z’amasaza ez’eggaali zitongozeddwa
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda butongozezza empaka z’amasaza ez’eggaali ezigenda okubeerawo buli mwaka okujaguza emyaka ettaano egya BBS Terefayina gyemaze nga eweereza abantu ba Kabaka mu kisaawe ky’empuliziganya. Enteekateeka eno etongozeddwa mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokuna nga etuumiddwa ‘Kengere ya MTN ne BBS’ nga zakubaawo omwezi ogujja mu Buddu nga ziwagiddwa kkampuni y’ebyempuliziganya eya MTN n’ekitongole ky’Obwakabaka ekya Majestic Brands. Bw’abadde ayogerera ku mukolo guno ssenkulu wa BBS Terefayina, Omuk. Patrick Ssembajjo, ategeezezza nti kino bakikoze okuddiza ku bantu ababawagidde ebbanga wamu n’okutumbula omuzannyo guno. “Tuli basanyufu okuddamu okugatta amasaza ga Buganda nga tutumbula omuzannyo gw’eggaali era kiyambeko n’okukuuma abantu ba Kabaka kuba Beene abantu be abaagala balamu,”Omuk. Ssembajjo bw’annyonnyodde. Eyakiikiridde kkampuni ya MTN ku mukolo guno, Joseph Bogera annyonnyodde nti omuzannyo gw’eggaali mukulu nnyo mu Buganda era nga kkampuni basazeewo okugubbulula wamu n’okulaba nti bayimusa ebitone ebiri mu muzannyo guno. Ate ye Omwogezi w’ekibiina ky’abavuga obugaali mu Buganda (Buganda Cyclists Association), Mathias Lukwago agambye nti amasaza gasabiddwa okuteekateeka ttiimu zaago ezigenda okwetaba mu mpaka zino kisobozese okutumbula omuzannyo guno. Okusinziira ku Lukwago eggaali zitegekeddwa mu mitendera esatu okuli maanyi ga kifuba, eggaali eza ‘Changer’ awamu n’eggaali z’abakyala. Ono agamba ku lunaku olusooka eggaali za ‘Changer’ zakuvuga okuva e Masaka mpaka Kyazanga ku Lwomukaaga. Ate olunaku lwe lumu olw’eggulo eggaali maanyi ga kifuba zivugibwe kilomita 40 awamu n’emitendera emirala.  Abawanguzi ku mitendera okuli; ogwa abaami, abakyala awamu n’essaza erigenda okusinga bakuweebwa ebirabo ebiwerako era enteekateeka eno ejja kubeerangawo buli mwaka.

headline: Express etutte Crsypus Kusiima
text: Ttiimu ya Express FC ekansizza omukwasi wa ggoolo Cryspus Kusiima amanyiddwa nga “Gufi” okuva mu Tooro United. Crsypus Kusiima Kusiima endagaano awereddwa ya myaka 2 era nga ggoolo ya Express ajja kugivuganyako ne Mathias Muwanga. “Ndi musanyufu okwegatta ku Express era nesunga lwe ntandika okuzannya” Bwatyo Kusiima bweyategezezza omukutu gwa Express ogw’omutimbagano. Kusiima yegatta ku Tooro United ku ntandikwa ya sizoni ewedde oluvanyuma lwa ttiimu ye okusalwako nedda mu ‘FUFA Big League’

headline: Ab’ Engo bakubye  Embwa ggoolo 4-2 mu kikopo ky’ Ebika 2022
text: Bazzukulu b’ Omutaka Muteesaasira bakubye aba Mutasingwa ggoolo 4-2 mu mupiira oguguddewo empaka z’Ebika bya Buganda ez’omwaka 2022. Omupiira guno guyindidde mu kisaawe kya Kasana e Luweero mu Bulemeezi nga bino byonna bibadde mu maaso ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka eyasiimye naggulawo empaka zino. Ab’Engo bebasoose okulengera akatimba mukitundu ky’omuzannyo ekisoose nga bayita mu muzannyi Ssenabulya Frank wabula wayise mbale Batenda Ivan ow’ekika ky’Embwa nateeba ey’enkyenkanyi, Ssekiranda Derrick nateebera ab’ Engo ggoolo ey’okubiri. Omuzannyi w’ekika ky’Embwa Batenda Ivan naye azzeemu okuteebera ab’Embwa era ekitundu ekisoose kiwedde guli 2-2.  Ekitundu eky’okubiri kitandikidde mu bbugumu era muzzukulu wa Muteesaasira Ssenabulya Frank azzeemu okuteeba ggoolo negubeera 3-2. Mu ddakiika ntono Micheal Lubowa ateebye ggoolo y’Engo ey’okuna (4) era Engo nesitukira mu bubonero 3 ne ggoolo 4 netangaaza emikisa gyaayo okweyongerayo ku mutendera oguddako.

headline: Masaza Cup 2021 : Buddu ekubye Mawogola 6- 1
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu ekubye ttiimu ya Mawogola eggoolo 6-1 mu kibinja kya Muganzirwazza mu mupiira ogunyumidde abalabi mu kisaawe kya Fufa Technical Center e Njeru mu Kyaggwe. Buddu y’esoose okulengera akatimba mu ddakiika ya 33 ng’eyita mu muzannyiSharif “Diao” Ssengendowabula mu ddakiika ya 37, Mawogola efunye ggoolo y’ekyenkanyi ng’eyita mu musambi Abdul Kalanzine gubeera ggoolo 1- 1. Bwegutyo ne guwummula ekitundu ekisoose mu maliri. Omusambi wa Buddu, Marvin Kavuma afunidde Buddu ggoolo eyookubiri ne gubeera 1-2, wano Buddu ekoze enkyukyuka ezibadde ez’ensonga n’ereeta omuvubukaVianney Bukenya okudda mu nnamba yaIsma Lamitara. Mu ddakiika ya 66, Vianney Bukenya abadde yaakayingizibwa ateebye ggoolo bbiri nnamba ne gudda ku 1-4 okwongera okunyweza obuwanguzi. Omupiira bwegutuusemu ddakiika 85, Buddu efunye Penati eteebeddwa omusambi Bruno Bunyagaokuvamu kisobyo ekikoleddwa Fahad Nsamba ne gubeera ggoolo 1-5. Omuzannyi Brian Omirambeafunidde Buddu ggoolo mu ddakiika ye 89 ne guggwa ggoolo1-6. Kino kitegeezanti Buddu eyiseewo okuva mu kibinja Masengere okuzannya mu mutendera oguddako.

headline: Eby’emizannyo bikuuma obumu era ye Federo esooka – Owek. Kaawaase
text: Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro, Hajji Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo asabye abantu okujjumbira eby’emizannyo ebyenjawulo kuba bino bisobola bulungi okutumbula obumu n’okulaakulanya eggwanga. Bino Owek. Kaawaase abyogedde asisinkanye aba Great Strikers International abatumbula omuzannyo gw’ebikonde wansi wa Uganda Professional Boxing Championship nga ensisinkano ebadde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. “Eby’emizannyo bikuuma obumu kuba tebimanyi mawanga era ebyemizannyo ye Federo esooka bikung’aanya abantu bonna si nsonga bibiina ki era bwebajja beerabira gyebava nebakulembeza omuzannyo gumu,” Owek. Kaawaase bw’ategeezezza. Katikkiro Kaawaase ategeezezza nti emizannyo mikulu nnyo mu Buganda ne Uganda kuba binyweza obumu mu bantu ba Kabaka awamu n’okutumbula embeera zabwe kuba bisobolera ddala okuvaamu ssente. Ono asabye bamusaayimuto mu muzannyo guno awamu n’emirala egyetaaga amaanyi okukozesa ekiseera kyabwe kuba gyetaaga okufunamu nga omuntu akyali muvubuka kuba gyakoma okukula n’omutindo gukendeera. Ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’ Emizannyo n’Abavubuka awamu n’Okwewummuza, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu bano abeebazizza olw’okuwanika bbendera ya Uganda ne Afirika. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti Buganda eriko enkolagana gyeyagala okuteekawo wakati w’ abatwala ebikonde mu ggwanga okusobola okwongera okutumbula omuzannyo guno. Amyuka Pulezidenti wa Uganda Professional Boxing Commission, Abby Mugayi ategeezezza nti balina omulimu gw’okutumbula ebitone by’ abavubuka mu ggwanga.

headline: Cheptegei ne banne beesozze fayinolo za mmita 5000
text: Bannayuganda abaddusi b’embiro empanvu okuli; Oscar Chelimo, Joshua Cheptegei ne Jacob Kiplimo, bonna bayiseewo ne beesogga fayinolo z’empaka zino eza mmita 5000 eza Olympics eziyindira e Tokyo mu Japan. Chelimo yakutte kyakuna mu misinde egyasooseewo era ng’addukidde eddakiika 13:39:07, era nga zino ziwanguddwa munnakenya Nicholas Kipkorir Kimeli ( 13:38:87). Mu ngeri yeemuCheptegei (13:30:61) ne Kiplimo (13:30:40) bamalidde mu bifo ekyokuna n’ekyokusatu mu misinde egiwanguddwa Muhammad Katir owa Spain (13:30:10) ate ngaPaul owa America akutte kyakubiri. Kimanyiddwa nti mu mpaka zino, abaddusi abataano abasooka beesogga empaka z’akamalirizo ng’ezoomulundi guno zigenda kubeera mu kisaawe kya Olympic Stadium ku Lwokutaano. Mu mpaka zino eza Olympics 2020, Uganda yaakafunayo emidaali ebiri gyokka okuli ogwekikomo ne Ffeeza nga gyawanguddwa Cheptegei ne Kiplimo mu mpaka za mmita 10,000. Bannayuganda abalala okuli; Ronald Musagala, Shida Leni, Kirabo Namutebi, Kathleen Noble Grace, Catherine Nanziri, David Ssemujju, Shadir Musa Bwogi, Ambala Atuhaire, Albert Chemutai, Sarah Chelenget, Esther Chebet, Prisca Chesang, Winnie Nanyondo ne Halima Nakaayi, baawanduse dda mu mpaka zino.

headline: Beene asiimye okuggalawo empaka z’Amasaza, Tikeeti zituuse ku katale
text: Minisita wa Buganda avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo, abavubuka n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ategeezezza nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako nga Buddu etunka ne Buweekula okuzuula Nnantameggwa w’ekikopo ky’amasaza eky’omwaka 2021. Ekirangiriro kino Minisita Ssekabembe abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku nteekateeka z’empaka z’amasaza ez’akamalirizo ezigenda okusambibwa mu kisaawe e Kitende ku Lwomukaaga luno. “Okusookera ddala njagala okusinziira wano ku mbuga y’Obwakabaka okutegeeza Obuganda ne bannabyamizannyo bonna nti enteekateeka z’ekikopo ky’amasaza ez’omulundi ogwe 17 tuteeseteese okugifundikira ng’ennaku z’omwezi 5 ku kisaawe kya St. Mary’s Stadium e Kitende. Ekyo tewakyali kubuusabuusa era olunaku lwo Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda,” Minisita Kyewalabye bw’ategeezezza Minisita Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti tikeeti z’amasaza zatuuse dda ku katale nga ziri wakati w’emitwalo 2 n’emitwalo 5 era nga zitundibwa ku Majestic Brands e Bulange e Mmengo, amaduuka ga Airtel mu Kampala n’ amasundiro g’amafuta aga Total e  Buweekula ne Mawokota. Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe abagenyi abayite bajja kutuuka ku ssaawa 5 ate olwo Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga atuuke ku ssaawa 5: 30 ku kisaawe era yagenda okubeera omugenyi omukulu nga Mawokota ne Bulemeezi nga guno gwakutandika ku ssaawa 6 zennyini ez’omutuntu. Olwo ku ssaawa 8: 30 Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi atuuke ku kisaawe e Kitende olwo ku ssaawa 9 zennyini Buddu ne Buweekula butandike okubefuka wansi w’omulamwa, ‘Abasajja tube basaale okulwanyisa Mukenenya tutaase abaana ab’obuwala.’ Minisita Kiberu agamba nti bakukozesa emipiira gino okulwanyisa obutabanguko mu maka era nga byonna bakubikola n’abavugirizi okuli Airtel n’abalala. Ono asabye abantu okwanguwa okugula tikeeti zino kuba ekisaawe kino kifunda obutafananako ne Namboole. Kati ekirindiriddwa kwekulaba ani agenda okubeera omuwanguzi w’empaka z’omwaka 2021 wali e Kitende ku Lwomukaaga luno.

headline: Kabaka agguddewo emipiira gy’amasaza, Bulemeezi eremaganye ne Butambala
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II, agguddewo empaka z’omupiira gw’amasaza ez’omwaka 2020 leero ku kisaawe kya Njeru Technical Grounds. Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga awuubira ttiimu zombi Omutanda asiimye n’ateeka omukono gwe ku mupiira ng’akabonero akalaga okukkiriza emipiira gino okusambibwa. Era Kabaka awuubidde abasambi ku njuyi zombi ng’akabonero akabalambula kubanga ku mulundi guno kino tekisobose olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Nnyinimu atuuse ku kisaawe ku ssaawa 8:30 era ng’ayaniriziddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, Minisita w’ebyemizannyo, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, awamu ne Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Owek. Joseph Kawuki. Omupiira ogugguddewo empaka z’omwaka guno, gubadde gwa kibinja kya Butikkiro, wakati wa Bulemeezi abalina ekikopo kino nga battunka ne Butambala. Butambala y’esoose okulengera akatimba ng’eyita mu musambi Nsereko Sharif mu ddakiika eya 23 ey’ekitundu ky’omuzannyo ekisoose, wabula mu kitundu ekyokubiri, omuzannyi Kateregga Bernado n’ateeba ey’ekyenkanyi mu ddakiika ye 75. Olunaku lw’enkya Ssingo egenda kuttunka ne Buluuli mu kibinja kino kye kimu ekya Butikkiro. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mpaka z’omulundi guno, temuli bawagizi olwa Corona wabula ng’emipiira gyonna giweerezebwa butereevu ku mikutu gy’Obwakabaka egy’ebyempuliziganya.

headline: Manchester United ekansizza Ace okuva mu Real Madrid
text: Manchester United ekkirizza okukansa Ace Alvaro Fernandez Carreras okuva mu tiimu ya Real Madrid era nga atadde omukono ku ndagaano ya myaka ena. Okusinziira okumukutu gw’amawulire mu Spain ogumanyiddwa nga Spanish Publication AS, Manchester United ewanguddde okuvuganya okubaddewo mu kukansa omubuka ow’emyaka 17 nga asamba namba ssatu era nga agenda kubeera omuzannyi asoose okusayiningibwa Ole Gunner Solksjaer mu tiim ya Manchester United. Alvaro agenda kuzannyira tiimu ya Manchester United ento mukaseera kano naye nga yabadde asubiziddwa okuzanyira tiimu esooka era nga kino kyamusikiriziddwa nnyo okwegatta ku tiimu eno nessanyu erinji. Alvaro y’omu kubavubuka abato abalina ebiseera by’omumaaso ebitangaavu mu kapiira. Bweyali taneegatta ku tiimu ya Real Madrid yali mu Deportivo La Coruna era nga takyakadde bulunji ku Santiago Bernabeu. Real Madrid babadde bagaala okuuma omuvubuka ono era nga babadde baakumwongera ndagaano mpya naye Manchester United bamukubye akalimi nga bamutegeeza nga ebiseera bye oby’omumaso bwebiri ku Old Trafford era bamukansizza ku team omuli eya Barcelona ne Manchester city. Mungeri y’emu Manchester United bakyakola ku ky’okuleeta sita wa Borussia Dortmund Jordan Sancho ku Old Trafford era Ole ayagala sayidi y’omukono gwa ddyo nga nayo erina omuzanyi omututumufu ow’ensi yonna nga bwekiri ku kono ewali Wan Bisaka. Diiru y’omuwuwutanyi wa Aston Villa Jack Grealish nayo esuubirwa okugenda maaso nga newankubadde team eno eri mu lusuubo okuddayo mu ba namba lujega.

headline: Ibrahim Kayiwa azzeeyo mu Express
text: Omuzannyi w’omupiira Ibrahim Kayiwa azzeeyo mu ttiimu ya Express gy’aba asambira omupiira sizoni ejja.  Kayiwa ow’emyaka 25 yasazizzaamu endagaano ye ne ttiimu ya Tooro United era kati ono afuuse omusambi owa 13 okwegatta ku Express sizoni eno. Aba Express bakakasizza ng’ono bw’agenda okubayamba okuvuganya obulungi mu liigi. Okusinziira ku mutimbagano gwa ttiimu eno, Kayiwa yaweereddwa endagaano ya myaka ebiri. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri abawagizi ne bannamawulire nga bamwanjula, Kayiwa yagambye nti musanyufu okudda ku ttiimu eno kubanga e Wankulukuku waafuuka waka era n’asuubizza okubawangulira ebikopo. “Ndi musanyufu okudda ku Express kubanga ku nze wabeera waka.” Kayiwa bwe yagambye. Kayiwa yatandika okuzannyira Express FC mu 2014, nga yabateebera ggoolo musanvu ate n’ayambako okunyeenya akatimba emirundi kkumi miramba bwe yali tanneegatta ku SC Villa mu 2018 gye yava okugenda mu Busoga United (Kirinya Jinja SS) mu 2019. Kayiwa ye musambi owookutaano Express gw’ereese okuva mu Tooro United ng’abalala kuliko; Charles Musiige, John Byamukama, Godfrey Lwesibawa, ne Cryspus Kusiima.

headline: Cranes ewangudde South Sudan 1-0
text: Omuzibizi wa ttiimu ya SC Villa, Halid Lwaliwa, ateebye ggoolo esobodde okuwanguza Uganda Cranes omupiira gw’esambye ne South Sudan mu kibina B eky’empaka z’abavuganya okusamba mu mpaka z’akamalirizo eza AFCON.  Lwaliwa nga yaleeteddwa ku kisaawe okusikira Ronald Mukiibi eyafunye obuvune, akozesezza eddakiika entono z’abadde amaze ku kisaawe, okutomera omutwe oluvannyuma lwa Farouk Miya okusimula ekisobya. Obubonero buno obusatu Cranes bw’efunye, bugitadde ku mugatte gwa bubonero 7 okuva mu mipiira esatu era ne beenywereza ku ntikko y’ekibinja. Ate yo South Sudan y’ekoobedde wansi mu kibinja ng’ewanguddwa emipiira gyonna esatu gy’esambye. Wabula Uganda Cranes erumye n’ogwengulu okuwangula South Sudan era ng’ekitundu ekisoose kibabeeredde kizibu okuwaguza mu kisenge kya South Sudan. Abasambi ba Uganda Cranes mubaddemu; Denis Onyango (GK), Elvis Bwomono, Joseph Ochaya, Timothy Awanyi, Ronald Mukiibi, Mike Azira, Khalid Aucho, Faruku Miya, Emmanuel Okwi, Kizito Luwaga ne Derrick Nsibambi. Ku ludda lwa South Sudan kubaddeko; Majak Mawith (GK), Peter Manyang, Abdelkarim Mutwkl, David Omot, Rahan Malong, Stephen Lony, Jackson Morgan, Manyumow Achol, Makueth Wol, Tito Okello neIvan Wani.

headline: Omuzibizi  Ssentume Police F.C emwongedde endagaano
text: Oluvanyuma lw’okuwonera awatono okuddayo mu kibinja kya wansi, ttiimu ya Police F.C eyongedde okwenywezza bwewadde abamu ku bazannyi baayo endagaano empya. Ku Lwokubiri, endagaano ey’omuzibizi Joseph Ssentume yaziddwa buggya okumala emyaka emirala 3. Ssentume ye kapiteeni wa ttiimu eno era yakola kinene okugiyamba okumalira ku kifo eky’ e 13. Ono asuubizza okwongera ku mutindo kisobozese ttiimu okukola obulungi. Ssentume yeegasse ku basambi abalala  abayongeddwa endagaano ye; Yusuf Ssozi, Johnson Odong, Mubaraka Nsubuga , Edward Kiryowa, Dennis Rukundo, Bashir Kabuye ne Musa Matovu. Ku bano poliisi egasseeko abasambi abapya okuli; Tonny Mawejje, Hassan Muhmood, Tom Ikara Eric Ssenjobe ne Muwadde Mawejje okwongera okwenyweza.

headline: Enteekateeka z’omupiira oguggulawo emipiira gy’Amasaza 2021 ziwedde
text: Minisita wa Buganda avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek.  Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ategeezezza nti enteekateeka zonna ekikwatagana ku mupiira ogugenda okuggulawo empaka z’Amasaza eza 2021, ziwedde.  “Njagala okutegeeza Obuganda bwonna awamu ne bannabyamizannyo nti enteekateeka zonna eziggulawo emipiira gy’Amasaza 2021, ffe nga abateesiteesi tumaze okuziggyako engalo.” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye.  Bino Owek. Ssekabembe abitegeezezza bannamawulire enkya ya leero ku Lwokutaano mu Bulange e Mmengo.  Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, olw’okuba omupiira gwakusambibwa mu kiseera kya muggalo, abo bokka abayitiddwa ne baweebwa ebbaluwa be bagenda okwanirizibwa ku ssaawa 7 era batuuzibwe mu bifo byabwe.  Ate ku ssaawa 8 zennyini Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ajja kutuuka era ayanirize Beene ku ssaawa 8 n’ekitundu, olwo ku ssaawa 9 omupiira wakati wa Gomba ne Kyaddondo gutandike ku kisaawe kya Fufa Techincal Centre e Njeru.  Owek. Ssekabembe asabye abayitiddwa okukuuma ebiseera era bakuume emirembe era omupiira guno gugenda kuweerezebwa butereevu ku CBS ne BBS Terefayina.  Ssentebe wa ttiimu y’essaza ly’e Gomba, Kabugo Mansur  ategeezezza nti alina essuubi okukola ebyafaayo mu maaso ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka era asuubira nti ku mulundi guno Kyaddondo terina w’egenda kubayita.  Ate ye akulira ttiimu ya Kyaddondo,  Charles Kisekka agamba nti bamukisa okuba nti be bagenda okuggulawo empaka z’omwaka guno mu maaso ga Beene nga kijja kuba kizibu essaza lye okuwangulwa kuba balina  ebitone ebipya.

headline: Buddu yeetegekera kumegga Mawogola mu mpaka eziggulawo ez’Amasaza 2022
text: Abaddukanya ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu batuula bufoofofo nga beetegekera okwaniriza Ssaabasajja Kabaka wamu n’okuzannya omupiira oguggulawo empaka z’omupiira gw’Amasaza ez’omwaka guno 2022 nga battunka ne ttiimu ye Mawogola ku Lwomukaaga luno nga 25/06/2022 ku kisaawe kya Masaka Recreational Grounds. Bano nga bakulembeddwamu Ppookino Jude Muleke balonze akakiiko ka ttiimu y’essaza lino akagenda okukola ennyo okweddiza ekikopo ky’essaza lino era Ppookino akakasizza nti olw’okusiima emirimu akakiiko akakadde gyekakola konna kazzeemu okuweebwa emirimu. Ssentebe w’akakiiko kano ye Lutaaya Joseph ate Minisita Harunah Kyeyune Kasolo n’omubaka Francis Katabaazi Akakiiko kano Ppookino Muleke akasabye okukolera awamu nga tebataddemu byabufuzi okusobola okukomyawo ekikopo mu Buddu. Mu ngeri yeemu akakiiko akalala kalondeddwa okuteekateeka omukolo Beene Ssaabasajja Kabaka kwagenda okuggulirawo empaka z’omwaka guno era kano kategeezezza nti kakukola kyonna okutegeka omukolo ogujja mu kitiibwa ky’Empologoma. Ssentebe w’akakiiko kano, Omubaka omukyala owa Kyotera Fortunate Nantongo ategeezezza nti beetegese bulungi naye nakunga abalina obuyambi bw’ensimbi n’ebirala okubuwaayo. Okusinziira ku Nantongo ku mulundi guno abantu abagenda okubeera awali ebiyitirirwa okukyuusaamu ku nnyambala nga kuluno bakwambala makanzu n’abakyala busuuti okwongera okuweesa omukolo ekitiibwa. Buddu yeerina ekikopo ky’omwaka oguwedde oluvannyuma lw’okukuba Buweekula 2-0 okutwala ekikopo kino nga ku luno eggulawo ne batabani ba Muteesa ab’e Mawogola.

headline: Kiplimo awangudde zzaabu
text: Munnayuganda omuddusi w’emisinde, Jacob Kiplimo ow’emyaka 19, awangudde emisinde gy’okwetooloola ebyalo egya World Half Marathon Championship ng’agiddukidde eddakika 58:49 n’asitukira mu mudaali gwa Zzaabu nga gibadde mu ggwanga lya Poland. Omuddusi Kiplimo Ate ye Munnayuganda omulala, Joshua Cheptegei amalidde mu kifo kyakuna mu misinde gino era ng’agiddukidde eddakika 59:21 era nga guno gwe mulundi gwe ogusoose okudduka emisinde gino. Abantu ab’enjawulo bavuddeyo okuyozaayoza Kiplimo ne Cheptegei ku buwanguzi buno era nga Minisita w’eby’enjigiriza n’ebyemizannyo era mukyala wa Pulezidenti Museveni, Janet Kataaha Museveni, ayitidde ku kibanja kye ekya Twitter n’abasiima olw’okuwanika bbendera ya Uganda. “Yogaayoga Jacob Kiplimo olw’okuwangula #WorldHalfMarathon mu ddakika 58:49. Naawe Joshua Cheptegei yogaayoga olw’okumalira mu kifo ekyokuna. Tubeenyumirizaamu, mugende mu maaso era Katonda abawe omukisa,” Mukyala Museveni bw’awandiise. Munnakenya omu ku babadde basuubirwa okusitukira mu mpaka zino Kibiwott Kandie, akutte kyakubiri mu ddakika 58:54 n’aweebwa omudaali gwa siliva ate Amedework Walelegn enzaalwa ya Ethiopia n’akwata ekifo kyakusatu n’eddakika 59:08 n’abuukayo n’omudaali gw’Ekikomo.

headline: Arsenal egobye abadde omutendisi waayo
text: Tiimu y’omupiira gw’ebigere egukyangira amukibinja kyaba binywera ku Lukalu lwa Bulaaya eya Arsenal egobye abadde omutendesi waayo U, oluvanyuma lw’okukubwa eggulo tiimu ya Eintracht Frankfurt nga eno egukyangira Bigirimaani, ggoolo 2 -1. Mukiwandiiko eri abannamawulire, Josh Kroenke, omu kabannayini tiimu eno, yategeezezza nti babadde tebasobola kugenda mumaaso na Unai ng’ono ava mu ggwanga lya Spain olw’omutindo omubi tiimu eno gweriko. Nga bwebanonya anamuddira mubigere, Kroenke yategeezezza nti Freddie Ljungberg alondeddwa okugiranga atendeke tiimu eno. Arsenal yeemu kuttiimu za Bungereza ezisinga amanyi wabula ennaku zino ebintu tebigitambulira bulungi anti buli tiimu egikwatako ewuttula mputtule.
